movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Most important thing in life is happiness. I'd like to offer you two our special cocktails. May I?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Very well. This cocktail is prepared for you. It's called 'Flame of Love.' You see its red color? It's reminiscent of a rose in the dark night. So passionate, so brilliant.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: This one is for you. It's called 'Emerald Green.' The green of the emerald symbolizes the vigorous vitality of love, full of hope. Please enjoy slowly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Don't you want to try it?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: "I didn't expect you to do something like this to me."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: "Do you know what I've given up to have what I have today? I simply cannot afford to lose."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: So, you can afford to lose me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: I gave you the opportunity to leave. It's your own failure to take it. It's fate. If you were me, would you let me go?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: I would try to find a solution.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: "Don't try to be so noble. I don't believe a word you men say. If you were truly willing to sacrifice for me, you wouldn't have come to me at this time. If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: I've finally seen you for what you truly are, Zhao Bing. You are a villain.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: "Are you judging me? What right do you have to judge me? What kind of person are you? Don't you know yourself?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: In these ten years, I've never done anything that wronged you. I even thought about... being together with you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Do you really have feelings for me? If it weren't for that girl leaving you ten years ago, would you be with me, huh? Don't think I don't know why you're with me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: I have something to say to you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: What did you guys talk about?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "Ten years," said Xu Decai, "it all seems like a dream."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: What will you do next? Will they still hunt you down?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "Let's burn the boats," said Xu Decai. "At least they won't find this place tonight, will they?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "I picked this place, they can't find it even if it kills them. Why do you guys insist on violence over a cup of coffee? When will it end?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "Bro, she must be rich now, right? Why not ask her for some money? You can run away and I can save my daughter. Wouldn't that be the best of both worlds?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "I'm afraid you have the life to get money," said Xu Decai, "but not to spend it."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: "Well, I don't care, as long as I can save my daughter," he said. "It doesn't matter whether I live or die."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: Don't be naive, everything will be settled after tomorrow.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Who owns the car at the door?

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Stop it, bro, put down the chair for now. I've been looking for you for several days, last time we hit the wrong person.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: What the hell is a box?

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Red-clothed Little Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Big Brother, I took the box. It's in the trunk. I haven't touched it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Blue-clothed Little Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: "You are such a waste, always upsetting Big Brother, you look like a joke. How are we ever going to make it out here?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: "My box really hasn't been touched, right?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Blue-clothed Little Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Then you should just keep your mouth shut.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: On behalf of our team, I extend our deepest apologies to you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Blue-clothed Little Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: "We are all professionals. Let's leave contact information."

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.speaker: Blue-clothed Little Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Add your Weibo, and follow you, to be your fan.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: Brother, the box has been found, brother.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver's wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: Driver, come back quickly. Someone has paid for our daughter's surgery, and the operation will be done tomorrow morning.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: Let, let, let, let, let that person who paid, wait for me urgently, I'll be back immediately.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver's wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: I don't know who paid, but Dr. Zhang said someone asked him to pass a letter to you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: What? Quickly ask him to read the letter to me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Driver's wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: Hold on, let me read it to you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: "Brother, when you see this letter, I will have temporarily lost my freedom, but my heart is free." "I have hated you for these ten years, but now I understand that I should hate myself." "There is a card in this letter with some money in it, which I have saved over the years." "Take your wife, kids, and Yang Shan back to our hometown with seven streetlights, and wait for me."

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.speaker: Lyrics
movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: The wind is cold, the rain is pouring, the night is helpless, but the dream is still beautiful, inside and outside of the dream are burning hot, with your hand leading, our hearts are synchronized, you are warm, then nothing else matters.

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: "What's your purpose from Penglai to our Central Plains?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: To find the nine famous swords in the world and fulfill my master's last wish.

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: "That's just a legend, it may not be true."

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: "If the master said it exists, it exists."

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: "Say, will you help me find the divine sword?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: "Unless the heavens and the earth are reversed and the sun and moon change color."

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: Grandpa, I swear, I will avenge you, I will kill Huyan Dazang no matter what.

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: Wait a minute, there is no one in the world against whom swords or guns are useless. In fact, I have a unique soft armor for protection, you can't hurt me, I can't beat you, so give this knife back to you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: So you're also going to find the Marquis in purple.

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: Maybe I'll have to fight him too.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Brother, I have something to attend to, I have to leave first.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Alright, take care.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Little boy
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Uncle, uncle, give me some money, I haven't eaten for three days, I'm so hungry.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Stop

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Who are you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, are you okay, hey

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: You're awake?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Did you save me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: I just bandaged you up.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Thank you, miss.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: You don't need to thank me. Your wound, although not too severe, but you lost a lot of blood, are you okay?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Your sword

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Thank you

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Your appearance doesn't seem to be from the Central Plains.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: I'm from Penglai.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Did you kill the leader of the Shandong Martial Arts Alliance, Bai Sankong?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: We had a martial arts contest and he lost.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Did you also kill quite a few heroes in the Central Plains martial arts?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "It's either they die or I die."

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "You are the biggest enemy of our Central Plains martial arts, I can't believe I saved you, should I kill you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "If you regret saving me, you can kill me now."

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Zhu Er, how come you're here?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: What's it to you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Turns out the proud daughter of the Mad King would also hide in this wilderness to steal a man.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: What did you say?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Miss Wang is really capable.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "If you continue to talk, I will kill you."

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Nice, why don't you try to kill me, I'm afraid you don't have the guts.

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "I suggest you be more respectful."

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: Who are you anyways?

movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_240_420.text: "Do you want to compete in martial arts with me?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Li Xiaoran
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: It's not a duel, it's a beating.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: A group of servants
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Ah, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "Why did you kill him?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "Didn't you want to kill him just now?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others? Oh, where are you going?

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: I have other things to do. I helped you kill him. You helped bandage my wound. We owe each other nothing.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: He deserved to die.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Hey, I'm going to follow you. You have to help me explain. You killed the person. It has nothing to do with me. Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice. I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: I
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Servant
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Servant
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Hurry and bow to your master.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: What are you planning to do?

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: You should leave.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran, I have no way to survive if I go back.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: I'm going to a duel this time. My life is uncertain. Thank you for taking care of me these past few days. Please, go back.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: What about your family?

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "I have no family."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Friend? Speaking of friends, you're the only one.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "I won't let you leave."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Huyan Dacang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "You would even kill friends."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Brother Wang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Brother Wang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Brother Wang
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: I would like to show the Marquis something, please.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: Please, Purple Marquis, come out of hiding, Please, Purple Marquis, come out of hiding, Please, Purple Marquis, come out of hiding.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: I am here for the Way of the Sword, hoping you can enlighten me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: A man
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: It turns out that he wanted to use the blade of the people of Penglai to kill Purple Marquis. Too bad the people of Penglai were so useless. Now Purple Marquis has boarded the ship and returned to his solitary island.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: No, Purple Marquis never went back to the solitary island, instead, he was quietly sent back to the Baiyun Monastery.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Daozhang
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: Come on, good, let's have a drink first.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: Both of you, both of you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Daozhang
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: My old friend here was just keeping me company in sword practice!

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: Excellent, with Drunken Hero present, the duel between Daozhang and the Penglai person can be said to be foolproof.

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Daozhang
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: 'It should be more perilous than auspicious, I am afraid.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.speaker: Drunken Hero
movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: What, are you going to duel with the person from Penglai?

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Yes, that's him, the one who is looking for all the famous swords in the Central Plains, Huyan Dazang.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Oh, no wonder. I think he's coming for your Red Sky Sword.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: I have fought him before. So I want to practice the sword with Daozhang.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: You are still alive, why didn't you come to find me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: I thought I wouldn't survive. Okay, eat.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Great, I hope the prince can use the unique moves of Penglai people and feed Daozhang. Daozhang must be looking forward to it.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: "Why do you always follow me? This decisive battle is inevitable, you should leave."

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: I can't believe that no one in this world is attached to me anymore. No one cares about me, no one pays attention to whether I live or die.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: You still have your father, he will care about you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Following him, I might as well join the White Water Palace and follow my grandmother, you really don't care about me, you really want to let me go.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: "My master once told me a story about his youth. He had a deeply rooted love. One day, he went to a duel. My master killed his lover by his own hands. From then on, he had no worries and pursued swordsmanship wholeheartedly and eventually won the duel."

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: "Do you also want to kill me? Two days later, you will have a life-and-death duel with Red Pine Daozhang. So, you don't want me to be a stumbling block, do you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Then why haven't you left yet?

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: "If I don't leave, would you really kill me?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Now I am all alone. No one cares about me. I'd rather die under your sword. I don't regret it, I just hope you can remember me. I want you to tell me, if you ever liked me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.text: "I don't want to die without knowing why."

movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.text: "You can eat now, while you were resting," "I went out and caught a wild rabbit," "Hurry and eat."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Marquis Zi Yi
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Yes, Drunken Hero and Master Qingkong have already left. There's nothing much for us to do here. By the way, there's something I need to tell you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Marquis Zi Yi
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: I know you have always wanted to know about your background.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Marquis Zi Yi
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: 'Yes, but there are some details that still need to be clarified. Your mother’s name was Bai Yanzhu, the number one heroine in the martial world. She was brave and decisive, admired by many in the martial world. However, because of her personality, she didn't easily pay attention to many people. Until one day, your grandfather met an outlander hero outside Qingping Manor. His name was Huo Feiteng. It was at this time that your mother also met this outlander hero. However, your grandfather was strongly opposed to this relationship.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Marquis Zi Yi
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: How about it, did you find Da Zang?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Maid
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: 'As per your order, we went to the bamboo forest but hadn't reached it yet.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Another maid
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: We saw flames reaching the sky.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Maid
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Upon closer inspection, it turned out that the Taoist priests of Wudang had burned down the house. There wasn’t a single shadow around.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Zhu’er, let’s see where you can run.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Mu Lang Shen Jun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: 'As long as Bēn Yuè is captured, Marquis Zi Yi will obediently go to Baiyun Temple.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Hu Yan Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: I really hope my wounds heal quickly. Once they do, I’ll head to Baiyun Temple as soon as possible.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.speaker: Mu Lang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Zhu’er is very safe with Wang Dian. I think even heroes can’t resist the beauty’s charm.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Your mind is lost.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: When I came to Central Plains, it was to fulfill my master's wish, I didn't expect to meet you all.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: You're in love with her, aren't you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Tuocheng Junzhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: You two, dinner is ready, come in quickly.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "Aren't you the same?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "My matters aren't as simple."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: In these matters, men should take the initiative, you wouldn't let the girl speak first, would you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "This is not the time to talk about private affairs."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Tuocheng Junzhu is a good girl, you have to cherish her, if you miss her, you may lose her.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: The more you cherish, the harder it is to get sometimes.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Even if I get beaten to death, I want to go to Baiyun view.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Zuixian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Mr. Huo, this is a very dangerous step that Fang Baoyu is forcing me to take. You better think it through.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "I have thought it through."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Zuixian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Here, this book is the secret sword manual passed down from ancestors.You must bury yourself underground for nine days to complete the cultivation, remember to be free of distractions.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: You're here.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "With you in Baiyun Guan, I'm assured."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Is everything arranged properly?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Chisong has been killed by Huyan Dazang. Wudang is now in chaos and they vow to confront Zi Yi Hou and Huyan Dazang for a clear explanation.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: How can Zi Yi Hou and Huyan Dazang not fall into our trap when we swap sincerity with insincerity?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: "You're still as cunning and deep-planned as ever. On the ninth day of the ninth month, we will definitely catch them all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Isn't the position of the martial arts alliance leader yours by then? Our next task is to remove all the obstacles, to completely destroy Shaolin and Wudang.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.speaker: Zuixian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: I know, I shouldn't have given him the secret manual. Fang Baoyu only knows a few rudimentary martial arts skills. How could he possibly achieve what those martial arts masters can't?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: The old man
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: But, but, what else can I do? He insisted on trying, if we don't let him, isn't he going to the White Cloud Temple anyway, isn't he still going to his doom, what do you have to complain about, at least you have a son to keep you company here, what exactly do you want, why aren't you speaking, if you don't speak I'll smash this gravestone, who are you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: White Water Saintess
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: "You're not worthy of knowing." "Why are you causing trouble here?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: The old man
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: "What's the big deal? He is a good friend of mine. He told me, he doesn't want this gravestone anymore. So I'm helping him change it."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: White Water Saintess
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: This gravestone was handcrafted by me, I won't tolerate your reckless behavior.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: White Water Saintess
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: "You destroyed the grave, I will have you torn to pieces."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: I have trained the True God Technique. I have mastered the God Technique! I have mastered the God Technique!

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Old Sir
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Thank you for your hard work, healing my wounds must have depleted much of your qi.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "You should rest well for now."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: White Water Holy Mother
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Who are you, daring to hide in the graveyard of the Beyond-the-Borders Flying Eagle?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "Why lure me to this place in the dead of night?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: White Water Holy Mother
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: I ask you once more, why destroy the graveyard of the Beyond-the-Borders Flying Eagle?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: That's none of your business.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Purple Marquis

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Fang Baoyu

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Purple Marquis, how come you are here?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Your martial arts have improved a lot. Who taught you?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "It's a long story,"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Old Sir
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: You talk about how fortunate this young man is. If you hadn't allowed him to practice martial arts, even the heavens wouldn't have agreed. I regretted giving him the secret manual at first, but if he managed to master the technique, it would truly be destiny.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Purple Marquis, what are your plans now?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: I was originally on my way to the Baiyun Temple to save Benyue.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: That's perfect, I'm also heading to Baiyun Manor.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: I've heard about it, and you've already agreed to do a job for White Water Holy Mother.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: There's nothing wrong with that, as long as it doesn't go against my interests, why not work for the Bai Shui Palace?

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: That's true, after all, those so-called righteous martial arts factions are also out to kill you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Stop dragging me into this, Tuochen and I are actually quite worried about you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "There's nothing to worry about,"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: I've talked to White Water Holy Mother, and I think some of the things she said make a lot of sense. We can't afford to fight head-on.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "Tomorrow will be different," "a real contest of martial arts cannot rely on scheming alone."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: That's true, but, tactics are still important, just follow my lead when the time comes.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Fellow martial artists, today is the day we elect the leader of the martial world. Originally, we wanted to decide through a contest of martial arts, but the Demon Cult meddled, and now they have surrounded Baiyun Temple, intending to launch a deadly attack on our Central Plains martial community.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: "Fight them!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: People in the martial arts conference
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: We will fight her, we will fight her.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: Yes, we are going to have a decisive battle with her. But we can't be as divided as we are now. We don't have time now to slowly elect a martial arts leader anymore. We can't be like before, one by one competing on the stage. We need every bit of strength to fight against the devil sect. Therefore, today Wang Dian is not talented. I would like to recommend myself as the master of the martial arts. If anyone disagrees, they can come and challenge.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: A man next to her
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: I oppose, the mother of this Wang Dian hero, not only is a member of the evil sect, and his daughter is also closely related to Huyan Dacang.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: Yes, my mother is from the devil sect. My daughter, due to confusion at one point, got involved with the devil sect. Zhu Er, today I want to tell you all, I Wang Dian in order to uphold justice in the martial arts world, I have already killed my mother, Mrs. Wang. Today, I will give my daughter to everyone. Let you all watch and decide.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: People in the martial arts conference
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: Good, Good, Good, Good. "We recommend Wang Dian Hero to be the leader of the martial arts community." "Vote for Wang Dian Hero to be the leader of the martial arts community." "Wang Dian Hero for the leader of the martial arts community." "Leader, leader, leader, leader, leader, leader, leader."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: Today, the first thing we are going to do is to exterminate the devil sect.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.speaker: Bai Yanzhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_1860_2040.text: Wang Dian, are you going to fight or not, what about, are you scared?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: I challenge you to a duel, for Zhuer.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: If I win, you have to hand over both the Red Cloud Sword and Zhuer to me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: "You seem very confident," "Let me tell you," "You can dream on about taking the Red Cloud Sword." "As long as I have a breath left in me, I will never allow my daughter to be with you!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: Hold on, I will duel you

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: The man in white
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: "Hold on""Wang Dian""Huyan Dazang is challenging you for the Red Cloud Sword and the title of Wulin Alliance Leader""But what qualifications does this person have to challenge Huyan Dazang?""Does defeating him mean defeating you and gaining both the title and the sword?""I can tell you""Huyan Huyan Dazang is my sworn son""He has the right to represent me in the duel""If he loses, I will immediately leave the Baiyun Temple""and never step into the Central Plains martial arts world again""But what does this person have to do with you?""What right does he have?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: Fang Baoyu is the descendant of Bai Sankong, the Green Willow Swordsman. He comes from a distinguished family and has deep ties with our Wang family. Today, I will betroth my daughter to Fang Baoyu.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: The man in white
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: If that's the case, then let's fix the duel for the day after tomorrow.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: I will accompany you till the end

movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2040_2220.text: Ben Yue, Ben Yue, Ben Yue, are you awake?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: Ben Yue I tell you, I will not be with Zhu Er. I will marry you tonight.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: Actually, having Fang Baoyu and Zhu Er marry was the leader's strategy, just for show.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: "Ben Yue, young lady, it's all my fault for being reckless. My intention was to disrupt Huyan Dazang's composure. I never imagined Ben Yue would be so determined and passionate, willing to die for love, almost causing an irreversible mistake on my part."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: I've decided, tonight we will have Ben Yue marry Master Fang Baoyu.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: What are you doing here? What have you done?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Person
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: What's up with this Fang Baoyu? Why isn't he here yet?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: Why, why did you lie to me? Say something!

movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_2220_2400.text: Fang Baoyu, I never want to see you again, not in this life or the next.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: Ben Yue, Ben Yue, what are you doing?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: You killed me, you killed me, you killed me, you killed me!

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: Get away, go enjoy your wedding night with her, don't come and bother me, don't come and bother me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: "Zhu Er, what exactly happened between you and Baoyu last night?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: That's right, Baoyu, explain this clearly.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: "I don't know, I don't know anything." "I don't know why I was in Zhu Er's room."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: I know it's not your fault. "I said I wouldn't leave you."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: Bai Yanzhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: None of you, none of you will die a good death.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.speaker: The people in Qingfeng An
movie101_7173948149160116773_2400_2580.text: Bodhi originally has no tree, the bright mirror is also not a stage. Originally there is not a single thing.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: nun
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: Where did I stir up trouble?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: beggar
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: That thing in his hand looks quite valuable, let's go, let's go.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: The remaining beggars
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: "You took our sword, give it back to us, give it back to us, this sword is ours. There’s nothing wrong with taking back what’s ours. Yeah, there’s nothing wrong with that."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: Stop, Dog, I often give you food, how come I never knew you had a sword? You’re running away before we clarify the matter!

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: "You know who I am. Where do you live? What's your name?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: "Answer my questions one by one. No tricks. Where is the person who came during the day?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: soldier
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: In Commander Chen's tent in the central camp

movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.speaker: soldier
movie101_7173948149160116773_2580_2760.text: There’s a red flag on top, and long lanterns hang at the entrance.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: "Fang Baoyu, if you are to blame anyone, blame yourself for your impatience." "Today, I will let you witness" "the might of our great Ming dynasty's iron troops."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: "You despicable wretch, stirring up trouble in the martial world." "Even if I don't kill you, someone else will."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: "If you are to blame anyone, blame it on your own youth." "Why do you follow me?" "You could have spread the word far and wide, and made it impossible for me to find a foothold anywhere."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: "You are too eager to kill me, so today, you will die by my hand."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: Master, I will be ready to serve the meal after I finish cooking these dishes. Later on, I am going out to the streets to distribute food. Can you help me feed porridge to Changguang?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: Zhu Er, I won't let anyone separate us again.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: You've just woken up. Don't stand here, I'll go and prepare things.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: How come you don't recognize me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: I do remember you. You are Changguang, right? Three days ago, you fainted on the street, and I was the one who saved you. But when you were unconscious, you were holding a sword in your hand, and you kept calling out my name and Changguang's. Are you called Changguang? What is your real name? Why were you calling my name? Do we know each other?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: We know each other? "Then tell me, how do we know each other?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: "How do you say we know each other?" "I want you to tell me what you like about me."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: I suffer from amnesia, I don't remember anything from the past. As it happens, you don't need to overthink things. I'm going to get something for you to eat.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: "The black-cloaked guests of Qingping Villa, a smear of setting sun, the sound of the Seven Killings."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: The deep residences of Yan Manor, nine layers of restrictions, Mount Song's mugwort hangs on brocade clothes.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Hero Bai

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: You're awake, come, have some water.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: You're lucky to be alive. Had you not encountered me, you probably would've died.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'Where is this place?' 'What happened?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: We've been chased by Wang Dian, and were forced to come here.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'We?' 'Who else is here?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: There's also Benyue.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Benyue, Benyue, where are you, where on earth is Benyue?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Don't rush, she doesn't want to see you now, but she's constantly thinking about you. She urged me to come check on you, she doesn't know how to face you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: I've let her down.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: By the way, how did you end up here?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: I was being chased by the official soldiers, so I fled into the great desert.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'Why were you being chased by the official soldiers?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'There are some things that I know you may find hard to accept, but you must believe me.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: What are you trying to say?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: The divine being Mulang is a fake.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Princess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'What do you mean?' 'I don’t understand.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Have you ever heard of the ancient city of Luoya?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Young hero, you aren’t joking, right?

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Court affairs are never a joking matter.

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'Are you referring to the legendary ancient city of Luoya?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Mulang
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: 'Exactly' 'The ancient city of Luoya is not a legend' 'It truly exists' 'Located in the dense forests of southern Sichuan' 'Previously, people in the martial arts world thought it was just a rumor' 'Because the court didn’t want to publicize this information' 'To avoid triggering a treasure hunt frenzy.' 'However, now Minister Yan has a different idea' 'He hopes that Hero Bai will spread this information throughout the martial arts community' 'Let them kill each other over the treasure hunt' 'When the time comes, the court can easily clean up the mess' 'There’s a second reason as well.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_2940_3120.text: Secondly, once everyone knows that the ancient city of Luoya is in the south of Sichuan,

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Bai Daxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: In the dense forest, those who are capable in the martial world will certainly rush there. At that time, we can clean up the martial arts world completely.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Shaoxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: That's right. Acting in Southern Sichuan won't alarm the common folk either. Initially, the court intended to handle it itself, but Lord Yan thought it would be better to notify Wang Dian through Bai Daxia and then inform all the sects.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Bai Daxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'Thank you for the court's trust.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Shaoxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: The Emperor and the court place great importance on this matter, so we ask Bai Daxia to put in extra effort.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Bai Daxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Shaoxia, what are you saying? This is entirely what we should do.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Shaoxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Oh, by the way, Lord Yan wanted me to tell you that this is the last task the court will assign to you. Once it's done, the court will fully honor its promises to you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Bai Daxia
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'Thank you for the Emperor's grace.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: The Mulang Shenjun you know was sent by the court as an enforcer in the martial world. His purpose is to eradicate the Central Plains martial world completely. Whether they are righteous or evil factions, they want to annihilate them, making the martial world vanish forever. The real Mulang Shenjun is probably already dead.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Guniang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: I'll tell you this. I can save you or kill you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: As long as we can escape the desert, I will definitely prove it to you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Haven't slept yet?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Hmm, what are you doing?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: I am carving a Chishop Excalibur, I'm sorry, I forgot you lost your memory.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: You haven't given up on Master's last wish to find the sword.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: I've never given up, it's just because of you that I haven't gone yet.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'So, how many small wooden swords have you carved? Besides small wooden swords, have you carved anything else?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: I have carved other things.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'Is this me?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'Yes.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'But why didn't you carve my facial features?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: 'Because I'm still contemplating whether the face should be the you before losing your memory or the current you.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Dazaang

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Hmm

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Do you like me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Zhuer
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: It seems you don't like it.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: I just feel it's very sudden. Why would you ask such a question?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Woman
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: So, is it or is it not?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: If I didn't like you, I wouldn't be around you all the time.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Woman
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Do you like me before I lost my memory, or after I lost my memory?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: "I like both"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: You take it, we are already full

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: I thought that you would never talk to me again.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Baoyu, I know, you were forced to go to Zhu'er's room in Baiyun Temple.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: "Wang Dian's plan was seen through by the Holy Mother" "so that night" "when you were practicing" "the Holy Mother hid in the shadows" "used her skills to confuse your mind" "she meant to send you to my room" "but ended up sending you to Zhu'er's room"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: How do you know all this?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: The Holy Mother and I are very close, to ensure my survival, she told me everything.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: "It's too hot, let's go inside and rest."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Oh, my guests, please come in, hey, sit here.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: What would you like to order, my guest?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Anything will do

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Ah, just a moment

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Wait, don't drink yet

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: What's wrong?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: "Look at his boots" "they obviously belong to an imperial official" "We can't stay here for long, let's leave quickly" "You go to Fengbo Pavilion ahead" "I'll follow shortly"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Okay, be careful.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: My guest, your bun is here

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: "Even if you kill them all, you still won't stand a chance."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: "You should recognize these weapons, shouldn't you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: The guards
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: Go, go, hurry up, move faster, get inside.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: Supervisor, the person has been brought here.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.speaker: Duchess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: "Don't touch me, who the hell are you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: At dawn, they will kill us

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Facing death, who isn't afraid? However, what I feel more is unwillingness, I feel I've let many people down. First of all, I failed my grandfather since I couldn't avenge him.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: No, I can't let you do something foolish, you can't become a lackey of the court, you can't work for the Wood Wolf God.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Shitai
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Alright, this is where we part ways, I wish you both much fortune and long life.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Stop, take one more step and I'll kill her in front of you all.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Wang Dian, what do you want?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: "Kill him and I'll release this old nun."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Zhu Er has lost her memory, the poison has been neutralized, she won't listen to you anymore.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory? You don't remember me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Hahaha, you can't fool me, quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Do you know you have killed a kind monk?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Wang Dian, you are going to die.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Dazaang
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Zhu Er, Zhu Er, please beg him to save dad please, please beg him, Zhu Er

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Wang Dian
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: A soldier came in
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Report, sir, Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: You knew?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Then why didn't you expose me?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: I also cherish everything here. But it's all over now.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: I know. Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords. I wonder if you would come with me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Don't even think about it.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Do you have any other choice?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Zhu Er
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan? Why is he here?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Hu Yan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: "Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Man
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: "I really don't know. I was ordered to wait for him in South Chuan for a month, but he never showed up."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Man
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: Of course, it was the order of the chief.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: What is the relationship between Wang Dian and the Forbidden Guards?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Huyan Dazang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: At dawn tomorrow, at the fortress gate, Ben Yue's blood will be spilled on the yellow sand, Mulang Deity.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Ben Yue
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: "Baoyu, don't come over! Don't come over, Baoyu!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Mulan Deity
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: You are really loyal, coming here together to die.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.text: Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Purple Marquis, am I about to die? I really didn't expect my father to still be alive.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Do not come any closer.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: She is really my daughter.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: What are you doing here? So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead. What do you want?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: I am here to find my daughter. I want to talk to her alone.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu, why? Why would you rather hide your identity and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world, than reunite with your family? Than acknowledge me? Does it mean you can even abandon your son? Why is that?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: I, Fang, Fang Baoyu

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Fang Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "Calm down."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Purple Marquis
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: You said the jade pendant you carry is the only thing your father left you, right?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Mulang Shenjun
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: 'The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Supervisor
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: I'm just here for the fun.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: However, since the Supervisor has said so, if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Supervisor
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Supervisor
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right? It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty. Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither, must have a high level of mastery.
