movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor, you truly are an expert. Come, come, let me play a tune.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Supervisor
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Bai Sankong, be careful, if you destroy this zither, it would be a great pity.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: What, Supervisor, do you want to leave?

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.speaker: Supervisor
movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: 'Bai Sankong, I have already mastered the Ultimate Unyielding Technique. You can't hurt me; take your playing to the King of Hell.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: I'm old, can't do it anymore. Didn't expect to lose to Mu Lang.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Baoyu
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Grandpa, stop talking, just lie down and rest.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Baoyu, it’s all Grandpa’s fault, for doing so many wrong and bad things.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: 'Can you forgive Grandpa, Yan Zhu, come over here.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Yan Zhu
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Stop talking, let the past be the past, from now on, we should live well.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.speaker: Bai Sankong
movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Alright, the family will live well, my daughter.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.speaker: Mu Lang
movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: Do you trust me? My feelings for you are real.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.speaker: Duchess Tuo Chen
movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: I know, don't be afraid. I'll always be with you.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.speaker: Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: "I cannot ignore my master's last wishes. This battle is inevitable, but I respect your Central Plains' rules— it will be to the extent."

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.speaker: Master Da Zang
movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: Da Zang, when you read this letter from your master, it means Chang Guang

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Auntie He
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Okay, I got it!

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Ah, alright.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: 'Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Alright, alright, Auntie He.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Auntie He
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Hey

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Auntie He
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Much better!

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Auntie He
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization. According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Bao Liang ah

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Hey, hey, hey.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Old Five

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Old Five
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Oh

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Old Five
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Okay

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Old Five
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Alright alright alright.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Ah, Bao Liang.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Hey

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: How's business in the first half of the year?

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Not too great, business is tough these days.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: That's a good thing!

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Bao Liang ah

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Oh

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: This timing isn't right.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Ah

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: All my sewage disposal equipment has been inspected.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: If you get involved in any illegal activities, I won't be able to help you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Director, I've always worked under your watch. There's no way I'd tarnish your reputation.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Bao Liang

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Oh

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: We are family, and we will be honest with each other.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: That's right.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Although I'm the village chief, there are two committees in this village. I'm the village chief and the old secretary Zhang Tiegui, so not everything is up to me.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: "Our village is about to have elections. Isn't this a great opportunity? I've heard that the old Party Branch Secretary is getting on in years and might not run again. Who else but you would be the Party branch secretary in this village? Don't worry, I'll campaign for you and ensure you get the position."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Ah, Bao Liang.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Oh

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Visit those few farmers again, do some work, give some gifts, treat them to a meal, and hand out a red envelope at crucial moments. These things can easily be resolved in the countryside, alright?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Alright, alright.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: It's about time for lunch now. Let's go eat.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Alright, I'll listen to you. Let's go eat, Director.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Hello, please come in.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Let's sit inside.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Mayor Yang, hurry, let's go welcome them.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Mayor Yang, long time no see. Mayor Yang, you've come a long way from the town to preside over our village's elections. Thank you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: The triennial reshuffling of rural Party organizations is a major event in the political life of rural Party members. As the township Party committee, we attach great importance to it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Alright, as the village leader, I will actively cooperate.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Tiegui
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Mengting, is everyone here yet?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Lin Chunhu hasn't arrived yet. He had an urgent matter at his cooperative but should be on his way now.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Tiegui
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Oh, let's go in first then.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Mayor Yang, oh dear, oh dear, Mayor Yang, I apologize for being late due to some matters.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: This is

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Tiegui
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: This is our village's Deputy Secretary Lin Chunhu.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Mayor

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Tiegui
movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: This is the king of turtle farming. He not only makes money from raising turtles but also leads our village to prosperity. We are counting on him for our village's future prosperity.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: A man
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: We will depend on him to lead us to a better life.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Sunglasses Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Alright, alright, let's start the meeting.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Promising and capable indeed.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Come, come, please, Chief Yang, please.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Today, I will be presiding over the recommendation work for the Party branch personnel candidates of our Camellia Village, and the candidates will be selected by the Party members and villagers together.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Let's consider who has made the greatest contribution to our village, who can do practical things for our villagers, and we will then nominate the person whom we all deem most suitable.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: After an examination by the township Party committee, the following six new candidates for the Party branch are now being announced: Wang Qiuhong, Lin Chunhu, Liu Mengting, Zhang Dong, Zhang Tiegui, Zhang Yibao.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: The preservation of the ancient architecture here is really impressive.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: It's decent enough; this has a history of over three hundred years.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: It's truly outstanding. Hey, Old Secretary, you've worked for this village for decades now, haven't you? Respected and esteemed indeed.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Oh, not at all, not at all.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: I heard that there is a strong call for you to serve another term, and some villagers even hope that after you serve another term, you will take on the role of village chief again.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: That's because they don't want another village director who holds an office but does nothing.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: "Is that so? I've also heard some of the villagers' discussions. Zhang Dong, when he ran for village chief three years ago, he was beating his chest, guaranteeing to do a lot of work for the building of our village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: How many of his promised actions have been fulfilled? But I'm also to blame. I'm getting old, and my health is failing. The slow development of our village these past few years is mainly my responsibility.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Come on, don't say that. You've been the secretary of this village for over twenty years. How can we blame you when your health is not good? You are a meritorious figure for Camellia Village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Chief Yang, this election is an opportunity, we in Camellia Village can't miss another chance to develop further.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: I've been thinking, I do have some experience in work, but when it comes to leading the entire village to prosperity, my abilities are limited.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Not at all, not at all.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Moreover, I am getting on in years and my spirit is willing but my flesh is weak. I think that this election should focus on selecting a capable person who can lead the village to prosperity and a better life.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: Old Secretary, do you already have someone suitable in mind?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: We know what's going on, right?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Alright, I have some business to attend to, so I'll leave now.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Father of Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Return this item to the sender.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: This isn't very appropriate. How can we return it after we've opened it?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Father of Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: "Lin Genxing, you really are a fool. How dare you accept something from their family? Accepting their gift means you owe them a vote. Do you even know what kind of people their family are? As for Zhang Dong, who's the village chief now, since he took office, has he ever done anything for the village? I'm telling you, son, I've lived a long life and I know better. If you want a better future for the village, we need a good leader. I think Chun Hu is a good choice. In tomorrow's election, I'm definitely voting for him."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: You want to vote for him, that’s up to you. Anyway, no one knows who you vote for. Besides, we’ve already accepted the gift. Refusing it would offend them, so we might as well take it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Father of Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Buy an identical one and give it back to them.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Wow, hubby, you’ve done well today. Let me see what you got.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Of course, the village chief is generous, isn’t he?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: So, according to you, the village chief might be re-elected in this term.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Think about it, we accepted the gift. But in the end, who gets our vote is up to us. It’s a secret ballot; only we know who we voted for. I think Zhang Dong might end up with nothing.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Then who do you think in our village will get elected? Who are you planning to vote for, hubby?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: I'll vote, but I won't tell you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: "Son, come quickly, it's time to eat! Today, we have pork trotters, pork stomach, pork ears, and pork intestines—all your favorites! Just smelling and looking at it makes your mouth water. Come quickly!"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Son, come on, come on.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: It's all pork again.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: The dishes are cold, eat quickly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "I don't want to eat, it's all pork."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "What's wrong with pork? Without me, this pork, could you have grown so big? So tall, so fat, so strong. Let me tell you, don't forget your roots when you have a girlfriend."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: She's ignoring me now.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: It's even better if she ignores you. She's not a fairy from heaven. My son isn't so desperate for her. Now it's hard to find a three-legged pig, but two-legged girls are everywhere. Don't worry, I'll take you to a matchmaking event tomorrow.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: The daughter of the chicken king in the neighboring village, I heard she has a chicken farm that can be a dowry.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Dad, stop talking about this, it's driving me crazy.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Son, Son.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Hmm

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Weren't you going to hold a photography exhibition? Dad has arranged the venue for you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Son

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Hmm

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: How are the photos? Let dad appreciate your work, you big photographer.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: See for yourself.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: My Son's photography skills are excellent. Look at the others' photos, the eyes are eyes, and the nose is a nose.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: The person on the stage
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Everyone quiet down, quiet, ah, quiet, quiet. Today, hosted by our Mayor Yang, we are holding the re-election meeting of the Camellia Village party organization.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: The person on the stage
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "Our village has 42 party members, with 41 present, meeting the election requirements. Now, let's welcome Mayor Yang to host the meeting. Everyone please applaud."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "Now I announce the start of the party organization re-election meeting in Camellia Village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: Alright, next, we have the candidates speak about their pioneer promises. Who would like to go first? Lead the way.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "We'll go first."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2580_2760.text: "If I go first, I go first,"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: 'I', 'Zhang Dong', am now the village committee director. In the three years of my tenure, I have achieved certain results, though there are also some shortcomings. The achievements are obvious to everyone. Last year, our village was rated as one of the top ten charming villages in the city, which is not easy.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: It made the newspapers, was even on TV, and the appearance and hygiene of the village has greatly improved. As for the shortcomings...

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: It seems that there hasn't been enough contribution to our village's economic development. I have been in contact with some foreign investors, negotiating projects, trying to get them to invest in our village. Recently, I've been in negotiations. Therefore, I have been running around tirelessly, talking incessantly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: Don't you drive a Land Rover when you go out? This isn't running, it's sitting.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: Driving a Land Rover, yes, that's for work. Everything is for the work of the village. What’s a bit of hardship and fatigue anyway? Everyone, do you agree?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: If I am elected, I promise to personally fund the renovation of the village’s ancestral hall. The village’s ancestral hall was built in the late Ming and early Qing Dynasties, with nearly four hundred years of history. We cannot allow it to be ruined in our generation.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: villager
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: You say that renovating the ancestral hall is a good thing, but the renovation must involve a professional ancient architecture restoration team. For this project, please do not subcontract it to your relatives again.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: Rest assured about that. I, Zhang, have been in the village for so many years. Everyone is familiar with my temperament, fair and just, and I don’t practice favoritism or bend the law.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: I promise again to personally fund the renovation of the village’s reservoir, strengthen the dam, ensuring that everyone present and everyone in the village can live a secure life.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: A healthy and happy life, thank you everyone.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Young Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Hello? Don't worry, I developed a hundred copies of the photo, the clarity is absolute. What? It's Autumn Red's turn to speak? Alright, I'll be there soon, I'll be right there. Yes, yes.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Next, let's invite our last candidate, Lin Chunhu, to take the stage and speak.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: My name is Lin Chunhu. I'm a straightforward person and don’t usually talk about grand principles. To be honest, I made some money from running a turtle farming cooperative.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Regarding this election for village official, the villagers have different opinions. Some think that my running for village head has ulterior motives, but I am clear in my conscience.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: "Some people advised me not to take on this thankless tough job. But in my heart, I truly want to do something concrete for the villagers. I believe I can shoulder the responsibility everyone trusts me with."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: If I am elected this time, I will definitely not let down the expectations of the entire village. I will fulfill my promises in the next three years.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Good, good, good, good, good, haha.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: First of all, running this turtle farm is profitable, very profitable, and I think all villagers can participate. Even those at home with children or the elderly lacking the ability to work can join in. I will provide the technology for free and help everyone expand sales channels. Then, I will distribute salaries to everyone.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Second, near our village at the foot of Phoenix Mountain, I plan to develop a seedling market, so villagers won't have to get up early and walk dozens of miles to sell seedlings anymore.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: During my three-year term, I want to turn the seedling market into the largest seedling trading market in our city. How does that sound?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Good, good, finally someone who does tangible work, yes, exactly, yes, exactly, good.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Third, I think there is something very important, which is the ecological construction of our village. I promise that within my three-year term, I will tackle the pollution sources upstream of the river and make our mother river clean and bright.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: My speech is over, please vote for me.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Staff member
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Liu Mengting, one vote; Lu Chunhu, one vote; Zhang Dong, one vote; Zhang Tiegui, one vote.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Why hasn't Old Wu come yet?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Staff member
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Lu Chunhu, one vote; Lu Chunhu, one vote.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: "Now I announce the voting results. The one with the most votes is Lu Chunhu with 36 votes, Zhang Dong with 28 votes, Zhang Tiegui with 25 votes, Wang Qiuhong with 23 votes, and Liu Mengting with 23 votes. Okay, next we will have our five newly elected committee members come on stage. Let's welcome them."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong's Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Wait a minute, wait a minute, the election is invalid, the election is invalid! Come on, come on, someone is buying votes, someone is buying votes, come on.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong's Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Everyone look, this is our village's Lu Chunhu. He gave the old party member He Dame a soft-shelled turtle to get more votes in this election.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Big Sister
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Just one photo doesn't prove anything.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong's Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Of course it does. I saw him give He Dame the turtle with my own eyes. He even said, make sure you vote for me this year.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong's Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: I wasn't stalking him. I just saw it by chance.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: The elderly man
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: That's quite a coincidence, isn't it?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Dong's Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: It was just a coincidence that I saw him give He Dame the turtle. If I hadn't seen it, who knows how many others he might have given turtles to.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Alright, whether it's a coincidence or not, the facts are right here. Mayor Yang, if a candidate is really bribing voters...

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: How should we deal with this?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: If this really happened, we will investigate thoroughly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Okay, so is Lin Chunhu's election today invalid?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Decisions can only be made after investigation, this matter has not been fully investigated yet, has it?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The man holding the photo
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Come on, everyone come have a look, someone rigged the election, come see.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: The president of the tortoise farming cooperative in Camellia Village, Lin Chunhu, during the election period, delivered two tortoises to our village's old party member Aunt He, in order to gain an extra vote in the election.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Old man
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: How can offering a tortoise be bribery?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Yeah, exactly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: "During the election period, whatever is offered is considered bribery, "as per the legal regulation" the team leader of the village organization term ends in six months"to the end of the community election"under the pretext of helping and condoling"indirectly giving things to voters" is also considered bribery.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Genxing's Dad
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: I tell you Zhang Xi, how could you be so heartless, Lin Chunhu is doing good deeds and you label it as bribery, there's no such thing!

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Yeah, yeah, way too much.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Genxing's Dad why are you so upset, could it be, that you also benefitted from Lin Chunhu?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Genxing's Dad
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: This is outrageous!

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: How can you speak like that? Enough, let's go.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Tea break.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Thank you, mayor.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Lin Chunhu, I want to ask you, did you or did you not give Aunt He the tortoises?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Yes.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Do you know Aunt He is a party member?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: I know she is a party member!

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: "When did this happen?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: The 6th, the day before the village's party organization's community election notice was issued.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Then when you gave her the tortoise, did you hint about the election?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: No

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Then why did you give him the tortoise?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: I had no motive, I just heard Aunt He was not in good health recently, and she was all by herself, so I felt sorry for her. I sent a home-raised tortoise, just to give her some strength.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: I was born in Camellia Village and grew in Camellia Village. I always want to do more for the villagers of Camellia Village. I won't say anything else. I, Lin Chunhu, have a clear conscience.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The person calling for the Town Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Mayor Yang, please come out, two old men insisted to see you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The old man looking for the Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Hello Mayor Yang, Mayor Yang, you cannot just listen to the Zhang brothers. Lin Chunhu is unjustly defamed. Thirty of our village elders co-signed to vouch for him. Here is the joint guarantee letter, Mayor Yang, take a look.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: The old man looking for the Mayor
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Their names are all here. Actually, every New Year and holiday, all the elders over seventy in our village receive a consolation gift from Lin Chunhu.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.speaker: Looking for Mayor's old lady
movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Whenever the poor and lonely elderly in our village fall sick, he is always the first to front up their medical expenses.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: The Old Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man, don't worry. We will definitely investigate this matter. If Lin Chunhu really didn't bribe, we will not wrong him. You two go first. We are still investigating this matter. When you go back, just wait patiently for our news.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: The Old Men
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Okay, Mayor Yang, we'll take our leave first.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Low-key, low-key, low-key. The town committee members haven't been finally decided yet. Low-key, everyone take one, come.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Little Sly
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Brother, why are you so careful? Everyone present today is our own brother. If you don’t take this village secretary position, who will take it? Everyone agrees, right?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Leather Jacket Knight
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: You see, the elected committee members, the old secretary is old, Liu Mengting is just a freshman out of school, she has no experience. Lin Chunhu’s eligibility has been cancelled. Now, in terms of strength and qualifications, this secretary position can't be given to others.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, well said.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Okay, to be honest, I didn't want to be it initially. Being a village official is not a great job. Being a village chief is annoying enough for me. However, since everyone trusts me so much and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being, I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Bushy-Browed, Small-Eyed, Pink Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Speaking of this election, it not only has people's will, but also the will of heaven.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Little Sly
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Yes, who allowed our Xiaobao to take such a nice photo, it's simply a divine favor.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Mysterious Man in Black
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Yes, yes, yes, Xiaobao is the number one hero. "Bao Liang brother, I toast to you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Little Sly
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Ah, by the way, why didn't we call Xiaobao for a couple of drinks?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: Xiaobao must not be called, he is kept in the dark about this matter.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: See for yourself.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "What are these? Ah, aren't these the photos I took last time we went to Aunt He’s house together? What's going on?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "Shouldn't I be asking you that?" "Only you, me, and Brother Chunhu were there that day." "How did this photo get out?" "Do you know Brother Chunhu was falsely accused of bribery because of this photo?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Ah, this this...

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "Tell me." "Wasn't this done by your dad colluding with your family members?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "I really don't know anything about this."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "This is your camera." "If you don’t know, then who does?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "You think I was involved in this, don't you?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "Xiaobao, I used to think you were different from those people. But now, I am really disappointed in you, you know that?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "Even though the camera is mine, many people have had access to it." "And many people have borrowed it." "Forget it, I won't explain anymore." "Mengting, we've known each other for so many years." "I thought you would at least have some basic trust in me." "Now I see, I overestimated myself."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Dad, have you seen my camera?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Camera? It's almost dark. Are you still going out to take pictures?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Have you seen it? I’m in a hurry. Have you seen my camera or not?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "No, just don’t go out."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Did you hide my camera?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Yes, I took it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Give it back to me.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang? "Doing such conscience-defying things?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Baoliang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: I'm doing this for survival.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. Ah, if you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Stop it, I don't want so much money. What I want is a clear conscience. To be human, one must have a conscience. Without it, we're worse than pigs.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Sister
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Oh, uh, then does he have anything to do with this election?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Hey, what's the matter, young man?

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Town leader! I'm actually here to clarify something. Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election. The photo, it was actually... I took it, you see.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Everyone, please be quiet. I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all. Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election. Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Meng Ting
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Good, really good.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter, to announce to everyone, after verification through public reporting, one of the candidates, Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery. The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive. So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member. In this term's election, he will not participate. Even if elected, it would be invalid.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: The crowd
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Exactly, exactly, exactly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Big brother, where are we going?

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Big brother, about this, I know we messed it up, I didn't realize they took something, and couldn't keep their mouths shut.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Get out, get out

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Younger Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Big brother

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Scram

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Younger Brother

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Meng Ting
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.speaker: Meng Ting
movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Okay, this ecological treatment refers to, after collecting and settling the sewage, to build constructed wetlands. Through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms, and through multi-layer filtration, degrade pollutants, purify water quality and discharge rationally. This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach.

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: 'Really' 'What does the global financial crisis have to do with me?' 'They told me' 'Even though stocks are falling badly now' 'But their Zijin One hasn't fallen at all' 'What do you know, really'

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: Sesame, you want to get on the ground, right? Come on, get down and walk. Come, walk.

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: 'Stop stop stop, don't come over, don't bully my Sesame (Animal)'

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: Come, Sesame (Animal), come here, come. Your courage is too small, Sesame (Animal), I know you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: Okay okay, it's fine, it's fine, come on, baby, come Sesame (Animal).

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: Mommy knows now, you've reached puberty, you have to hold on, don't be like your dad, can't move when he sees a girl, okay?

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: 'Are you scolding the dog or scolding me?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: 'What do you think?' 'How could I bear to scold our Sesame (Animal)?' 'Our Sesame (Animal) is so pure, right?' 'In a few days, I'll find a girlfriend for our Sesame (Animal)' 'Find him a purebred one' 'A gentle and good girl, okay?' 'Only such a girl is worthy of our Sesame (Animal)' 'Such a pure and handsome guy' 'So strong, so sexy, so charming'

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: What are you doing?

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: What's your smell?

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: What what smell?

movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_780_960.text: What's your, I want to smell, smell a bit

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Good job, you got the scrap car so quickly?

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Are you kidding me, is there anything in Nanjing my friends can't handle for me? How is it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Don't tell me, this is the car from my company.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: You, your junk car is only worth ten thousand at most, making money is now the most important.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Are you crazy? You're aiming at me now.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Even this condition is not acceptable. The generator is broken, I need to replace it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: I lost to you, damn it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Oh my, what's with the attitude, I think it's pretty good.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Zhang Li, take a look. Oh dear, Zhang Li, oh dear, be a good girl, listen up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: "Mom, what are you doing?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: "Would you take a look, get up, come on, take a look."

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: "Mom, are you involved in pyramid scheme? You would be happy if you sold me out, right?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: "What are you talking about?" "Really, look at this, these conditions are all very good. They all have houses and cars." "That is way better than your electrician." "Hey, alright, alright, Zhang Li, be a good girl, listen to mom." "You go and meet them, you won't be at a loss anyway, right?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Mom, if it's not a loss, you go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Oh my, what kind of talk is this, how did you become like this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Xiaopo, it's your phone.

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: "Bring it to me."

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Oh my, Zhang Li, Zhang Li

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Oh my, do you think I'm playing? I'm exhausted. And then you nag at me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: I'm also helping build our new house. Ah, don't scare me, I am scared easily.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: What's going on?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Ah, behave, aim precisely, huh.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: What a coincidence, you two again. It's fate, huh?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: What's going on? The last time you bumped into us, was it these two? "Behave," "Bumper Car Association, right?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Xiao Teng
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Big brother, you see me, I, we didn't do it on purpose, right?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Look at this, what should we do about this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: What to do? Pay up, a thousand bucks.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: "Let go of the thousand bucks, just settle for three hundred and help them with the repairs."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: "Three hundred bucks?" "Not even enough to fix a door with three hundred bucks."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Alright, go ahead and treat them kindly then. Ah, it's so annoying, can we just call it bad luck and be done with it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Why should I? It's like you're boss of my car repair shop.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Ah, Xiaopo, you talk to these two. I'll take them to get the car fixed.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Hurry up, we've still got work to do.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: All right.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Just fix it up casually, what took you so long?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Oh right, they've changed out their generator, can you believe that? What for? It looks dead, are you going to pay for a new one? Seriously. Let's go, it's no big deal, let's go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Ah, hello.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Good day, sir. Is there anything I can assist you with?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Let's get acquainted. My surname is Chen, like the 'Chen Shimei' Chen. I'm a reporter for the Jiangnan Express.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Mr. Chen

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Reporter for the Jiangnan Express.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Jiangnan Express

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Eh, could you talk about the homebuyers' response to the current real estate prices? Could you discuss this with me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: So many customers around, ask them.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Then, miss, may I have your name, Zhang Li?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: "Can't you give me a few more days? I'll definitely gather the money." "Rest assured, I won't default on the payment," "Yes, yes, that's right, this sum isn't much." "But my recent capital..." "...turnover is a bit tight." "Okay, thank you, thank you!"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: What kind of quality is that?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Hey, hey, where is your mind during work time? And you, hairy ghost, get your hair cut tomorrow.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Recently, the company held a work meeting for team leaders and above, reminding everyone not to neglect production safety. Also, whenever you have the time, dip into your studies on electricity.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Electrical Safety Work Rules, don't think you're a master now and just slack off.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: "Class Monitor, do we also follow procedures when we use the restroom?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'What nonsense!' 'You're the one who's upside down!' 'Your car was wrecked, and you haven't even compensated me yet!'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'Don't bring up what's irrelevant,' 'I'm trying to figure something out here as well,' 'just give me ten more days, only ten.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Are you trying to take advantage of me again? Kid, you are also training apprentices now, don't cause me more trouble.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'Don't worry, Class Monitor,' 'in my work,' 'I have never been sloppy.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Class Monitor
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Go on, stop blathering, and do what you need to do!

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'I'm going to figure it out right now.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: This is what life is all about.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Look at you, all pleased with yourself, what about the house thing?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Buying it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: What are you buying it with?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Don't worry, there will be bread, and there will be a house.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'With the way you're leisurely all the time, you won't have anything.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'How am I leisurely? Every day I'm working as hard as a dog just to be able to buy a house sooner, right?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Buying a house isn't just your responsibility,' 'I have to live there in the future too,

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Let's do it this way, I'll pay the down payment, and we both will contribute. Let's settle it this way.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: No, I won't live off a woman.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'Hello,' 'Big Xu,' 'I know, I'll come over in a bit, okay?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: Hey, hello, Big Xu, how about my tickets to the Wilber Pan concert? Okay, that's settled, 'What long hire?' 'Gotta hang up, bye.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: "I told you I'd give you money. You said you wouldn't live off a woman. Isn't that like trying to look more important than you are?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: 'You say you want to pay a down payment for this house,' 'like this,' 'can we make it in the future?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1320_1500.text: "What do you mean? What about my mom bothered you? So you want to pay for the house, is that it?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Okay, off you go, with the meager salary you have, are you selling a kidney or what?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Just wait for the day I, Wang Xiaopo, make it big."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Wang Xiaopo

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Who is it, someone's here.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Mom, is everything alright?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: You scared me to death.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: What happened, did you have a fight?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Mom, I’m so annoyed.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Don’t think that your mom is annoying. If I don’t worry about you, who will?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Little Li, Little Li, my dear, what's wrong with you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Who has been bullying you? There, there.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: It must be that Wang Xiaopo, right? It has to be him, I will call him to give him a lesson.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Mom, don't go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "I won’t call. We’ll just ignore him. I’ve recently been looking at a good young man for you,"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: He is a returnee from overseas study, got back from abroad and is quite a catch. I've seen a photo of that boy, he’s really handsome. I’ll show it to you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Mom, I don’t want to see it."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Just this once, if you are not satisfied this time, I won’t meddle in your affairs anymore, alright?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Mom, are you serious?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Really

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: If you're serious, I’ll go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Hey, is the generator fixed yet, or not?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: It's fitted.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "If you ask me, beauty is generally found between dumb and very dumb."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: Hey, do you know what I'm worried about right now? I'm worried that this little generator won't be able to power this big thing.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: That's enough then.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: By the way, did Zhang Li really make you angry? You can’t keep giving each other the cold shoulder; otherwise, the cooked duck might just fly away.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Cooked duck, you’ve got quite an imagination, haven’t you?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1500_1680.text: "Good boy, an honest man doesn’t have a navel, do you?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Hey, hey, hey, I'm asking you, did you get the concert tickets or not?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: I asked already, it's eight hundred per ticket.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "Eight hundred per ticket, huh."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: What's the matter?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Wow, so expensive!

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "What's she so obsessed with?" "Why pay so much to watch?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: To please a woman, you need to spend some money, you know.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "I still can't bear it." "Who do you think I'm making this armored vehicle for?" "Seriously." "Stop bothering me." "And don't brag in front of others." "What 'I have connections' and all that."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Hey, buddy, we were just talking about having fun. When did I ever brag? Didn't I say I have friends over there? I asked already, they can't offer discounts right now. Otherwise, the computer can't process it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Sorry, sorry, sorry. Just get me the tickets. Don't go over four hundred.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "You're so stingy. Honestly."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Oh my gosh. Waist, waist, my poor waist.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: What are you doing, striking a pose?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Look at it yourself. Can you see outside through this window?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "No, you can't see, didn't you draw it yourself?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: I said the window was too big and to make it smaller. Now you've done this. Why did you put that dark film outside? How, how are you supposed to see?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: What, what, what now?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "And you installed two rear-view mirrors. What's the point?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: I installed them? Didn't you tell me to do it? Honestly.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "Now it's like two blind men driving." "Go ahead and drive like this."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "What do we do now?" "How about I sit on top and guide you?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "You get up there."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Gosh, you think I want to stay here? "It's so hot.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Go, go, go, go, go. Right, right, right. To the right.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Reverse, please pay attention. Reverse. Turn back. Turn back. Go, go, go, go, slower, slower. Go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Come in, come down here and direct, come down.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Okay, coming right down.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Left, right, left, right.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "Are you brainless? You can't tell left from right?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "What's going on?" "From outside, facing me." "You say left, right, left, right." "Do you think it's the same for me inside?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Gosh, this is so frustrating.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Come on, come on, start, start, start.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Okay, watch closely, turn right.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Charge! Stop, stop, stop.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: "What's the situation?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: "It's over, it's over, it's over, oh my, it's over, how did you drive this thing, take a look, come on, get out, how did you drive, you even hit a tree, look."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: What's going on inside here? It's so hot, is it a furnace for alchemy? It's so hot I'm about to die.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Hey, oh, what's the big deal? I'll make a few holes for you, and you'll cool right down. What should we do about this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
