movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Alright, alright, I'll go and get the cannon out.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Forget it, let me do it. With your small build, can you handle it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: "Then I'll get out first."

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Ah

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Hey, hey, hey, be careful, be careful with the barrel.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Don't worry, it'll be fine, I've got this.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Geez, are you trying to kill me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Xiao Bainian
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Hello, I'm Xiao Bainian.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: "Pretty boy," but you're not even white?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Xiao Bainian
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: No, I am Xiao Bainian, Xiao, Bainian.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: You sit down first. I'm getting dizzy with you standing up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Xiao Bainian
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Okay, okay, okay.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Thank you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Excuse me, I have a call, hello, what's up?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Where are you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Weren't you busy? How come you have time to look for me today?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Let me tell you, I got the tickets, how should I give them to you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Really, then do this, bring them to me. I’m at Costa Coffee.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Alright, I'll be there in a bit, bye.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Where's the ticket?

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: This is

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Oh, let me introduce you, this gentleman here is Dr. Xiao, who just returned from Japan, and this is my classmate, Wang Xiaopo.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Sea turtle, okay, then, you guys continue talking, I'll be going now.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.text: Oh, why report it, why call the police? The police are so busy, can they help you find a dog? Listen to me, I'm telling you, don't go looking around everywhere. Stay at home, eh, Sesame will come back on its own. Ah, how can I not be upset? After all, I'm its owner too. No, I mean after all, we are like family. Yes, our relationship is no worse than yours, eh. Oh right, I forgot to tell you, this afternoon, I need to take some people out of town for an interview. I won’t be back tonight, ah, I'll return tomorrow. Listen to me, Sesame won’t go far, hear me? Be good and stay put.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.text: "You're pretending to be an armored vehicle, right? Ah, I built you, but I don't know what you are. You're a pickup! Why are you pretending to be an armored vehicle? Ah, I’m a lineman; I don’t install anything. I’m broke. If I had the means to build you, I could also dismantle you. What, you’re not convinced? Tell me, why are you laughing? Ah, you, what are you laughing at? What are you laughing at? I’m asking you. Laugh! Laugh! Ah, laugh!"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.text: Sesame, oh dear, where did it go?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Hello?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'Did your family lose a puppy?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'Did you see my Sesame?' 'Sir, where is my puppy?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Where?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Why don't you just tell me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: I can tell you, but you understand the rules, right?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Rules, what rules?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Money!

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: How much do you want?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Ten thousand

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'Ten thousand yuan, could you be a little cheaper, brother?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'I'm not in the mood to haggle with you.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'Isn't this kidnapping then?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Good that you know, be straightforward.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Alright, how do you want me to give it to you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: 'You can't call the police, or you'll see your puppy's body by tomorrow.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: No no no, I'll give it, I'll give it, just tell me, how do I give it to you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: At the intersection of Zhanjiang Road and Mengdu Road, there's a big billboard. Behind the billboard, in the bushes, there's a big stone.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Alright, alright.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: A man
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: At nine o'clock tonight, place the money under the stone alone, and remember, don't call the police.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Alright alright, I'll go get the money now! Alright alright, bye.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Whose dog is this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Is anyone there, huh, is anyone there? How can you leave a dog unattended? Are you even human?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Wang Xiaopo, Xiaopo, are you in?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Hurry, are you asleep? Get up to pee! Hurry up, can you hear me? Open the door.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Hurry up, hurry up! I’m slipped! I’m slipped! I’m slipped! Quickly, I got pinched and it hurts, quickly, quickly, hurry, hurry up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Hey, you're sleeping so heavily, I'm in pain from being pinched.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: "You just left without saying a word, and even took the key with you, making me run this trip in vain. I’m telling you, Wu Ming called and asked us to fix the armored car by tomorrow and hand it over to him."

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: You go back, I want to sleep

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Why do you want to hibernate? Get up

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: "What are you busy with all day?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: No, what’s wrong with you, did you quarrel with Zhang Li? Ah, once you fix this armored car and sell it, won’t you be laughing all the way to the bank? Hurry up and get up and get to work

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Who? Who is she seeing? That’s impossible. Anything else you say, I believe. But I absolutely don’t believe this. Has Zhang Li ever flirted with any man over all these years? You think about it, she even ruined her relationship with her mother because of you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: "I saw it with my own eyes, she is with a certain doctor"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: What Doctor? Can you finish work before discussing this? Don’t you realize work is more important? Hurry up and finish the work.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: "I don't have any work now, if you want to go, you go, I'm not going"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: "Are you crazy? Why are you angry with me? Aren't you living lavishly? You’re letting go of easy money"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Think quicker!

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'I said I'm not going.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Are you going or not

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: I'm telling you, Wang Xiaopo, you are going either way, quickly!

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Oh dear you, move if you're a man. Quick, quick, quick, quick!

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Oh dear, move!

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Nutcase

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'I got scratched by the puppy.' 'Does it need rabies shots?', 'Does it need, how much?' 'So expensive' 'Can I get a discount?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Please, lend me the tuition fee, give me the tuition.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'We, mother and daughter, really don't have any other options.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: I know, I told you already, I'll give you the money in a few days. Are you trying to corner me by acting like this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'I dare not corner you, through all these years, I've been selling vegetables all alone' 'It's not easy for me amidst wind and rain.' 'My daughter is my only hope.' 'If you delay her studies' 'I will have no way to live.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: No, you listen

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: What happened?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: male colleague
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Oh my, I did not expect Mr. Zheng to be such a player, he even has a child, who would've thought.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Let me tell you, Mr. Zheng is such a lecher, he will go after anyone.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: I promise, I promise I'll give you the money tomorrow, okay?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'We still have to wait till tomorrow? School has started, I borrowed from all the relatives I could, I have no face to see people anymore.' 'At least she's diligent in her studies, my child is among the top three every year.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Good child, wait for a moment.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: I am trying to work it out. The police won't deal with this kind of thing. Just follow what he said. As long as you can get the dog back. If it costs 10,000, just give them 10,000.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Ah, you can spend ten thousand on a dog, can't you spend six thousand for a person?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Well, I was discussing an advertising deal with a client, it's about the contract.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Please pity us, mother and daughter. Give me the tuition, I won't bother you again. I am willing to work for you the rest of my life.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: Let me explain to you, it's not like that.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2580_2760.text: 'That was a call from my wife.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: "How can you do this?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I don't know, I'm sorry.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I'll give you the money, just wait.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Xiao Tang, I need your help with something. Here's the situation. The other day, I went to the city association. We attended an annual meeting. At the end of the meeting, unexpectedly, there was a fundraising activity for poor students launched to support their college education. I thought about it, and even the editor-in-chief from the other newspaper had donated. I thought it was a good thing, so I also pledged a donation. They even took a picture of us.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Everyone, this is a good deed.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: "Yes, yes." "But I've been a bit tight on money recently." "They came to ask for it again." "I want to resolve this issue." "Could you lend me some money first?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: "But, I..." Xiao Tang averted her gaze. "But, Editor-in-Chief, I only have 1,200 yuan." "Editor-in-Chief." "Didn't you say I was fat last time?" "I still need to renew my gym membership." "My hands, my hands."

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: That's right, let's resolve as much as we can first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: This is my 1,200 yuan.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Alright then, lend me 1,000 first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Editor-in-Chief, you must, you must pay me back.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I will, I will.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: There's another thing. Last time during the company dinner... You, I covered 20 yuan for you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Did that happen?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: You see, you forget things easily.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I remember now, I know, I know.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: 1,020 yuan, Editor-in-Chief, don't forget to pay back 1,020 yuan.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Hey, Li, hello, hello, hello. Nice to see you again.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: What do you want?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Really don't remember me? We've met before, you don't remember?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Cut the nonsense, tell me, what do you want?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I'm not a bad person, I'm decent. This time, I want to discuss serious business with you. How about I treat you two to a meal? Is that okay?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Who are you? Why should we?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: It's business this time, really business.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Alright then, how about we go for some Kobe beef?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Zhang Li's colleague
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: I think that's a good idea.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2760_2940.text: Don't worry. Once we deliver this tank tomorrow, all the money will come back. Right?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: What? What's going on? Who did this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: "You, are you out of your mind? Are you insane? Wang Xiaopo, I'm telling you, if I had known you were such a loser, I would never have helped you."

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: "For you, for Zhang Li, for your house, for this tank, do you know how many jobs I've missed out on?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: Did it provoke you? Why did you smash it? Are you still human? Are you still human, huh? You think only you can smash, huh? I can too. Come, take it, hold it well. Hit here, come, hit, hit.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: Can't do it, can you? Then fix the tank for me. Fix it, fix. Hurry up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: "Do you think I don't feel pain? Do you think I wanted to smash it? Zhang Li doesn't want me. I'm not joking with you, I'm not joking. I worked so hard for what, what are we doing? Me, I'm just doing it for a house. I'm just very selfish, I'm just a petty citizen, I don't have grand ambitions. I just want a house and to get married. For my mother-in-law to accept me. Who knew, why am I so miserable?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_2940_3120.text: "Haven't we been fighting all along? We're fighting, we want to make money. With money, we can have everything, do you understand? Why are you so dumb? It's okay."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: 'Let's fix it together, okay? With money, we can have everything, okay? Okay? Okay?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: It's okay, it's okay, we'll fix it together, let's go fix it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: Ah Cheng, then I'll go back and talk about it, next time, see you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: That song he sang, those blue and white lyrics, were really, really, worse than crying.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: Yeah, not just tone-deaf, he wasn't even on pitch.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: Hey, Zhang Li sis, maybe that journalist wants to chase you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: Hey, could it be you who likes him?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: What are you looking at, never seen it before, old man?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: Get lost, get out of here quickly.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: I'm sorry, I, I, I didn't see anything, sorry, hey, alright.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.speaker: Road Worker 1
movie101_7089369392055583246_3120_3300.text: 'The government, soon they are going to put, do you know what, safety condoms in the bathhouse.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Worker
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: That ticket price went up again

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Good, straighten up, straighten up, hey, more to the right, more to the right, good, this turn is good, to the left, to the left, to the left, to the left, to the left, hey, to the right, to the right, good, a bit slower, stop.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Hey, hey, slipping slope, slipping slope, hold it, hold it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Step on it, step on it, step on it, step on it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Alright, I'll go down and push.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Wait for me, wait for me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Where's my armored vehicle?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Worker
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: 'What armored vehicle?' 'Don't run, don't run,' 'What's there to run for, get down.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: The workers
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: 'You hit someone and you want to run? You still want to run? You must pay for the medical expenses today,' 'What's the meaning of this?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: What are you all doing? Get up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: The police are here.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: 'Look at you, young man,' 'How did you ride the bike?' 'Can't you see the road ahead?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: 'I did it on purpose, you know, my leg got hurt,' 'An armored vehicle just passed by.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: What are you doing, all of you? Stand still, no hitting.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: You people here are too arrogant.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Here's what we'll do, you deal with it yourself, take the two of them to the hospital. Oh, why is there blood on your butt? Stop pretending.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Get in the car, everyone.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Driver, take them to the hospital.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Taxi driver
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Good

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Armored vehicle, Xiao Zhang, make a turn.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Stop, stop

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Oh my, they brought such a big vehicle to get the money?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Glasses Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: Don’t rush, don’t rush, let’s see how many of them there are first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: fall on the butt

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: I was pulling you and you dragged me down.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "How would I know you?" "I can't even take care of myself!" "Gosh, it hurts so much."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Are you crazy?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: We hit the jackpot.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: So your truck is powerful, huh? So only your truck can sprinkle water? So only you like to keep things clean, huh? Crazy person. It's ruined. It's ruined. New clothes, new clothes, I just bought them.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Alright, alright, let's check the car first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "I told you not to drive so fast, drive so fast." "Why do you have to drive so fast?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "I can't see."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "You can't see, I'm telling you." "Do you even know what's wrong with the wheel?" "I told you not to add two more wheels, but you insisted."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "It's a technical issue, you wouldn't understand."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Gosh, only you understand.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Alright, alright, let's take it off first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: How to take it off, really.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Go get the tools.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: I told you I didn't bring them, do you believe me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "So how are we going to remove it? With our hands?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: That's what I'm saying, how are we going to remove it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Then you start the engine first, let me see the situation.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "What's making that noise?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: What's wrong, what's wrong?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Help me over there, help me over there.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "Gosh, you're really spoiled."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "Wasn't it you who dragged me down?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "How would I know?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "Why haven't we seen our Sesame yet?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng's brother
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Sister, they won't go back on their word, will they?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Oh no, your brother-in-law went to a meeting today. There's no one at home. I called, but no one answered.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng's brother
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: So what now?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: What if Sesame gets sent back? I'll go back and check, you wait here.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng's brother
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Okay.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "You can't fight them. You can't beat them if there are too many people."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng's brother
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: I know

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Got it? I'll go check.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "What's that smell, burning rubber?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Is the generator burned out?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "What are you doing?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "Let's go out first."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Now the generator is burned out too.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: We replaced the generator and it burned out again. "What can I do?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: So what now? Should we call a tow truck?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Are you out of your mind? Call a tow truck at this hour?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Then what do you suggest?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Let's hide it first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: Gosh, hide it? This huge thing, where do you want me to hide it, in my pocket? I'm not Doraemon, you know.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: "Isn't there a construction site over there?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3480_3660.text: So what?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: What the heck, hurry up, hurry up

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: That won't do, it's stolen then.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: How can you call it stealing? No, no, help me, help me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: It's not ready yet?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Much better, much better.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: What a pampering, goodness.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Not bad, it's pretty well hidden, good enough.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: It'll make do for now. We should bring tools to fix it tomorrow. Go check out the back, near the road.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Yikes, yikes, it's the police, the cops, the cops, police, what are we going to do?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Run, run

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Run, run, which way do we run? There’s no time left!

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: "Where did this armored vehicle come from?" "This kid is talking nonsense." "Let’s go, Officer Zhang."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: "Was that Zhang Li's father?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: "We'd be done for if he caught us. Keep going, keep going."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Hello

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: You don't follow the rules.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: I, I, I, Da, Da Xu, I, I've transferred the money, please give Sesame back to me, okay?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Did you call the police?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: No, I definitely did not call them.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: I saw it all, you even had someone lying in ambush there. Tell them to leave at once.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Da Xu, I was wrong, I admit it, I was wrong, I was wrong, I was wrong, okay? I'm going to check now. I'll tell them to leave, okay?

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Hurry up, my patience is limited.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Colleagues
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Someone even posted a smartphone picture of the armored vehicle online. "I think it's not a military exercise," "It seems more like a stunt." "Exactly, it was rampaging on the streets. I heard there was a guy with a big beard giving orders on top." "That one didn't get sold off."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: "It's really beautiful, actually, it's a pity you didn't go to military school."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Let me tell you about this tank.

movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.text: "Well, this one is the latest Russian-developed T95 tank. Its missile-firing cannon can effectively penetrate 1,200 millimeters of armor at a long range. It's also equipped with fully automatic sensors. Its maximum off-road speed is 85 kilometers per hour."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.text: "Stop talking, I don't understand it anyway. Since you like tanks so much, let's plan to take our wedding photos on a tank in the future."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.text: "Hey, wake up, wake up, hey, you've slept all night, alright."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.text: Oh dear, still looking at me, huh? That's right, that's it, my Sesame at home smells just like this, I'm telling you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Why get involved in such things instead of something worthwhile?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'What did I do?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'What do you think? You have no idea? Well, let me suggest something. Take the money, and return the sesame to me, then it's all settled, right? Anyway, I don't have it now, the police don't know, nobody knows.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Policeman, go ahead and call.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Why should I call him? I didn't tell the police. Ah, you really are something. Oh, oh, oh, I didn't call for that.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'Is it Wang Xiaopo?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Hey, Uncle.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Wang Xiaopo, what are you doing here?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: I, Big Sister, we're looking for Sesame.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Sesame

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: It's you again, the one who wrapped dog poop in newspaper. Ah, Sesame, what does that mean?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Sesame, my little dog.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: The little dog's name is Sesame, huh? How did you lose, lose, lose it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'Can't find it anymore.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'Where's your husband then?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: On a business trip.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Such a coincidence.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: The person on the walkie-talkie
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Officer Zhang, Officer Zhang, there's been a two-car collision at Grass Gate, please go handle it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Okay, I'll be right there. Your dog won’t be lost forever. When your husband returns from his trip, he can help you look for it. Wang Xiaopo, you seem a little haggard lately. You need to sleep well in addition to doing good deeds, it's about time to leave.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Hey, uncle, you, dropped, dropped, dropped this.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: It's okay, it's okay, I can manage it myself.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Goodbye, Uncle.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Hey, okay.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Sesame

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Dog, dog, dog.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: TV Drama News
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: 'Last night's incident involving an armored vehicle on the western city thoroughfare, the traffic police department has already contacted the military district, confirming no military exercises have been scheduled recently. So where exactly did this armored vehicle come from?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Help me revise this segment, if you're not sure, you can go to this website to check, it has everything. Remember, don't mix up these two segments, thank you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Don't be afraid.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Who is this?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: One of us, clear the way.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Male Colleague A
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Your face is wrapped up like a rice dumpling.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Male Colleague B
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: What are you doing, playing the Mummy and scaring people?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Disfigured my face, fell into a ditch.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Journalist Chen, since you know you’ve disfigured yourself, don't come out and scare us during the day like this, all wrapped up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Male Colleague A
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Scare people? He's advertising toilet paper.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Go

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Journalist Chen, come here, let me have a look.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Don’t touch me, what are you doing, get up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: My goodness, we can’t stay wrapped up like this. With this wrapping, you’ll become the Phantom of the Opera within a couple of days.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Really? This quack doctor, in order to swindle a bit of medical fees, nearly disfigured me. Hurry up and unwrap this, unwrap, unwrap it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Female colleague
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: It's not a big deal. There's not much left to ruin on your face anyway.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Sit down, let me check, sit here.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Journalist Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Gently.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: I know, hold onto your glasses yourself, hold onto them alright, how do I unwrap this, oh oh oh, I see it, ouch, it doesn't hurt, does it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: I went home late at night, guess what I saw?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: What is it

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: An armored vehicle

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: It rushed past my eyes. Too fast to catch up. It's like a ghost tank.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Well, you're bluffing, even the cows are flying in the sky, hey, Fenfen, tell us how you fell into the pit yesterday, were there any beauties in the pit?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: This is a work injury, count it as a work injury, got it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Nonsense, you didn't even conduct an interview on site, and you still have a work injury. You've let our editor-in-chief down.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: You don't talk to me about this, I

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Slow down

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Hello, who is it? Hello hello hello, really?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Who was it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Fine, fine, alright, I'll be there right away, wait for me, hey, hey.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Who was it on the phone?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: You guys just wait for me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Xiao Tang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Here he goes again, take it easy, brother

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Fenfen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Get up, get up, get up

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Hey, don't leave, wait a minute, wait a minute, wait a minute, hello

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Hello

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Ah, h-honey, hey, I'm looking for Sesame, I put the money there, but she didn't give me the dog back.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: She said you behaved well and didn't call the police, so she agreed to extend the deadline. Just leave the money under our street lamp.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: "Okay okay, okay okay, I'll be right back, okay okay, goodbye, okay okay, goodbye, hey, I'm sorry, I was wrong, I've wronged you. I, I was wrong. I, I, I... hey, could you please help me move this wheel, that plastic bag is mine, okay?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: I'm so skinny and thin, do you think I'm Superman?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: "Oh sir, please I beg you, my Sesame has been missing for two days already. It never eats strangers' food, I don't know how it survived these two days, you you you, please."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Wait a minute, I'm answering a call, I'm answering a call, hello

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wu Ming
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Wang Xiaopo?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Hey, Wu Ming

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wu Ming
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: "I saw the armored vehicle you made on TV, what a piece of junk. It's not what I wanted at all. Didn't I give you the blueprints? I tell you, I don't want that armored vehicle anymore, I just don't want it"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: You, let me explain, hello...

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: "That day, if it weren't for my hair..."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: I'm making a call, I'm making a call.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Da Xu pick up the phone

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Who said that? How could it be possible? He dare to refuse? I'll call him right now.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Hey, Wu Ming, what's going on? Why are you backing out now? No, don't be joking; we have a contract signed.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: No, no, listen to me, Wang Xiaopo put all his money into this thing for you. What do you expect him to do now? You can't play this game; it could cost lives.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: No, no, no, just hear me out, or else just give me two more days, alright? I'll take care of everything according to the plans. Okay? Do me a favor, please.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Alright, then I'll wait for you to come back from checking the exterior shots. Hurry up, bye.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: I'll answer, answer the phone, hello, Da Xu, how's it going?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Master, the company is asking us to work overtime.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Overtime? Don't they let us rest even on Saturdays?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Master, the company wants us to quickly check the high-voltage line near Qingliang Men.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Not going, not going. I'm not feeling well today.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "Master, you should still come. If not, per regulations, I have to go by myself. I'm practically begging you; if there's any mishap with this task, I won’t be able to become a permanent employee next month."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "Where are you at?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: I'm right beneath the iron tower across from Wu Hua Tai Securities at Qingliang Men.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Wait for me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Sir, my pet Sesame hasn't been seen for two days. Please help me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "Can you wait here for a bit? I'm really asking you."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Master

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Ah, Master.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "Why are you just standing there?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "Why aren't you wearing your uniform?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Stop your nagging and get to work.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Come on, this one's no good, needs replacing.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Master, I didn’t bring a new one.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "How can you be so dense? I just can never teach you."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: "What are you looking at? Hurry back and get one!"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Apprentice
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Master, take it easy, I'll be right back.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Today even drinking cold water gets stuck in my teeth.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: It's you, you, don't run, don't run.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: What's the matter?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: I, I'm asking you, did you tamper with our generator?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: What generator? Your generator has been burnt out long ago.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Okay, let's forget about the generator then, but tell me, was that armored vehicle thing you’re doing?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: "How did you guys find out?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Dude, stop pretending, you're a celebrity on the internet now.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Where's the armored vehicle? Let me take a look.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: What armored vehicle? There's none. Don't bother me, I need to get tools to fix something. Move, move, move away.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: This time, the decline in China's stock market is completely due to this, the country's subprime mortgage crisis. You see how they borrowed money to spend here and now they can't settle their accounts, affecting our stock market.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Auntie
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: I'm telling you, you old man, how can you have your feet in two boats?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: I haven't, you're mistaken, you're mistaken. How could I do such a thing? No.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Auntie
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Are you being dishonest in your speech now, huh?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Ma'am, how could you just say I have my feet in two boats?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Auntie
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Are you still not admitting it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: "But you've never made your intentions clear to me, willing to be with me."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Auntie
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: I'm saying, shouldn't you men always take the initiative a bit?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: If you put it this way, I understand completely. I want to tell you that I, as a person, would never have my feet in two boats. If I ever have my feet in two boats, let me fall off this iron tower.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: What's the big deal?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: What are you up to?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: What? What's going on?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Do you even know what this is? Messing around with it without a clue.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Messing around? Isn't it just a tank?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Goodness, you even know it's a tank? Knowing it's a tank and still messing with it? I should take you to the military court straight away.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Military court? Do you think you're an uncle from the People's Liberation Army?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: I'm just joking with you. What are you doing?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Hurry up, move this vehicle a bit. My stuff is trapped underneath.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Huh? What stuff?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: If I can't get the thing out, my precious is gone. Do you get it? My sesame.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: What happened? Is your child in trouble?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: It's even more precious than a child to me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Oh, is it your own child? In danger? Kidnapped? Call 110.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: It's not a child. It's a puppy.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Kidnapping a dog is also illegal.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Oh, hurry up and move the vehicle a bit, would you? You, you

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Alright, alright, I'll move it right away. Have you seen my friend? A guy.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: I saw him.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Where is he?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: He left. He's even more annoying than you. I begged him for ages, and he wouldn't move the vehicle either.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: He's gone off?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Just wait a moment. I'll call him.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: "What's with this lunatic, turning his phone off?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: machine

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Wait, wait, wait a moment.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Could you hurry up?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Ah, okay.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Hello, Da Xu

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Zhang Li, hey, is Wang Xiaopo with you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: I don't know. Shouldn't he be with you all the time?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Oh dear, how should I explain it to you? Let me tell you, aren't you guys supposed to get married? Wang Xiaopo, well, he wants to buy a house, but he doesn't have money. So, I introduced him to a business opportunity. It's for my friends who are making a film. They need a tank prop. And now, you two want to break up, aren't you pushing him to his limits? You can't treat him like this.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: You're not telling me that the armored car that caused the accident is yours.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: 'No, it's not. Our car was lost on the street, how would we know it broke down? And my friend from the film, he just called to say that they don't need the car anymore. I think Wang Xiaopo is about to lose his mind. What should we do?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: He deserves it.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Oh dear, you can't talk like that. He's only trying to do what's best for you, don't you know?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: You figure something out, I'm going to look.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Okay, I understand, I understand.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Where could he have gone?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Am I heavy?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Not heavy.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: 'If I'm not heavy, why do you look so miserable?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Am I miserable? I really don't want to do this anymore.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: 'Then what do you want to do?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: There's no time to figure that out now. If I had gone to college, I wouldn't be in this position where I can't even afford a house.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: I'm telling you, if one day I can't think straight and I jump off a bridge into the Yangtze River, I won't bother telling you first.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Don't try to be a tough guy, if you want to jump then jump.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: 'Are you trying to drive him crazy?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Goodness, this is too cool.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: What's the matter, did Mrs. Zheng not come again? Alright, then hide. Hmm.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Alright, I won't chat with you now. I have a small issue.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: What happened to Old Zheng?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: 'Last week, he insisted on attending a charity auction. He donated money to a poor student.' 'But you need to know this.' 'Mrs. Zheng’s wife is notoriously stingy.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Shen Yan
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: No way.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: It's not about the donation, it's about how if she hadn’t leeched off of me during the dinner, he would now be one, not daring to go home and two, the creditors constantly coming after him. His only choice is to hide.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: duck

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: 'How much money does it take to push someone to this state?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Just 6000, now, too scared to even attend class, hiding all day long.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: 'It can't be that bad' 'To push your husband into this state' 'His wife is indeed a bit extreme.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Hey, you can't talk like that, young lady. You're not married, how would you know? You know the saying, right? When men get money, they turn bad.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Hey, big sister, you can't say that. How do men turn bad, isn't it because of women pushing them? Hey, you won't be like that in the future, will you?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: 'What are you looking at, you're annoying.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Hey, I'm working, get back, get back!

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Person above, please stay calm, don't move, we are coming to rescue you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Hey! Don't move, don't move, what's the problem? We can help you. You're still young, you have a long life ahead. Think about your family, think about your parents. Especially your mother, it wasn't easy for her to carry you for ten months. Please don't do anything foolish.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Passerby
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Jump then, it's not a big deal!

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Who's talking nonsense? Don't you have any humanity?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Listen, I'm Officer Zhang from Weishuimen, just call me Old Zhang, I beg you not to move. It's too dangerous. If you refuse to listen to persuasion and act recklessly, we will have to proceed according to the law.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: What's all this about?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 2
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: How about we have Shengjian buns?

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 3
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Sure.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 2
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Oh my, look at the TV. Who is that person? They really can't think straight, trying to jump down from the tower.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 3
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: 'Still quite young, what's the big deal'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 2
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Look at so many people

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Woman 3
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Look, he's about to jump.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: The old man
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: I'm not very clear about this situation, he's been standing up there for a good while now, looking at the way things are, it seems to be because of work pressure being too great, life pressure too great, he can't bear it, maybe there's some mental distortion, or something like that, it's been a long time, looking at his attire, he must be a migrant worker.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: It's probably not an issue of economic dispute.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.speaker: The old man
movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: That wouldn't be the case, nowadays the government takes the wages of migrant workers very seriously.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Take it very, very seriously, so it doesn't seem like it. I wonder if it's a love problem, or trying to keep two relationships at the same time, I'm not sure about that, I'm not sure. Anyway, hurry, hurry to save him.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: "Did you see the person up there, our fire truck always comes right away.""In a while, you'll experience how good it feels to ride on a ladder.""Not everyone gets this treatment""Only you get this treatment, very safe""So don't be impulsive, impulsiveness is the devil."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Sister, take it easy.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: It's okay, it's okay.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Just now, that kidnapper

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: No no no, it's fine, I

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Young man, which newspaper are you from?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Jiangnan Express

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Jiangnan Express, is your editor-in-chief called Zheng Jin?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Know him?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Old friend, could you do me a favor? This money, give it to the parents of the needy student tomorrow, ok?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: I, they are not easy either.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Sister, what's your name? I need to tell our editor about this.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: It's okay, I'm his old classmate. Thank you, he's quite good. I'm going now.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Sister, take care.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Hello, beautiful, what's going on, what happened?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Really, isn’t he at work?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Really, don't be in a rush, I'm coming over immediately, I'm coming over immediately, don't be in a rush.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Oh right, him, Glasses, come here, I can't see the road, you sit here and help me guide, hurry up, hurry up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: Comrades, who asked you to come up, I didn’t want to commit suicide.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: firefighter
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: We know you're not committing suicide, so we have to be even more careful, understand?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: "Can you listen to me first?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: firefighter
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: "We are listening, just come down and talk."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: "You are impeding my work."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: firefighter
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: "Sorry for impeding your public duties temporarily, sorry about that."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: I can get down on my own, I'm not insane, I'm a line worker

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Police officer
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: What are you doing? What?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_5100_5280.text: He’s my boyfriend, he’s my boyfriend

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: 'Are you crazy?' 'I just wanted to annoy you; it's your fault for leaving me on the mountaintop.' 'I don't want anything else; I just want you to be all right.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Wang Xiaopo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Stop messing around

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: What's all this about? Isn't this embarrassing? Get in the car.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Report to Officer Zhang, report to Officer Zhang. An armored vehicle has been spotted on Zhanjiang Road, driving recklessly on the road.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Stop causing trouble, hurry up and seal off the area, block it immediately.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Passerby A
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Oh, my clothes, my clothes, oh, my clothes.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Passerby B
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: What's it got to do with me?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Oh dear, oh dear, Uncle Officer Zhang, oh dear, sorry, so sorry, so sorry.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: What are you up to?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Da Xu
