movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: I, I'm saving someone.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: You're saving people with this big thing? You're saving people and you think you're in 'Saving Private Ryan' or something?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: No, seriously though, Wang Xiaopo had an accident, they said he was lying up on some kind of iron tower.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: He's already down

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Ah, down.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: 'Take that red cover off the antenna for me,' 'How shameful is this! You, you, you all get in the car.' Then he turns to a worker and says, 'Hey, Xiao Wang, make a call, tow this big thing away.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Little Wang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: is

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Let's see.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Enough talk.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: He's back. Your son just called, he won a second-class scholarship from the school, he wanted to share the good news with you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Did you get the money back?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Hmm

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Where did you put it?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: 'Placed it where they told me to.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Where's that?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.speaker: Mrs. Zheng
movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Under the streetlight

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Money is but an external possession, ah, as long as our sesame comes home safe, that would be lovely.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Can you really blame us? We just wanted to make some money for marriage, who does it hinder? Can't afford a house, the family disagrees, you tell me, what should we do?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: The woman in the red dress
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Yeah, right now the most troubled ones are us young people. Back then, we missed the welfare housing allocation. When it comes to affordable housing, we are not eligible to buy. As for commercial housing, we lack the financial foundation. Who really takes care of us, I wonder.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: I'm talking to you, you think watching Korean dramas you're stirring what emotions, take proper notes, see how attentive others are taking them.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Why is it you again? What are you doing here?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Hello, I am the reporter from 'The Southern Fast News,' last name Chen, as in the Chen Shimei.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Chen Shimei's Chen, let me tell you, you hit someone yesterday, weren't you satisfied with the mess you caused? Go, go, attend to your duties, out you go, out!

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Reporter Chen
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Then I will take my leave.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Let me tell you, it really infuriated me.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: colleague
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Officer Zhang, this man, he's his apprentice, went back to get parts.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: Officer Zhang
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: "In that case, I'll recuse myself from this," "you deal with it," "do what needs to be done, follow the regulations."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.speaker: A female officer
movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: "Wang Xiaopo," "You have illegally modified a vehicle and taken it to the streets," "violating road traffic regulation," "disturbing public order, damaging public property," "if handled strictly, you can be detained for this."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Policewoman
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: "If handled severely, you could be detained. But considering that no major harm was done, a fine of 200 yuan, suspension of the driver's license for three months, and all damaged items must be compensated at their value. After completing the procedures, you are free to leave."

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: Can I take my armored vehicle?

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Policewoman
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: This is good enough. Are you really that naive or just pretending? Still not enough trouble for you.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: Let's just leave. It's not a big deal. Listen to the police lady, okay? Let's go.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: "Why did you climb from that side?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: I think all this time we've been struggling for houses, cars, stocks, just thinking that these are everything in life, but actually, they are not. Today, I realized that there are many, many precious things in life that cannot be measured by money.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: Air, sunlight, friendship, family, and my love, are all, money is worthless in front of these things.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: And now, I now have a small but warm house, and an armored car that no one wants. But I believe that as long as we are sincere, and put effort into it, our dreams will come true.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Zhang Li
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: "My mom is always worried" "that you can't provide me a safe and happy home," "Indeed, you don't have a big house," "or a good job," "but who can resist your armored car?" "Would you like to give it to me," "and be my driver forever?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Da Xu
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: What's the big deal? Willing, willing.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Wang Xiaobo
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: I am absolutely, absolutely, absolutely willing.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.speaker: Zheng Jin
movie101_7089369392055583246_5640_5820.text: The newlyweds are now in front of us. Does anyone have anything to say to them?

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: I am Wu Zheng, a professional photographer. I heard from people in my circle that Yingtan Village is an ancient village hidden deep in the Taihang Mountains. Unbeknownst to me, my arrival has disrupted the tranquility of the previously peaceful small mountain village, and it has never been the same.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The Photographer in Red Clothes
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: 'Wow, brother Wu Zheng, you are something. You transitioned from urban human scenes to rural life in one step. This click captures a beautiful aunt.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The Chubby Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: 'I'll say, a master is a master. Although I don't understand much, from the lighting and composition, it's really excellent.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The Chubby Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: 'You can't just focus on mining gold for yourself and ignore our well-being.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The young photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: I think nobody should participate in this Taihang Culture Photography Exhibition. It's hopeless.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The Chubby Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: Hmm, there are definitely some prize-winning photos among these.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: 'Forget it, I haven't resolved the portrait rights for my photos yet,'

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The Chubby Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: 'You've taken such beautiful photos, and someone still worries about portrait rights?' The photographer asked, 'Wu Zheng, where did you shoot these beautiful pictures? Who is this woman?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: Her? She's a woman from Yingtan.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.speaker: The woman from Yingtan in the photo

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: Explanation? What explanation do you want? Yes, your husband was injured, but who paid for his medical expenses at the hospital?

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: 'His injury is so severe that his future normal life is in question. Today it's Yucheng who got injured, but what about others who get injured? As the owner of the stone factory, can't you think about the workers' safety? They work tirelessly for you to earn money, couldn't you take full responsibility?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: Shui Xiu, you need to understand. Your husband was not following regulations while working in the quarry area but went to a dangerous zone on his own to work. Didn't he know that working there would yield more stone slabs that would earn him more bonuses? This injury is his own doing.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: I'm telling you, Yucheng got injured, and now my quarry has stopped working. Who's going to be responsible for that? Who?

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: 'This is ridiculous! They can't think of me when they're enjoying the good life, with the wife and kids around a warm stove, but when something happens, they come running to me. I'm telling you Shui Xiu, you're extorting me.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: Extorting you? How am I extorting you?

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: The woman with the teacup
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: What's going on here? Shui Xiu, don't be angry. Come, have some water first.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: The woman with the teacup
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: I told you, can't you speak nicely?

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: 'What is there to say? I have only one thing to say: No money.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: Liu Yuhai, if you won't be reasonable, there are plenty of places that will.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: I'm telling you, you can raise a fuss wherever you want.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: You went to see Liu Yuhai again? If it doesn't work out, just forget it. It's all because of my bad luck.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: What do you mean, bad luck? Why shouldn't he be responsible for our injury?

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: They are wealthy and powerful; we can't fight them, and you can't make a scene with them.

movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_240_420.text: Who said I was going to make a scene? I just can't swallow this. I refuse to believe there's no place to seek justice. I'll go talk to Old Qin.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Dad, I've heard many people in the village talking, saying that Brother Yucheng and Shui Xiu are in a particularly pitiful situation. Please help them.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: "What do you know? More than half of the people in our village work at Liu Yuhai's slate factory to earn a living. If you push him too hard and he shuts down the factory, how will everyone survive? Besides, Liu Yuhai isn't refusing to compensate, it's just that Shui Xiu insists on him taking full responsibility." "Yaoyao, think about it. Shui Xiu's family has no children, which means Liu Yuhai would have to support him in his old age. Isn't that a bit too much?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: "What's so excessive about that? I think Shui Xiu is right. If he got hurt, Liu Yuhai should take responsibility."

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Is Uncle Lao Qing at home?

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Sister-in-law

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Are you eating?

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Okay, do it, over here.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: This is Yucheng's medical certificate. The doctor says he still needs further treatment.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Shui Xiu, haven't we settled the medical bills already? I think you've done enough.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Uncle Lao Qing, I've already approached him several times and he just doesn't care.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Shui Xiu, we're all neighbors. Don't overdo it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: "What if Yucheng ends up disabled? Who will take care of him for the rest of his life?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Who will take care of him? The village will.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: He's my husband, not the village's responsibility. I can take care of him myself.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: "Aren't you being unreasonable?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: "How am I being unreasonable? I just want him to take responsibility. Why can't he?" "Uncle Lao Qing, you're the village head. I came to you to hear a fair word." "If you won't handle this, I'll go to the township. I can't believe this can't be resolved."

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Go, go ahead.

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Sister-in-law, Dad, why do you talk like that?

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Sister-in-law

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: How am I talking? Is she arguing with me now?

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "Yu Cheng, this is the prescription from Doctor Wang from Shitou Village. You should drink it."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Oh, it's been so long and there's still no improvement.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Injuries take a hundred days to heal. You can't just expect them to get better right away.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Did you go to see them again?

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Don't worry, I know what I'm doing. We're not people who make false claims. But if they don't admit their mistake, I won't let it go.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "Who else but your wife could do this? You should just focus on getting better. I'll handle everything else."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "It's not appropriate for a woman to be out in the open like this."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "Why isn't it appropriate? Winning a lawsuit depends on reason. Liu Yuhai has bullied us too much. I can't swallow this anger."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "The word 'people' has one mouth, 'official' has two. No matter how reasonable you are, we only have one mouth." "If it doesn't work, let's just endure it a bit longer."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Yu Cheng, why are you so weak now?

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "I'm already crippled like this, can I not be weak? You always wanted a child."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: In the future, I can't give you anything and will only drag you down. If it really doesn't work, let's get a divorce.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: "Yu Cheng, why are you saying this? Didn't we agree to stay together for a lifetime?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: I will take care of you for a lifetime. Don't say such things in the future.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Take this. Our man doesn't know how to talk, please don't take it to heart.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Use this money to buy something nourishing for Yu Cheng.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Shan Tao, I understand, I am addressing the matter, not the person. Right and wrong must be made clear.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Xiuer

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Shan Tao, thank you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Okay, okay, okay, you can do whatever you like. Don't you understand what you've done yourself? Fine, let's do as you say. But don't forget, I'm a law student.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Big sister, excuse me, is there a hotel in this village? Oh, it's you!

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: You are

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: My name is Wu Zheng, 'Wu' with the 'mountain' radical beside a 'struggle' character, and this is my business card.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "This is my husband Feng Yucheng. He got injured while working with the stone slabs." "Feng Yucheng, Mr. Wu is a photographer who has come to our village to take some landscape photos." "We don't have a hotel in our village," "so" "he will stay at our place."

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Come, come, sit down, sit down.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Okay, thank you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "What's there to see in this poor village. You city folks are different."

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Oh, right, this is my living expense for the time being. If it's not enough, let me know.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: No, no, that's not acceptable.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "Come on, this is the right thing to do, this is the right thing to do."

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Brother Wu

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Shui Xiu, oh, come on in.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: I brought you a pot of hot water.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Thank you

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Brother Wu, you studied law, right? I have something I want to consult with you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Come, sit, tell me what's the matter.

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "Here's the thing. My husband Feng Yucheng was injured while working with the stone slabs." "But his employer refuses to take responsibility." "Do you think if I sue them, I can win?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "That depends on whether their mining operation is legal and legitimate." "If it's not, it would cause environmental damage," "and lack better safety measures," "which inevitably leads to injuries." "If that's the case," "then they should bear the corresponding legal responsibility."

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: "You know I'm clueless about these things. What should I do about this matter?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_780_960.text: Our country has Environmental Protection Laws and

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: And labor protection laws, for those who cause damage to the environment and to the laborers, they are harming my body, our country has relevant regulations in law.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: "I see"

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Exactly

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: I have some business to take care of

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Wu Zheng older brother, thank you. If there is anything in the future, I will come to you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Sister-in-law, sister-in-law

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: You're dressed so nicely, just like in the city, are you going to meet your lover?

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: I say Er Niuzi, your mouth really can say nice things.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Sister-in-law, look, my brother Yucheng is injured. If there is any physical work at home, just tell me. I will be at your service. Absolutely no trouble. We can still guarantee quality and quantity.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Alright then, the persimmons on my East Mountain haven't been harvested yet, could you please pick them for me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Sister-in-law, sister-in-law, sister-in-law, sister-in-law, do you see

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Remember, quality and quantity guaranteed.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Alright, sister-in-law, aiyah, what you're saying is a different story.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Director Liu, what did you say

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Director Liu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: I just contacted the judicial department. They said your concerns about environmental and ecological protection have no direct relation to your husband's injury. These two cases cannot coexist.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: "Isn't it the same thing?" "If not for Liu Yuhai's illegal stone factory lacking safety measures" "Then my husband wouldn't have been injured like this"

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Director Liu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: One thing at a time, did the village chief Feng already coordinate with you two?

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Yes he did, but he didn't solve the root problem

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Director Liu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Being a grassroots cadre is really tough nowadays. We should also support grassroots work, right? How about this, you go back first, we'll discuss it, then give you a response.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Director Liu, I don't want to make things difficult for you all. If our village can't handle it, I'll go to the county. This issue, I will see it through to the end.

movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.speaker: Director Liu
movie101_7228950501038293560_960_1140.text: Wait a moment, I'll show you something

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Security Guard
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: "Comrade, may I ask who you are looking for?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: I'm looking for the county head, I want to make a complaint.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Security Guard
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: "You should take complaints to the Petition Bureau, just turn right outside the door."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Female Boss
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: "Are you looking for a room to stay?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Female Boss
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: If it's too expensive, too expensive, go home. "If you're not staying, then leave."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: "My Shui Xiu, she has always been so good to me." "We've never had a fight." "She is unwilling to eat or wear anything for herself." "She gave all the money for my medical treatment." "If it were any other woman, she would’ve left me long ago." "You have no idea, I--"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: I, I don't deserve to be a man.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.speaker: Narration
movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: 'Facing this grieving man before me, I don't know how to console him. Actually, Feng Yucheng having a woman like Shui Xiu, he is fortunate.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.speaker: Narration
movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: Shui Xiu went to the county town for her legal rights. Though we don't know the outcome, she was courageous.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: I'm fine, Yu Cheng.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Xiù, as long as you're okay, we won't fight for anything.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: 'Why not fight? I just want to fight to keep my dignity.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Dad
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Dad

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: man
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Uncle Lao Qing has come.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu, you really are something, huh.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Uncle Lao Qing

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: 'Our village of Yingtan.' 'For decades, no one has ever lodged a complain.' 'You are really breaking new ground.' 'Shui Xiu, just listen to your uncle, stop causing trouble, okay?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Uncle Lao Qing, don't be angry. Now it's not just a matter of our family and Yu Cheng. I didn't intend to blow things up. I've checked, his Liu Yuhai's slate factory is illegal.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Illegal? What law does it break? That Liu Yuhai has been operating legally for many years. He pays so much tax every year.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: I don't care about what taxes he pays. I just know it's illegal.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Alright, alright, that's enough. Let's stick to the facts. This matter, let it go already. Why should you demand that he bears all the responsibility when you guys get hurt?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Uncle Lao Qing, please stay out of this. I must get to the bottom of it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Fine, go ahead and sue then, go on and sue, you're just like this, straightforward, go ahead and sue to the end.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: How did it go?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu came back from filing a complaint. Guess what? No luck.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: What does this show? It shows that with reason, you can walk the world, without it, you can't take a step.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Exactly. But it's just that, that.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: 'Just what?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: It's just that Shui Xiu filed a complaint this time. Against you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Second-Rate
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: What, destroying the environment?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Destroying the environment, isn't this woman possessed or something?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: In that case, for the next couple of days, don't go to work. Keep a close eye on Shui Xiu for me. If anything happens, hurry back and notify me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Second-Rate
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: No problem

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: This photo

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: "This was taken inadvertently when I was in England for the talks. Also, Shui Xiu, I have something I'd like to discuss with you."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Whatever it is, just tell me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: I'm thinking of organizing a photo exhibition in a while, and would like to use your portrait rights. What do you think?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: What, portrait rights?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: It means that I want to use your image from my photos, I need to have your consent.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: "You've made my sister-in-law look so good in the photo," "why wouldn't we agree?" Right, sister-in-law?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Wu Zheng brother, I don't know much about this portrait right thing, but if you want to use it, just do it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: That's great.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Look at this, this is your fee for the use of the portrait rights.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Wu Zheng brother, what are you doing? You take my picture and then offer me money; that's not acceptable.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Shui Xiu, listen to me... When I use your portrait right, it is a requirement to compensate you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: I don't care about rules or regulations, all I know is I can't take this money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Shui Xiu, listen to me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Wu Zheng brother, if you keep doing this, then I won't allow you to use my portrait rights at all.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: "Wu Zheng brother, can I give you some feedback on this photo?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Sure, go ahead.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: There are so many beautiful spots in our village, why didn’t you take pictures of them?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Oh, there are places more beautiful than this?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Of course, sister-in-law, when you're feeling better, let's take Wu Zheng brother for a tour around.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Mm.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Okay

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: This is truly beautiful.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: We used to walk up there before, but because of the sinkhole, we now go this way.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: The scenery of the English countryside is beautiful, but there's no way to promote it. It would be great if people from outside the mountain could come see our beautiful landscape. Our village intellectual here is quite anxious, he wants to do something for the village.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Wu Zheng brother, what are you thinking about?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Shui Xiu, look, this place of yours, with its mountains, waters, stone fortresses, Gong, and an abundance of historical legends and revolutionary relics, if tourism could be developed here,

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: It can increase your income, and might even make your place famous throughout the country.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: "What your village lacks in tourism is publicity. If you find a good way to promote your town, there will be no problem in developing tourism. In a few days I will go back to the city and have a good discussion with some friends."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Should we discuss this with the village head, huh?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Village Chief's Daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: As for my father's stubbornness, you won't be able to convince him.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Middle-aged woman
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Wen Sheng, oh Wen Sheng, how could you be so cruel, how can your daughter and I live without you, wake up, Wen Sheng, why, Wen Sheng, Wen Sheng

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Villager
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: There was a landslide, Wen Sheng got trapped inside, he’s dead.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wensheng's Wife
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Wen Sheng, wake up, please wake up.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wensheng's Wife
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: “Aunts, sisters-in-law, sisters, we can't lose our men in Yingtan anymore. It doesn't matter if we suffer or tire, but we can't do without men, sons, husbands, brothers, we can't let Yingtan become a widow's village. Today, let's tear it down."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: The villagers
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wensheng's Wife
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Let's go, let's go, follow me, let's go, follow me, let's go

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wensheng's Wife
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: We're going to smash the slate factory

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Person in charge
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: "This slate factory is our village’s lifeline."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Wensheng's Wife
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: "Do you want all the women in our village to become widows? Sisters, charge, smash it."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Everyone stop, listen to me, even if we smash this factory today, they could just open a bigger one tomorrow, can we really stop them?

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: "Mei Feng, leading everyone here to smash the factory is risky. If there’re landslides ahead, won't more women become widows?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Everyone knows that mining slate is the most dangerous. Our men are risking their lives to earn money. Our ancestors...

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'Our ancestors, for generations.' 'They relied on breaking stone slabs for a living.' 'It was something they had no choice but to do.' 'But now, we have a choice.' 'You have the ability to change all this, so why not do it?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'You think it can be changed just like that?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'We can engage in tourism development. Improve our lives through tourism. Regarding tourism, I have a series of plans. I guarantee, everyone will earn more money than by breaking stone slabs.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Another woman
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Fine, then let's leave. We're done breaking them, let's go.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Shui Xiu, you are ruthless. If you don't let me break stone slabs tonight, I won't let this go. Just wait and see.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Mei Feng

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Stop calling me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'I advise both of you.' 'Don't jump to conclusions.' 'Do you think engaging in tourism is that simple?' 'It requires a lot of money.' 'Moreover, in our poor village with broken houses, who would come to visit?' 'Even if you invest money, it will go to waste.' 'I think it's better to be more realistic.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'Dad, nowadays tourism doesn't need much money at all.' 'We can just focus on the county town.' 'City people now prefer our natural scenery.' 'Just like how our villagers like the vibrant city outside.' 'You don't understand this kind of cultural taste.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'If you understand, then go be the Minister of Culture.' 'You graduated from university but didn't find a job, just fooling around all day.' 'How can that earn you a living?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Dad

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Hey, Village Chief, actually, Old Qingshu’s Daughter and I just want the people in our village to live a good life.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Exactly, we also want to become prosperous and wealthy.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'Sigh, I'm old now, and I don't have such ambitions.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Actually, I think developing tourism might be a way out for us. So, can you at least oversee the plans for me?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: I can't oversee this. But, if you, if you want to try, as long as you don't spend a cent from the village, you can go ahead and try whatever you want.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'Thank you, Dad.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: My face is all covered in saliva.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Uncle, I just talked about developing tourism. Did you both understand?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: We understood.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'Then, when I bring tourists over, you can let them visit your house.' 'Just cooperate, and we can share the profits.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'If it's this good, then great.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: 'I'll leave first, you two carry on.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Man
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Alright, goodbye.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Goodbye.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Sister-in-law, when the time comes, you can motivate our women to do some handicrafts. Like insoles, socks, gloves, and sell them to the tourists.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Sister-in-law
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Okay, I'll give it a try.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.speaker: Village Chief's daughter
movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Alright, thank you. No need to see me off, go back now.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Alright.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Woman
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Okay, goodbye.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Ah, goodbye

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Er Saozi

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Saozi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Ai

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: This matter is settled then.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Saozi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Okay, Shui Xiu, whoever doesn't support you, I have to support you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Here you go. It's settled!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Saozi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Okay, deal, it's settled.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Then I'm leaving.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Saozi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Okay, goodbye! Take care Shui Xiu!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Alright!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Second Uncle
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Take your time, my niece!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Ah, second uncle, goodbye! Please return!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Dayi, I am leaving! Ah, then you go back, go back quickly!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Oh my, it smells so good!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: So much!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Hmm

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Spicy stir-fried potato. Come, have a taste!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Wow, what a feast, Sister Shui Xiu, what's the celebration without a special occasion?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shuixiu's Husband
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Er Niu, come over, have a drink or two.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: No, I am not that lucky, unlike this well-dressed photographer. I am using a machine gun to hunt rabbits, a waste of energy.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shuixiu's Husband
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Er Niu, what do you mean?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Shuixiu's Husband, ignore him, come, let's eat.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Alright, alright, alright. We caught a rabbit on the New Year's Eve, but no one paid attention to, Sister Shui Xiu, you are really powerful, killing two birds with one stone. Enjoy!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Er Niu, let this tomato shut your mouth!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Well, Er Niu is just like that, he is the funny one in our village, right?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Girl
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Right, I'll teach him a lesson next time I see him.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Shuixiu's Husband, you're taking medicine, don't drink so much.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shuixiu's Husband
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: It's fine, I'm happy today, come on!

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Photographer
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Drink less, come on, yes, come on.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Come on, cheers.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Shuixiu's Husband, are you sleeping?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shuixiu's Husband
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: I'm still awake.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: During the day, don't take to heart what Er Niu said, he never says anything nice.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.speaker: Shuixiu's Husband
movie101_7228950501038293560_2220_2400.text: Shui Xiu

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: I am a worthless person. I am completely useless.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: Yucheng, don't worry, you will get better in the future. The weather is cold; don't catch a chill. Come, lie down.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: I can't sleep. The moon in the mountains is truly beautiful. Life is like a mirror. When you cry, it cries too. When you smile, it smiles back.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: Wu Zheng big brother, you have such a kind heart, but I have a tough fate.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: 'You know, Shui Xiu,' 'a person needs both feelings and responsibility.' 'Because of feelings, we learn to cherish.' 'Because of responsibility, we hold on to our promise to each other.' 'In life, there will be many ups and downs.' 'But as long as we have faith, everything will gradually get better.' 'Don't you agree?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2400_2580.text: It's late. Go back and rest early.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: You should rest first, I want to stay here alone for a while.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: Alright, I'll head back first. Make sure you go back and rest early too.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: Wu Zheng big brother, it's time to eat.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: "Shui Xiu, Feng Yucheng, please forgive my unannounced departure." "The village tourism project needs funds." "I’m going back to discuss with my friends." "Thank you very much for taking care of me during this time." "Wait for my news." "Wu Zheng"

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: "For Shui Xiu, such a pure and kind woman, to bear pressures she shouldn't have to is unfortunate. I should protect her and help her. I should help the honest and simple Feng Yucheng brother. The virtuous and hospitable Shui Xiu, and those simple and kind villagers of Yingtan."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.speaker: Uncle Lao Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: Shui Xiu, you are amazing. You reported the matter to Liu Yuhai and it has been accepted by the authorities. You'll see.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Uncle Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: It's written here.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Uncle Qing, thank you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Uncle Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Ah, no need to thank. Ah, it seems that I, the old village chief, am not useful anymore. From now on, I can only run errands and deliver letters for you guys, ah.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Uncle Qing, if I, Shui Xiu, have said something unpleasant. Please don't take it to heart, I apologize to you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Uncle Qing
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: What are you talking about? I should apologize to you. You go ahead, I am leaving.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Then let me accompany you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Big brother, what happened?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Well, an announcement has been issued from above, stating that I violated the environmental protection law and asked me to close the quarry.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: "How is this possible? I think this is all caused by Shui Xiu. This is the result of her complaining to the authorities."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Why is this woman so ruthless, just because her husband is injured. Ah, now he is not just cutting off my income, but also the income of everyone in the village.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Yes

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Do you think she is sick, is she crazy?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Yes, we can't be soft on such a madwoman. Brother, shall we bring a few people tonight to smash her house?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: No need, if she wants to fight with me, I will fight with her in a fair and open manner.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: So how do you fight?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Our village is not about to hold elections, right? If Uncle Qing steps down, then the position of village head will be mine.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: In this way, you go from door to door in the village for me. Just tell them, say that I am certain to win the election for village chief this time. And you have to tell them, tell them that I have already booked 20,000 square meters of slate. As long as everyone participates, everyone will make money. Go on.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Ou La.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Yucheng

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Feng Yuquan
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Oh, Sister Mei Feng

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Where is your Shui Xiu?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Feng Yuquan
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: She's out, is there something wrong?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: She's out? My husband has been crushed to death, you've been turned into a disabled person. She goes out every day, what is she doing out there?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Feng Yuquan
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Sister Mei Feng, don't talk nonsense.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Oh, don't I talk nonsense? Who in the village doesn't know, your Shui Xiu. With that little white face taking photos, she goes out every day, do you know what she is doing? Do you? You are such an idiot.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.speaker: Feng Yuquan
movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Mei Feng

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Yu Cheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: My Shui Xiu is not like that at all.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: So what kind of person is your Shui Xiu? Do you understand your own Shui Xiu? What type of person is your Shui Xiu? Your Shui Xiu is not like that.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "Your threshold is high." "I won't come in."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Mei Feng, I know I didn't let you smash the stone factory the other day. You're upset. But why smash it?

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "You ask me why, it's to let off steam."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "Your husband died, and you feel sad. I understand that." "But you should consider the children."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "I am thinking about the children." "My daughter can't even eat now."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Mei Feng, us women have to depend on ourselves, we have to learn to be independent.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "I don't care about independence or anything, I don't understand"

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: This, is what Yao Yao and I wrote after visiting other tourist attractions these past few days. With this planning book, we can develop, develop tourism.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "I don't care about all that, my concern now is if my daughter and I have food to eat."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Alright, then let me put it this way, if I, Shui Xiu, have food to eat, then you, Mei Feng, will have food to eat.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "Okay, those are your words, I will remember them."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mediterranean
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Liu Yuhai 115 votes, Feng Laoqing 114 votes, Shui Xiu 114 votes, Fengshan River 53 votes

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Mediterranean
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: After the villagers' election in Yingtan Village, the leadership group supervised the village election. According to the election law, this election was fair. Liu Yuhai was elected chairman of the village committee. Everyone clapped for him.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: "Thank you everyone. I have good news to tell you, can the people at the back hear me? Wang Gan Bu, can you give that to me? I have good news to tell everyone. I just signed a very big order with Boss Wang from Shanghai. They ordered a full 20,000 square meters of stone plates. Folks, 20,000 square meters of stone plates, just for this year, that order will keep us all busy."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: I, Liu Yuhai, have one principle. "Money isn't everything."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Having no money is absolutely not an option. I only recognize one word, and that is money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: So, here and now, let me make a statement to everyone, I'm going to expand my slate factory to fatten the wallets of more of our fellow villagers. When that time comes, I will help everyone make more money and let our villagers live the life of the wealthy sooner rather than later.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Host
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Please welcome Li Shuixiu to speak.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Li Shuixiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Fellow villagers, I, Shuixiu, am not good at speaking. But today, I want to introduce a concept to everyone. That is soil and water conservation and environmental protection. Maybe you all, don't understand the concept I'm talking about, so let me put it another way. We live at the foot of the big mountains, relying on the mountains for our livelihood. It's natural, but if we use up the mountains, what will our descendants rely on? Quarrying slate is profitable, but we all understand its dangers. Moreover, quarrying slate also damages our ecological environment.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: "What you're saying, we also can't understand, right? If we can't understand, then explain it clearly."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Li Shuixiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Then let's talk about tourism. As long as everyone trusts me, Shuixiu, I will lead everyone to vigorously develop our Yingtang's tourism, promote our village far and wide. As long as we can make tourism work, every family in our village could become wealthy.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Bald head
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Oh, women these days are too realistic. As long as you have this, they'll throw themselves into your arms. Hey, brother, are you still single now, got a target yet?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Bald head
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Did anything develop with the girl you filmed last time? You have to seize the moment and not let the duck that's in your hands fly away.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Wu Zhen
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Alright, alright, you're right, I can't argue with you. Let's talk business, have you looked at the tourism planning proposal I gave you last time?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Wu Zhen
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Nonsense, if I'm not asking you to invest, what am I asking for? Once this tourism project kicks off, a significant amount of funds needs to be invested. What do you think?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.speaker: Bald head
movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Buddy, let me tell you, I've always wanted to be a miser in my life, not spending a penny, but if you're asking me for a loan, I might consider it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: I can no longer call you brother, I'll just call you Village Chief Liu.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Brother Hai, what's wrong with you?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Lost my voice during the village head election.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Hey, no matter what, brother, now I'm the biggest in the village, no, you're the biggest. Shui Xiu is sidelined, she’s trying to do tourism, but does she know anything about tourism? Uh, if no one comes, what can she even do?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Do you know what they're up to now?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Shui Xiu, Yao Yao, and that pretty-boy photographer, they went to visit some tourist attraction.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: What visit? I think they're just out having fun. I really don't understand what Feng Yucheng is thinking, how can he bear to watch his wife mess around with others every day?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: That man of hers, he's just a worthless bum.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Village head Liu, the more detailed parts are later on, please take a look.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: No need to look at it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Shui Xiu, I just want to ask you one thing. Since you want to develop tourism, you need funds, right? Where are you going to get that money?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Village head, we've calculated it. Right now, to develop tourism, we don't need that much money. As long as we can get the word out, the tourism will take off.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: "I understand what you're saying. My principle is still the same: money. If you can make money, I'll support whatever you do. But, look at our village committee, we can't even squeeze out a penny."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: "How about this, if you can get the money, you go ahead. If not, then let's drop the matter."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Alright, as long as you agree, I'll find a way to get the money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Wu Zheng brother, what is this?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "This 100,000 yuan is for your travel expenses."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "We, how can we use your money."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Shui Xiu, you see, I have used your portrait rights, you did not charge me for using fee, gave me such a great help, this can be considered as my gratitude.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Okay, this money, consider that we borrowed it, when we have completed the tourism project, we will pay you back.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Good.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Good job, Shui Xiu, you are talented.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: You said when you were running for the village chief that you would make everyone in the village rich.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Yes, I did say that. I want everyone to get rich quickly by carving stone slabs, by their own labor.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: What about our tourism?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: I keep my word.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "Since you have already got the funds, then just go ahead. I just want to see whether everyone is willing to make money by carving stone slabs or relying on your half-baked tourism for a living."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "Today, I convened everyone because I have something to say. As the old saying goes, one depends on the hills when he lives in the hills and relies on the water when living near water. Our place here, with its beautiful mountains and clear waters, and so many ancient villages. Why can't we do easy and profitable tourism business. Today I, Shui Xiu, take the lead in opening up the Zhonghe Hall in the old residence for tourists to visit."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "Everyone, you can participate in our tourism cooperation in the form of equity. Men can be guides and security guards, women can cook. Take out our knitted handicrafts to sell as artworks, sell all the walnuts, chestnuts, and persimmons, and we will all make money."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Fellow villagers, do you think it's good?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Fellow villagers
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Okay.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "Shui Xiu sister-in-law, what's so good to see in our broken house? Don't lose so much at that time that we can't even wear pants, right?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "You, < Er Niuzi>, just rest assured, as long as you enter the valley, not only will you be able to wear suits and shoes, you will also be able to marry a college student from the city."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: "Really? Sister-in-law, you can't fool me."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: I'm not lying to you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Then I'm in, I will buy shares.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Well, the method of equity participation is written in detail here. All of you should read it carefully. Yao Yao, you distribute it to everyone.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: A villager
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Does tourism really make money? How much can it give us a year?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Another Villager
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Exactly, don't lose all the money we have made.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Listen to me, everyone. It depends on the number of tourists and the size of everyone's income. As long as we have a Phoenix tree here, we are not afraid of not attracting this golden phoenix. What do you guys think?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Shui Xiu, if we really lose, and I can't find a wife, I have to go with you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Okay, I happen to lack a son.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Today our Yingtan small chef's farmhouse restaurant officially opens. Welcome everyone to come and taste!

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Shui Xiu, Wu Zheng is really good, you see tourists say they will come.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: "Wu Zheng took beautiful pictures of Yingtan, these tourists want to see how beautiful Yingtan is based on his photos. He really helped our village a lot."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: No, Wu Zheng is really a good man.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Everyone sit down and rest for a while, Feng Yucheng, come!

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: One day, from catering and tourism, the net earnings are two thousand and eight.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, we also want to buy shares.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Not possible, not possible. When we asked you to invest, you didn't want to. Now you see that we are making money, you all want to. This is too opportunistic.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Er Niuzi, don't be a toad yawning - it's not like you can bite. Do you hear me? Go away!

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Shui Xiu, I'll listen to you!

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: Mei Feng, as long as you all trust me Shui Xiu, I welcome you to join.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.speaker: Mei Feng
movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: We trust you, let's work sisters!

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Shan Tao, what's going on? Why are there so few people here?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: I heard that everyone has been going for tourism with Shan Xiu recently. The number of tourists here has been increasing.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Tourism, isn't this strange? I, in slab factory, can't compete with tourism?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai, don't be disheartened. I have a piece of good news here. The boss from Guangzhou called me this morning and said that he wants to order thirty thousand square meters of slabs at once.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Thirty thousand

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Thirty thousand, plus the twenty thousand from the Shanghai boss, that's fifty thousand. Oh no, it's over, it's over, with so few workers, it'll take me until the Year of the Monkey and Month of the Horse to finish, oh my.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: But that's true. We have to guarantee the delivery time if we sign a contract with them. Otherwise, they may claim damages. Liu Yuhai, we have to think of a solution.
