movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Anyway, I cannot let others enjoy the benefits that should belong to me. I will think of a solution.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai, Shan Tao.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Shan Tao
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: I have something to do. I'll go over there first.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Er Niuzi, long time no see, you are radiant. What have you been doing these days? Don't you know that my slab factory is open?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: I know, but I'm afraid to ruin it like Feng Yucheng.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: I'm running a slab factory, not a crematorium. Are you afraid of dying?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai brother, you you you, calm down, calm down, I'm not afraid of death, I just think Shan Xiu's tourism business is very prosperous, really.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Stop mentioning 'tourism' to me. I find that word annoying now. Oh boy, you are such a smart aleck, leaving my slab factory and running to Shan Xiu's to curry favor.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: No, no.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Disloyal, whoever feeds you is your mother, right?

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: "Liu Yuhai, you underestimate me. I was a runner there, aiming to gather their information, didn't I come back to report to you?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: What information, tell me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: You see, Shan Xiu receives eight groups of people a day. She makes money hand over fist. Everybody sees that tourism really brings in money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: Tourism really does make money, 'Who else would come to smash stones?' I think, bro, 'you should come up with a way to outshine the water show' 'otherwise there surely won't be many people' 'working at your stone slab factory,' 'yeah, really.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: It seems, I really need to think of a strategy, let's discuss this together.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: Welcome, welcome, hello everyone, hello everyone.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: You see, these city folks are really something,' 'coming to our mountainous area for a visit' 'just to give us money.' 'Your Shuixiu is really amazing, perceptive, and knows how to make money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: What money? She's just making, and what she earns is all hard-earned money.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: Oh come on. Think about it,' 'that pretty boy Wu Zheng' 'brings customers to your family for no good reason,' 'helping Shuixiu achieve her dream of tourism,' 'what's in it for him?

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.speaker: Er Niu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: 'Brother Yucheng, there is ambiguity between those two,' 'the villagers gossip all day,' 'it doesn’t sound good,' 'but then again,' 'who cares as long as it brings you a god of wealth,' 'even if it means wearing a green hat, it's not a loss, right?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Er Niuzi
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Ah, hey hey hey, bro, bro bro bro, even, even if I didn't say anything, even if I didn't say, I'm leaving

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Brother Wu went to the county to attend a photography exhibition.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: "This Wu Zheng, busy with everything, is promoting our village to help us develop tourism" "What is he aiming for?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Brother Wu has a good heart.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Good heart?" "Give me a break." "What are people outside saying?" He came to our village to develop tourism for you" "He has a purpose."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: "What purpose? He came for you. No wonder people outside say you are attractive. You should manage your feelings."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Feng Yucheng, why do you think so? What do you think of me and Brother Wu? I know, I haven't been taking good care of you while I was outside. But me, Shui Xiu, have not done anything sorry to you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: "Whether you did it or not, you know it in your heart"

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Feng Yucheng, others can say that, but you can't, you know me best, I'm not as dirty as you think.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Big brother Wu Zheng, Feng Yucheng is missing.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: I was arguing with him, and he smashed up the place.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Ah, shouldn't we go look for him?

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Feng Yucheng, Feng Yucheng, Feng Yucheng, Feng Yucheng, Feng Yucheng

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Shui Xiu, you go ahead and look for people.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Ah, got a hold of it.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Is it amazing to have money?
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: You need to inform the villagers about a meeting at the village committee tomorrow.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: Xiú, you shouldn't have saved me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: "What are you talking about?" "You're my man, without you, wouldn't my life be aimless? Our good days are just beginning."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: "There's a lot of things I can't help you with and seeing you with Wu Zheng every day, it bothers me inside!"

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: Feng Yucheng, my relationship with Brother Wu is not what you think.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: Actually, I trust that you are not like that, but this Wu Zheng, he came to our village for you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: A couple of days ago when I was cleaning his room, I saw a pile of photos, all of you.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: Brother Wu is a photographer; those pictures were accidentally taken when I was washing clothes by the river.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: Let me tell you, this time he came to the village specifically to sort out this portrait rights issue. You know what happened afterwards, don't you? Feng Yucheng, do you know what kind of person I, Shui Xiu am? You should know best, I will never leave you. But seeing you injured like this, it hurts me.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: It's the luck of my many lives that I married you. Yet, I brought you trouble.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: I'm sorry, Xiú, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: Yu Cheng, you are a man, and you are the pillar of our family.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: If you cherish yourself, you are cherishing me, when you recover your health, we will have a child, ah.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: I believe everyone, is already aware, that in our village, there are some villagers who disregard their personal image, disregard family unity, and blindly pursue tourism, ah, pushing their husbands to jump off cliffs.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: Chief, please investigate thoroughly, who jumped off a cliff? That was an accident.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: Sit down, no matter what he says, this incident has a huge impact, something that hasn't happened in our village for decades. The impact is very bad, do you understand?

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: "Now, on behalf of the village committee, I announce that no matter who you are, you must not damage the reputation of our village. This reckless behavior, if something happens, who will take responsibility? Who will take responsibility?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: "I announce that the tourism cooperative is dissolved." "I understand," "I also support," "making money," "But you can go to the quarry," "and cut stone tiles there."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: "Cutting stone tiles is even more dangerous."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Liu Yuhai
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: "The current quarry is big and safe," "this is the craft passed down by our ancestors," "If we abandon it," "what a pity that would be."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: "Come, come, take it easy, Minister Yang," "Shui Xiu, come, let me introduce you," "Shui Xiu, this is Minister Yang from the county's publicity department," "this is Shui Xiu from Yingtan Village that I told you about."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4740_4920.text: Shui Xiu, introduce us to Yingtan Village.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Come, come, come, come, come, come, come, come, come.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Everyone, please be quiet. Next, please, let's have Minister Yang give a speech.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Minister Yang
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Folks, today we have come to your Yingtan Village, I'm very happy to see your village, with its ancient charm, dignified and serious, very generous, it really has a taste of the elegant lady of a secluded residence. It's really beautiful, an overwhelming beauty, I think we should vigorously develop the tourism industry here. From today onwards, if you have any difficulties, come to me. Our superiors will strongly support everyone.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: 'Thank you, leaders, for your strong support of our Yingtan Village's tourism.' 'The elders and folks of Yingtan Village will also cooperate to the best of their ability' 'To make this tourism successful, and keep it going.' 'Now, please Minister Yang for the unveiling.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Now, please join the leaders for a tour.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Minister Yang
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Yao Yao, are there any difficulties with the tourism work now?

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Yes, our village chief does not support us in developing tourism.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Minister Yang
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: 'That, I will think of a way to coordinate for you.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Yao Yao
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Alright, thank you, Minister, please this way.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: 'This is the East Gate, which has a history of several hundred years.' 'Everyone, walk up and take a look.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Yao Yao, Shui Xiu, you can go back now.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: Wu Zheng brother, from now on, consider Yingtan as your own home. If you have the time, come back for a visit.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: 'Okay, when I have time, I will definitely come to see you. Shui Xiu, take good care of Yu Cheng.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.speaker: Wu Zheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: During my time in Yingtan, I deeply appreciated the beautiful scenery of the mountains. At the same time, I experienced the simplicity of the people living here. I have left Yingtan. But I don't know why, a sense of nostalgia always lingers in my heart. I feel a deep, unbreakable connection with this place.

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.speaker: Shui Xiu
movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: Take your time, there's no rush.

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.speaker: A villager
movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: 'Something's wrong, something's wrong, there's been an accident. The quarry exploded, go check it out.' 'It's bad, the quarry exploded, hurry and see!'

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.speaker: Leader
movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: 'Liu Yuhai not only forged documents to illegally operate a quarry but also used explosive materials illegally, causing a fatal accident that led to more serious public incidents. Now, the offender Liu Yuhai has been criminally detained. At the same time, there will be a thorough safety inspection of all quarries in the county. Those with proper documentation will be strictly reviewed, and those without will be immediately shut down. Comrade Feng Lao Qing will temporarily serve as the director of the village committee in Yingtan Village. Shui Xiu will assist with the work, quickly calming the public and actively guiding them. Shui Xiu's case against Liu Yuhai will be concluded soon with compensation awarded.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.speaker: Feng Yucheng
movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: 'This time, it's my turn to take care of you.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'Hey, bro, where are you going, get in.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Hey, bro, bro, where are you going? Hey, bro.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'Hey, bro, where are you going, you scared me. Bro, you got on so fast. What's up, where are you heading to make some money? We have been together for several days.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: No nonsense, drive fast, and take me to the airport. This is the fare.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Hey, what are you doing?

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Oh no, we can't go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Policeman
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: What's going on? Don't you know you can't park here?

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: No, no, no, my car is stalling. Look, it won't start. It won't start at all. Look, oh, it started.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Policeman
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'Be careful. There is a repair station ahead. Go there for a repair quickly. Why are you on the run if your car is broken?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'You keep pretending not to know me, interesting? We can't just stop on the highway. If you have guts, jump off the car.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Stop the car.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'We can't just stop on the highway. If you have guts, jump off the car.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'I would rather jump off than stay with a turncoat like you.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: "See, what did you just say? It's offensive to call someone a turncoat. Moreover, if you hadn't disappeared for so many days back then, Yang Shan was so worried, she forced me to take her to find you. I had no idea you were messing around with that woman."

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Shut up.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'If I had known, I would... You are not even as good as a truckload of dogs that I pulled.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Where on earth are we, say something.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: "Didn't you tell me to shut up? Let's eat."

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: "What meal? I'm in a hurry to catch my flight."

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: 'Look how impatient you are, even if you are rushing to a rocket, you still have to eat.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: Don't move.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Waiter, waiter, where is everyone? What's going on? Not in business anymore, huh?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Where is everyone?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: "That stare is quite intimidating."

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Da Ma
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Cui Hua, Gou Sheng

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Cui Hua
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: What do you want to eat?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: A big bowl of beef noodles, extra meat and vegetables, hey, what are you looking at?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Cui Hua
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Anything else?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Nothing else to eat, what's going on, what kind of attitude is this, where's the young girl?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: "Are you crazy?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: That's last year's calendar.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: "Who owns the car with the dog outside? Huh?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Lao Da
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Not enough to eat? Who owns the car with the dog outside?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: "It's mine," Wang Xiaobing is kicked down and yells, "Oh my mom!"

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Should we just do it? Don't you know what teamwork is?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Bro, what are you doing?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Da Ma
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Go fight outside, don't break my stuff.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Lao Da
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Don't make me lose hope. I don't want to hurt innocent people. And I have professional ethics.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Da Ma
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Hey, I've got a bad temper; I don't believe you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Cowards

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Lao Da
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: You're making me lose hope. I don't want to make a scene. Who are you talking about?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Red
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Big brother, I suspect he, he is talking about me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Lao Da
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: "You don't have to suspect; he is talking about you."

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Don't keep hitting my nose.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Bro, catch. Why didn't you catch it?

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.speaker: Da Ma
movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Everyone get out of here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Lady Boss
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Don't kill anyone here!

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Middle-aged Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Did you hear that? Yes, our rule is we can't kill anyone. Hahaha.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Middle-aged Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Do you submit?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Ah, I submit, I submit.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Middle-aged Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: You know why you were beaten.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Ah, I know, I know.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Middle-aged Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: If you see me again next time, I will kill you. Go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Lady Boss
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Pay up!

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man in Red
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: loser

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Brother, brother, sit down.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Where did you go?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Ah, I don't know, I don't.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Who was that?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: I don't know, really.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Who

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: I don't know, really.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Hey, why did you hit me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: "I saw you nodding just now."

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Bullshit, if I didn't nod, wouldn't I still get beaten?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Crazy people would rob a suitcase, huh.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: You're still hitting me, getting used to it, huh? If you hit me again, I'll fight back!

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: A bunch of lunatics, escaping from the hospital to become gangsters! Ah.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Not gangsters, it didn't even hurt, if you didn't fight back, nothing would happen.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: What do you want from me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Borrow, borrowing money.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Borrow money

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: "What do you want from me?" "Didn't you harm me enough before?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Looking at you, how can you hold a grudge? You still remember things that happened so many years ago. And I really didn't know you were with that woman.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: What are you talking about, you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Alright, alright, I won't talk about it anymore.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: It's not all my fault, everyone in the village thought, you would marry Yang Shan, who knew it would turn out like this? So, what now?

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: "My passport, my plane ticket," "Everything was in that suitcase," "I need to leave within three days," "Do you understand?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: What a coincidence, my daughter is also sick, waiting for money for surgery in the hospital, if we don't pay within three days, it'll be dangerous, but I don't know why, the medicine has to be ordered from abroad.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Even someone like you has a daughter.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Why can't I have a daughter? If you had acknowledged me earlier, I wouldn't have come here out of spite.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Let me tell you, if the suitcase isn't found, everything is ruined.

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Brother, there's really money in the suitcase, right, brother?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: I reckon the audit team will be moving into the company in about three days.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Is it a large sum of money involved?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: 'Is that something you should be asking?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: I'm sorry, what can I do?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Things are out of hand now. I told them from the beginning not to do it this way, but nobody would listen.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Is it beyond redemption?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: 'They want someone to take the blame. Those bastards are so ruthless.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: It's okay, Dé Cái. You have also been tired over these years. Go out and take a rest. As long as you are out, no one would dare do anything to you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: 'If you stay here alone, would there be any problems? Or shall we go together?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: If I could go, I would have gone already. This incident came too suddenly. If we leave now, we'll have nothing.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Understood

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Then you'd better hurriedly pack up. I can only hold on for three more days here. After things quieten down, I'll come and find you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Decai

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: 'Those backups of company data at your place need to be immediately destroyed. Otherwise, if anything happens, we'll have nowhere to be buried.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: I'll get it done.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Yeah, Huang Feng.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Who's that?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Our drivers call him the chief of the underground transportation bureau.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: That’s the Huangqun Road.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Eh, driving here, why are you talking nonsense! This underground traffic chief controls no less than the surface, big truck drivers with tempered are not dare to run wild at toll stations, traffic posts, but they shiver at the sight of Huang Feng.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: My daughter put it there. Do you think it’s good-looking? Let me tell you, I really admire this Huang Feng!

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: How old is she?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: He's only in his fifties, huh, with this position, the future is limitless!

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Bullshit

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Ah

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: I'm asking how old is your daughter?

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Vaguely, I thought you were asking about Huang Feng, my daughter is nine. She's in elementary school now, which raises a lot of questions.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Sell your kidney! Being a mess like you, it's not much use keeping your kidney either.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: Then

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: In, everything can be sold but not kidney, I am still fighting, planning to have a boy, no, two boys

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey, hey, what are you doing? Look at you, making a mess, the car is all dirty.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: "Bro, bro, hey, bro, bro, bro, see that topless man, he's been in the number for three years, he's vicious when he fights, no one here dares to mess with him, and the one next to him, the one with the head like a rooster's comb, his name is Li Hai, a martial character in Beijing Opera Troupe"

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: OK, OK, did those two do it?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: "Why should they kill me with a butcher knife, they are big shots."

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: How in the world did you offend them?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: This is what happened. Recently, the fare for this trip to the provincial capital increased by a thousand yuan. I didn't raise mine, but maintained the original price. I wanted to get more business.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: "Aren't you asking for trouble?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: What do you mean trouble? I was making money. Brother, you better talk less.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: What are you guys doing?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Apologize apologize apologize

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: What apology?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: We got beaten and they stole our suitcase

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Yes yes yes, let me tell you. My daughter is in the hospital. So I went ahead to ask some old friends for money. But he pretended not to know me. That made me quite angry. Then I went to eat something. While eating, a bunch of guys came over and started hitting me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: hit me

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Looking for trouble, aren't you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: No, no, no, I came here to apologize myself.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Okay, come with me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Thank you, brother.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in blue
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey, this is not an apology

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Haha, haha.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey, big brother wins.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Then bring out the money.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hurry up and bring out the money, quickly, quickly, quickly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in white
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: I won the last round and you haven't given me my money yet

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Big brother, I have no change.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in white
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Three yuan, three yuan, very clear.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Isn't it just three yuan?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: What's wrong with you, get lost!

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Smoke a cigarette

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Damn, are you lighting a cigarette or starting a fire? Get lost!

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Eh, Huang Dage, eh, you're really handsome, hehe.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Man in white
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Big brother

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Oh, Huang Dage, you look even more handsome.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Yeah, it seems like I hear some dialect.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Yeah

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Yeah

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Yeah

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey, old fellow

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Then it's easy with Huang Dage.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Damn, why are you carrying a broom? What's this about?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Hey, who let you guys in?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: My name is Wang Xiaobing, I'm a freight driver in this market, I, I came to apologize.

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Haha, you take me as Lin Xiangru, don't you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Well, you're much more like that.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: You look a lot more like him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: What's the matter? Speak.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Brother, this is the situation. My girl is sick and waiting for money to have surgery in the hospital. I'm afraid that if the prices go up, I won't be able to get a job.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "I don't think you're unable to get a job. You just don't want to work anymore, do you?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Isn't that right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: San Er
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Kneel down

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: San Er, don't make trouble. Go buy two packs of cigarettes.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: San Er
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Brother, I have some here. You, you smoke first.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Get lost, this is not your business. Go away.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Brother, take care.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: You know the rules here. If you want to fight, you have to cripple. If you want to punish, you have to pay money.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Big brother, I also have some problems here. I lost my case.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Yo

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Looking at your outfit, you're not a person who runs errands on the street. A journalist, right? Search him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Brother, he's not a journalist.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: If you really want to fight, someone will die here today.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: If you dare, let him go. Damn it, tell me, what are you here for?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: It's one thing to beat us, but stealing my case? Don't go too far.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "Who hit you? Where?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: On the street.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: My people never fight in the street. They won't steal your things. If you get beaten up, go to the police. The same goes if you lose your case. I can't help you. I won't take care of it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: My brother already paid the protection fee.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: What the hell is the protection fee?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: That's called

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: That's called a management fee.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: I paid the management fee.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "Oh my, you thought this was the underworld? This is a logistics company, understand? Do you understand what a logistics company is?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Understand understand understand understand

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Do you think it's easy to do this job on the street? We should talk about affection, righteousness, civility, and manners.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Towards

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "Rules. Do you think I like to raise the price? Is it easy for us brothers to live? There's pressure to have a place to live, to eat, to use water and electricity, all kinds of pressure. Everything else is going up in price. Can I not raise it? Am I not embarrassed if I don't raise it?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: No, no, no, I'm sorry.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "If we don't raise prices, there's no future in what we do."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "He's right."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Passerby A
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: He's absolutely right.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Listen to me, in consideration of your being a fellow townsman, I'll let you off this time. Get lost.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Thank you, Brother Huang.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Come back, I'll borrow it, take it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Brother, this, this isn't right.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: "If I tell you to take it, you take it."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Take it, take it, take it, take it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Listen to me, take this money, cure your daughter's illness. If your daughter's illness is not cured, I'll beat you every time I see you. Do you hear me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Go, go, go, go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Thank you, thank you, sisters.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Dage
movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: You'd better go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Take that broom down, I think this brother is not easy.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Bald Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: You guys are blessed in disguise.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: So, thank Brother Huang for me. "Thank you, I'm very ashamed."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Roll aside.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Bald Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: The car you guys bought, was the previous owner called Wan Peng? You dare to buy his car. Countless people are looking for him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Hey, brother, what's going on? Can you clarify a bit?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Bald Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Go find out yourself.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Hey, bro, hey, bro, you said, bro, hey, hey, what are you doing, it hurts.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Go and find that Wan Peng quickly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Ouch, this hurts.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: The person you talked about, is he here?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Wan, Wan Peng, no, not him, my daughter is here, I need to send the money to the hospital first.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Do you have a clue? How can this little money be enough? Go and find the box first. Once you find the box, it will end all the problems.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: "Brother, there is actually money in the box, right?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: "If there's no money in the box, you're not gonna look for it, right?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: No, I just want to know whether you're looking for the box or helping your niece with treatments.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Both.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Well, in that case, why don't we make a written agreement or something?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: No, uh, well, no need, no need, no need. Let's go, let's go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: What are you going to do?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Didn't you say that we needed to find the box?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Go on, go on.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Bro, bro, bro, bro, bro, when you see my wife and daughter later, can you please respect me a little?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Hey, Doctor Zhang, hello, hello, hello, I am the father of Wang Rui, how is she doing now?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Eh, her condition is basically stable right now, and the child is also very strong. The hospital has thought of all possible ways. The most important thing right now is medicine for surgery, imported medicine. We have to rush and order it from abroad. This way we can reduce some risks. If you don't pay the day after tomorrow, it will be too late.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Got it, I understand.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Ah, oh dear, ah, my memory, Xu, Xu Decai, we have had dinner together, I brought two of our female nurses from the department with me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: We never had dinner, you must be mistaken.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: No way, how could I possibly misremember.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: "I have a too common face, it must have confused you."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.speaker: Female Nurse
movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Doctor, Doctor, patient on bed 309 is getting fever again.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: You've come?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Ah

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: This, this is the money a big brother gave, take it for now.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: You should go in later, they are just getting an IV.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: In

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: The kid was in so much pain last night that he couldn't sleep.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: You’ve been working hard these past few days.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: 'I'm fine. I wish I could take this pain for Daughter. What should we do? We still need so much more money. That director came again yesterday. They said if we can’t raise enough, the surgery could be at risk.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: "It's okay, my dear, it's okay, I'm here. I will find a way for sure. No problem at all. ' Ah, this is Xu Decai brother I often talk about with you."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Big Brother

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: All right, all right, all right.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Thank you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Dad, you’re here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Daddy missed you. Does it hurt?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Daughter
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: It doesn’t hurt, daddy. I want to go home. I still have to go to school.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Don't worry, daddy will get you home soon. Once we’re home, you can go back to school, we won’t miss any lessons. Look, daddy even brought your backpack for you. Look, English, Maths.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Now we can catch up on everything you’ve missed.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Quickly find the box, it will solve everything.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wife
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: You can go if you have things to take care of.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: My girl, don’t worry, you’ll be out of the hospital soon. You'll be home before you know it. Be strong, you’re dad’s bravest girl.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: I'll be leaving now.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: Daughter
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Goodbye, Daddy.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.speaker: young man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Yo, Yashi, Yashi.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: "Why haven't you contacted me at all?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: "I've been really busy."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: "Is that creepy old man still waiting downstairs for you?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Yes, he is. I'm so scared.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Yashi, don't worry, I won't allow anyone to bully you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: The boss is here, I have to go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Oh man, we barely talked again. How tragic.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Seems like you don't want to survive here anymore.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Guys, it's that car, get it for me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: You're free now!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Wait here for a moment, I'll drive the car. Who let my dogs go? My dogs!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Hey, stop right there, idiot, over here, he's running!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Stop right there!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Stop right there!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Stop right there! Tell me, why did you let my dogs go?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: I looked you up online. You're planning to sell the dogs to a restaurant.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Bullshit! Bullshit! Bullshit! What's it to you? What's it to you? What's it to you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Hey, why are you hitting him? If you keep hitting him, I'll call the police, I'm telling you!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Who hit anyone? I didn't hit anyone! I didn't hit anyone!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Internet Cafe Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Dogs are man's best friend. You should treat them well!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: I'll treat you well! Who the hell is going to take care of me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Hey, hey, hey, my car, my car!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.speaker: Traffic Police
movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Come here, come here, come here!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: My car, oh no. Don't worry about it, bro.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: My car, my car, my car.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: It's in the car, in the car.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Traffic Police
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Go to the bank and pay the fine. If it's not settled by tomorrow morning, the traffic police squadron head Officer Guan will have your car towed.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Brother, no, I just parked here, but they let my dog out, and I was chasing after the dog, bro, brother, I'm begging you, don't go, bro. My daughter is in the hospital, brother.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Brother, why didn't you watch my car? Now everything is gone.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Are you blaming me? Was that even a parking spot? This is what a parking space looks like; you had to park on the opposite side.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: "But don't parking spaces charge a fee?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Brother, it really is inconvenient for me. I hate cops. Look, releasing the dog was right, dogs are man's best friend. Aren't dogs more loyal than humans?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: "Brother, why do I feel like I'm not living like a human anymore? I might as well stop living, I'll just sell my organs, not just a kidney, but my heart, liver, lungs, all of it. When they're gone, my ashes will be scattered across the motherland, do I count as having lived up to humanity, brother? All I want is to live a peaceful, stable life. Is that really too much to ask for?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Passerby A
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: "You dare to hit me, if you dare to do it again, tell me clearly why you think you can hit me! I'm telling you, hey,"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Who are you guys, huh?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: "I can't go on like this," "If I do, I'll have no shame or integrity," "It's against natural justice," "Today marks my Wan Peng's doom."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Bro, bro

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: But

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Wan Peng, Wan Peng

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Not your tomorrow.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: You recognize the truth, huh?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: I recognize it, well, Wan Peng... "What are you up to?" "And you?" "Hey," "what’s going on?" "You jump," "be careful," "your flowerpot might fall and hit someone!" "What's going on?" "This guy..." "Ah"

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Ah, yes, yes, yes, it's fine, nothing to worry about, he’s just drunk.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Dammit, the police don’t take care of this kind of disturbance?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: He’s drunk, not driving drunk," "even if the cops come, it’s no big deal.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Bro, it must be because his girl left him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: It’s more serious than a girl leaving, his wife has run away.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Ah, this darn fool wasn't always like this.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: What darn fool? I'm his dad.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Sorry, sorry, I'm sorry haha, but you really take it easy, playing chess while your son might jump off a building?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Old Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Grandson, go on and jump!

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Hey, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Old man, take it easy, cool down.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Bro, grandson, the generation gap is quite big, right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Quick, go up and get him down, if the police take him, then where will we search for him?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Then, if I go up there and he jumps, does that make me a murderer?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Put your heart at ease, if he wanted to jump, he would have done it by now.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Uh, why don’t you go up?

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: "I need to stay here," "what if he tries to run away?" "Be quick!" "Ah!"

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Hey, hey, hey, who are you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: I

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Mind your own business, hey, hey, if you keep moving forward, I'm going to jump.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Wait, calm down, you're scaring people. I'll ask you something, and then I'll leave.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Ask

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: I bought a car from you, remember?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: 'For repairs, you should go to the manufacturer..'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: 'Why would I go to the manufacturer.' 'I was driving with my friend in the car.' 'Someone hit us.' And then the suitcase was lost, I have to find the suitcase.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Stop looking, there's no suitcase in this world. There are only prostitutes.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Bro, you see, I was right, his girl ran away, he.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Let's get to the point.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Ah, hit, hit, hit, hit, hit, who have you offended?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: 'Him!' 'To offend me is to offend him.' 'Is there any justice in the world, is there any humanity?' 'I haven't screwed up my dad yet and I was screwed by him.' 'Being a father-in-law, calling my daughter-in-law a beast in human clothing.' 'Now I've really become a beast, flying around, running around.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng's father
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: You still have the face to say, all my savings, all spent by you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Wan Peng, can you accumulate some virtue, can't you, 'at least he is your father.' 'Let me ask you one more thing.' 'Have you ever...'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Wan Peng
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Don't come over, go away, I'll sue you for murder.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: 'Stop.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Wan Peng

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Come down, a gentleman's revenge is not too late for ten years.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Wan Peng, you remember this, my brother said, a gentleman's revenge is not too late for ten years, I curse you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Hey, hey, hey, what are you doing? Can that solve the problem? Is it useful to smash and hit? Look for your own faults.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: I'm washing your clothes, why are you kicking the door?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: You, I thank you, these can't be wrung, they need to be air-dried.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Bro, I didn't wring the trousers.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Put it down for me, pick it up, pick it up, these are dry-cleaned you know? Have you never eaten pork or seen a pig walk?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Bro, should the underwear be washed or dry-cleaned?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Shut up, you're jinxed.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Bro, I'm not comfortable sharing a bed with a man.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: You can sleep outside if you want.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: 'But you're my bro, it doesn't matter.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Eh, bro, you got a nice phone there, swiping back and forth like that.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Weibo, looking for the box.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Hey bro, where are you hitting? This is still useful, can you afford to pay for it if you damage it?' Then, as if in defiance, he started wiggling his butt in front of Decai, saying, 'Disgusting? Disgusting? Disgusting?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Go, go, go, hurry up and get some sleep.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: There are still quite a few problems.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Two more days. If we really can't find it, I'm completely screwed. Ah.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Ah, bro, don't worry. We will find it. We must find it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: You better not have done something seriously wrong without telling me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Bro, what are you saying? I may lack money, but I don't lack morals.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: you

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Everything needs a reason, some basis. Why don’t people hit me? I’m a good person, but people chase you down and beat you like crazy. You must be pretending.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: What are you doing, are you going to sleep or not?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Sleep, sleep.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'You're being inappropriate, don't you know?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Hello

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: The person on the other end of the phone
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: It's eight in the morning. Make sure you're fully awake first.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Who are you?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: The person on the other end of the phone
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Who I am doesn’t matter. Are you the one who posted on Weibo about looking for a box?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Where is it?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: The person on the other end of the phone
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Desheng Road, Room 1088, Desheng Building.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Who are you, may I ask your last name?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: The person on the other end of the phone
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Once you're there, look for Mr. Bao.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Get up, get up, get up.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: What are you doing?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Hurry up

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Bro, this sounds so suspicious.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: You wouldn't understand with your IQ, huh.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Here, bro, Donkey Search Co., Ltd.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Mule Donkey

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Eh, it's been unpacked, bro, why this name though?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'To make it easier for the fools to remember.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Bro, why are you cursing?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Beautiful Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: 'Welcome! How can I help you two today?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: We're here to see President Bao.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Beautiful Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: You're here for President Bao, right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Yes, we're here to find the box.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Please register first.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: So, should I register alone?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Only you can meet our Boss Bao if it's just yourself.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: The phone call your Boss Bao made to me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: I'm sorry, that's our company policy. Please register. Ah, this person here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Bro

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'What's the matter?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'The two of them haven't registered yet.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Who may you two be?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Over the phone

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Oh
