movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: So you are Boss Bao, right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: No, Boss Bao is busy. I am his assistant, Wu Jiang.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: That...'Boss Bao mentioned the box on the phone...' 'I'm the person who lost the box.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Oh, I understand, I understand. Don't worry. Take a breath first.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Here, please have some tea, please have some tea.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Thank you, thank you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Here's the thing. To better serve you, I think it's necessary to understand our company's history. Our industry first appeared during the Warring States period, more than 400 years BC. Please look over here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: What does BC mean?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: BC means Before Christ.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: What does 'Before Christ' mean?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: It means 'Before Christ'.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Back then, there were constant wars. A lot of nobles and royals, they would feast one day, and the next day their country would be gone. So they inevitably had to run around and in the process, some important things would get lost. This thus gave rise to our finding industry.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Mr. Wu, have you found my box yet or not?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: It will be found. Don't worry. We actually want to do some publicity to build up a reputation. So, we ask for your support and understanding. Since Mr. Xu is in a hurry, I'll just skip the middle parts. I'm talking about now.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Below?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Now' means 'this moment'.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Sorry, sorry, could you please bring your Boss Bao out?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Wu Jiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Ah, well, I think...

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Which one of you is Mr. Xu?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Boss Bao, let's cut to the chase. Have you found my box yet?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Very straightforward. Where are you guys from?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: From the Central Plains.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Bro, just say you're from Henan. Why say Central Plains?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Henan is the Central Plains. The Central Plains is Henan. It's the same thing. Hehe.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: 'Bro, where are you from then?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: As for me, well, let me put it this way. I'll explain it to you properly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Bro, he will explain properly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Your box, though it hasn't been found yet, I believe it will be found soon. Because before this, we used the American satellite positioning system, later found that it was only good for finding oil, not for finding boxes. So then we used the German satellite positioning system, which has made a lot of progress.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Where are we at now with the search?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.speaker: Boss Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Within a 100-kilometer radius.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Right now, there are 43,684 people moving quickly, each carrying a box of a different color, so I need you to provide accurate and detailed information about your box.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: 2.5-inch Lion brand

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: "01, 01, 01, what's the situation now?"
Reporting to the base, over three thousand have boarded the northbound train, no suspicious individuals detected.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Continue to expand the search area, airports, docks, and various stations. Do not overlook foreign individuals.
Received, base.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: 02, you're dressed too lightly, what's the situation? Has the target been locked?
Reporting to the base, a dark-colored business vehicle is traveling west to east on Highway 502. There is a silver box in the trunk.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Hey, quickly stop that car!

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Shh, continue to lock the target, continue to lock the target, report immediately if there are any developments.
Received, received.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: "If this were in Mexico," "we'd just hit it with a mortar," "But this is the People's Republic of China," "a land governed by the rule of law," "we have to rely on the people's police."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Do whatever you see fit.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: So professional.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: "How much does it cost, I must know."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: I find it hard to adapt to the people of my homeland, always talking about money when it comes to getting things done. Technology belongs to all humanity. Is this something money can settle? Obviously, we offer our services for free.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: German satellites are free to use.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: "We are an international NGO, Asia-Pacific region office," "You wouldn't understand even if I explained."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Then, then, then, then, let's not talk about it then.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Move aside, move aside, move aside, hello, this is... Oh, hello, hello, hello, okay, okay, okay, yes, yes, yes, good, good, good.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Mr. Xu, I can responsibly tell you, your box has been thoroughly locked, barring any accidents, it will be delivered here within two hours.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Really? That was so fast.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: However, according to our organization's regulations, you need to provide a record of your public service activities.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: What, what what, what record?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: For example, blood donation, charitable contributions, community service, and so on, according to international practices, you only need to provide one, our organization will then serve you for free.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Brother, then quickly provide it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Oh, this this this

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Think carefully, from your birth to now, have you never helped an elderly person, or helped someone cross the street? Have you never found a penny on the street, or anywhere else, and handed it over to a police officer?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Xu
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: I am usually busy with work.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: Being busy with work doesn't mean you can't do public service.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: I, I I, I've done it, I I've donated blood, I've made charitable contributions, I've fought floods, rescued from danger, I've helped in disasters.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: I was asking him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: The checkered-shirt guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: What's mine is his, we are one and the same, we are brothers.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.speaker: Base guy
movie101_7166164445343941151_2700_2880.text: I apologize.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Hey, brother, you haven't done a single good deed.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Mr. Bao, do you see any way to fix this?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'In developed countries, charity is a part of people’s daily lives. As a social elite, it's astonishing and disappointing to see you haven't done any charity.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Don't be disappointed. Isn't it still time for me to start now? I'll go out and donate to the Hope Project and the Red Cross immediately, then I'll go to the blood donation center to donate blood.' Mr. Bao, as soon as we find the box, I'll donate my riverside house to the children in the mountain areas.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: No, no, no, Big Brother. Charity comes from the daily details of life. I understand your intention. Let's do this: there's a public charity foundation office upstairs. Just go up and donate 100 yuan.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: How many

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: One hundred

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Brother, why do we have to donate 5000? Can't we just find an old lady downstairs, help her across the street, and take a picture?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: In society, it's most taboo to suffer big losses for small gains.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Hello

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Who are you looking for?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Donation

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Wait a moment

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Why are we still waiting then?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Where do you want to donate?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Chairman Mr. Bao always says to donate to disabled children.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Chairman Mr. Bao, which Chairman Mr. Bao?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: The one downstairs from the Ma Hu Lu Company, Chairman Mr. Bao.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: I don't know, and besides, we don't have a donation project for disabled children now.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: What projects are available now? As long as it can issue a receipt, it's fine.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: There, the sea turtle, an endangered animal in Australia. If you donate to it, you can also participate in an Australian tour lottery.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: You have money to donate to this big turtle, but no money for the children, huh?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'This is a sea turtle, an endangered animal in Australia. Do you even understand that?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: I'll donate, I'll donate.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: How much to donate?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'You have money to donate to the big turtle, but no money for my daughter, huh?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'I'll adopt two more later.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Adopt, huh? You must be sick.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: There's not enough money on this card now. Find the box and everything will be fine. Just shut up.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: invoice

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Oh, Mr. Xu, congratulations. The box has finally been found.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Really

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: That's fast.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: It's in my branch office. You can come here, come here. Yes, this address.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Oh, alright, alright. I'll go right away.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Bao
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Hey, give me that receipt.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Oh, alright, thank you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Is this the place, right, brother?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: That's it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Brother, after we get the box, I want to go handle something. Is that alright?

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'Until the matter is settled, you can't go anywhere.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: I meant after it's settled.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Welcome, welcome.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Big Brother
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Chairman Mr. Bao sent us.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: 'You have an appointment.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Hey, you guys.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: You may pay attention to our new collection. These three European style designs. The price is a bit more reasonable than before. The design is a bit more innovative than before. If you two are interested, I can give you a further discount.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: What discount? What is that? Isn't that Lion brand's? Didn't we buy our own brand?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Lion brand, we have only Vitas brand here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Didn't the manager call you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: He probably did call.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Why are you unsure? The manager told us to bring boxes here."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: I'm sorry, we only have high-grade cabinets here, no boxes.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "What's wrong with you, didn’t the manager mention this to you?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "We don't have boxes here, only cabinets."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Your account has successfully transferred 500 thousand."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Hey bro, why have these words changed?" "Why has this become 'sub-health', 'This is unreliable, it's a scam."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Welcome, this is the Global Sub-Health Research Institute. Is there anything I can help you with?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Bring out your Manager Bao, bring out that Mr. Bao for me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Please come and register.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Bring out the one named Bao."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "This is our company's policy."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: You don't recognize me anymore, look, you didn't even change the paper, totally unprofessional, fraudster.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Hey, these two, these two haven't registered yet."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Oh dear, gentlemen, have you made an appointment?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Appointment your head, your company just started less than an hour ago."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "You fraudster, what's your bloody relationship with this donkey."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: You, come over here, I think you are nothing but a stupid donkey.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Hey, sir

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Oh, hello there.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Oh no, they have moved everything away.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Middle-aged Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Call security, what are you looking at, pack your things and leave.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Ah, changing again.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: The cleaning is strangely thorough, just finished cleaning didn't you?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Bro bro bro, look, little turtles, five thousand each, do you want any? There's more. Tidy up, keep tidying, come on."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Yay, ah, bro, isn't this 01? These few holes are all here, ah, these fraudsters, they are too awesome, really? So, they are making movies.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "I'll remember you."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: You demon.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Police
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Go, quickly.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Welcome to visit us again next time.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: "Bro, shall we," "How about we do a stunt show here," "To attract some attention," "Maybe this will solve our problem," "Bro," "Hasn't everyone encountered difficulties," "We will lower our heads and yield when encountering difficulties, right?" "Who can avoid troubles, bro?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: "Sorry, I couldn't make it."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: What's going on?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: We need to talk in person.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: I have something very important right now. You can't come to me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: I've lost both my ticket and passport, and there's no time to replace them. You have to help me!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: How could you be so careless?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: "I was robbed, and I don't even know who did it, and furthermore,"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Hey

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: The USB drive with the company's account records was also in the suitcase.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Oh

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Are you okay then?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: I'm fine

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: That's fine. Send me the address, and I'll have A Qiang find you. He will take care of everything.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Zhao Bing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Be careful!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Brother, we aren't going to look for that suitcase anymore, right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: There's no hope.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: "I've arranged everything. You don't need to worry."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Of course, all the money is in the suitcase! Can't you help me out, brother? If I don't get the money by tomorrow, my daughter will be in danger!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: If you don't help me, you're too much, brother! You have money to buy such expensive liquor but no money to help me. You're not tricking me, are you, brother?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: This is all your damn fault!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Hey, what's going on? If you're going to cause trouble, do it outside. Or should I call the police?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: A Qiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: What's going on? He's not coming yet!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Hey

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: President Xu, our car has arrived.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Wait for my news!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: A Qiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: President Xu, Sister Bing asked me to pick you up.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Okay.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Wait a minute, I have a brother inside, and I need to tell him something.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: A Qiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Sister Bing told me to get you back quickly. You should hurry up and go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: A Qiang, stop the car. I still need to talk to my brother.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.speaker: A Qiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Sister Bing is in a hurry. We'll talk about it later.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: Man, this is really risking our lives.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: "I don't understand why they want to kill you."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: I couldn't just stand by and see you die.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: A Qiang
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: Then I'll go and kill him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: Man, the mess you've created is quite big. Why am I still helping you look for that box? We should run away!

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: Wang Xiaobing
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: "Back to our village. Don’t you remember when the Japanese ghosts invaded our village, they were confused. If you go back to our village, no one will be able to find us."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.speaker: woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: "Where should I look for them?" "They‘ve run away long time ago, how can I afford to keep a waste like you, roll away!"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'How could I not go back? I still have some money in my pocket, I have enough for the journey. You better run off now.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'If I really can't save my girl, I'll just take her back to our village. We just installed seven streetlights in our village, it looks beautiful at night.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: Bro, what are you thinking about? We need to go now, it's getting late.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'What are you huffing at, you useless coward.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: Hey, hey, hey, who are you calling? Are you talking about me?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: I'm so thirsty, oh, why it so bitter.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: You can add sugar, do you want white or brown sugar?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: Do you have any brown sugar?

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: Well, I don't care what kind of sugar it is, just add some sugar, it's too bitter.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'Why do you want to kill me?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'If you don't die, I have to,' you know that.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'What do you plan to do now?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_3600_3780.text: 'Let go, I need to go to the restroom. I won't leave; if I really wanted to, you couldn't stop me.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Middle School Student
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: I want to buy a bunch of flowers.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Middle School Student
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: My teacher is very young, not much older than me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Then give white lilies and pink carnations.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Middle School Student
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Aren't carnations meant to be given to mothers?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Give roses then, white roses matched with cornflowers, along with baby's breath, representing pure feelings and care, the cornflowers symbolize keeping in mind.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Middle School Student
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: That's too childish. I want to express a kind of... a kind of sadness, or rather... well, something special.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Haha, you're really an old soul in a young body, what are you thinking about?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Hey, Middle School Student, can you help me with something?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Woman
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: 'Hello? You're looking for Xiao Bing? He is not here now. He left his phone here. You can come here if you want to find him. It's No.1 Guicheng Road, 'Language of Flowers' flower shop.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4140_4320.text: Xiao Bing, I'm going to kill you. Fuck chopping you up.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: The inside room is almost finished, just this bit outside left.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: No rush

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'How can I not be in a rush?' 'The flowers outside haven't been moved' 'I have things to do later'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'What do you have to do?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Nothing major, but we still need to move, right?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Let's eat first if we're hungry, then move

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: No, not eating now

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Then you can go, I'll eat by myself

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Okay, okay, we'll eat, we'll eat

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Driver, what happened, who came?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Nothing, my apprentice is here. I asked him to help me move. That lazy bum just now came.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Don't talk about him like that. You guys sit down first. The food will be ready soon.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Alright, nothing's wrong.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: What do you have to say to your daughter? Say it now, today, only one of you is getting out alive.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: She didn't let me tell you

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'You ruined my life, do you know that?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'Who ruined Yang Shan's life then?' 'If it wasn't for you and Zhao Bing being together ten years ago' 'Could she be like this now?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'I had no other choice, you know that' 'If you hadn't brought Yang Shan to find me,' 'Would she have found out?' 'Would she have turned out like this?' 'Everything I did' 'Was for a better life with Yang Shan'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Don't talk crap, you ruined Yang Shan and you say it was for her.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'I did it for her' 'You don't understand how much I love her' 'You don't understand'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: How dare you say that, you love her? You only love yourself. If you loved her, would she be like this? Would she be like this?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'Do you know why she had to find you ten years ago?' 'Because she was pregnant with your child' 'She wanted to tell you first thing' 'The child was lost later' 'Cried her eyes blind' 'This is the result of your love, right?' 'Right?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'You're lying'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Driver, Driver what are you guys doing? Hurry up and come eat with your apprentice.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Okay, we'll go in right away

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Hurry up

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: 'When we're inside, keep your mouth shut'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Here, Xiao Bing

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Little Soldier, I owe you a lot over the years. Take care of your wife and kids, and look after me, too. This cup is to honor you.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: This is the rose wine I brewed myself. It's non-alcoholic and doesn't contain any alcohol.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Come on, the apprentice of Little Soldier.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: He is not of age yet and doesn't drink alcohol.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Little Soldier, how have you become so harsh? The young brother has been here for a while and hasn't spoken; is the food not to your liking? Come on, don't just sit there.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: He doesn't speak, he just eats, already finishing half a bowl of rice.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Little Soldier, we won't be moving too far away from here, will we?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: You know, Yang Shan, I think you should have left this place a long time ago. I know in your heart you can't let go of that bastard, and you don't want to see him. Why bother?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: No, it's not that. It's this shop I can't let go of. In another year, it will be ten years since the shop opened. I had plans for celebrating the tenth anniversary: to invite all the customers who have bought flowers here, and thank them for all these years.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Ah, right, when moving, remember to take my dancing shoes. They were a gift from Xu Decai.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: 'You really care about the stuff given by the ungrateful one.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: It's already like this now. I've gotten used to it over the years. As long as I can feel his breath, that's good enough for me.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: We’re eating, we have to relocate, let's hurry up and move, ah, hey, you, aren't you...

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: I've seen you on the display board at the group.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Man
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: Uh, this was the ""Urban Hunter Project"" you planned two years ago" "Starting today, the demolition begins" "The place where you’re standing now" "Will be our city's landmark building in the future" "This whole area will be our most bustling office building complex

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: Yang Shan, Yang Shan, Yang Shan, Yang Shan is gone, she was just here.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: Yang Shan, Yang Shan what are you doing, be careful!

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: Xiao Bing, did you hear the music?

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: What? No, I didn’t hear anything.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: I seem to hear it, it seems to be coming from over there.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.speaker: Yang Shan
movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: I hear it, I hear it

movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.speaker: Driver
movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.text: 'Where did you go just now, why did it take so long?'

movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.text: I had some things to do, let's go.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.speaker: WeChat voice message
movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: When you hear this WeChat message, we are already far apart. I lost, I lost everything, including you. I'm sorry.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: Little Soldier ah, send me away, take me to the place where I got on the car.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.speaker: Little Soldier
movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: Brother, why do you need to do this, the person is already gone, what’s the use in going back to find her now?

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.speaker: Xu Decai
movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: Send me to the place where I got on the car, just pretend you haven’t seen me these past few days, remember it.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: San Ma
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: My dear brother, when Mr. Tang is gone, Ye Qishan will naturally become the boss of Shanghai. He and Owen have joined forces, you can't contain them.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: San Ma
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: "You have all the brains in the world," "But you're still too young," "You don't understand that small fry like me," "In the face of storms," "Can only go with the flow," "Do you understand?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: San Ma
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: Brother, get out of the car.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: Has the Tang group's people arrived?

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: Biao
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: "Not yet," "San Ma is already handling it."

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: I wouldn't want to be late to the banquet.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: Underling B
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: San Ma, sorry, the brothers have families to feed.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_4980_5160.text: Eh, why isn't San Ma here yet?

movie101_7021874945990853151_6420_6600.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6420_6600.text: Fusheng, do you know a Mr. Luo?

movie101_7021874945990853151_6420_6600.speaker: assassin
movie101_7021874945990853151_6420_6600.text: Mr. Tang said that Fu Sheng loves tea. Don't waste it.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: The brothers have searched Suzhou River up and down three times but still haven't found Li Zihao's body. If you don't kill him, he'll come to kill me. Do you want me dead? The one who killed the boss can never become the boss.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: "But let me tell you, the only person who can replace me in Shanghai Beach is myself. All others who tried to replace me are dead. Do you want to replace me? Qianqian will end up with you sooner or later. The gang will be yours eventually, but unfortunately, you acted too hastily with this setup."

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: Father, I'm too foolish to handle such a big setup.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: The fortune teller said I have a hard destiny, which means 'One general's success is built upon countless bones.' But I still need someone to take over. I held you in my hands to raise you, but you don't want that; instead, you choose to be one of the bones under my feet.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: In this world, the most terrifying people are those who pretend to be fools. Even scarier than pretenders are actual fools.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: They were outsiders after all. One aspiring youth after another—why would they follow the Blue Shirt Society's nonsense and waste their youth in vain?

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: The number of people eating with me is getting fewer and fewer. In the end, family is the most reliable. Let's eat. Doing too many good deeds displeases the bad. What's the use of being a good person? Kind people are taken advantage of. This is society now.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: "If you don't step on others' heads, others will step on your shoulders to climb up"

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: Dad, there are only human feelings and worldly wisdom in Shanghai Bund, there's no distinction between right and wrong

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: "He has been lying to me, he killed Ah Jie, killed the student, killed many people, he will also bring the entire Shanghai Bund gangs, to kill you"

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: "He has been using me from the beginning, to eradicate others, to eradicate the Blue Coat Society."

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: "The debt my father owes, I will repay you with my life"

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: Qianqian, you don't owe anyone, the debt he owes, he must repay himself.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: Qianqian, you should leave the Shanghai Bund as soon as possible.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: No, it should be us together.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: "Tomorrow morning, we leave this place of right and wrong together, we go to England, at nine o'clock in the morning, I will wait for you at the dock"

movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.text: "The savior of Bund, you are just a villain who manipulates power."

movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.text: "The debt my father owed, I came to return it to you. Is the Bund really that important, important to the point that the two most important people in my life are killing each other."

movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.text: "If I must die," "I will," "I will take," "the night as you," "let myself eternally," "held in your arms"

movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.speaker: Father
movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.text: A car is prepared outside, let's leave and go far, far away, I'm all ready.

movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.text: You want to kidnap me too.

movie101_6967711402819584543_480_660.speaker: Man
movie101_6967711402819584543_480_660.text: It was here just now, seems to have gone over there.

movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.speaker: Policewoman Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.text: It, it keeps barking. Do you have a dead rat in your house?

movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.speaker: Policewoman Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.text: "Due to the warming weather in Europe, migratory birds have delayed their southward flight." "Just as the faint dawn light streams through the window." "Ah, my beloved one." "Why don’t you come sooner?" "Ah, my beloved one."

movie101_6967711402819584543_1020_1200.speaker: A group of girls
movie101_6967711402819584543_1020_1200.text: Beloved, you must, must not be discouraged, to this world, you're pretty weird, to me, you're not strange at all, to this world, you're a nuisance, to me, you are my whole world, you surely understand how important luck is in life, but only through hard work, you may not need to pray to Buddha, ah, if you wait until sunrise, you can luckily take a picture for me, ah, that is a morning, we were lost.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Woman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: Hey, stop with the sour face, I'm sorry.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: 'Why did you get into a fight?' 'Speak,' 'Say something,' 'Why do you always have to fight,' 'Ah,' 'Why do you always cause me trouble,' 'Do I owe you something?'

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Woman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: Then don't take care of me anymore.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: I don't care about you, how did you get out if I didn't take care of you, how are you sitting here if I didn't take care of you?

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Woman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: Let me tell you something serious, the guy next door to us, he's weird, I asked him if there's a dead rat in their house, he said, 'I'll check,' I think he's a pervert, do you want to go have a look?

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: 'Didn't you tell me not to care about you?'

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Woman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: There's really a problem, go check it out.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: Have you ever thought, 'why problems always find you?'

movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.text: Hello, can you check if I left my keys in your car?

movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.text: I'll bring them over to you.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.text: Feng Feng, Feng Feng, Feng Feng, Feng Feng

movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.text: No, he was taking me home.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1740_1920.speaker: Young Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_1740_1920.text: Or maybe just prescribe some medicine.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1740_1920.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_1740_1920.text: Open your mouth, let me take a look. This needs to be pulled.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.speaker: Rice noodle shop owner
movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.text: The boss has arrived, please have a seat.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.speaker: Middle-aged Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.text: Why suddenly change places? Don't trust me?

movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.speaker: Middle-aged Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_1920_2100.text: "How could I not, I just suddenly felt a bit hungry, wanted to eat something, would you like a bowl?"

movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.text: He was arrested by the police.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.text: Godfather told me to leave first. "The last time you brought those two people, they were the police."

movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.text: It's the hostage I brought back.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.speaker: Godfather's Son
movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.text: Just what I needed to blow off some steam.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: This has its use, exchange it for your dad to come back.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Sugar Daddy's Son
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: "Why are there no photos?" "Not a single photo." "Why should I believe he's not dead?"

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: He's really not dead. When he was first captured, I even checked his teeth.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Sugar Daddy's Son
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: Bring him back, otherwise, your daughter won't survive.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Sugar Daddy's Son
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: I'll give you, a week. If you're a day late, I'll chop off your daughter's finger. Ten days late, I'll kill her.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Sugar Daddy's Son
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: "If my dad doesn't come back, you'll die too."

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: "Let me see my daughter," "Just one look."

movie101_6967711402819584543_2640_2820.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2640_2820.text: "Your child is dead," "You go see her."

movie101_6967711402819584543_2640_2820.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_2640_2820.text: You go back, take the stuff with you, bring it back, take the daughter away.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2820_3000.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_2820_3000.text: 'You can't arrest me.' 'You've arrested me.' 'What about my daughter?'

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: Dad, I'm fine now. I'm happy. Isn't this enough?

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Dad
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: I don't want you to be happy. I want you to live.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: 'I will stay alive.' 'Aren't I living just fine?' 'All these years.' 'Mom was also cared for by him.'

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Dad
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: Don't mention him. What caused all this?

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: 'But everything has already happened.' 'There's no going back.' 'We will leave Myanmar someday.' 'If that day comes, I hope Dad will leave with us.' 'But until that day comes, I don't want to change anything.' 'I got used to it.'

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: 'Try to understand me, I will try to make him a good person.'

movie101_6967711402819584543_3360_3540.speaker: Xiao An
movie101_6967711402819584543_3360_3540.text: 'What kind of crappy building did you build' 'It collapsed'.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3540_3720.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_3540_3720.text: "I've decided, I'm not doing this business anymore"

movie101_6967711402819584543_3540_3720.speaker: Driver
movie101_6967711402819584543_3540_3720.text: "Quit the business," "we can’t make any money," "We’re likely to lose protection."

movie101_6967711402819584543_3720_3900.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_3720_3900.text: "This has nothing to do with him," "Let her go,"

movie101_6967711402819584543_3720_3900.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_3720_3900.text: Consider it as I'm begging you.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3900_4080.speaker: Drug Dealer
movie101_6967711402819584543_3900_4080.text: It's the life-saving goods I kept, the goods are good. I need money now.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4080_4260.speaker: Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4080_4260.text: I told you so, but you didn't believe me.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4260_4440.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4260_4440.text: By the way, I'm going on a business trip.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4260_4440.speaker: Policewoman Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4260_4440.text: Hey, do you want to know why I fought last time?

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Just a little damn thing, there's a pervert teacher in our school, actually trying to take advantage of me.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: What? Someone wants to take your cheap, what cheap do you have to take?

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: I won't say anymore

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Hurry up

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: I will fight with him, scratching his face into a mess, finally managed to escape, only to find out after escaping, I left my sunglasses at his place, that's my new sunglasses, I saved for a long time to buy, I just went to him and asked, he even did not give me back, and scolded me.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Then I told my boyfriend, the boyfriend went to find him, when he comes back I asked him where are my glasses, he said sunglasses broken, buy a new one later, I think it's ok, buy another one later, do you know it, he lied to me.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: "He lied to me" "He gave my glasses to another girl!" "That girl is a melon babe" "Wearing my sunglasses and shaking it in front of me" "How could I not hit her?" "This matter" "On the surface is a security issue" "Actually is a relationship issue"

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: You are just a melon babe

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Let's go

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Middle-aged Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: This one, I'm still regretting it.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Middle-aged Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Should have let him trade his daughter back, it would have been better if I didn't have to work overtime that day, I heard a sound, the sound of the shoe coming off, I later pleaded for him, explained the situation, but he still got sentenced to ten years.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Middle-aged Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: "Wish your action goes smoothly" "So that the innocent don't have to be hurt"

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Where is he now

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Middle-aged Policeman
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: In a dental clinic, working for others

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Rinse your mouth

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Thanks

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: You're welcome

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: "Do you work this late every day"

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Dentist
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Depend on patients' condition

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.speaker: Older Brother
movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: What time do you open in the morning

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Official A
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Salute

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Commander, we've arrived.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Identity confirmation.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Mmm.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Commander of the 101st Regiment Che Zhen Shan welcomes the special envoy's secretary for guidance.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: I'm here to learn.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Secretary Yang, you're too kind. I originally planned to personally receive you but I couldn't leave due to an urgent matter. I hope you can forgive me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Ah, not at all, not at all.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Please

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Good

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Secretary Yang, you must be tired from your journey. I have organized a welcome banquet for you at Si Xi Grand Hotel, the best restaurant in Liucheng.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Commander, you're too kind.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Please, come in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Superior
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Comrade Hong Zichen, the organization has decided to send you to infiltrate the Nationalist 101st Regiment. Your primary mission is to obtain the code. You will go disguised as the secretary of the Nanjing government's special envoy, Yang Mohan, and inspect their work.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Superior
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: We have already captured the real Yang Mohan, you must act cautiously, obtain the code by clever means, not by force.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: is

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Secretary Yang, you are so young, yet you have gained the appreciation of the special envoy. You have a bright future ahead.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Oh, why didn't you bring your family along for some fun?

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: I'm not married yet.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: I have hands and feet; I don't need anyone to take care of me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Miss Che, this is black chicken soup personally ordered by Lu Xiao to rejuvenate you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: This is my daughter Che Linlin, she is in charge of the radio translation work, she was frightened a few days ago, her mood hasn't been great, I hope Secretary Yang can excuse her.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: "Since Miss Che is upset, why not invite her to join us for a few drinks, to help ease her mood?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: "That doesn't seem very appropriate."

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Is there any inconvenience?

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: No, no, it would indeed be an honor for my daughter.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: "Linlin, Secretary Yang from Nanjing, is inviting you to dine at Si Xi Grand Hotel."

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Woman
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Thank you, you two are such good people, thank you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: "It was snowing that day, it was exceptionally cold, and the old lady also said."

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: Miss Che, you must be mistaken.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: No, I think it was you. Think again.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: But I have never been to Liucheng.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: How is that possible? That's strange.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Strange, then where have I seen you before?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'Could it be in a dream?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: In a dream

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: A bit. 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words... The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable. However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Yang Muchen
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'What does that have to do with me?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: My affairs are none of your business.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: That

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: Linlin Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Alright, if he won't go, I will!"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Alright, alright, let's pretend I never came here," he sighed, "Oh, sweet child."

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "First, her mother was killed by Japanese soldiers, then, her boyfriend was brutally murdered by a Japanese bayonet. After her boyfriend died, Linlin became emotionally withdrawn. She has rejected every man I introduced to her, including Lieutenant Lu. I know she blames me. She blames me for not avenging her mother all these years. Since the death of her mother, she has never called me father."

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Commander, I should offer her an apology personally,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "No, no, no, Secretary Yang. Don't worry. She will apologize to you voluntarily in due time,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Hold on," ZhenShan Che interjected, "Yes, Commander?" "Yes, it's Secretary Yang."

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: Secretary Yang, what are you doing here?

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "I came here to apologize to Miss Che,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "This matter is not urgent, did you know, the special envoy Bai has already arrived at the division headquarters and will make it here by noon tomorrow."

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Secretary Yang, I hope you will speak good things about us by then,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: The Commander has always done a great job, hasn't he?

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Thank you, thank you! I will never treat you unfairly, Secretary Yang. If you have any requests, please feel free to let me know," said ZhenShan Che.

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "Well, coincidentally, I wanted to send some money to my big brother but didn't know how to ask."

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.speaker: ZhenShan Che
movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: "That's very simple. Just tell me how much you need, and I will have Lieutenant Lu arrange it for you,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Hello, brother, I want to send you some money. You mentioned last time about moving. Didn't move, right?

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: 'Okay, our special agent will arrive at noon tomorrow. From the division to the regiment headquarters for an inspection. I might go back to Nanjing or maybe another place, so don't reply after receiving the money.' He hung up quickly after finishing.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Comrades, Special Agent Bai is coming from the division to the regiment headquarters. He'll pass through one of these routes. Tonight we'll plant mines here and ambush with machine guns at this high point.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Look to the right, look forward.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Report, Colonel. Just received a call from the division. Special Agent Bai has switched to a plane and is expected to arrive shortly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Secretary Yang, Special Agent Bai is arriving soon. You must be excited.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: I'm not excited, I'm nervous, extremely nervous.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Colonel, with you saying that, you've made me nervous as well. Whenever I get nervous, I feel like going to the restroom.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Alright, go quickly and come back soon. Your superior will be here shortly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: Special Agent Bai will be here soon. Where is Secretary Yang? Lu Xiang, go check.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Secretary Yang

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Get out, you pervert, get out quickly, get out, you shameless lackey, you actually came into the women's restroom.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: "What's the matter, Secretary Yang?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Deputy Lu, I suddenly had a stomachache, I didn't see the sign clearly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Che Linlin
