movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: "Didn't see clearly, my foot! You did it on purpose."

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Miss Che, I'm really sorry, I just can't hold it anymore.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Linlin, are you okay?

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Oh no, I can't hold it any longer.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: "Hurry up, the commissioner will be here soon."

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Deputy Lu, Deputy Lu, where's Secretary Yang?

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Commissioner Bai has arrived.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Commissioner Bai, he... he

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: What's wrong with him?

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: He had an accident.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: What's wrong, spit it out quickly

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: As soon as he got off the plane, a beggar with a bomb strapped to him rushed out of the bushes. When he got close, the commander shot him. But, but...

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: "The commander is dead?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: The commander dodged quickly and injured his leg, but Commissioner Bai, he... he

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: "What kind of guards are you? Oh my, Commissioner Bai, how did you die so suddenly?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Alright, Secretary Yang, he's not your real father. Just wail a bit and it's enough.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: He is my real father

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: The man is already dead, what's the use of crying?

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Guard
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Deputy Lu, the commissioner might still be alive.

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Ah

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Secretary Yang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: What, not dead?

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.speaker: Lu Xiang
movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Damn it, didn't you say he wasn’t dead earlier? Secretary Yang, let's go and check now, hurry, let's go and check, let's go, let's go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "Yang Mo Han, you came just in time. The special commissioner is eager to see you."

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "How is he?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: He slips in and out of consciousness. He's awake now, hurry in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "Secretary Yang, please."

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Commissioner, I was just a moment too late.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "What do you mean, Commissioner?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: The commissioner asked me to get closer.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "Commissioner, I'm Xiao Yang, Yang Mo Han." "Commissioner, you'll be fine." "Commissioner, you'll be fine." "Got it, I understand." "Commander, the commissioner is worried he won't make it, and he has something to tell me privately."

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Alright, we'll go out first.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "I'll call you."

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Alright, let's go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Commissioner, you'll be fine, don't worry.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Someone come quick! Doctor, Commander, someone come quick!

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Quick, doctor, quick, doctor

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Doctor, how is he?

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: It's too late.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Commander, how can I explain this to our superiors when I get back? It's a death sentence when I return.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Secretary Yang, please accept my condolences.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: "Commander, you're the only one who can save me now." "As long as you temporarily take me in," "Let me think of a solution," "I'll repay this great favor in the future,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: No, no, no, Secretary Yang, we can talk about this.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Hold on, why are you in such a hurry?

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Reporting to Deputy Officer Lu, Ms. Che has been kidnapped. A group of kidnappers took her to the back mountain, saying they want

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Bring a hundred taels of gold, go, go to Beishan to get a familiar ticket.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "Damn, how did you get back alive?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "They let me come back to report."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Brothers, gather immediately, full action.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "No way, Deputy Lu! They said they only want Group leader and one subordinate to go."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "Damn it!" "Group leader is having a meeting at the division headquarters." "I can wipe them all out in three minutes."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "No, Deputy Lu, this will result in casualties."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: If you nag any more, I'll shoot you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Deputy Lu, he's right. We can't underestimate the bandits.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Just a few petty thieves scared you like this, are you from Nanjing? Don't make me look down on you. Brothers, move out!

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: You get Lu Xiao to come back immediately. I'll be back soon to handle this personally.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Yes, Group leader, about the gold matter.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Deputy Lu, stop the action, Group leader called.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "You called him, didn't you?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Yes, I was afraid of any danger.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: You sure know how to seize opportunities. No wonder, a graduate of Whampoa Military Academy who studied in Japan. Move aside.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "I dare not disobey Group leader's orders."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: I'll count to three. If you don't move, I'll run you over. One. Two. Three.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Alright, you surnamed Yang, the gold bars are ready, so eager to curry favor, huh. Give me the gold.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: No way, Group leader told me to hand it over personally.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: I have followed Group leader for years. He is me. I am him. Hand it over.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "No way."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Don't be ungrateful.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Deputy Lu
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Group leader, you are here. We've been waiting for you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Lu Xiao, are you here to save people or to endanger my daughter?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: "Secretary Yang, take the ransom and come with me up the mountain." "The rest stay here."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Is anyone there? Come out and talk if you have the guts.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Listen up, heroes on the mountain. I, Che Zhenshan, have brought enough silver to ransom my daughter.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Please come out and speak, hero.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Those who want money, come out. Those who don't want their lives, come out too.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: bandit leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: First, put down your guns, put them all down.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: bandit leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: She's right here with us. Did you bring the ransom?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: A hundred taels of gold, not a single coin less. Please hand over my daughter.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: bandit leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Put the gold down and step back twenty paces.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: No, what if you take the gold and don't release her? I'll go alone, handing over the money in exchange for the person.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: bandit leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Throw the gold up here, raise your hands.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart. For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: It's up to you, I'm sorry.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: "The one who should be sorry is me." "I didn't know your mother." "And your boyfriend were all... by the Japanese." "I'm sorry."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Mo Han, Mo Han, Doctor, Doctor

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: If something happens to Secretary Yang, I'll have your life.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Yes, my life was the one group leader saved, from a pile of dead bodies. The group leader can take it without a word, just for this one, an unclaimed, useless secretary.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Impertinence! Get out of here.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Group leader

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Get out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Come back. Lu Xiao should think longer before acting. You've followed me for so many years. Ah, how can you still act so recklessly, like a headless fly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: "There's something I can't figure out." "Tell me who dares to cross me, Che Zhen Shan, on this turf of Liu City?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: You suspect the identity of the kidnappers.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Although I haven't met all the local bandit leaders, I've heard of them. But the way this group acted today was strange.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: "Where do you think they came from?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: The bandits in the Northeast are causing trouble. Could they come from there.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Immediately seal the city and inspect it thoroughly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Yes, I'll go right away.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Wait, you accompany me to visit Secretary Yang first.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Look at him

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: You're still my deputy.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Yu Xuan, I'm leaving. Can you let me kiss you once? Just once.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Wait until after the revolution is victorious.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Then I'm leaving. Take care.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Zi Chen

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: "Does it hurt?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: This is not

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Lin Lin, let me do it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Lin Lin, don't joke around.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: I mean what I say.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter. Hurry up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Lin Lin, let me do it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: No need.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Secretary Yang, are you feeling better?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Don't think too much, just focus on healing.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: What? The bandit escaped?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says, "They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit. Could it be the Communist Party?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: "This music is so nice. Lin Lin, I think I should go back. Living here is not very convenient. You need to work and take care of me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Oh, let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Hey, don't put it there. How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Where did he say he was going?

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: The person on the other end of the call
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time? Yes, I'm fine now. Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven. Don't worry, I'll be on time.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Thank you for taking care of me these days.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Then it should be well protected.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Could you help me put it on?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Let the past be the past.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: You only live once, cherish it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Hmm, who's more important than me?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: An old friend, we've grown up together.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: I'm just strolling around.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, you seem well informed.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Speak up, who are you meeting?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Do I need to tell you?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: What, Miss Che?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Darn, why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Then I'm leaving.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Go ahead, go ahead.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Woman
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Come in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Yu Xuan

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Unfortunately, that password is a fake.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: messages, but realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Good

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Are your injuries completely healed?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: I'm fine now.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: You need to take good care of yourself.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: I forbid you to talk like that.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: You must return safely, promise me that.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: It's getting late, I should go back now. Take care!

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Wait, take care.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Linlin, what are you doing here?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: What are you talking about?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: But I was wrong, why did you hide that you have a fiancée, why didn't you tell me earlier, you can say directly if you don't like me, I didn't force you, you shouldn't lie to me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: I don't need your gratitude

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin, Lin Lin

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Yang Mo Han, we are now even. You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately. I never want to see you again.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin, Lin Lin

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Let me go, let me go

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Things are not what you think

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Follow me, trust me

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Where is the person

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Yeah, how is it gone

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: You are lying to me

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: I am telling the truth

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: What's wrong

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Nothing, let's go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Still the woman who has seen him.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: No, that Yang kid told me himself.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Group leader, why do you always side with him?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Group leader
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: What if I tell you no, would you believe me?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Please connect me to 4321, please connect me to 4321 once more.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hey, friend, don't go, let's have a chat. Friend, friend, friend, don't leave. Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.speaker: Hong Zichen
movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Birds of a feather, indeed. So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Che Linlin, how did you get here?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: "I'm glad you're fine."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Don't run around like this in the future, ok? It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Little Eyed Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Friend, see you next time, see you later.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: "You go home first. I still have something to deal with the old friend."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Forget it, let's go home together.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Speak up, who is he? Speak up, and this is yours.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Little Eyed Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Really

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Of course it's real. Of course. You can choose not to say.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Little Eyed Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: No, no, no, I'll talk, I'll talk.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: You're saying Yang Mohan is a communist?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: "That's what the informant told me directly."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: How much did you give him?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: A gold bar

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: What's happened?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Lu Xiao, if Mohan was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Group leader, I will prove it to you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Speak.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Little Eyed Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: There is a traitor in your organization.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Who

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: "It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.speaker: Little Eyed Man
movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: See you later.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "Please connect me to 4321. There's an urgent matter at home pushing me to return. A distant cousin is coming over to help with my business. At 3 PM tomorrow, she'll be at Ruifuxiang Silk Store making a qipao, wearing a chicken-heart-shaped agate pendant around her neck. Bring the account book and make sure to contact her proactively."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "Mo Han, do you think I look good in this?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "Why don't you choose the red one?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "I actually wanted to choose the red one at first, but I was afraid you wouldn't like it."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: The man with the account book
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: Miss, would you like a necklace? Pure gold, we can negotiate the price. Just take one.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: Che Linlin, don't bother with him. Boss, is it ready?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "Che Linlin, I think that one looks pretty good. Come over and take a look."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: "Let's go for now, we'll come back another day. Let's go."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: Lu Xiao, do you have a death wish? Che Linlin is my daughter.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: How can she be a communist? You have to take responsibility for what you said!

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Commander, do you think I want to believe it? But it is the truth.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Enough, stop. Bring that communist to me immediately. I want to ask him myself.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Yes, I'll go right away.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Linlin, come to my place immediately.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: For safety reasons, I've secretly taken care of 4321.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: "The code you mentioned, is it this version or this one?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Commander, that communist is dead.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Lu Xiao, Lu Xiao, you really know how to act.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: "Do you suspect that I did it?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Small-minded, adding insult to injury, framing others, isn't that enough for you?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Commander, I've followed you for over ten years.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Enough, stop acting. Considering your years of service with me, I'll spare your life for now. Your career as my adjutant ends here.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Commander, are you really this heartless?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: I've been lenient enough. Get out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Don't go. Let me ask you. This afternoon at three, did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Fine. You don't admit it. Let me ask you, "why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: You were following me?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: "I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Yang Mohan, huh, Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Simple, because he was working for the Japanese.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: How can it be? Commander, I never thought it would be like this. If Linlin is not a communist, then Yang Mohan must be.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Get out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Che Zhanshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Linlin, is Mohan good to you?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.speaker: Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Pretty good.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: "If you're going to go with him now,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: What about him?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Nothing much, you go first.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: "Just received an urgent call from the master" "saying there are three important communist underground members" "who will be escorted to Nanjing today" "having lunch in my department" "For safety" "I command you two to go and meet them" "You can't make any mistakes" "Understand?" "If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill, I promise to complete the task.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Mo Han, this is the first time I have given you a task, I hope you won't let down my trust in you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Yes, Station Hill.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: I'll come back another day to pick up the two missing packs of medicine.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: I saw him enter that pharmacy with my own eyes, his behavior was quite suspicious.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: What can that prove

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: It proves that he must have gone to send a message.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: What do you plan to do?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: "I hope that Station Hill will put Mo Han under house arrest."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Is it necessary, ah

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill, if there is a problem with the transport at noon, is it on him or me, it's not clear.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Lu Xiao, you are really like a monkey, you are really smart.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill, do you agree?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Do you think I want you to leave the adjutant position?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Thank you, Station Hill. Lu Xiao swears to complete the mission.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: "If there is a communist interception, must capture alive."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: is

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: What, I'm not needed anymore, why?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill, why didn't you use me anymore?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Mo Han, come, sit sit sit, sit, no need at all.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: What do you mean?

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: There is no communist escort to Nanjing. There are only a few guards from the regiment in that vehicle.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Then why did you do this

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Just want to test Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Lu Xiao

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.speaker: Station Hill
movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: He first suspected that you were a communist. Then it was Lin Lin. Who knows next he might suspect me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: The trap I set this time, Lu Xiao will either be killed by the Communists or be in big trouble, hmm.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: But doesn’t the Commies not know the news yet?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: "I've already let the word out, they will know."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: "Che Zhenshan, this move is really clever."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: "Mo Han, fortunately you were specially assigned here." "Otherwise, I almost assigned Lin Lin Xu to Lu Xiao."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan, now that you mention it, it reminds me. The cheongsam custom-made for Lin Lin should be picked up today.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: The cheongsam can wait, stay here and watch the show with me first.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan, I still want to discuss the cheongsam with Lin Lin.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: What do you need me for?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: The cheongsam is ready. You go pick it up. I have a task and can’t accompany you. It should look very beautiful on you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Then I'll go get it now.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Wait. Show it to me when you get back.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Help me pick up some medicine.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Group Leader, do you think Linlin looks good in a red cheongsam?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Sure.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Actually, I think she looks good in any color. Don't you agree?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: "I'm a bit tired."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: You're awake, Group Leader.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Group Leader, we've captured a female communist courier.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: What

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: The prisoner is in the cell.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: How did she get the message?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Secretary Yang would know best about this.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Me? Group Leader, you're the one who knows this matter best.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Group Leader, what's going on?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: "It's not certain if she's a Communist yet. Mo Han, how about you interrogate her?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Group Leader, I'm afraid of being accused of seeking glory, better let Lu Xiao do it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: No, you'll do the interrogation.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Miss, this man is from Nanjing, and he's very skilled in interrogation, capable of using brutal torture. If you don't want to suffer physically, speak up now, okay?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Hold on, give the whip to Secretary Yang, he will interrogate thoroughly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: I have arranged for Linlin to deliver the encrypted information to you, indicating a change in plan.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: "But I had already set off."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Once Linlin comes back, I’ll kidnap her and we'll break out together.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: "No, the 'Peony Pavilion' code has been encrypted by them; you must stay behind."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Then what will you do?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: I'm ready to sacrifice at any time.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Tsk, if you want to kill me, just do it quickly. Stop touching me, you stinky ruffian!

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: "I'll check if you have any documents on you, tell me, who are your superiors and subordinates?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: What superiors and subordinates cotton line wool line

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Don't pretend to be confused with me

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: "Beat me to death, I’ll take you all to the underworld, are you scared now, I'm not made of paper and paste."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Yu Xuan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: "Come on, you coward who is afraid of death, hit me, whip me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Are you crazy? I didn't expect you and Lu Xiao to be the same kind!

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Okay, tell Mo Han to stop interrogation for now, and don’t let him get involved in this matter again

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: "What do you think living is for?" "For the country, for the faith? Or for money and status?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Ling Ling
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: "I live only for the people I love,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: "Look how beautiful this tree is," "It's a pity it's twisted by living in such an environment. What do you say to moving it one day?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Ling Ling
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: But, won't it die if we do that?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: "No, it will grow even better," Mo Han reassures, "Ling Ling, I'm tired of the deceit in officialdom. Would you leave it all behind and come away with me?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Ling Ling
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Mo Han, have you ever given this kind of pendant to another woman?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: No, why do you suddenly ask?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Ling Ling
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: "I have always felt that we are not on the same path." "Like a swan and a shrimp pulling a carriage together," "The swan yearns for the sky, while the shrimp never dares leave the water." "No matter how hard we try, we can never head in the same direction."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Ling Ling, don't cry. What's wrong? Do you not want to leave, or are you reluctant to leave your father behind?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Ling Ling
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Mo Han, let me think. My mind is really confused right now.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Don't overthink; sometimes life is very simple.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Sometimes it’s complicated.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Maybe.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Soldier
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Secretary Yang, the commander wants to see you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Linlin, don’t cry, go to bed early. I’ll go first.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Commander, I might not have been tough enough during the interrogation this afternoon.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: "Don't talk about that. A secret order just came from the division commander. We are to launch a large-scale attack on the Communists soon. Mohan, I intend to send you and Linlin to America."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: United States

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Yes, I’m worried Linlin might have unclear dealings with the Communists.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Do you mean Linlin and that female Communist?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Promise me, leave immediately, go to Shanghai tomorrow, but before you leave, you need to do something important, kill this person.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Japanese

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Yes, Shan Ben Ichiro. Linlin's mother was killed by him. He just arrived in Liu City. He will be at the Baixiao Gate tonight for entertainment.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Commander

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Is there a problem?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: "No, I just want to know. How do you plan to deal with that female Communist?" "I mean Linlin, if she is really with that woman." "I almost beat her to death this afternoon." "If anything happens to her, I'm afraid Linlin will resent me, so."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: As long as you bring back Shan Ben Ichiro's head, I’ll release her immediately.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: "Linlin, don't get excited." "Didn't I send Mohan?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: You sent him alone, isn’t that sending him to his death? Why aren’t you going?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Linlin, listen to your father.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: I don’t have a father like you. Let me go, I need to find Mohan.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: "Do you think you can find him?" "Do you think he will really avenge you?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: "He will definitely come back, he told me to wait for him. He doesn't lie."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Zhenshan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Going alone, he’s walking into the lion's den. Do you think he can come back alive?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Then why did you let him go?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Yang Mo Han might be a Communist member.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: So, you intend to eliminate him through the Japanese.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Yes, for you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: It's for your own good, isn't it?

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Linlin, no matter what you think, daddy will always love you!

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Hello, what, Lu Xiao and the female Communist fled together, are they accomplices? Order the third company to assemble at once.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Che Linlin, it's me.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: You can now console your aunt’s spirit in heaven.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Mo Han, thank you. I can't repay you for your kindness in my lifetime.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "{Why are you} so polite with me?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: I will follow you even if I have to cross fiery waters.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: All right, then let's go now. Shanyamoto will never let us go after killing the Japanese. But before we leave, I need to bring someone along.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Bring the female accomplice. She has been taken away by Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "Taken away by Lu Xiao."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: My father suspects that they are Communists and has sent someone to follow them.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Lu Xiao being a Communist is a joke.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "What did you say?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "I just feel Lu Xiao doesn't seem like a Communist."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "You seem to know a lot about the Communist Party."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: I wouldn't say that I know them well, but this time, killing Shanyamoto, I have to thank the Communist Party. They have helped me both inside and out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "Why would they help you?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: "They want the encryption key in return. I know the key is with you, so I agreed to their terms."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: The key is not with me. It seems to be in the commander's office safe. Apart from my father, no one has seen it.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: But it's okay. If necessary, we can kill the donkey after it's done working. They wouldn't dare do anything.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Che Linlin
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: But

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.speaker: Yang Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: All right, you should rest early. I'm going to meet the commander.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Lin Lin, what are you doing here?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: At this point, I don't want to hide it from you any longer, actually, I am...

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: "Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Thank you for your kindness and honesty.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Don't be sad. Let's go. Didn't you say you would be willing to go with me?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: If I leave, what about my father? You go by yourself.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: "You're too naive to fight with me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: "Come with me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Let him go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lin Lin, put the gun down. Do you want my life?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: My life was given by you. It was also given by him. I don't want him to die by your hand.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Do you know how dangerous his identity is to us? "Lin Lin, he is a Communist."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: I don't care which party he belongs to. As long as it's a party against the Japanese invaders, it's a good party. If you really love me, let him go immediately. I'll count to three.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: One

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lin Lin

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Two

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lin Lin, why are you forcing me like this?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: "Give me the gun."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: You and your whole family better behave.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lu Xiao

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Che Zhen Shan, hmph, the commander will be here soon. He will tell you whether my career as an adjutant ends here, or your career as a regiment commander ends.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lu Xiao, you beast, do you believe I won't shoot you?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
