movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Ah, don't be so agitated, my dear commander. Put the gun down.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Or I'll blow your whole family up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Commander, this is what is called the student surpassing the master.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: What a pity, Secretary Yang. You ended up mixed with a female Communist.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Lu Xiao, thank you for giving me, the honorable title of Communist.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lu Xiao
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Then you should thank that female Communist. It was she who informed us about you as the hidden operative. You thought you could run, but you couldn't escape my bullet, Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Get down!

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Mo Han
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Quick, get up! Let's go.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Wait, wait, where are we going?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: We'll talk outside. The commander will be here soon. We have to leave now, father.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: "You finally called me father." "After all these years, you finally called me father."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Do you know how many years I've waited?

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: "My heart is broken from the waiting."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: I always thought you had forgotten mother, but when I used mom's memorial day as the password to open the safe, I realized I was wrong, I'm sorry, Dad.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Foolish child, you and your mother are the apples of my eye, the ones I always worry about.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: "Dad never remarried all these years," "just to preserve the love he held for your mother. Child, you must go, the further the better."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: "Take these passwords with you, I have another copy. Mo Han, Lin Lin is in your care now, take good care of her."

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Even if one day I'm gone, at least there's an explanation to her mother.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Lin Lin
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Dad, let's leave together, from now on you can be a common folk, your daughter will take good care of you.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Enough dawdling, take the password and hurry on, I'll deal with them here, otherwise, none of the three of us can escape.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.speaker: Che Zhen Shan
movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: "You beast, Mo Han, go save Lin Lin, hurry, take good care of her."

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Looking at this extremely familiar place, I realized that I have indeed entered menopause. Because it's in menopause that one loves to chew on the painful black memories of one's life.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Red envelope, Red envelope, I will send you my bank account.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: I am willing, from Beijing to Xiamen, 2000 kilometers, I give you a promise, I am willing.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Principal
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Students, next, please representative of the graduates, classmate Liu Chong, onto the stage for a speech.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: We are about to say goodbye to the campus and head towards all the wide world.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: You have to flick the tassel when you go on stage later, how can you do that dressed like this?

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Our initial dreams, held tightly in our hands.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Classmates
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Marry, marry, marry, marry, marry, marry, marry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.speaker: Principal
movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: Quiet down please, I have been a wedding witness several times but I have never done it at a graduation ceremony. So, can the female student in the white dress please come up on stage?

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Dean
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "Oh my, I've heard that the two of you are considered the golden couple among this year's graduates." "You guys managed to express a commitment to each other in a way that makes us all believe in love again."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as his lawful wife. In good times and better, in wealth and more wealth, in health and better health, for the rest of my life, I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part.

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: Dizzy, chest tightness, shortness of breath, heart palpitations, weak legs. All these symptoms started at that moment. And what happened next, I just can't recall.

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Next patient."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Man with black-rimmed glasses
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "My Chris always encourages me, not having MC doesn't mean anything. Tomorrow is another day, but every day is the same."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Old Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Keep exercising."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Old Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "Menopausal syndrome," "In traditional Chinese medicine it's called syndromes before and after menopause," "Kidney Qi declines, Tian Gui is exhausted, Chong and Ren are imbalanced, organs lack nourishment, Qi and blood are deficient."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "I just missed my period. If this were a cheesy TV drama, I'd be pregnant."

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: "What are you looking at?" "A CT scan with your naked eye?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: The age of menopausal patients is tending to decrease. This is called premature menopause. I'll prescribe you a 'Dingkun Dan.' Back in the day, Emperor Qianlong had three thousand concubines. It's thanks to this that they could regulate the liver, relieve depression, and maintain youth.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: You misdiagnosed. Yeah, I'm not dizzy, you know, my head is perfectly fine; I'm not dizzy. I'm not even married yet, and I haven't even had a child. My mom hasn't even hit menopause. Are you saying I'm experiencing premature menopause? Do you even have professional ethics?

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Angry, aren't we? Feeling a bit dizzy, right? These are typical symptoms of menopause. Just like this cactus. Prickly on the outside, but the inside is still very soft.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Soft my sister, prick your own head.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "Heard you hit menopause?" "I told you before, if you don't get your period for six months, it's a bad omen." "But when you seek medical advice, why would you prick the doctor's chin with a cactus?" "Why did you leave my phone number after you pricked them?" "Is that decent of you?" "Ah, let's go."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Tell me, what do you want to do tonight?

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: The night grows late with snow threatening; may I have a drink?

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: No, I already told you I'm allergic to alcohol.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Every year at this time, those who are graduating turn the quiet summer night into a wild and sentimental one. Three bottles of drink in my belly, all my sentimentality turns into a stomachache. Unhappy things seem to become happy.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: This wedding dress cost me five hundred yuan to rent.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Look at this lack of spirit.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Can't get it dirty.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "I have a stomachache."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "Stomachache?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "Shouldn't my heart be aching instead?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "You deserve it."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: That bastard Liu Chong.

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "Chong your ass, he flew away this afternoon."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "When he left, he asked me to take good care of his turtle."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "What turtle?" "If I were you." "I'd take the opportunity to blind him." "Pierce his mouth." "You're such a wimp."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: A long-haired man
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: "Don't leave, don't you leave. Who the hell will pick up the soap for me if you go?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Two men wearing only red underwear
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: I'm graduating!

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Congratulations on finding your group, you crazy person.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: That's quite a lot.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: We're all in the same boat, I should help them out.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Don't go, come back.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Go back to the dormitory, there's stomach medicine there, hurry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Oh my, Lin Shuer

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Stop messing around.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: We're here, we're here.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Why can't this door be opened?

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Isn't our dorm empty? Hey, hey, hey, open up, open up, it's a raid!

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Open up, open up

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Take off your clothes.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Look, look, who is it?

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Yuan Xiaoou

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Yuan Xiaoou

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Lao Bai, why are you sleeping in my bed?

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lao Bai
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: All my luggage is on the bed. Unless you want us to sleep on the floor. Eh, you almost forced him to jump out the window.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Sigh, Yuan Xiaoou is the most honest guy in our class, and even him? You're such a beast.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lao Bai
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Hey, he pushed me down, okay? Yuan Xiaoou burst in, knelt on the floor, and tearfully confessed he's had a crush on me for four years.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: He usually seems so quiet.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lao Bai
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Hey, if I didn't show my gratitude for his support in real action, would I still be considered human?

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Well, anyway, you and Yuan Xiaoou go to Suzhou together. I wish you happiness.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lao Bai
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: My relationship with him is pure.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: You sleep on my bed, and now you take my bed sheet too.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Hey, hey, hey, forget it, they both slept on it. What do you want it for? Just take it.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Lao Bai
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Ah, goodbye my sisters, bye.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: I never would have thought that Yuan Xiaoou neither went to Suzhou with Lao Bai nor returned to his home in the Northeast. Two months later, he appeared at my doorstep.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: vagrant
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: "Did your wife kick you out too?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.speaker: vagrant
movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Once I get my house back, I'll save the balcony for you. Women are all the same. Men are still better.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Don't grab my bag, I've told you."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: vagabond
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: I have to go home.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: If you continue like this, I will call the police.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: What are you doing, stop it, what are you doing, don't make trouble.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: So you want to play nasty games with me?

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: vagabond
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "This is my home, give me the keys."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: How many times have I told you, that's not your home.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "People say it's not your home."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: If you continue like this, I will call the police.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "It's just a key, come on, take it."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: vagabond
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: I said you two must be having an affair.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Girl, his words..."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: You are Yuan Xiaou, right?

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: Senior brother, you got the wrong person.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Yuan Xiaou, how did you bring him here?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I ran into that vagabond again, and Yuan Xiaou saved me."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I knew this rent couldn't be so cheap for no reason. But how did you end up here? At this moment in time, shouldn't you be watching the sunset with Old Bai in Suzhou?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I am not going to Suzhou."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: Ah, you're not going to Suzhou, what about your job?

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I'll find another one."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Lin Shuer, come over here. Let him squeeze in with us. He's our classmate."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Squeeze in, get pregnant, is it yours or mine, did you forget his thing with Old Bai, he's very thirsty, this is like leading the wolf into the room."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "But that vagabond is afraid of him."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Just him, that small size."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "It's better to have than not, at least he can take a knife."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Alright. But he can't stay for long."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Yuan Xiaou, don't go, live here."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "That vagabond often makes trouble, right?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: Hmm

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: What, are you scared?

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Just kidding, don't worry, I will protect both of you in the future. Ah, I even have some chest muscles."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "From now on, you block the knives and take the punches."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Yuan Xiaou
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Got it."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Don't get used to living here, you should find a room as soon as possible."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Qi Jia, get up."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: 'Let me vomit for a while.' 'Hey, I didn't drink too much.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I told you to drink less, you didn't listen."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "I'm in menopause now, I want to toast to youth."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: "Keep your voice down."

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: I want to get angry, I want to lose my temper.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: What in the world are you doing, howling and wailing in the middle of the night? Did you forget to take your medicine before going out?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Come down, and let's settle this once and for all'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Go home

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Hermaphroditic and not a single part of the body intact, huh?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Say that again, who are you calling hermaphroditic?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'You're hermaphroditic!'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: You stand right there, don't you walk away!

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Hermaphroditic and not a single part of the body intact, huh?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'What are you two doing?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Take care of your wife.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: You're the one who's his wife!

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Sorry, big sister, they drank too much. Please, please, don't stoop to their level.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Are you guys sick or something? Looking for a beating are we?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: older sister
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Beat, beat, beat... beat your head, what's with all the noise in the middle of the night.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Where did you come from, you old lady?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: older sister
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: From what's coming out of your head

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Man
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: If you've got the guts, come down here.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Wait for me

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: older sister
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Are you insane?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Yuan Xiaoou was scrambling down like a dog.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Don't tell him that I'm going through menopause.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: It's okay, there's no shame in having a physical illness.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: What's going on? Why did you let her drink so much again?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: I, I'm upset, can't I drink a bit more?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: So you don't want me to speak up because you're afraid I'll steal your lines, huh?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Can it kill you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: That wouldn't happen.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Do you know that drinking can kill you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: What are you trying to pull on me?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Shuer said, 'No one is going to die.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Drink, drink

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: No, no one will die.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Qi Jia went to the hospital today, she's not actually going through menopause.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Then what's wrong with her?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'She's pregnant.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Who are you kidding? There would have to be a man involved,' 'She's not an earthworm that can get pregnant on her own.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Are you with her 24 hours a day?' 'How do you know she didn't have a chance?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Who is the father of the child?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: The father of the child ran away.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: She wants to keep the baby.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Hmm

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Fine, then I'll marry her.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: 'Sucker, fighting for a cuckold's hat, huh?' 'I always said you loved Qi Jia, but you never admitted it.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: No, I care about both of you equally. If the father of your child ran away, I'd take care of you too.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Get out of here, stop pretending to be something you're not, acting like a love saint.

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: No. So what's really going on?

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Qi Jia is really going through menopause. Take good care of her.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: Ah, no, you must be thirsty, let me get you some water.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: What's wrong? Stomach ache? Here, take this, I’ll get you some medicine.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: No need, no need, it will pass after a while.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: I, dreamed about the silly things I did on graduation day.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: What you did can hardly be called silly. What I did was truly foolish.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: Well, it's all in the past now. Let's look forward. Alright?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: I can’t forget it. As soon as I sober up, it all comes rushing back. Didn’t someone say that unconditional love is the most powerful voice in this world?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: You must have seen that on social media. What is unconditional love? That’s just a weak awareness of security leading to high bad assets. Balanced give and take, that’s love. You gave too much, do you understand?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: 'There’s such a thing as giving too much love? I just want simple happiness, but why?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: Who doesn’t want that? It’s just that you chose the wrong person.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: I should have left with him earlier.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: 'You two are like two ships sailing in opposite directions, yet you insist on tying them together. That only leads to going in circles.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: I'm willing. I'm willing to go wherever he goes.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: Hey, you don't mind eating a hundred beans for the stench, do you? You’re already perimenopausal and still haven’t let this go.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: 'Get out, and close the door on your way out.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: "Look at this, look at what you used to be, look at what you've done to yourself now," "What’s the big deal? It's just premature aging, if we're sick we take medicine, that's all."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Don’t worry, I will definitely cure you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: I dare not look at this photo because I can clearly see that fate has drawn different paths for us," "Four years have passed, I'm still standing still, while he has never looked back.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Nowadays life is fast-paced and stressful which really can cause some women to experience premature aging of their bodily functions, just like your friend, look, she is panic-stricken, irritated, hypersensitive, violent tendencies, agitated, and her skin is becoming slack.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Doctor, we already know all this; what we want now is to see if there is any way you can help her revert to her younger self.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Sure, how about time travel then.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Doctor, please help her, she's only twenty-six and doesn't even have a boyfriend yet.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: "Not having a new life is also a main reason for premature aging."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: So, please guide us on what kind of medication we should give her.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Medication is necessary. But what's important is to combine it with life's rhythm, exercise, and, you know, romance.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Romance

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: This comrade seems to be in good health, right? You could very well complete this mission for her with your own physical effort.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: "What are you talking about?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Don't be agitated, it's only those who can’t do it that avoid this topic.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: "Yuan Xiaoou, what are you doing? Let’s go."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Why do you have to be so annoying?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Hurry up, I'm sorry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Neurotic! Next one.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Have you actually come up with a solution?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: "Just as Doctor said, let her take some medicine, get some exercise."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: That's nonsense. Don't skirt around the issue.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: How about you come back and keep her company for a while?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: How can I live in that tiny place when I go back?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Didn’t you live there just fine before?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: I can’t be bothered to argue with you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Fine, be selfish. You just take care of yourself. Qi Jia's business is none of your business. Waiter, bill please. No need for change.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: female waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Sir

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Ah

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: female waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Not enough.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: If it's not enough ask her for it.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Qi Jia, don't scare me, what are you doing? Is this also a symptom of menopause? It's just early menopause, right? Don't lose your heart.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: This early menopause has its advantages, late menopause is not as good as early menopause. Early menopause leads to early detachment, no, no, no, just now, forget what I said just now.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: I'll tell you the truth, I'm also undergoing menopause. Do you see me buying so much medicine? Now we are both in the same boat. If you want to die, I'll die too. I'll be your cushion. Let's see if you have the guts to kill me.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Don't hit me in the face. I want to die beautifully. Don't hit me below either. I'm afraid of pain.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Yuan Xiaoou, are you persuading me or pushing me to do it? And now so many people know about it. I was just feeling suffocated. I was sitting on the windowsill to get some air. If I had the strength, I would have jumped already.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Stop thinking about such profound questions, OK? Nothing happened. Are you hungry? I'll make you noodles.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: I want to sleep.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Sleep, sleep, increase the fun.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: “Are you trying to kill me closing the door so loudly? You scared me to death.”

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: I'm curing the disease, curing the disease.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: "Why are you taking off your pants?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: The doctor told me to help you, the doctor really told me to help you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: "What did the doctor say, Yuan Xiaoou?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Don't rush, it will be over soon. Don't rush. Ouch. The doctor really said that.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Does it hurt?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: It's so comfortable you cannot imagine.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: I'm having hot flashes. And you are babbling.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: "It's fine if you don't, but the doctor said, if you drink iced beer, you'll get cold uterus, do you know that?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: If I get cold uterus, I won't have hot flashes, right? Where's the barbecue?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Where's the barbecue?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Where's the barbecue?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Where's the barbecue?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Barbecue Master
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: What's the rush? Even those who came before you haven't started yet. Wait.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Wait a moment.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Where is your boss?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Where is your boss?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Barbecue Master
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: The boss didn't come today.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: His boss didn't come.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Why don't you give me your boss's WeChat ID, I'll add him.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: "Adding me is the same, buddy, do me a favor, help me hurry up, thank you. Calm down, calm down, sit, okay, okay. Let me tell you, this drink today is your last drink in your life."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1500_1680.text: Impossible

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: "Unless I die tomorrow" "You know I'm going to die tomorrow"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: What nonsense are you talking about? Starting tomorrow, you must change your lifestyle and schedule, and your life goals.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Alright, here it comes. Thank you, thank you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: I ordered super spicy, what is this?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Show me, where, where is it super spicy?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: "Don't take him seriously, don't take him seriously, what are you doing?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Who did you call a freak, let go

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Who did you call super spicy? Who did you call super spicy, huh?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Just saying that you're the super spicy one.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Who did you call super spicy?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Get in quickly, stop messing around, go, go

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Tattooed man
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: We eat, sleep, and play games, and there are two of us.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Tattooed man
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Keep up, don't fall behind, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: "Do you know who I am?" "Do you know what I do?" "Why is your mouth so reckless?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Keep your voice down, keep your voice down, my brothers might really beat you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Bro, I'm sorry to the sister-in-law, my mouth is reckless, reckless.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Know that's your sister-in-law, huh? Next time you see her, be more polite, with a smile, understood?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Do squats, a thousand, do them now, quickly.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: I'm going to the bathroom, I'm telling you, my brothers are all watching.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Oh my god, you scared me to death, um.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "Are you crazy? What if I didn't come back at this time? You and Lin Shuer drink like this all day. Are you still women?" You made it home."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: I made it home! Made it home!

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: delivery guy
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: Is there a Qi Jia here?

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: Come, come, I'll sign for it!

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: I was already so drunk my eyes were blurred, but the name Liu Chong was clear as day, crashing into my eyes.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "Don't snatch it, look at it later!"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "Don't you need to throw up? Hurry home and throw up then."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: You swallow back your words too!

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "I have sent Liu Chong hundreds of letters these three years." "All vanished without a trace." "I didn't expect his first reply." "To be a wedding invitation with another woman!" "Looking at the face on the wedding photo that looks so much like mine." "Does Liu Chong still miss me?" "Did he just find a replacement for me?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: Stomach hurts, doesn't it? "Your stomach must have done something terrible in a past life."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: You shouldn't have saved me. If I die, nothing will hurt anywhere.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "So what if a jerk found a mate?" "Is it worth it?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: "Since you can't let go," "Why didn't you go to Beijing with him in the first place?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'Come on, tell me, I've asked you eight hundred times and you never answer, what is it really about?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'On graduation day when I wore my wedding dress, I always felt that he was going to say I do.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'If that were the case, even if he went to hell, I would go with him.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'I never thought he would say that he wasn't ready.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'Qi Jia, you have only two choices now, first is to go to Beijing and snatch him back, you're not afraid of death, what else is there to fear? Second, completely annihilate him from your mind, dice him up, cremate him in your skull, and let the pathetic remains flush out with your tears. From then on, reborn from the ashes, start a new life. If all else fails, there's still Yuan Xiaoou to try.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: No, can we consider my feelings when speaking?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Can't

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: I'm going to Beijing.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Sis, is fear of flying also a symptom of early menopause?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: This time going to Beijing, don't screw up okay? If it's a love you can't forget, then prove it to us.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Qi Jia

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Ah

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Just squat behind the car's rear, nobody can see you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'You think you both are blind or what?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: 'Blockhead, get back in the car, what's a girl peeing got to do with you?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Be careful there, don't step on a wasp nest.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: There are wasp nests in the mustard flowers, Lin Shuer, you're right, that's just being mindless.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: It smells so good.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: This chicken soup, I started simmering it at four in the morning.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Go

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Soup

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Meat, it's ready, eat it all.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'Give me more meat'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Sorry, that's all the meat there is.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Cooking more won't kill you

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'I only used half a chicken.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: It's not even your meat.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Eat more meat, this is free-range chicken, eat as much of the remaining food as you can, if you can't finish, let her eat it.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'What are you doing, Qi Jia hasn't eaten yet'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Delicious, by the way, Qi Jia, look here, I found the same ones for you, check it out on JD.com.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Are we still going? I'm still not sure

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: When do you plan to decide, big sister, they're about to get married soon

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: I still can't believe he would marry someone else.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'Then I can't believe I'm not a billionaire either'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Oh come on, hurry up and eat, or you'll be too weak to cry. Quick, eat the meat, hurry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: We better not go.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Coward, it's just a wedding crash, what's the big deal?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Qi Jia, if you actually manage to crash the wedding, will you settle in Beijing?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'If you don't stay in Beijing', 'Are you planning to kidnap Liu Chong back to Xiamen?', 'Let me tell you', 'I've already planned the steps for the wedding crash', 'We need close cooperation from the three of us', 'Come here', 'Once we're in Beijing', 'Qi Jia, you should not lose your virginity first'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Ah

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: No, no, don't show yourself.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: You know the construction industry, only in Beijing can you enter the core circle

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: But Beijing has no sky, no sea, bad environment, high pressure. Apart from you, I have nothing in Beijing.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'Are there monsters outside?', 'Why won't you try?', 'Or do you prefer to follow your parents' arrangements, drinking tea, reading newspapers, stamping papers for life?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: No, have you ever thought, in a completely unfamiliar city, the moment you open your eyes it's all pressure, it's not just about our bodies and minds, even our love would be defeated.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: You know, in my dictionary, there is no word for defeat. Qi Jia, I really don't want to miss this opportunity. The company chose me among tens of thousands.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'But there's 1.3 billion people in China, and I chose you alone'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Why don't you go first, if it doesn't suit you, come back.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'Do you think so little of me, think I can't do it?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: I don't mean that, I'll wait for you here

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: 'But I don't believe I'll be back'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: "I think I am still suitable to stay behind."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Are you not happy to see an old classmate?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Happy, happy, I just didn’t expect you two to be together.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: This affair, it's a long story, sit, sit.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Such a big deal as marriage, yet you didn't send us an invitation.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: I hesitated for a long time and still sent the invitation to Qi Jia. But I think with her character, even if she received the invitation, she would not come.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: "The truth is, Liu Chong, Qi Jia is really happy for you" "But she is so busy, she sent me and little Yuan Xiaoou to help.""She repeatedly asked us""She hopes the two of us can be your bridesmaids and best man""Witness your happiest moment on her behalf."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: I think she's doing really well. The bridesmaids and the best man are already set, you can come and attend the ceremony.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: "We have consulted a master, Yuan Xiaoou's Bazi is very favourable for you"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Really, don't underestimate him, he's not the sharpest tool in the box, but he is indeed the best match for your best man. In the words of the master, it's called completion. We must believe in the words of the master.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.speaker: Lin Shuanger
movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: "This is also Qi Jia's wish, she sincerely blesses you"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Didn't you always say your boyfriend is tall and strong? Why are the clothes so small?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Wear whatever fits. Why are you complaining so much?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: The clothes might lose to Liu Chong.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: "Do I look much different from graduation?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: "It's been over three years. Who hasn't changed a bit?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: The bride's wedding car is still stuck on Xizhi Bridge. Let's cut in line and go first.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Today is your last chance. If you fail, turn this wedding into your funeral. Bury your ignorant youth and obsessive love.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: priest
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Groom, do you pledge to love her and regard her as your wife for the rest of your life? Do you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: priest
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Bride, do you pledge to love him and regard him as your husband for the rest of your life? Do you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as my lawful husband—whether in health or greater health, in wealth or greater wealth.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Starting today, I am willing to love you, be faithful to you, cherish you, until death do us part.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: "You already made a choice. Why overturn it now?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: 'I am willing to go anywhere with you.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: I don't love you anymore. Just go.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Liu Chong
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: Qi Jia, you don't love me as much as you think, because you always want me to love you more. You haven't realized this until now, but I know.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "This love is like a tug of war, we both want the other to love us more." "Desperately trying to win the game." "But I forgot, if the other lets go of the rope first." "You'll just fall and hurt yourself badly." "I've been asleep in this dream for seven years." "When I woke up, he had already reached the other side and I didn't know where I was."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: What are you looking for? I'll help you find it.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "I just forgot what I forgot. It's just early menopause, I'm not senile. Why do I forget everything!"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: Don't worry, don't worry. Forgetfulness is also a symptom of early menopause. It's something very important, right?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "That very important thing probably isn't in the kitchen, right?" "It should be in your room." "Think along those lines."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "Wine bottle, mineral water bottle, shoe brush." "Which one are you looking for?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "It's this one. But where's my turtle?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: "In the middle of the night, what are you looking for a fish tank for?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: Yuan Xiaoou, you have to help me find my turtle.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: A pet raised from childhood.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'People and their pets really match each other. I've been here for four years, and I've never seen any turtles. I bet it turned into somebody's turtle jelly.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'Even if it turned into a turtle spirit, you have to help me find it.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: What do you mean by transferring me fifty thousand dollars?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: I have to go on a business trip for a while. That money is for Qi Jia's treatment.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: You can't just not accompany her. She even had hallucinations yesterday.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: What

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Yuan Xiaoou

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: hallucination

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Ah

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Then you'd better cure her before I get back.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: I spent all of last night watching the moon.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Otherwise, be careful that some parts of your body might also become a hallucination.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: It's over, it's over. Alternating between acting up and depression – it seems only a psychiatric hospital can treat her.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: What's wrong?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Hey, don't touch me!

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'Big sister, did you wake up with multiple personalities? Don't scare me.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'My heart is beating so fast. Could I be having a heart attack?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'No, this is just one of the early symptoms of menopause. You need to take medicine. Ah, here, here's the medicine.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'I won't drink it.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Madam, for the sake of your health, please drink it, I beg you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'Let's be fair then. Drink this bowl of Ganges water, and we'll be menopausal buddies in the next life.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: I feel it, I feel something special. Do you feel it?

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Qi Jia, you need to tell them, say goodbye, say goodbye. This is your new diet.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'Starting today, you must eat these things. And you must follow the seven house rules. First, no drinking, second, go to bed early and get up early. Oh my.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: 'Don't lock me out. What was number four again, and five?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: 'For your safety, I made an extra key.' 'Let me tell you something,' 'People who are prone to insomnia shouldn't talk before bed.' 'It excites the brain and emotions.' 'Now, let me guide you to an excellent sleeping posture.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: I'll give you three seconds to get out.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: 'Not like you did just now with your head covered.' 'For people in poor health,' 'the exhaled carbon dioxide,' 'you end up inhaling it back.' 'Over time,' 'it can lead to brain hypoxia,' 'brain stroke,' 'brain death.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: 'I've grown up and I don't know how to sleep?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Then you really don't know how to sleep.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: 'You're an idiot, get out.' 'Hurry up, get out.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: I'm doing this for your own good, what are you doing?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Hurry up, get out, get out.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Let me tell you, you can't sleep on your left side like you just did. This way, it can compress your heart causing insufficient blood supply, and you need a pillow to sleep. But the pillow shouldn't be too high. Yes, align your cervical spine. Yes, exactly like that. Then spread out your arms and legs, like a frog.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Yes, all your bones and muscles are fully relaxed. Now, place both your hands over your belly button. This is what Taoism calls settling the qi in the dantian. Then imagine yourself as a little bee spreading its wings and flying. Fly.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Qi Jia, it's time for sit-ups. From now on, every morning, you need to do sit-ups. After work in the evening, I'll run with you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: "Don't force me. I have a temper too. If you don't comply, I'll make you. On the first day, thirty sit-ups. One, two, three. Do you see this? You actually remembered my name. This is the result. Keep going. Come on, five, six, seven, two, two, two. Enough for the first day, you barely passed."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: 'I left lunch in the fridge,' 'Just heat it up in the microwave at noon. Also,' 'don't even think about eating instant noodles or chips,' 'because I threw them all away.' 'Don’t think you can buy junk food with your money,' 'because your wallet now has no money in it.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Exercise to protect the motherland! Pick up the pace!

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Hey, why didn’t you wake me?' 'What’s so funny? Am I not handsome enough?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: 'It's not about what I'm wearing today.' 'How come... They think I look very...'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: 'Qi Jia, Qi Jia, come quickly, what is this thing?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Yuan Xiaoou, you’re stepping on it, you murderer! Yuan Xiaoou, after all these years, are you still doing okay?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Ah, if I may ask, then what should I be called?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Forget it, it’s not important anymore. That turtle has been starving for four years, find it something to eat, will you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: 'At this age, the turtle is in the prime of its life in the turtle world, food isn’t that important' 'Let’s release it and let it find a girlfriend.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: "Is what you're wearing the trend from fashion week this year?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: 'I forgot to change my pants.' 'I was wondering why it felt so breezy.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: "But you’re quite fashionable, oh! Look at me, showing a bit of leg hair. Is it fashionable too?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: There is no feast that doesn't end, okay, this is your last photo shoot, strangle him, yes, pose as if you're strangling him, okay, hit, hit, hit him, kill him, don't kiss him, you kiss him, are you stupid or what?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Are you stupid or not, are you stupid?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: It's back, how did it come back?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Are you playing stubborn, huh? Acting like a hooligan, aren't you? I'm gonna give it another ride, it's too young and can't recognize the way.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: "I knew you couldn't bear to leave me."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: No, it's lost. Isn't that right, you got lost right?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: The man on the side
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Hey, young man, are you silly? That's a freshwater turtle, it crawled back when you threw it into the sea. Really silly.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Are you stupid? You can't even tell the difference between a freshwater turtle and a sea turtle.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: You brought me to the beach, laugh, what're you giggling at? My lip hurts and you are still laughing.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Mr. Liu, you can finally go back to your parents now, once you leave don't come back.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Not bad, your complexion is rosy and shiny, could it be that you got the big fool to do something for you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: I just had a good sleep, is that a big deal?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: During my travels, I heard that the big fool has trained you very well, it was worthwhile to take him in.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: When I took him in, I had no ulterior motives at all.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Could it be that you two are the long-lost 'tears between men and women' that scares many of-age youths in the world, the pure friendship between a man and a woman?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: He and I have pure friendship like sisters.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: You have such a 'sacred beast' that 'harvests Yang to supplement Yin' at home, and you're so calm. To be honest, there aren’t many people who would give their lives and shed blood for you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "But he will still leave."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Oh, I detect a hint of reluctance?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: Stop kidding, let's go have a drink.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "When drunk, you'll know who you love the most. When you're ill, you'll know who loves you the most. Consider the fool. Though he has countless flaws, he has one greatest merit—he is utterly guileless."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'Such a rare quality in a man.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Let's go, let's go, let's go shopping."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Mr. Li, ah, I've bought it. Alright, I'll pick you up shortly."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Mr. Li, take it slow."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Yuan Xiaoou, it's easier to give birth to twins than to find a devoted man. Even a person like Yuan Datou has a spare tire."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: Thank you

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Didn't order any hearty dishes? I'm not even hoping for braised pork, twice-cooked pork, or stewed pork belly. But there should at least be a plate of stir-fried pork, right?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Sorry, our restaurant only serves health cuisine and does not offer those dishes."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: Health cuisine, do you have health beer?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Sorry, none either."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'How about health liquor?'
