movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Waiter
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Sorry, none either."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Yuan Datou, you really squeezed out your wife's savings."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'The food here isn't cheap at all.' 'It's all organic.' 'It's good for your body.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "So, what's the theme of today's grand feast?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: I... I got promoted to Administrative Director.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'Your boss got drunk and made you the Administrative Director?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'Did you sell your body?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "What's with that talk? Do you think everyone is like you?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'Stop, yesterday you were still fooling around.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: 'Exactly.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "It's not like that. That was my boss, we were visiting a client together. Qi Jia."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: "Alright, alright, let's toast. Hopefully, you will do well in the future."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: I hope you can do well in the future. What is this? It tastes like overnight swill.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: 'This is red date yogurt, especially good for women.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Sir, you are truly a marvel in the world of women's therapy.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Actually, I have another matter today. Our boss wants me to go to Shanghai to prepare for the new branch. But the decision is up to me, I don't have to go if I don't want to.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Go, of course you should go. Why not go?

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: One one one, two one, one one one, two one.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Yuan Xiaoou, I really can't do this anymore.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: What's not possible? I'm telling you, when I go to Shanghai, you have to persist in running every day.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: 'I'm exhausted, running alone feels like using the strength of two people.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Hurry up, what's there to look at? It's just where you had your first kiss, nothing impressive.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: 'How do you know?' Lin Shuer, that gossip.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Come, I'll show you a magic trick. I guarantee you’ll never think of that person again when you pass by here. Now, stand still and close your eyes, quickly.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: "Yuan Xiaoou, I'm telling you I'm scared of ghosts. If you summon something weird, I'm going to hit you!"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: 'Heavenly spirits, earthly spirits, let the Supreme Elder Lord appear.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: Qi Jia, silly goose, over here, get in the car!

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: 'You two are quite romantic, aren't you? The place is almost flooded, but you're still strolling in the rain.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: 'Did you two have a fight?' 'I don't know which brain-dead twins parked their cars blocking mine, not even leaving a phone number. Just wait and see how I'll deal with them.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: No, no, this won’t do. If it keeps raining like this, none of us will be able to get home tonight. I'll go out and think of a solution. If you both are going to fight, do it outside of the car, don't splatter blood all over my vehicle, it has genuine leather interior.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: That thing, starting tomorrow morning... You know you need to increase the sit-ups to 50, yeah?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: 'Got it. Starting tomorrow, I'll do it by myself. Just take care of yourself going to work. No need to rush every day.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: I think you're getting better. You're becoming more positive and optimistic.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: I think you need to go to Shanghai.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "How many times do I have to tell you?" "I'm stuck on the road and can't get back." "I'm with Qi Jia." "She’s in the car." "I’m outside now." "Why are you asking her to answer the phone?" "You're the one contradicting yourself." "Where else could I be?" "Where do you think I can go in this heavy rain?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "Where the hell is Lin Shuer that bitch? I'll go find her."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Hey hey hey, don't, let me go. It's raining so heavily and you're still so weak.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: The water is waist-deep. It's over, it's over, what do we do now.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "Who's being unreasonable here?" "Who’s starting the fights on purpose?" "I’m fucking sitting in the middle of the road in the rain." "You keep pestering and causing trouble." "Can I be fucking gentle?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer's boyfriend
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "Look at that filthy mouth of yours, are you even a woman?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "If I’m not a woman, then you're not a man." "I just missed two of your calls, so what?" "It’s pouring rain, I didn't hear, is that not okay?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer's boyfriend
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "No." "I’m abroad, staying up late because of the time difference to call you." "And you? Throwing tantrums, acting like a diva, and purposely not answering my calls."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Is there no other way?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "You shameless jerk, didn't you say you were abroad?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer's boyfriend
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: I'm destined to travel the world. Don’t think you can ride the bull and act all mighty.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: I am mighty, so what? If you're so capable, swim over here and bite me.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer's boyfriend
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "I haven't learned to swim all this time, didn't you know?" "Call the police to save me quickly."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "I won't." "I won't save you or call the police." "Float wherever you want."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer's boyfriend
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "You're too heartless. Let's break up."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "Fine, let's break up. Whoever doesn’t is a coward."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: The line is busy.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Come back quickly and save us. Water is already inside the car. Hurry, hurry, hurry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Yuan Xiaoou, we probably won't be able to escape, right?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: It's okay, it's okay, I’m still here. Don't worry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Yuan Xiaoou, we are about to die, right?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: "If we have to die together, I think it's quite nice."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Yuan Xiaoou, I've imagined ten thousand ways to die, but I never thought it would be like this, suffocating.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Yuan Xiaoou, why do you want to die with me? Are you shy?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Do you think I'm short of your breath? Open your mouth! Open it, Yuan Xiaoou!

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: You want to hold your breath, right? If you're going to hold your breath, I will hold mine with you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: "I really think it's good to die with you."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Lin Book Two
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Where's my car? If I can't find it later, I'll be in trouble.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Hurry back and rescue us, the water has already seeped into the car. Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up!

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: "Do you think I still need to go to Shanghai?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it. Be the real you. You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better. When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile. Simple life is the best. Thank you. Qi Jia, I'm leaving.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Don't worry, I'll definitely cure you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Oh man, these two foreigners can really drink, they nearly drank me to death last night, but yes.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Hey, rich lady, what made you think of calling me?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yo, I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: I knew you’d try to turn it around. You’re really shining in Shanghai, aren’t you?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Don’t say that... Whenever you want to come to Shanghai, I'm always ready to welcome you.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: "Look at you, sweet talker. When Qi Jia went to Shanghai, I didn’t see you being so attentive."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: "She's been there for a while now, currently in the hospital."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Why is she still in the hospital?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Qi Jia has been in Shanghai for almost a year now.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: No, which hospital is she in?

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Lin Shuer
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: What, you want to visit her? I’m telling you, you’re too late. Even if you saw her, you wouldn’t recognize her. Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Stop the fucking bullshit and just tell me which hospital and what ward she's in.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: "You've been in Shanghai for such a long time, why didn't you contact me?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: I'm Yuan Xiaoou, little turtle, I'm sorry.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: How did you become like this? It’s all my fault. Even when you rejected me back then...

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Reject me, if I don't leave, I can take care of you forever, you wouldn't have ended up like this.

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: What did you say? I don't understand.

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: I said I want to be with you forever. We will never part.

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Well if you want to be with her, I am going back to Xiamen

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: She is my cousin, she has been sick recently so I came to Shanghai to see her.

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: "You've been in Shanghai for so long, why didn't you find me?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: "Why should I find you""You are a promising young man, I am an old woman""So I have to see if you already have a harem"

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: "I've been carrying it, and I always thought,""I will meet you someday"

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Yuan Xiaoou
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Can you give me a chance? I want to take care of you forever.

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.speaker: Qi Jia
movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: I Qi Jia am willing to marry you Liu Chong. Whether in health or even better health, in my lifetime I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The younger brothers
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Here he comes, big brother, big brother, watch your step, be careful, slow down, big brother, slow down, you're finally back big brother, let's go, big brother, you seem very energetic, let's go, let's go, watch your step.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Woman in a green dress
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: "Who is this rich man?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The curly-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Woman with braided hair
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: She's only been married a few months. The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi. Of course, she wouldn't recognize him.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The curly-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Short-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief, he doesn’t manage the village affairs and spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The curly-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Woman with braided hair
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Short-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Woman in a green dress
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: East, West, South, North, Central, isn't this a full mahjong hand?

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The curly-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Three women
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Why?

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: The curly-haired woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: For Secretary selection.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Three women
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: "Oh, that makes sense."

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Little brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Come come come. Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Red-clothed younger brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Just a bunch of kids messing around.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.speaker: Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: Big brother

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Floral Shirt Crew Cut Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: The old village secretary of our village was admitted to the hospital these past few days.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: What illness?

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Floral Shirt Crew Cut Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: His high blood pressure acted up again. Given his health, I reckon he won't be able to carry on much longer, right?

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: The people around
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Yes, yes, yes.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: That's all.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: The standing man
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: There’s also this Lin Chunhu, who has established a turtle farming cooperative in Tea Flower Village. I heard that over 80 households have joined. They even offer free technical support, promise to buy the products centrally, and help with finding customers to integrate into the domestic market.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: "Buying people's hearts, huh? Alright then, this time elder brother brought back some gifts, let’s hand them out to everyone."

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Youngster
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Wow, a gold one!

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: In a few days, we must change the water in this pond, the turtles are getting ready to hibernate, and the water quality must be kept clean.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: villager
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Alright, alright.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: The villager who ran over to report
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Lin Chunhu, Lin Chunhu ah, there's going to be a disaster, someone's going to die.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Don't panic, speak slowly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: The villager who ran over to report
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Gen Xing's mother is threatening to jump off a building, the village head and secretary are not at home, you have to go have a look, I can only turn to you now, hurry!

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Alright, let's go quickly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Mom, please come down.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: "Gen Xing’s mom, come down quickly, we can talk this through. Come on, everybody, help get some straw to cushion the ground, Gen Xing’s mom."

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Mom, please come down.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Mom, please come down. If anything happened to you, what would happen to my brother and me? Mom, please come down.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Onlooking villagers
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: That’s right, let's talk it out, please come down quickly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: old lady
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: I just want everyone to see how I am being driven to death by you two unfilial sons.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Be careful! Careful! Where’s Gen Xing's dad?

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: "My brother went to pick him up in the car."

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Be careful, Gen Xing's mom, please come down! 'Come down, come down!'

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing's Dad
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Old lady, you better come down right this moment! What are you doing? If you die, what am I going to do? If you're gone, I won’t want to live either. I’m telling you, I’ll go back and drink pesticide right now, and we can simply die together.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Mom, please come down.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Gen Xing's Dad, Gen Xing's mom, both of you, don't be anxious. If there's any grievance, tell me, I’ll help you solve it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Gen Xing's Dad
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Lin Chunhu ah, the old lady and I, we’ve lived our whole lives together, but now that we are old, we have to live separately. What’s the point in that, tell me?

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Gen Wang, Gen Xing, what’s going on here?

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Support Agreement: For the convenience of managing our household and establishing a business, my brother and I have voluntarily decided to divide our household. Eldest brother, Lin Genwang, will support our father, and second brother, Lin Genxing, will support our mother. Both will look after their respective parents, provide for their every need till the end, bear clear responsibilities, and not interfere in each other's affairs. To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Second Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Old Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Mother
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds, but we have to do it behind their backs, it feels like being thieves.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Old Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Mother
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Oh dear, living together is no big deal.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Eldest Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Second Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed? This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond. Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative, but now, I need to reconsider.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Old Father
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Oh, Mayor Yang, hello, hello, hello"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Old Secretary, hello, hello, how's your health?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Pretty good, pretty good

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Please, please, please, come on in.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Oh, good, good, good"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Man in Blue Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Man in Gray Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Mayor Yang
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Alright, alright, let's go"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Man in Gray Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Please, please, please"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Seated Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman in Black Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Seated Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Why?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman in Black Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Seated Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Is it that serious?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman in Black Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman in White Clothes
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Seated Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Oh, you're boasting"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Alright, got it"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Is it heavy?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "Not heavy"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Good, sit here, sit, sit well, one, two, three, hmm, looks good.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: How have I been all talk no action?

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Who says? The photos are all ready, look. Not bad, right? Now, my dad is helping me find a venue, as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major.

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we...

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Hey, why are you walking so slow? Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: 'You set up the cooperative to enrich everyone, and you became the secretary for the same reason. Aren't these two tasks essentially the same?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: I am young and lack experience. I am afraid I cannot bear this responsibility. If I fail as the secretary, it might hinder the development of the cooperative and cause trouble for the entire village.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: You have seen the results of this recommendation; your popularity was the highest.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Old Secretary
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: 'This shows that you have earned a lot of respect from everyone. Over the past few years, your turtle farming has led everyone to prosperity, and your capability is evident to all. Everyone chose you, so if you don't become the secretary, should we let Zhang Dong take over?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Our cooperative will introduce a new breed next year, and we will have experts come over to provide guidance. Let's see if anyone has any objections.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Alright. I will pick a few representatives from those present to go for training at the agricultural school. Let's see who will sign up first.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: villager
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Lin Chunhu, Lin Chunhu, it's not good, Baotang and his group have blocked the cooperative's door. Hurry and have a look.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Excuse me, excuse me, let's talk it out, let's talk it out, what's the matter?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Baotang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: So many turtles have died, what should we do?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: 'How could this happen? Did you check the cause?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Baotang
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: 'What other reason could there be? We were fine using our own feed before, but as soon as we used yours, there were problems. Look, we've taken loans for tens of thousands, what should we do now?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, everyone, please be quiet and listen to me. I will immediately take the feed and the dead turtles for testing. If there is indeed a problem, I will definitely compensate you. I give you my word.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Hey, Meng Ting, I need your help with something, hey.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Meng Ting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: Looking at the test report, the feed's indicators all meet the standards. I think the death of the turtles should not be directly related to the feed.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: That's a relief. But then, what is the real cause?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: I guess, could it be the water quality? Maybe we should go and take a look.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Good

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Yes, let's go.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Si Fu, was the water in this pond just changed?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Si Fu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Ah, yes.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: So where did you get the water from?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Si Fu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Due to the lack of rainfall in the past few months, it's water drawn from a nearby creek.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Oh, we have also used the water from the creek a few years ago. Didn't seem to find any problems.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Henchman in pink shirt
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: I think we should discuss this matter with Big Brother, let's listen to Big Brother's opinion.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The henchman in the black coat
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Boss, boss, gosh, Lin Chunhu is gaining a lot of popularity, it's almost catching up with you, boss.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: "Isn't that good?" "It's fair competition."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The henchman in the black coat
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Ah, we should, ah.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Henchman in the floral shirt
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Big Brother, this Lin Chunhu has set up this cooperative, providing technology to turtle farmers, expanding sales, he really has won a lot of people's hearts.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The henchman in the black coat
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Gosh, exactly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Henchman in pink shirt
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Also Big Brother, you see, even the old secretary is supporting him openly and secretly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Henchman in the floral shirt
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Big Brother, I think we need to think about countermeasures.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Brother Chunhu, the test report is out, it is indeed a water quality issue. It's due to direct discharges from the pig farm upstream, polluted the water quality, causing the turtles to get a highly contagious acute enteritis. Repeated infections and unable to cure, finally leading to death.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Upstream, isn't that Zhang Baoliang's pig farm?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Then we go to him directly.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Hey, wait, it's not great for us to go directly. Zhang Baoliang and Zhang Dong are cousins, they usually hang out quite often, I think it would be better for Zhang Dong to handle this. Also inform all the turtle farmers. Temporarily do not use the water from the creek.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Alright

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Here, here, here, cheers to Big Brother's successful election.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Alright, let's have a drink. Come on, let's eat. Eh, where are the third and fourth brothers, and the second and fifth brothers? They are late. It's been such a long time.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang family's fourth brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: One of them went to deliver a gift. The other went to host a dinner.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: It's all for your election.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Oh, rare guests.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Hello, Mr. Mayor.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang family's fourth brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Chunhu, the high achiever, you are so free today, coming over to our place.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Gosh, come on.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Lin Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: I've eaten, I've eaten.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Oh dear, since you're here, have a seat and have a couple of drinks.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Come on, sit, sit.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang family's fourth brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Sit, sit, sit, sit.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: We are here today to discuss an important matter with Mr. Mayor.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang family's fourth brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Gosh, have a drink first.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: The third brother of the Zhang family
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: Don’t be so serious, right? When talking about work, we shouldn’t eat, and when eating, we shouldn’t talk about work, right? Come on, drink, drink, drink, drink.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1680_1860.text: I don't

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: I don't drink alcohol, I really can't drink alcohol.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Grey Clothes Little Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: "Come on, Chunhu, let's the two of us have three rounds, I'll drink first as a toast to you."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Alright, let's do it, come on.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Black Clothes Little Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Come on, brilliant student, let's drink together.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: The young lady really can't drink, look, I'll drink for her.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Black Clothes Little Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: "If you can't drink, what kind of village chief assistant are you?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: "Isn't it okay if I drink for her?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Grey Clothes Little Brother
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Wow, Chunhu can really hold his liquor, another round.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Alright, alright, Chunhu is family, Chunhu, my brothers are thoughtless, don't take it to heart.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: It's fine, it's fine, it's fine.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: You're here about the dead softshell turtles, right?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: The village chief is indeed a wise man.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Ah, lately, yes, I've heard some things, how is it, did you find the reason?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: We found it, I believe it's due to the sewage discharged from the pig farm upstream at Baoliang.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Baoliang

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Baoliang

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Chunhu, the location and sewage disposal of his pig farm, have been scientifically validated. It was also approved by the village committees' collective discussion, do you have any other evidence?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Yes, take a look, this is the water quality report, look, the E. coli count is severely over the limit, and look at this report, these softshell turtles died of acute enteritis. Isn't the evidence clear?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Eh, where did you get this report from?

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: This, this is tested with the help of our teacher.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Teacher

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Yes, teacher.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Teacher, brilliant student, although I am not well-educated, don't understand E. coli or lesser germs, but I know, it's the environmental protection agency that has the final say on environmental testing.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Lu Chunhu
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: Right, we will send the samples we've collected to the environmental protection bureau in the next few days, for the most authoritative testing.

movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_1860_2040.text: "Chunhu, there's a saying," "you should have heard," "called 'harmony brings wealth'," "we're all villagers," "why make things so stiff?" "Baoliang runs his pig farm," "you raise your turtles," "we're all breeders," "business is hard these days," "it's tough for everyone."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: So, can the two of you try to understand each other a bit?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Yes, that’s why we came today, asking the village head to step in and talk it over with Bao Liang. It solves the problem without creating hard feelings. What do you think?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Good. I’ve got it. I’ll discuss the matter with him. As for these two incident reports, I’ll keep them here for now and hand them over to the relevant department.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Zhang Dong
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Hey, Bao Liang, come here at once, fast.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Meng Ting
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Do you think the village head will help us solve this?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: I think he will consider it carefully.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "Hmph, you think you can report me? No chance, I’m telling you. Zhang Dong is my cousin, and this election... I’m sure to be the Party Secretary. See what you can do about me.”

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: The crowd
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "That Bao Liang is really bullying too much. I visited him several times in these past few days, and he didn’t even open the door. So are our turtles just dying in vain? Bao Liang is this arrogant just because Zhang Dong is backing him up. Zhang Dong, who is now just the village head, is already so dismissive. If he becomes the Secretary, what will our lives be like in the future?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: At this election, you must definitely run for the Secretary.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Chun Hu
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "Me? Do you think I can be the Secretary? If I become the Secretary, I’m afraid I won’t have time to manage our cooperative anymore.”

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Another woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "The cooperative is trivial; the village is what’s important. If we don’t elect a good Secretary this time, our village is doomed. If this pig farm continues to operate this way, how are we supposed to live? Right?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Exactly, if he becomes the Secretary, then his family, with brothers in east, west, south, north, and center, will be totally lawless.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Another woman
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "If you don’t become the Secretary, our cooperative definitely won’t be able to continue in the future."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Man
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: The whole village is counting on you now, Chun Hu, stop refusing it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Don’t talk to me about that Meng Ting, she went to university for a few years and now acts like she doesn’t know her own name.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Bao Liang's Son
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: "Dad, actually, I think what Meng Ting says makes sense. Look, isn't the TV always advocating for river pollution control? How can you still..."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.speaker: Bao Liang
movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Ingrate! Betraying your own for outsiders.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao's father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: You were still raised by me. You're siding with outsiders, eh? Your mother has gone on a trip to Hong Kong. Wait until she comes back to see how she deals with you.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Liu Mengting is not an outsider at all. I'm sure my mom will support me when she's back.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao's father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: I'm warning you. If you dare to marry her into this family, I won't acknowledge you as my son, believe it or not.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "Dad, have some food to calm down." "Actually, I think that Liu Mengting is quite reasonable." "She's also considering the environment of our village." "Look, many pig farms are now using modern waste disposal equipment." "So there's no pollution anymore." "Why don't we spend some money" "to get a waste disposal system too?" "That would solve the problem."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao's father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "Waste disposal equipment, you say it so lightly." "Do you have any idea how much that costs?" "It's easy for you not to understand how expensive daily necessities can get."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao's father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Tell me, who gave you the clothes you're wearing? Who provides for your meals? Who gave you that camera to play with? Who gave you the house you live in? Who gave you the car you drive? Isn't it all thanks to that pig?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Ah

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao's father
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: No, no, no, no...ugh, it's all given by me.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "Liu Mengting!" "Liu Mengting!" "Liu Mengting!"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: For my sake, please stop making trouble, okay? This pig farm is the main source of income for our family. Besides, every year we also contribute a lot of money to the village, adding a bit to the village's income.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "Can't you think a little more long-term?" "Can't you stop being so selfish?" "Just thinking about these immediate benefits." "Look at the water in our Daxi River," "see what it has become." "This is the water our whole village" "uses to raise turtles with." "What's the use of that little money you contribute?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Mengting, I'm really troubled by all this fuss. You see, on one hand there's you, and on the other my father. With you two at odds like this, how are we supposed to live in the future?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Liu Mengting
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "You and your dad can live however you like. I don't want to marry you and be a pig farmer's wife."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xiaobao
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Liu Mengting, Liu Mengting

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Uncle Lin, is Uncle Lin home?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Oh, Zhang Xi, you're here, come on in, sit for a while, sit for a while.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Ah, my dad has gone to play chess with old Wang. What's up, you got something you need from him?

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Nothing much. Your dad is an old party member of our village, isn't he? I just came to see him. And this is just a little token of appreciation from me.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Lin Genxing
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Don't mention it, don't mention it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.speaker: Zhang Xi
movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: "It's not worth much. We have village elections coming up, and we know who's fit to be the village head, don't we?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Shen Meijing
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "I don't really want the Hong Kong police to hand over the person, just saying that if we approach him, maybe we can find Equator."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "Prepare two teams, come with me to hand over the person"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "Professor, Mr. Cui, you guys go check DJin Taonian first."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Mr. Cui
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "I was born into a second-generation scientist family. This device, I can vouch for it in the name of my family and my brother. It’s the safest weapon in the world."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "I told Li Yanming, once you guys come back, we will sort things out, then I will leave. Actually, the sooner we send off DJin Taonian, the sooner Hong Kong will be safe. You’ve done what you should, it also counts as helping us."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.speaker: Mr. Cui
movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: "Although it's in a graphite box, it absolutely must not have any more severe impacts, handle it with the utmost care. Team Leader Park, I have something to handle, please assist."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Stay calm. If you try anything funny, I'll be the first to shoot you dead.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.speaker: foreigner
movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Saad? Saad, I brought them here.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.speaker: Criminal
movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Change the location, Wan Chai, Shek Tong Tsui, Sanxiang Building.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Everyone listen, the location has changed. Wan Chai, Shek Tong Tsui, Sanxiang Building.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: Overtake them, Weiye, catch up quickly.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: Seal off the building, as soon as you see her, shoot without further ado.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Short-haired woman
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: I'm still in Macau. The source is dead. It's a bit troublesome. But don't worry about me. What's the situation on your side?

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: DC8 is already in our hands. Professor Zhao said that the Korean consulate is in the office building in Admiralty. Sending weapons there is very dangerous. He gave us a dock address. I will send it to you by text later.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Short-haired woman
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: 'Okay.' 'Then I will contact Consul Quan and have him send support.' 'I will be back to Hong Kong immediately.' 'May be a little late.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: There is one more thing, very important. You pass the news into the intelligence community. DC8 is back in our hands and has already left port. So no one will hurt Hong Kong anymore.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: Almost there, it's a bit odd.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5460_5640.speaker: Park Woo-chul
movie101_6969128872847770149_5460_5640.text: Suddenly so many people showed up, let's split up.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Fan, there's a mole. Check for me after we left the headquarters. All entries, communications, and email records.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.speaker: female officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Chief Li, in the past two days, only the professor made a call within the crisis team.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Angela, it's Professor Zhao, do me a favor. Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time? Also, I'm sorry, please organize the paper on my desk. I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18. Discard the rest.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time? Also, I'm sorry, please organize the paper on my desk. I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18. Discard the rest.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time? Sorry for the trouble, please organize the paper on my desk. I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18. Discard the rest.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Professor, the police need you now

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: "Everything you do is classified," "I don't know anything, how can I cooperate with you?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Based on the safety of Hong Kong residents, DC8 absolutely cannot stay in Hong Kong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: The Korean expert also confirmed the weapon and locked it in safety mode, right?

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Please help me take good care of the weapon

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: "Before you realize the situation," "Our war with the equator has already begun," "If you compromise this time," "He will turn Hong Kong into a real underground weapon trafficking center," "Deal?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Police
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Professor, Mr. Cui, you go check DC8 first

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Do you really not need help?

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: No need, if I guess wrong, I have a document in my computer, if I guess right, you take my place.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: subordinate
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Officer Li, do we really not need us?

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Fourteen years ago I was transferred to the serious crime squad, when I was dealing with the first case, my superior told me that policemen are humans too, and humans can also commit crimes.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: "Your boss has a very high opinion of you," "First case, he let you catch one of your own"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: But unfortunately, he found the wrong person.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Then you are not very popular

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: "Not at all," "The case was solved, and I also caught the boss," "Because he wanted to push the responsibility to his subordinates"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Since coming back from Macau, I've been constantly thinking: 'Why? Why am I always one step behind the Equator?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Both the United States and South Korea have failed to find you over the years. I'm honored.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Know I'm the Equator, and just come with these few people?

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Mr. Song hasn't left yet. No matter how sure I am, I can't give this credit to him.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Your character will kill you. Do you want to be the police chief?

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: "Chief? Back in high school, he was still copying my homework. Don’t mention this to anyone."

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: There's no reason. It's just business.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: In the entire process, you did one thing wrong. You should not have hit a woman. Apologize to her.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.speaker: Kim Hae-sook
movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: Director Choi, we really appreciate you.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: My greatest regret is that I couldn't protect Woo-cheol.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.speaker: Kim Hae-sook
movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: Director Choi, we truly appreciate your efforts. Welcome back safely.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: Deputy Director Choi Minho of the National Intelligence Service reporting to the general and the Director of the National Intelligence Service.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.speaker: Policeman
movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: Mr. Song, we found out that this Professor Zhao Zhiren is not a Vietnamese Chinese, according to the nation

movie101_6969128872847770149_6540_6720.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_6540_6720.text: According to the bulletin given to us by Interpol, his two couriers were last seen with an underground buyer nicknamed 'His Highness' in Estonia. We suspect that they made the transaction for the DC8 here. Also, we've analyzed the information Mr. Lee left us before his death, we believe the next target from the equator should be in Kyoto.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Navigator
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: The oil temperature is 100, which is normal.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: Give me 3.5 Bar, the Anti-Lag (turbo lag reduction system) is fully on.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: First of all, I want to thank my team and my sponsors. I also want to thank my Navigator, my brother from another mother. Come on, give little strong a shot.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: Finally, I want to thank one person, the most important person in my life. He also came to the race today. I want to tell him, Dad, thank you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: Thank you for not supporting my choice, thank you for not understanding my hobby, and thank you for not respecting my profession.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: I invited you here today to witness all this, to witness that you were wrong, that I won the annual championship, that I succeeded.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Reporter
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: Your words to your father are very special. What about your mother?

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: I never met my mother. She died when I was born.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Alright, thank you everyone, that will be all.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: crowd
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: You don't have to congratulate me with a special gesture.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: 'I've loved driving since I was young. I never imagined you'd get this good at it.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: 'You always force me to do things I really don't like. As a kid, it was studying math. As I grew up, it was medical school. When I said I loved driving, you arranged for me to drive an ambulance.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Your mother once said that it's especially good for a child to grow up and become a doctor.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Did she also say it's especially good that her husband, before having a child, went off to fight, ended up in prison for six years?

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Slow down, Xu Tailang. Don't go too fast, ahead...

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: 'I think I'm going to be sick.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Go ahead, throw up. It's my co-driver's helmet anyway.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Jia
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: There's another person in the car.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: They say that when a person dies, their life flashes before their eyes. Will mine?

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: 'Playing with these all day, what can you achieve?'

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Girl
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: I’m sorry, I fell in love with someone else.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: 'I feel very nervous for the first time,'

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Co-driver
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: 'Are you dumb? How could you drive into a ditch on a straight line? I will never be your co-driver again.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Father
