movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: I found you a job driving an ambulance, come.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: Hello, this is the ambulance, we need another ambulance.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Father
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: Just drove off and already overturned, what's the use.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Boss Lady
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: Drink less and drive for my Big Brother.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Co-driver
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: Hold steady, the finish line is ahead.

movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_480_660.text: Mom, the first stage champion is for you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.speaker: Mr. Chen
movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.text: "Whose parent are you from our school?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.text: I'm from the class of '04, Xu Tailang, you are my homeroom teacher. When I was young, you always held me and said, 'too wild, too wild,' 'you can't be too loose in your life'

movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.speaker: Mr. Chen
movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.text: Class of '04? It's only '98 now. Are you crazy?

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: "I'm already dead," "Why should I be afraid of dying?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: Untie my belt, untie my belt, quickly, tie him up.

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Director Qin
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: "It's been a whole night," "and you still haven't explained where you're from."

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: I've explained it very clearly, but you don't understand.

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Director Qin
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: This is an ID card, look closely.

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.speaker: Director Qin
movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: "Do you think catching a bad guy gives you the right to answer questions flippantly?" "You have the right to remain silent," "but you don't have the right to talk nonsense, got it?" "Where are you really from?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: If no one recognizes you, I'll send you to a psychiatric hospital.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: 'These four cards need to add up to 24 points.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Big brother, your face is all messed up.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: You don't have to jump in the river just because you can't figure it out.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: 'What's the situation with the person who jumped into the river?'

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: You know him too. His name is Liu Yi. He has been setting up a street stall with his dad since he was a kid. He always runs when he sees the police.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Officer, my name is Xiao Ma, Ah Zheng has been taking care of me all along.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: What do you do for work?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: So, unemployed. Go back for now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Do you recognize this person? What's your relationship with him?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: 'What sir, or not sir.' 'Just open a video hall and watch more Hong Kong movies and you can call whatever you want.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: This is our Director Jin, he's called Jin Suo.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Save it, save it. What's the relationship between you two?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Today is the anniversary of our father's death. Where have you been? Hurry up and go kowtow to the old man.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: I really forgot his name because grandpa died too early.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: 'Ah, sir.' 'My brother Ah Zheng.' 'My dad always spoiled him since I was little.' 'He never spoiled me.' 'So I went out to work when I was very young.' 'Actually, I...' 'I've never received fatherly love in my entire life.' 'So when he died, I wasn't sad at all.' 'Really.' 'If you don't believe me you can go inside and check.' 'In the portrait, he's wearing a plaid shirt.' 'The urn is dark red, placed next to the TV.' 'And there's a white cloth covering the TV.' 'You can go see for yourself.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: 'How do you know I'm called Ah Zheng?'

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Come here, come here. Tell me, what's the brand of the TV?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Hitachi, TOSHIBA, TOSHIBA, the first generation... Toshiba

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "What brand is the TV?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Little Sun
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Hitachi, others match too.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Director Jin
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Unfilial

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "Take care, Jin Suo."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "Take care, Jin Suo."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Follow me.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "When did you steal from my house?" "You're so familiar with it."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: I

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Brother, stop being a thief.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Alright

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: What's your name?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Xu Tailang, you can call me, A-Lang.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "What was your dad thinking?" "Giving you such a silly name" "Xu Tailang" "Xu Tailang." "Your dad is so dumb." "Ha ha ha ha."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: "My dad's IQ managed to make a kid like me." "My mom must be very smart."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: I can see my mom now. I can see my mom now. Are you married? What's your partner's name?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: You didn't even ask my name and you're asking my woman's name? What's your intention? Used to stealing, huh? Want to steal a person too?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Oh, alright, A-Zheng, what's your full name?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Coincidentally, we share the same surname. Xu Zhengtai. Quite proper, right? My dad is smart, isn't he? Such a good name, 'Zheng Tai.' So I named my gang the 'Zheng Tai Gang.' Impressive, right? Join us. Being a member, you can meet the boss lady.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: I'll join. Ah, it seems like one of your members just jumped into the river.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Ah, it's okay, Mu Mu, Mu Mu.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Mu Mu

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Mu Mu, come out.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Mu Mu, come out.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Here it comes, here it comes. Calm down, Mu Mu, be good. Smell, go find Liu Yi. Go. Golden Retriever. The only one in town. Also the last one. Specially trained for searching abroad. Watch closely.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu, Mu Mu.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1200_1380.text: Shout louder. It's your fault it went missing.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Mumu, how did you get so skinny?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Hey, wait, Xu Tailang, look, that leader, the one in the middle, his surname is Luo, he's called Luo Li, he's my archenemy, I didn't expect him to be involved in smuggling cars now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: These guys have guns now, bro, should we bring out the cannons?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: It can't be a real gun.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Even if it's a real gun, we're not afraid.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Well, I should probably leave first. I haven't finished writing my program yet.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Hey, let's go eat at my girlfriend's place.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Xu Tailang, sis-in-law's best dish is fish.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: The fish is ready. Oh no, forgot to add vinegar.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Look at you, staring so intensely waiting for the fish, Xu Tailang.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Hey, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick!

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: My real name doesn't sound good. Just call me Xiaohua.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: The name was given by your parents. "Good or bad, it's not your fault." "What's your name?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Then it's better to call you Xiaohua.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: I have no memory of my mother. I've only seen a blurry wedding photo. The year I was born, my father went to jail. My mother's name is Zhang Suzhen, not Niu Aihua. This woman is the same type as my mother. It seems that my dad likes this kind of a match. No, I can't let them continue like this. I have to find Zhang Suzhen and introduce her to my dad. If not, I wouldn't be here.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Hey, how far have you two gotten?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Marriage is a big deal. You need to think it over. At least know each other for one or two years. Know each other's background. How long have you known each other?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: I probably met my wife when I was less than four years old, I lived right next to her, her mother had just given birth to her, she was still being breastfed, I took a fancy to her at first sight.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: What could a four-year-old possibly know?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Of course, I knew something. I was not a three-year-old child anymore.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: "That's right."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: I'll handle it, I'll handle it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Can you find it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Found it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Mwah.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: "Their relationship is really good. It seems that I can only do it myself. Sorry, Dad."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: I feel like I've seen you somewhere before.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Really?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Hmm

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Maybe.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Do you like watching movies?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Love it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Do you want to go together?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: "Sure."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Tomorrow night at seven, I will wait for you at the bridge.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Sure, I don't have shifts in the evening.

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: "By the way, Ah Zhen," "I'm leaving first," "You guys take your time eating."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Damn, hey wife, are you okay?

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Are you trying to get yourself killed? Ah, you guys, why did you hit my car?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2100_2280.text: New guy in green, huh? Pretty composed, but you're also blind, huh? Acknowledging a wimp as your boss, even the police station doesn't know you. What are you busy with?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2100_2280.text: A bunch of girls singing without selling anything, all dressed so provocatively. That's called misleading. Get it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: "We probably haven't captured the core management. Logically speaking, in this underworld, even if we captured an intern, their boss should have come to rescue. Their inaction to our activity puts us in a very passive position."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.speaker: Blue-clothed henchman
movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: Just tear up the ticket, shoot him dead, and throw the body at the KTV entrance.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: Are you fucking crazy, killing is illegal, do you want to be a death row prisoner, let me tell you, you absolutely cannot kill people.

If you kidnap the negotiation target directly, isn't that shameful, disgusting, ugly? Ah, I, Luo Li, will only be a street thug. How am I supposed to transition to the political and business world?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.speaker: Black-clothed henchman
movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: Boss, then there's only one person left we can move against now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: Ah Lang, take a look, you've never seen so many videotapes, not bad, eh? Try these sunglasses on, look sharp, come on.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: This cinema thing, it's definitely got no future, the society is all about video parlors now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: What's a VCD? My big brother just installed an air conditioner in the video parlor. See how many places can afford air conditioning? That's why you have to go to video parlors to watch.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: Hey, I'm saying, the one we've got this time should be more useful than that one surnamed Ma, right?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: Little Ma has been kidnapped

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: Get in, I'll drive, I'll drive, get in, let's go, let's go, get in the car.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: Wife, how's the Japanese cuisine today?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: Brother Huang Zhiqiang said that after finishing this batch of cars, he will not do the smuggling business anymore and will do real estate with me. Then I don't need to watch the cars here anymore.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Songzi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: You don't have to work so hard

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: "Maybe a little illegal. How can I drive a fancy car and take my wife out for a ride without taking some risks?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Songzi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: "When I start making money, I will buy you a real gold chain"

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: Wife, I know you like Japan, but with my current ability, I can only give you this world.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: I learned a Japanese song, let me sing it for you

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: My love, I can only give you a piece of the world, this piece of the world belongs to you

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "To celebrate the rescue of Xiao Ma," "and to take down our competitors," "to dominate Tinglin Town," "cheers."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Cheers

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Cheers

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: It was so thrilling, just like in the video, why didn't you take me along?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "Are you stupid, Liu Yi?" "If we took you, it would have been a full deployment," "so what would we do if we were annihilated by others?" "There would be no one left."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: I am the 'no one left'

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Xiao Ma, those who survive a catastrophe are destined for future happiness.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Actually, these past few days, I've been thinking about the importance of instant communication for people, do you understand? I'm working on an Internet communication software.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Please, your dial-up internet disconnects every day, a single phone call comes and the internet goes down, what are we all using now?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Pager

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: We don't need your thing, you're not good at fighting, you have no professional skills, how will you survive out there? Society is dangerous now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "Society's pretty good," "nobody needs to use a phone," "no swiping through WeChat Moments, no scrolling through Weibo," "To find someone, you have to rely on a dog," "and then you can't track each other's location," "It's nice."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Tai Lang, you're drunk as hell, I didn't understand a word, did you understand it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "Big brother, if you didn't understand, how could I dare to?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: What stage is your project at now?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "I was detained for a few days, right?" "So I focused and thought about it," "and I feel like I've figured out a lot of it," "I should be able to finish it in a few days."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: So, what do you plan to name it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: I'm thinking of calling it, "OICQ."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Xiao Ma, is your surname Ma?

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "My name's Xiao Ma, of course my surname's Ma."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: "What's your given name?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: My given name is Huateng.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: The restroom's in the back.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: But let me tell you, actually, I still feel quite confused.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Come on, eat an egg, never be confused.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: How about this, you come to my video parlor to be a projectionist, over 500 a month.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Don't listen to him whatever you do.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_2820_3000.text: Xiao Ma, I'm telling you, if you sell your computer, you could stock up on pagers en masse, In the future, the good numbers will definitely be very valuable, or we four could stock up.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Pagers, stock them for five years and sell them, we'll definitely get rich.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: What Liu Yi said is great. You're usually so clueless, but today, your words show remarkable business acumen.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: There is

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: "In the future, I'll be the richest among us at this table."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: To

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Come on, let's toast.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: I will definitely be the poorest among us, so how about this, after I finish writing the program, let's stock up on pagers.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Xiao Ma, go your own way.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: I think Xiao Ma should follow the path I suggested, I'm just looking out for him.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Never changes, still the same as always.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: "What did you say?" "Speak louder."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: "You never change."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Exactly, Liu Yi, what's that line again?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: I am just like this world!

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: This world will never change!

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: This world will change.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: This world will definitely change.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: You don't belong here, you should leave.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: You wanted to see me?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: The TV broke.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Alright.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Then it's fixed.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Let's watch TV together.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: "Are you sitting there to watch the TV or for me to watch you?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: Where is Xu Zhengtai?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: He went out. He won't be back for a while. Come, sit over here.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: This woman definitely has issues. Dad, for your happiness and for my existence, today, I'll deal with her once and for all.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3000_3180.text: It's so stuffy in here. I'll go open the window.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Let's change the channel.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Let's watch this one.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Niu Aihua

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: I don't like this name.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: "I also used to dislike my father."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Because he almost never spends time with me.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Don't talk. I also used to dislike my father.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: I really like the name Bai Su.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: I feel like my fate is similar to hers. Before I get married, I want to make a trip to the police station to change my name.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: I still want to take my mother's surname. What do you think of this name?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Zhang Suzhen

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: "We... We can't do this. How can this be right for a straight man?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: It's okay.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: It matters, it really does matter.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Alright, you've withstood the test. Come out of the closet, husband.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiaohua's Husband
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Brother, it's a man.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: "You guys are too twisted."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiaohua's Husband
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: A-lang, you can't say that. It's necessary. Without going through some things, without setting some tests, how can you see a person's true character? I know your feelings are very complicated right now. I really understand how you feel.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Understand my ass.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Husband, how was my performance?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiaohua's Husband
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: You were amazing, so engaged this time.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.speaker: Xiaohua's Husband
movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Not many can pass this level, so in our Straight Guy Gang, it's just the three or four of us back and forth.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I was thinking, what if something happens to me and I'm not around anymore? There should still be someone to carry on the Zheng Tai Gang.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I don't even know how much longer I'll be around. Isn't there Liu Yi? Liu Yi could do it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Liu Yi isn't smart enough. He can't handle big tasks. He is only suitable as a lackey.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Liu Yi, come down.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I'm not coming down, you come up.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Be honest with me. How long have you been in the cabinet? What were you doing in there?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I came early to find you and saw the room door open, so I went in. When I realized no one was there, I heard Sister-in-law calling for Lang Ge, so I hid in the cabinet.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: "Luckily, you weren't hiding in the same cabinet as me."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Zheng Tai Ge, do you really look down on me that much?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Liu Yi, everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Then tell me, what are my strengths?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: There must be some.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Ah Lang, what would you say are my strengths?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I understand now. Just wait.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Liu Yi

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: One day, I'll show you my strengths.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: What? What did you say?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: What's wrong, Ah Lang?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: I want some peace and quiet.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Good

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: This era is so nice. When you say you want some peace, no one asks who 'Peace' is, and I can still find my mother.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Eh, who is your mom?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: I want to go find someone, to have a word, promise me, you'll stay right here, don't go anywhere, okay, wait for me to come back.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: Okay, I promise you, sticking to my word is my principle in wandering the world as a youth, go on.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: Ah Lang, what are you doing here?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: "I've been looking for you all night."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: I had a night shift, you know. What's wrong?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: I'm still not over the shock of what happened yesterday, Ah Zheng is just a kid after all.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: I really didn't expect him to be such a fool when he was young, especially after you left.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: "What do you mean after I left?" "Sometimes I really feel like you don't live in the same world as us" "You've never mentioned your family before."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: I, my mother passed away when I was very young. She committed suicide by jumping off a building due to postpartum depression. I never even got the chance to call her 'mom.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: "He was locked up for six years" "and came out when I was six years old" "turning from a headstrong youth" "into a particularly irascible middle-aged man."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: My father was a test pilot.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: When I was young, I rarely saw him. Later, he and my mother separated, but I still invited him to my wedding. He said, 'Just lift up my head and look at the sky the next day.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Do you think, "The moment my mom jumped off the building," "She regretted it?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "If your mom could see you now," "She would definitely regret it."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: I think so too, I'm leaving first.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Tai Lang, I've been waiting for you all night. I was sober, but now I'm drinking again.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Can you promise me two things?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Sure," "I promise you." Then, Zheng Tai took another sip.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Don't cause trouble for the next few months."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: If others do not provoke me, I do not provoke them. If others provoke me...

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: If others provoke you, you become the problem, "Promise me not to cause trouble."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: What's the second thing?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: And it's about your wedding with Xiao Hua, let me handle it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Okay, you got it, I can promise you one more thing.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: No, right, yes, you promise me, if you have a child in the future, don't kick his face when you get angry.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Why

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Because my dad used to kick my face all the time."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Your dad was a monster, wasn't he?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: "Isn't that right?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Your house is smoking.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: It definitely can't be my house.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: It must be your house, let me check.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: It really is my house

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Ah Zheng, I always thought you were the kind of person who values money over life. But I never expected that the first thing you'd do after rushing in was to save grandfather's—

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: You saved your father's portrait. I helped you save the urn. Even though it's all ashes inside, it wouldn't hurt to burn it again. From today on, I see you in a new light. You're truly damn filial and loyal.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: "Not entirely."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: This is my wedding money. I was afraid I'd spend it recklessly, so I hid it here.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Big brother, big brother, are you okay?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: I'm fine.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Where the hell did you just run off to?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: I, I

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Ah

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: I

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: You're still, yakking away.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Hey, come with me.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Where to?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Hurry up.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Hey, I think we're being watched.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: What should we do then?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Move together as a group. The three of us will stick together.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Why

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Look, look, one chopstick, hey, this is what happens to it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Now, three chopsticks together. Try it.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: I think, when I walked alone, I got kidnapped, right?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Ah

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: If we move as a group, the three of us together, it's impossible to get kidnapped, right?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: Big brother, big brother, big brother.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: "You burned the house, didn't you?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: The man smoking
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: You took my car, smashed my door, and injured my men. You owe me a lot of money. Burning your house isn't too much, is it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.speaker: The man smoking
movie101_6969128384144081416_3900_4080.text: I do business in Hong Kong. I know the real estate market will eventually rule. The most important thing in real estate is location, location, and location. The KTV you manage is a prime location. And owning it is...

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "What is a 'location'?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Geographical location

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "Brother, you know so much, I'll have my son study hard in the future."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: I wasn't very satisfied with my previous resources either. You guys work for me. Once this place is well-developed, I will give two sets of houses to each of your brothers.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Are you joking? Trying to buy us? What do you take us for? Where is our dignity?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Friend, I haven't even started talking about dignity with others yet. You talk to me about dignity. If you nod now, you'll know in ten or so years how correct the decision you made today for your brothers was.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "What's the use of having a few houses after ten years? Xu Tailang, am I right?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "Not exactly."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Hey, dare to turn around, huh?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Dare to open your eyes?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "I've already opened my eyes as wide as I can, your biggest quality is how well you spit, right?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Younger Brother
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Big brother, what should we do?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: I originally just wanted to find a runner, I don't need one now.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Hello

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Get rid of him.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Xu Zhengtai, Xu Zhengtai, Xu Zhengtai

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang, Xu Tailang

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Dad

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "What am I going to do if something happens to the two of you?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "Don't worry."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "Ah Zheng and I are good fighters. We were just tied up and couldn't fight back."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Wife, give me one reason not to take revenge. Just one will do.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "I'm pregnant. Is that enough?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Enough, enough, enough, wife.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: My goodness, you’re pregnant.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "This time you take the loss and stop the fighting."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Okay

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: A gentleman's revenge is not too late even after ten years.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Xu Tailang, what are you doing?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: You’re acting as if it's your child.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: The child is not mine.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: You've done all the actions and expressions, what can I do?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: "Do you think it's a boy or a girl?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Ah, wife

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Niu Aihua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Hmm

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: I think.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: A boy, a boy.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4080_4260.text: Don't interrupt.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: Can you leave this moment for me?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: I think it's a girl, a girl like you, eh? If it's a boy, I'd kick him every day. What's wrong with you now?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: Xiao Ma has gone. He just left a letter.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: Dear Xu Zhengtai, Liu Yi, Xiaohua, Xu Tailang, by the time you read this letter, I would have already left...

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: The content on the back got washed away by the rain.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.speaker: Xiao Ma
movie101_6969128384144081416_4260_4440.text: "By the time you read this letter," "I will have already left this place""I'm planning to go south to make a living""Thank you all for taking care of me this past year""The things I like always clashed with yours""I've never been able to fit in with this gang""With me around," "I only held you back""To tell the truth," "I don't know what the future holds""But I don't want to be a typist or a projectionist""I always feel like something is waiting for me""Brothers," "goodbye""Write to me""If I still have an address by then"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: 'How is the situation now? Is it about to start?'

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Everyone's eating. Maybe for the villagers, this new form of buffet is a bit too advanced.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Why hasn't Liu Yi arrived yet?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: 'How about this? I go on stage first, I will try to delay the time.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Fellow villagers, distinguished guests, thank you all for participating in the wedding of Ah Xu Zhengtai and Xiao Hua. Today will be one of the most memorable experiences of my life. I never thought I could witness their love in person.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Ah Xu Zhengtai, he used to be the person I hated most, now he's my best brother.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: 'We are getting married, why does he have to make such a fuss?'

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Get used to it, he is always like this.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.speaker: Tai Lang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4440_4620.text: Xiao Hua, she is the most beautiful woman in the world.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Because I never thought, I would, I would have the chance, to see her with my own eyes

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: A, a woman in a photo, blurry as she was, standing so clearly in front of you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Who knows what the future holds, so Ah Zheng, I hope you cherish Xiao Hua, every minute, every second, every day, all conditioned phenomena are like a dream, an illusion.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: What is around here, this area, have you finalized this contract

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Go and rescue that window cleaner.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Liu Yi, you can come to the office by telling my secretary, what are you doing, eh?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Your man, broke one of my brother's legs, do you remember?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Today is my brother's wedding day, otherwise, I'll break one of your legs, or, you come with me and bow, apologize.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Liu Yi, leave, you are not a bad person, just foolish.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Huang Zhiqiang, today your leg is my wedding gift.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Lawyer Qiao, does this count as justifiable defense?

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: Before you marry me, there are some things I want to say to you, maybe my words

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: "might make you feel bad", "but you have to listen to me", "listen to my heartfelt words", "you have to listen closely", "listen to my heartfelt words", "every night", "you can't sleep earlier than me"

movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4620_4800.text: You bastard, even in death, I'll watch you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.text: Don't forget, don't forget, I am a person without skills, this whole family relies on you, all relies on you, all relies on you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.speaker: Huang Zhiqiang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.text: We have to hide out in Hong Kong again.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.speaker: Liu Yi
movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.text: 'In the future, I'll definitely be the one with the most money at this table.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Zheng Tai, this one is faster.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Whatever, just give it to me, I'll drive.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Let me do it, your leg is broken.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Fine, you do it, I'll teach you some techniques on the side.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: This is Huang Zhiqiang's current address. Hurry up, he'll go back to Hong Kong soon.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Zheng Tai
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Alright, I'll deal with this guy.

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.speaker: Luo Li
movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: We're just small fry, no need for big talk, just staying alive is enough.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: "I'm in so much pain," "I'm going to die."

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: "I won't die, but I'll be jailed for ten or eight years."

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: A Lang, what happened to you guys

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: "I'm sorry" "Listen to me, wife" "I've prepared some things for the kid" "Put them in" "the box next to your bed" "Listen to me" "Those things will be worth a lot of money in the future" "I'm not a waste, am I?" "A Lang"

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: "After I go in, you have to take care of my wife and child. Forget it, don't worry about my wife. You act as the kid's father."

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Tailang
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: No, I the hell can't do this.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Judge
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: The court adjudicates, the defendant Zhengta, convicted of intentional injury, imprisoned for six years.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: "In the future, we could become someone like Du Yuesheng"

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: It's normal to not be able to continue the business, don't be sad, I will support you.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.text: Ah Lang, your driving is really impressive.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.text: It's a talent. But why are you so good at it?

movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.text: Hold on, there's a secret to be revealed, hahaha.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.speaker: Xiao Hua
movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.text: Allow me to introduce, this is Ah Lang. Call him Brother Lang.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.speaker: Xu Zhengtai
movie101_6969128384144081416_5520_5700.text: This here, is my man, Xu Zhengtai. You all know him, right?

movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.text: "This (used to be) what they called a comfort station. Barbed wire and trenches were all around. There were puppet soldiers on guard at the entrance. It was essentially a place to imprison women."

movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.text: The front has two cave dwellings; it used to imprison Liu Mianhuan and Feng Zhuangxiang, this place, and the east side has three cave dwellings, which used to imprison Li Xiumei and Zhang Xiaoni.

movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.text: "The south side has four rooms, which were used to imprison Hou Dong'e and Chen Lintao. This cave dwelling had two kangs, which likely accommodated women. According to my investigation, at least more than 40 women were imprisoned in this courtyard. Then to Shangshe stronghold, Xiyan sawmill stronghold, Hedong stronghold. Through these strongholds, investigations were conducted across various places. Wherever the Japanese stayed, there were victimized women."

movie101_7021829520667705869_360_540.speaker: He
movie101_7021829520667705869_360_540.text: "These elderly people have suffered so much and want so much to speak out, want so much to pour out the bitterness in their hearts, but obviously, others cannot share this pain."

movie101_7021829520667705869_360_540.speaker: He
movie101_7021829520667705869_360_540.text: "She feels lighter after she speaks out, however, the people around her, she bears a lot of mental pressure, she has children, and she doesn't dare to speak."

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Grandmother, where did her daughter go?

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Translator
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Where is your girl? Do you know where she went?

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Cao Heimao
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: 'Have a smoke,' 'There's no need to be shy,' 'You won't find her even if you look, let's not talk about it,'

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Translator
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: 'If you want to find her daughter, I can ask others.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: We can't understand what the grandmother is saying, making communication impossible.

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Call her daughter and ask if she can come over.

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Cao Heimao
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Can the retaken photo still be the same?

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Cao Heimao
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Can it be used or not, look to see if it's the same or not, this is the photo on my good citizen certificate, see if it can be taken or not.

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Cao Heimao
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: The photos have turned out well, this thing is great, isn't it? It can take pictures of anything.

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: Cao Heimao
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: This must be quite expensive to buy, right?

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: 'I first met Cao Heimao in 1995,' 'I first saw Cao Heimao in Korea,' 'I felt their pain deeply, it was unforgettable,' 'so I continued to pay attention to them,' 'and looked for ways to help them.' I am good at photography, so through photography,' 'I hope many people will pay attention to this issue and provide help.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: 'I mainly visit Korean and Chinese Korean elderly women, but among the victims, there are not only Korean elderly women, but also from Asia — the Philippines, China, Indonesia, and even more countries and regions.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: 'We know their suffering is the same,' 'and many people know about their existence,' 'I personally hope everyone works together to solve this problem,' 'so I am here to visit these elderly women.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.speaker: An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_540_720.text: Especially China, which is the country most heavily invaded, and the number of victims is very large.

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Volunteer An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: And the number of victims is quite large, and they are still enduring a lot of pain up to this day. When I saw how difficult their lives are now, I wanted to let more people know about these grandmothers as soon as possible.

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Volunteer An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: "But recently, I discovered that their situation has not actually improved." "So I am thinking about what kind of help they really need." "When I saw Grandmother Park Cha-soon still living in a house with no roof, like a warehouse," "I wanted to turn it into a very warm home."

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Volunteer An Shihong
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: "We want to let more people know about her through this house renovation project for the elderly." "So that people will spread the word, from ten to a hundred to a thousand." "We will promote these activities in the United States, Korea, and Japan." "Tell them about this grandmother and call on more people to help her." "All 24 of us went to Xiaogan to help her renovate her house." "We painted and rebuilt the walls." "Those who visited her home wanted to express their feelings." "They wanted to give the grandmother their most precious things." "So they prepared these items." "Such as thermal underwear, scarves, Korean music, and maps."

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Park Cha-soon's adopted daughter
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: "My mother couldn't have children. She wanted a child. A neighbor suggested she adopt one, so she took me in. At that time, I was only two years old. I heard from others that I was still nursing."

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Park Cha-soon's adopted daughter
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: I have four sons. He has a son and a daughter, my grandsons.

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Park Cha-soon's adopted daughter
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: Then there are the three of us. My husband, me, and my mother. That's seven people in total.

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.speaker: Park Cha-soon's adopted daughter
movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: She was born under unfortunate circumstances, fleeing from Korea to China.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: South Korea is my birthplace, there was no food at that time, run.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: "My mother abandoned me, left me. My sister was very young and needed someone, she held her and left, held her and left. She was always missing me, always missing me!"

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: My Gaga is my mother-in-law. "I don't understand!" "Mother-in-law is Gaga (Hubei dialect)."

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: Gaga would look for me, search everywhere. Without Gaga, I would be lost.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: "I followed her, I followed her, I don't know how old I was, I, don't, don't know, I don't know how old I was when I fled."

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: All I knew was she was my mother. She looked at me, I looked at her, she couldn't help herself, nor did she have a father.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: Once she went back, she returned to my birthplace (South Korea), that train, the train left from such a high place.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: "I cried on the spot, people above were looking at us, throwing food for us to eat. We picked it up and ate, mom cried."

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: I didn't know (what had happened), if there was food, I would eat it fiercely.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: Koreans coaxed me,"They said Japanese were going to build a factory, a sock factory,""it seems to be in July, in Hankou."

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: The position of the Japanese, they locked Koreans and Japanese together.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: That's a door, all doors, they were locked inside. Once locked inside, they couldn't get out. Everyone stood against the wall, someone stood at the door.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.text: "Everyone stand against the wall, there is someone at the door," "You can't escape, they beat people, and if you run, they'll kill you," "Just play slowly, play a bit then leave," "Leave as soon as the door opens," "(To me) It didn't do anything," "(The Japanese) He doesn’t care about you, doesn't look at you, doesn't even glance at you," "Remember a bit then forget a bit," "Understand, but then again forget a little," "I'm finished speaking, I won't talk anymore, no more talking," "I have said I am not comfortable."

movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.text: "My mother doesn’t tell me anything," "She says there's no use telling me now that I am grown up," "She doesn't tell me, so I don't ask, I don't force her," "What's there to say about old people’s matters," "What’s there to talk about, we as the younger generation can’t speak up."

movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.text: Over a decade ago, when reporters came to interview, I heard what others said, and that's how I knew, but she always keeps silent, doesn't talk to me, reporters came to interview, she started suspecting, they said it's the old people’s matters that got into newspapers, that situation was on TV, discussing, saying she is Korean, Japanese did that to her, Japanese bullied her, my father never talked to me about it, he’s been dead for 18 years now, he surely knew about it a long time ago.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.text: At such an old age, what's there to say, once it's in the past, let it be past.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.text: I can't remember, I can't remember.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.text: I don't know what it means, welcome, please sit down, I am asking you to sit down.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.text: Come in, I am asking you to come in, to come up, please come in, welcome, please sit down, I am asking you to sit down.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: Over the years, people have come to visit her, greet her on the phone, once a year.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: When Korean people call, they still say they're looking for Park Chaesoon, I said why did she change her name to Park Chaesoon, I said her name is Yinmei Mao

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: I chose my name with Chairman Mao, my surname is Park first, then I followed Chairman Mao's name, I love Chairman Mao.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: He loves us, and I love him too.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: Some people say she is Japanese, I don't care where she's from, she's old and nice to me, I'm nice to her, that's enough, she raised me to this age, she's nice to me, I should take care of her in return.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: She can't do anything in the winter, always curling up from the cold, just want to move around a bit, her hands are too cold to stretch out, she has no blood, if it's too cold, she hides in the quilt, once she's cold, she doesn't want to go out

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: Only bones left, here is drafty, so cold.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: The draft makes it so cold, she's just afraid of being a bother, I've lived so long

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Huang Meirong
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: Can you sing, what's wasted, do you still remember

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: "When I was a child, I remembered well", "Any song, I can sing once I hear it"

movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.text: When a loved one leaves, don't let him go, but if he must, he won't get far before his feet hurt.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.speaker: Daughter of the Elderly Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.text: "He (the Korean) wants her to go home, to have a look" "She says she's too old, not going back" "She says it’s troublesome" "He (the Korean) says it's not troublesome, by airplane it's only two hours away" "No going back, she says there are no relatives in her hometown"

movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.speaker: Yinmei Mao
movie101_7021829520667705869_1620_1800.text: "On that mountain covered with trees, go there to pick vegetables, dig for them while singing songs, during childhood."

movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.speaker: Chen Shui-bian
movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.text: I started from 1996 and continued until now. Huang Yufeng A-Po passed away in February 2003. The Japanese built a bridge from Kamo base to the county town, opening a road to the Japanese military camp in Baoting. They forced the local farmers to work as laborers. Huang Yufeng A-Po was among these laborers in the village because she was very beautiful, as our Li people are. The Japanese drooled when they saw her and tricked her into going to the base to do laundry. During the Cultural Revolution, her name became well-known. Some people used to say she married a Japanese, saying she was a Japanese collaborator. At that time, these elderly women were called Japanese mothers. The term 'comfort women' hadn't been mentioned yet.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.speaker: Chen Shui-bian
movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.text: So every time I go to interview these elderly women, I have to seriously record their experiences, from the first time I met them, to tracking their lives until their passing.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.speaker: Chen Shui-bian
movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.text: 'We are currently suing the Japanese government' 'to help the 'comfort women' in this lawsuit' 'Actually, the term 'comfort women' is what the Japanese call them' 'not what we Chinese call them.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Volunteer
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: But we use it to clarify the identities of the grandmothers, Actually, we've stated before that these victims were forced to serve as "comfort women" (sex slaves) during World War II. This elderly woman is named Wang Zhifeng, born in 1928.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Girl
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: Did your husband go to Haikou?

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: I thought you'd come to see us a few days ago.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Girl
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: The Dragon Boat Festival, right? I was a bit busy those days, is everything packed up?

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: I come up here when the festival arrives. I would come up for both the Dragon Boat Festival and the Spring Festival.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Girl
