movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: Do you also come up during the Spring Festival to pay respects to the deities?

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: The chicken is killed right here. If the cooked rice isn't eaten, it's discarded (nowadays) no one eats it.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: She just lay here sleeping, like she was sleeping, she wouldn't get up and it was very uncomfortable. My husband said, if you can't get up then you can't, my husband also cried, if you can't get up then that means you can't, he precisely said that.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_1980_2160.text: She was like she was just sleeping, sleep, sleep, and then just drifted off.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: Grandma passed away on the morning of January 2, 2014. Grandma's granddaughter contacted me online to say that Grandma had passed away. The funeral was also arranged, Grandma really passed away.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: All is bought by you, all the things you bought have never been used.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: I said so many people care about you, you all

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: This has not been used, it's new.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: Come on weekends, I visit grandma Wang Yuka's house more often, seems like once a month, this grandma is the loneliest among the seven grandmas in Hainan.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: Because she lives alone, other grandmas roughly live with their families.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Liang Zhaosheng
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: The nursing home has been built for three years, now I manage it, that's to open the door in the morning, open the main gate, and close the door in the evening.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Liang Zhaosheng
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: "This window is burglar-proof," "It's to prevent someone (thief) breaking the glass and stealing things" "The elderly who come here are all five guarantees households" "Blind and disabled elderly without descendants"

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.speaker: Liang Zhaosheng
movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: "She moved up here three years ago"" She moved up as soon as it was established"" She was the earliest to come"

movie101_7021829520667705869_2340_2520.speaker: Yan Xuechen
movie101_7021829520667705869_2340_2520.text: 'When I came back from school, I often passed by her door.' 'She was very difficult, no one helped her.' 'I'd buy some stuff, cook rice, fetch water for her.' 'That's how I got to know her.' 'There was once an old anti-Japanese war veteran.' 'He is dead now, but he told me before!' 'Grandma Lin Ailan had great contributions to the revolution, to the party, and to the people.' 'Why, you ask? Because she infiltrated the enemy interior.' 'Qi Lian told me; she's no longer around now.' 'Then, she stole a lot of bullets for our troops.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Yan Xuezhan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: She smuggled out a lot of bullets for the troops, secretly took them, took out boxes and boxes, and she also mobilized the public and young women to join the army.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "How many photos have you taken after shooting for so long?" "I don't know where they went after being handed over to the state." "Did I forget? No, I'm not a fool."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "I kept and placed them at the foot of the bed."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: I know the medals are kept with the money and the wallet.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: The old man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: There's nothing in that wallet either, I don't know where it is.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: It has been stolen.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: old man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: It wasn't stolen, it's been found. "(Look) You said someone stole it, but it's here."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "It's placed inside here."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: old man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "It might have fallen out from here." "You accused Ah Han of stealing and wanted others to chase Ah Han."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: Where did you find it? I've searched everywhere.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: elderly man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: This one is inside the flower bag.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: Where is it, let me take a look.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: old man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: In that flower bag

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: old man
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: If you hide it like this, you will definitely not be able to find it.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Old Man B
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: That's it.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: This one is like this.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Old Man B
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: Both are the same, oh well, never mind.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Yan Xuezhan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "Our troops rescued her and she joined the army. So, here in our Civil Affairs Bureau, we awarded her the 60th Anniversary of the Anti-Japanese War Medal!"

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: "A few of us girls" "sang those songs," "songs about fighting the devils," "The Japanese devils' artillery destroyed our families," "They captured my father and then me, new soldiers were drafted," "They captured my father and mother, and then captured us," "Our troops saved me, they are our saviors."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: We are going to fight Japan, oh, there are so many such songs. When you sing them, the Japanese come to fight us.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: It was then that the Japanese had just arrived and destroyed our home.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: "My mother was caught and killed", her hands bound and thrown into the river.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: They caught my mother and threw her into the river that they were building. The person who threw my mother was him (the Japanese soldier).

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: "They wanted to kill people of Songmei village, I was caught by the Japanese, and three of us from Songmei Village were forced to marry him. I pretended to agree, but in my heart, I thought of stabbing him with a knife."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: On the surface, I said I would marry him, but later I opposed him.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: "Many of my experiences are known to the state. He (the Japanese) made me crippled, and he is dead too."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: "When she gets up, someone feeds her. Sit until noon and then slowly move inside to sleep."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.speaker: Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng
movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: In the afternoon, she sits at the door, waiting for the woman (caretaker) in the afternoon to prepare the food, then gives it to her to eat. We cook for three people and deliver it to them, the others who can walk can go and get their meals from the dining hall themselves.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.speaker: Yan Xuezhan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.text: The main reason for not having children is the abuse by the Japanese.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.text: They stripped off their clothes and forced you to sleep with them, otherwise, they would use torture devices, right at your mouth here, forcing you to sleep. If you don't, they would beat you.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.text: I was captured for almost two years, it seemed to be from October to July, around two years or less.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.speaker: Grandma Lin Ailan
movie101_7021829520667705869_2880_3060.text: I don’t want to bring up these matters.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.text: My daughter went to work in Haikou. All three children are in school, and some have joined the army.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.text: "Everyone gives me money. Sometimes, when they don't have money, I give them a little. It's fine if I spend a little less. The children are all grown up, and I have grandchildren. If there's no food, my son gives me some. My grandson also gives me food, so I'm very happy and at ease. At home, I'm very idle and do nothing."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3060_3240.text: "If there's no firewood, I go out to find some to cook."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.text: It's been over 70 years, I can't remember clearly, I was over 10 years old then, When the Japanese devils arrived, they would shout respectfully at our girls, they came into the village to capture people, and then set houses on fire.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.text: The Japanese devils came in groups, they made us pick wild fruits for them, they forced us to climb trees to pick fruits, if we couldn't climb, they would stab us to death, don't their guns have a bayonet attached?

movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.text: "The sharp knife attached to the gun makes it lengthy, the Japanese devils ran a lot, which was noisy, their boots reached up to their knees, running also made noise, at that time we didn't dare to sleep at home at night, we took our quilts and slept in the mountains, we dragged our cattle and sheep up the mountain and tied them, we didn't dare to fall into deep sleep when sleeping, we had to watch the cattle, the forest was very tall, we could hide, we didn't dare to sleep at home, when the Japanese devils came, we hid in the mountains, no matter where you went, they could find you, there were so many (Japanese) people that they couldn't be counted."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.text: The children couldn't walk anymore, we walked until our legs hurt, the Japanese devils hit our legs with their guns.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3240_3420.text: "My leg hurts so much now, it's all because of the Japanese beating back then, they beat my legs so much that

movie101_7021829520667705869_3420_3600.speaker: Li Caiyong
movie101_7021829520667705869_3420_3600.text: "My mother fiercely grabbed hold, my big sister was dragged away by him. He pushed my mother with his hands, and once she fell, he dragged her away."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3420_3600.speaker: Li Caiyong
movie101_7021829520667705869_3420_3600.text: Big sister was taken away, did she survive? That Japanese devil, the Japanese devil killed her, my mother said. When she spoke of it, my mother cried.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "He's already gone," "We used to live well," "We never had to resort to hitting each other."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Jia
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "The elder sister and the younger brother cannot be separated," "Whenever there's something tasty or a treat, she'd be called over," "If she can work, she'll work; if not, she'll just eat," "Whenever there's food, we try to let her have some."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: The government is great, Chairman Mao is wonderful, everyone knows Chairman Mao leads us, his image is even posted on the wall.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "Every household in our village has a photo of Chairman Mao on their wall."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "Can you work in the fields now?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Woman
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "Can you work in the fields now?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.speaker: Grandma Li Meijin
movie101_7021829520667705869_3780_3960.text: "If I can stand, I can surely work too,"

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: "I started substitute teaching in 1992," "I continued to substitute teach until 2009, then I became a kindergarten teacher," "I teach singing, dancing, and games," "I sometimes teach poetry and some Pinyin," "I also teach simple Chinese characters."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: "My eldest sister is now over 60 and she can't come, my brother is busy with his job, my second sister is teaching in Taiyuan, so at home, it's just me, my husband, our child, and my mother-in-law. My mother-in-law is actually straightforward, she says whatever she thinks and sees, but she doesn't harbor ill intentions."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: Moreover, my mother-in-law has had a difficult life.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: I got married to my husband on the 24th of December in the first lunar year, he was taken away in February of the second year. At that time, people urged me to remarry. I said I just got married, why should I remarry? I decided not to remarry, just leave it at that.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: I wrote a letter of repentance (a guarantee letter) for him (the Japanese), and didn't return home. I stayed at Nangou, living among the enemies. People said how could you live there. Find me some work, you all find me some work.

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: "I specialized in making shoe soles, doing nothing else, worked on a sewing machine making things for people, and I was able to sustain myself."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: "When I was with the Japanese, they beat me too. Lived there for three months, how could I not be hurt."

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: After they stopped beating and bullying me, I came back when they left (Japan surrendered).

movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.speaker: Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_3960_4140.text: The man said he didn't despise me, you live as you wish, it was the Japanese who took you, not your choice.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4140_4320.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7021829520667705869_4140_4320.text: No more, I won't talk about it.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4140_4320.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4140_4320.text: '(In the past) there were also such judgmental people (gossipers) in the village, but most of those of her generation are almost all gone now, young people don't really understand either, it was only after you guys came, that people in the village started to understand what happened before, who was arrested, the Japanese just took them away, they didn't know the specifics, nor did they have other opinions or thoughts, people now don't talk together about the past, so the elderly don't reminisce about the past anymore.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: Whose cat is this? It's not ours, it's another stray cat. "Hey, why are you going into the house?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: That one has kittens now, has children now, look at its bulging belly.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: "The black one? I don't know, I haven't seen it."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: "I saw it was thick around the waist a few days ago."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: "If it has kittens again, how is it supposed to raise them."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: "It might be the neighbor's cat. It's the one that had a litter of kittens. The neighbors don't care, so it came to my house. Initially, five cats came to my house. My mother-in-law fed them every day. I even told her off, 'You don't even want to cook for yourself, why are you feeding the cats?' 'If nobody feeds them, won't they starve to death?' she replied."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: Even if she doesn't eat, she feeds the cats. Sometimes she cooks for the cats first. She gives the best food to the cats, and she eats what the cats don't.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4320_4500.text: Cat, come. Where are your kittens? Why didn't you bring them over? When your kittens come, pick up and eat. Your kittens haven't eaten yet. Eat slowly.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "She comes out when the children start playing in the yard," "The children gather around her calling 'Grandma, Grandma,'" "They are all happy playing with her," "When she comes out, she plays with them and sometimes cooks something for them," "The children happily surround her, dancing and singing."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Grandma Li Ailian
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "Actually, my mother-in-law is quite happy," "The hardships she endured are beyond our imagination," "So now, seeing her in good health, our whole family is very happy."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "How did you feel when you found out you were Japanese?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Luo Shanxue
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "My younger brother (from the same mother but different father) said I was Japanese," "He wanted to kill Japanese people and said he would pay a hitman," "He would pay to have me killed, so I closed the door and said kill everyone."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: Hmm, your brother said the same thing, your brother said he would pay a hitman, oh, oh, oh.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "Your brother said he wanted to pay a hitman to kill you, why?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.speaker: Reporter
movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: "Didn't Zhu Hong (a volunteer) say he would help you find a wife in Japan?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_4680_4860.speaker: Chen Houzhi
movie101_7021829520667705869_4680_4860.text: "If these elderly people are no longer around, the historical facts will still be there. Many will ask, what about their descendants, how will their families live? I encounter these elderly people frequently, and it always makes me feel a certain way seeing them so happy, so carefree. However, once this topic is broached, their faces drop, and tears start to fall. So, apart from what is needed for the lawsuits, we try to ask questions on that matter only. If it isn't necessary, we do our best to keep them happy."

movie101_7021829520667705869_4680_4860.speaker: Wei Shaolan
movie101_7021829520667705869_4680_4860.text: "When I come to this granny's house, I help her clean, give her massages, and carry water. When she washes clothes, I help hang them up. I don't feel that she is a pitiful victim. It's as if she were my own grandmother. I like her; some grannies are sadder than others, but some are not as heartbroken as I thought. They're all very warm-hearted. They feed us and then care for us when we sleep at the granny's house. When I was a child, my grandmother took care of me and my brother, so I like grannies a lot! The grannies are all very old, but they're

movie101_7021874945990853151_120_300.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_120_300.text: "Torture" "It momentarily helps me forget the pain" "Forget those unforgettable memories" "The Bund of Shanghai only brings me pain" "The organization" "Hope" "Where is it" "Oh God, please help me" "I want to escape" "I want to end all this"

movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.speaker: Several henchmen
movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.text: Young Master, we are here to send you off today.

movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.speaker: The prison guards
movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.text: Someone is escaping! Don't let him get away!

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: What are you looking at? I'm borrowing your room.

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: prison guard
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: Everyone rush in, wake up, wake up

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: prison guard
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: They are up there, fast, don't let them run

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: prison guard
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: Catch him, don't let him run, catch them.

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: The jailers
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: Don't run, don't let them run, don't run, where do you think you can run, stop, don't run.

movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.speaker: The prisoners
movie101_7021874945990853151_480_660.text: Good, good, good, good job, brother.

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: "What do you mean" "Do you know who I am" "I am a big shot in Shanghai" "You want me to jump from here" "How am I supposed to survive in Shanghai after this"

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Singer
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: Like a bright moon, overflowing through the sunset clouds and smoke.

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Singer
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: The night is silent, taking away the hustle and bustle.

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Singer
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: It's like a warbler's call, softly waking the spring dawn. It's a love song and dance, intoxicating the beautiful night.

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: "Surprised to see I'm still alive, huh?" "It was a close call for me to meet you all today." "Luck was on my side." "I don't know who sent those small fry to the Bund to ambush me." "But I was lucky to escape with my life." "Otherwise, it would have been me falling on those cars outside."

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: "Which dock boss had the gall to mess with Mr. Tang Hexuan? He must be tired of living. Come on, let's raise our glasses. For Mr. Tang Hexuan, to calm his nerves."

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: "Thank you, Mr. Ye Qishan, for the kind words." "But think about it, even if Xiang Yu were given a thousand chances, he still wouldn't beat Liu Bang." "That's the difference between a hero and a tyrant." "For so many years in Shanghai, many heroes have wanted my life, but in the end, they all died."

movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.text: Are you fucking mute? I helped you escape and you can't even say thank you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.text: "I counted you in," "I indeed did not misread you," "Your driving skills are okay," "But let me tell you," "You still lack a bit when compared to me."

movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.text: Where did you get this clothing from? It's not bad.

movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.text: No, I just praised you, can't you do it right? It's risking our lives, not throwing them away!

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: 'Stop, stop, stop! Brother, I'll take you for a good time.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: Come on, come on! I've booked the second floor! Come down! Relax a bit.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: Dad, that Ye Fatty was too fucking ruthless this time! The bastard wants to kill me straight in jail! He even dares to stir things up! Should I make him disappear?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: Fang Jie, it's good you're back. How do you know it was Ye Fatty? Why are there so many people in the yard? Dismiss them all.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: "Dragons produce dragons and phoenixes give birth to phoenixes", "The sons of mice will fight", "No, no mice", "I tell you", "Everyone on the Bund knows", "We are a perfect match", "You are a crow in the sky", "No, no crows", "You are a phoenix flying in the sky", "I am on the ground, this..."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: It's been two years, you haven't changed, still the same heartless person, who are these flowers for?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: "Thank you" "Let's hurry up" "I hope we're not late for the movie."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: I've reserved the whole Cinema Palace, don't worry about being late.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: I didn't expect An Affair to Remember to premiere earlier in Shanghai than in England, I'm a big fan of Hepburn, I think she's both beautiful and hot.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: What the hell is that you're talking about?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: I found out you are really ignorant, I won't say more.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: You are quite romantic now, you even arranged an antique carriage to pick me up.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: Of course, who am I, I am Fang Jie.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: "Aren't you born in the year of the dog?" "Look at its appearance."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: Look how much it resembles you

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: Alright, I'll reluctantly accept it, thank you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: By the way, how's my dad?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: He's doing well. He misses you a lot, just like I do.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: Then why didn't he come to pick me up?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: He's at a meeting in the Administrative Council today, so he specifically sent me to pick you up. He should be waiting for you at home now. The situation in Shanghai is too chaotic these days, every day, the Suzhou River surfaces with so many bodies. Those people's faces are all decayed.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1560_1740.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1560_1740.text: Make way, make way, make way!

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: Thank goodness for him today. Come, meet my dad.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: This is Tang Hexuan, my father.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: 'Dad,' 'I think those people today,' 'didn't look like they're from Shanghai.' 'Don't know where they got those little thugs from.' 'They only relied on their numbers.' 'If they had the guts, come out and fight me one-on-one.' 'I’d send them all to hell.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: If it weren't for him stepping in to save the day…

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: 'If it weren't for him today,' 'how would you have the chance to brag here?'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: 'Thank you for today. If we had to rely on him, this dinner would have been replaced with the soup of the afterlife.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: 'What afterlife soup?' 'Other than you,' 'I’ve never dreamt of other girls.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1740_1920.text: Dad, look at what nonsense he's talking.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: It's a joyous day. Come, let's make a toast together. I am also careless, forgot to ask the hero's name.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: Dad, he is mute. He cannot speak.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: Li Zihao, Mr. Tang Hexuan, my name is Li Zihao.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: A sparrow has one head, two eyes twinkle, two wings, two legs, one tail stands upright.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: You sing well, just like your mother. Since you came back this time, I noticed you have grown quite a bit. Becoming more and more elegant.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: No, it's graceful. Just like my mother.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: After a while, Dad will arrange a special ball for you. You will definitely be the focus of the ball.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: "Like with mom?" "Dad, I miss mom." "How did mom die?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: "It's been so long. Why are you still unwilling to tell me?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: Dad, do you remember ten years ago, on my mom's birthday?

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: "Your mother hid you. I thought you were lost. Almost turned Shanghai upside down."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: I thought you were lost. Almost turned Shanghai upside down.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: "Wasn't it me and mom" "Trying to make you happy?" "Who knew you were so uninteresting." "For just a joke," "You got so mad at us."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: "Only you two," "Dare to joke about this with me." "Dad can't take such jokes."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: Dad, this time when I came back, I felt you weren't happy.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_1920_2100.text: As long as you are by my side, I am happy. I just hope you will always be happy and joyful.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: "I'm not a monkey", "How can I be happy forever"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: Then you let Li Zihao protect this monkey of mine.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: "You're just like your mother when she was young", "Your eyes can't hide anything", "Every word you speak comes from the heart"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Fu Sheng
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: Li Zihao is twenty-four years old, a native of Beiping, a student at St. John's University. Last year in the Japanese Concession, he was the leader of the April 15th Student Movement. He was later imprisoned in the First Prison, where he maintained a tough attitude during incarceration and refused to disclose the whereabouts of other radical figures.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Fu Sheng
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: "Handling the jailbreak this time cost us quite a bit in the concession, we found no connection between Li Zihao and the Blue Shirts Society", "Should we wait a bit longer, sir", "We'll investigate more thoroughly"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: Can't wait any longer, it's a critical time and we need people, I don't care if he's reliable, I only care if he's useful to us.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: This is Li Zihao, my newly recognized adopted son.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: Mr. Tang, what exactly do you want me to do?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2100_2280.text: "I want you to kill me in front of all the gangs in Shanghai", "Ever since I started getting involved in the French Concession", "Wanting to shut down the opium business", "Shanghai has been in turmoil", "Consul Owen of the French Concession teamed up with Hong Gang's Ye Qishan", "They’re dead set on eliminating me"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: "Do you like it? This is where everyone in Shanghai aspires to be, Heaven."

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: Mr. Tang Hexuan, what's the meaning of this?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: I, I am asking everyone to listen to the music.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Lan Luoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: If there are falling leaves, disappearing into the dust, I turn around amidst the bleakness, who says that partings are always deeply sinking, closing my eyes, it's still us.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Lan Luoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: What was promised, if there are years, passing through dawn and dusk, suddenly

movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2280_2460.text: I am going to the restroom.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: Such loneliness will be engraved with a lifetime, but do you still remember?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Singer
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: What did you promise when you were young?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Man
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: From this moment on, you are members of the Blue Uniform Society. We are comrades in the same trench. Obey orders, be loyal, dare to sacrifice, and decisively complete the tasks assigned by the organization.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: "I swear to be sincere, obey the leader, be loyal, and do not hesitate to face difficulties. Contribute to the group for a lifetime."

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Dialect
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: What are you doing, are you okay?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Owen
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: "Your party at Paramount today, it can't be just a simple invitation for everyone to have a drink, can it?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: The short and fat man
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: The attack on Mr. Tang Hexuan a few days ago, I wonder if it has anything to do with this election of Hua Dong?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: San Ma
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: I also think that the situation in Shanghai is not so good. It's very unsettled.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: San Ma, both of you, who have collapsed the stage and are just looking for a livelihood, are speaking out such eerie words here to help Mr. Tang Hexuan. I'm not surprised.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: Mr. Tang Hexuan, let me break it down. The reason you asked us to stay here is to investigate who caused you trouble. It's a demonstration of power. There's only one tiger in your eyes, and that's me, Ye Qishan.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: Then am I not a sheep into the tiger's mouth?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: You are a real tiger, and I am a real tiger, but there can only be one real tiger in Shanghai.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: I don't see any tigers, but I do see a basket of salted fish.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2460_2640.text: Mr. Tang Hexuan, you need to be careful. The salted fish

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Ye Qishan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: Even a salted fish has its moments of turning over

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: "Wait until the salted fish turns over," "that's when the soup will be cooked"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Fat Man in Disguise
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, you, what are you guys doing, we are all here to have fun, peace brings wealth, peace brings wealth.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Ma Shan
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: Heh, heh, don't forget that the French inspection team hasn't left yet, Consul Owen's vote, he wouldn't possibly give that to Boss Ye, if he couldn't even keep his official rank intact.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Owen
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: "We have discovered this assassination plot, including the one against you, it does have connections with an underground society."

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Owen
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: Don't forget, after the Japanese envoy was assassinated, you helped the Japanese purge the progressive students, your actions were ruthless, many members of the Blue Society were involved. If I were you, I would be very, very, very careful.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: What's wrong, are you scared that I haven't died yet

movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: You sang very well, really well

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Care for a drink? This liquor is really fine. More expensive than you could ever imagine.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Why, don't you want to drink with me? We haven't been together for so long, surely we have much to discuss. I'd like to hear it too. So, let's have a drink together.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: I came today to return this to you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: I'm sorry, for the time I was in prison, I, I damaged it, I shouldn't have let you join the organization, nor should I have let you take part in that operation.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: You say shouldn't have, shouldn't have let me join, regardless of success or failure of this mission, we were supposed to be together, that's what you said, right? We were going to get married in Beiping, that's what you said, too, right?

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Now all that's left is 'I'm sorry,' I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Don't be like this, calm down, calm down.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: It's all my fault, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Zihao, Li Zihao, ever since we met, you entered my life and become my everything.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: "But what am I supposed to do after you leave me?" "What should I do?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: "Now what do you want me to do?" "I always thought you were dead" "My heart died too" "But now you've come back" "How am I supposed to face you" "How do I face all this" "What on earth am I supposed to do?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: man
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Miss Lan Ruoyun, the next performance is about to start. Mr. Tang Hexuan is waiting for you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: man
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Miss Lan Ruoyun, it's your turn to go on stage. Mr. Tang Hexuan is waiting for you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Mr. Luo, why did you make her do this?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: After that incident, her condition has been poor. Don't worry. Her only task now is to obediently stay by Tang Hexuan's side. However, it seems she's genuinely fallen for the old man.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Yes, and you still keep her basic info on file.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: There's no choice. Given her current state, I'm afraid she might do something harmful to you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: You mean harmful to the organization.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Without the organization, you think you could live such a free life, do you?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "Do you think you can escape from the prison without the organization knowing?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "Why won’t you give Lan Ruoyun her freedom? She has sacrificed so much."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "I did it for the safety of more people. Why didn't you contact the organization after the jailbreak?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Tang Hexuan watches me every day.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Mr. Luo
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Alright, let's follow this lead. So this opportunity for you is very rare.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Okay, but I have one condition.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: After the job is done, destroy the files and send Lan Ruoyun away.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Miss Tang, your father said he was busy, so he had Li Zihao pick me up.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "Is it just a simple pick up? Li Zihao, I forgot, I heard that you and he used to be good friends, right?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: I wouldn't say Li Zihao and I are good friends.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "If you're not good friends why do you address each other so intimately? I saw you with Owen yesterday coming out of Hua Mao Hotel, quite affectionate."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Do you think I've wronged your father?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: That's not the case, I didn't tell him, but I want to tell you, Li Zihao, you'd better stay away from him.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: "Your father knows I went to see Owen, he asked me to find him and discuss some things, so you don't need to worry about that, nor do you need to bring it up with me in the future."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: You just need to remember that your dad loves you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Qianqian, I advise you to stay away from me. Stay away from here too, okay? You shouldn't be in Shanghai. You should hurry back to England.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: This girl has fallen in love with you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: A single glance is enough. I know.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Lan Ruoyun
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Don't harm her the way you once harmed me.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Zihao, what kind of person was my father really?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: That's not important. All you need to know is that he is your father and he loves you. That's enough.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Maybe that kind of love is a misfortune.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Perhaps it's a misfortune, or maybe it's a great fortune.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Li Zihao, I love you. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you. I'll say it again. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: "You can touch any woman in Shanghai, just not her."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Gao Tian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: "Since Mr. Tang Hexuan can cooperate with us sincerely, there's no need for you to worry about Director Hua's matter."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Gao Tian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: "However, I hope there will be no further incidents that harm the Great Japanese Empire."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: Have Zhao Yan bring some sandalwood incense to rid oneself of that distinct Eastern smell.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: I wanted to drink with you.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: "Do you want to drink together? I can really hold my liquor."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Qianqian, it's late, you should go home.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Do you want to dance? Can you dance or not?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Then I can teach you how to dance, relax.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Li Zihao
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Tang Qianqian, if you mess with me again, I will carry you home.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Tang Qianqian
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Oh, so what you mean is that you don't want to dance, so you want to wrestle?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Fang Jie
movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: What are you nodding at, huh?

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.speaker: Fang Jie

movie101_7021874945990853151_6240_6420.speaker: Tang Hexuan
movie101_7021874945990853151_6240_6420.text: Ah Jie, this is an era where the strong survive and the weak can only die. There is no brotherhood in the guild, only unchanging interests. If you want to be the boss, the only way is to conquer.

Since I met 'daddy', I have been grabbing territory with my brothers. No one can grab whatever I want. But you are my brother. I can give 'Qianqian' to you. I don't even need the position of the boss of Shanghai. Why did you lie to me? Why? Why did you work for The Blue Society? Why? Speak."

movie101_7021874945990853151_6240_6420.text: Fang Jie, my good brother, live on for me.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6240_6420.speaker: Fang Jie

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Bonnie
