movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Yes, I've been lying to you from the start.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Zong Sheng
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: I already told you, don't, what are you dropping on me, hey, rock, rock salt, wow, truly impressive.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Going through all this trouble just to meet me directly is to avoid paying the middleman's commission?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: These people are all vampires. This time, Zong Sheng deceived us about the Long Tou matter.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: You can't entirely blame him. The Long Tou was always with us. I even forgot about it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Forget it. In our line of work, lying and being lied to is already a habit.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: 'Where is the Rose?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: If it's fake, I wouldn't bring it to you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: I still need to verify it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: It can't leave our sight.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Okay

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Employee
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: We are ready, let's begin.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Please verify this for me.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: I can't fake this in a few minutes.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: Test this, wait a moment.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Would you mind if we take a look around?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: I didn't expect there to be such a large verification center hidden underground at the winery.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: It's a forgery center, with tens of billions of transactions every year. They have the final say on everything big and small.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Hey, isn't this the painting that was stolen from the European museum at the beginning of the year? It's very well done.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Don't underestimate these artists, they are all masters. It's a pity they only become famous after they die. Pay more attention to upstairs.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: "What are these people doing?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: They polish and sand the porcelain, soak it in manganese dioxide solution, then further process it, making it look like it's hundreds of years old. The Chinese paper has many layers, all of which can be peeled off. This is an authentic piece, when opened, both of the two pieces are genuine.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: That's not one in five or six.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: That's too thin

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: What about...that one?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: That's silk, they can't separate it, so they sell a long painting in parts, one in six, one in eight.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: I'm amazed they came up with this

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Antiques excavated in small pieces, reconstructed based on archaeology, true top, fake bottom, fake top, true bottom.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: So it's 70% fake and 30% real

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Then they use x-rays to make the brand new porcelain look like it has a history of thousands of years all of a sudden.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: This is really complicated. How many real ones are still on the market?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Ninety percent are fakes

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: "Poor rich people"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Security Guard
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Over there

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Who is that

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: It's one of Nine-headed Bird's people

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Wow, what is this?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: This, high-pressure low-temperature combustion, simulating the carbon emission process, specifically deceives antique experts, this technology isn't well researched yet, the process of adding fuel and catalyst can only be done manually, they really dare to do this.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Is such a crude equipment dangerous?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: All frauds are dangerous

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Nice to see you, JC, aren't you going to talk?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: I don't want to see you

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Don't be like that

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Who is he

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: He is JC, a big-shot in this industry.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Reputation is sometimes not reliable

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Are you colleagues?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: We are not the same, we wouldn't do what he does.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: What? Don't be so smug. Whatever you can do, I can do better.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Nine-headed Bird, you stole a Buddha statue from a temple in Southeast Asia

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Yes, those people thought it was done by their neighbor country.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: A war broke out at the border and thousands of people died

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: People will die eventually

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: That's their problem

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: You are the scum of our line of work

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: The last person who said that to me has already gone west.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Really? Scum

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: "I don't even need to leave this couch to kick your ass"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: You can go now, enjoy your vacation.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Just checking out these pieces of furniture

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: If you two want to fight, go outside, okay? This is authentic, be careful.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Get it sorted and then leave. We'll move it later.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Old rules, you'll get your money tomorrow.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Your asking price is too high. We will discuss it when my dad comes.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: "I can give you a discount, but I want three people."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: I don't understand what you mean

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Then go prove it if you can

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.speaker: Security guard
movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: Help me open the door, quick.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: JC, what have you proven now?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: "I soothed a bit of my rage."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.speaker: Nine-Headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: No, this is a women's singles match.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.speaker: Foreign woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: Let's see how capable you are

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.speaker: The person on the TV
movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: Earlier, we captured the fourth parachutist, but couldn't identify him.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: It's Martin, Martin, it's him, it's Martin

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: You are the wingless bald eagle, don't dream of defeating me.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.speaker: Reporter
movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: "This mysterious person has no parachute." "What does it matter if he grabs the dragon head"

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: "It's yours, brother, you really are something."

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Female News Reporter
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: According to our special report, the mastermind behind MP Corporation, Lawrence Morgan, and his son Michael, have been arrested on suspicion of possessing the stolen painting of incalculable value, 'The Rose'.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Male news reporter
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: We now have a special report, "Today four foreign consulates," "each received an anonymous package containing long-lost national treasures of their countries," "including the gold scepter of an Egyptian pharaoh," "the scepter of Russian Empress Catherine," "and the Incan jewelry box with the gold eagle," "let's not forget the Star of Arabia."

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Male news reporter
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: To this day, no one knows who this mysterious sender is, isn't it amazing? In related news, Japan has just announced, that they will return the five ancient Korean books to South Korea.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Anna
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: Hello, my name is Anna, on behalf of the Cultural Heritage Preservation Association, I present this to you as a token of our gratitude.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: No need to thank him, he’s sold a lot more through his hands. Look, Professor Guan has also been released.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Nurse
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: Mr. Liao, your wife has just given birth.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Mr. Liao
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: I’m on my way! I'll leave you to it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: I'll go have a look too.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Martin's wife
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: "You promised to meet and said 'let's not part ways'."

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: A very loud phone recording, listen to this, I'm leaving.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Martin's wife
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: I've tried everything, and you still haven't shown up.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: I'm learning from you guys, stole it, anyway those bankers don’t understand.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: After leaving you guys, I've been studying Chinese.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: He's awake, go and see him.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: "Hurry up and open it to take a look."

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: You guys figure out your own business properly.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: Two people, each with 50 percent, can only create a 100 percent nurturing environment for him.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: If you are willing, let's start again.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Mr. Liao
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: Hey, it's a girl, come see, come and look!

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Wu Qing
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: Congratulations, congratulations, what name have you chosen?

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Mr. Liao
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: World peace, JC suggested four names, I chose.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: The one from the phone recording, go and see.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: He's fine, he's recovering quickly, he should be able to be discharged in a week or two.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: It's not that I don't allow you to learn music, if you want to learn, do it right. Look at who you're hanging out with every day, these people, they're either doing drugs or chasing girls. What good can you learn from them? Go home.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Lu Xiaoxing, let me tell you, you can criticize me, don't slander my friends, we didn't mix with the wrong crowd, didn't use drugs and didn't chase girls, we just want to make our own music.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: "You are still arguing with me, open your fucking eyes and see, you know you got expelled from your school, you still dare to steal money from home saying you are paying tuition, this is what you learned from them"

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: So, I skipped school. What's wrong with that? I didn't do anything else, I just came to rehearse. I took money from home because we needed more equipment. I'll tell you, I wanted to get expelled. I don't want to go back to those boring classes.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Get off me and stop meddling in my affairs. You're not my real sister. You never were.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: So you know some grappling techniques, great. So what if you want to be a cop, why can't I study music, what right do you have to tie me up here

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: You know I'm a police officer. It's only right for a police officer to correct delinquent juveniles.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Sister, can you just do me this one favor in this lifetime, let me go back, this performance is very important to me, sister.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: "It's impossible, Liang Cong. Look at how old you are, and you still have your parents worrying about you. You should start thinking about your own life."

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Lu Xiaoxing, let me go. If you don't let me go back to the performance, I'll fucking hate you for the rest of my life.

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Liang Cong, what are you doing, are you crazy, Liang Cong

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Help me, help, help me, come save me, hurry up and save me

movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_120_300.text: Sister, sis, come save me, ah, sis, hurry up.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: Sis, get up quickly. Please, get up.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: Alarm clock
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: Eight o'clock, eight o'clock, eight o'clock, eight o'clock.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: I got it. I’m waking up.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: Today's weather in the city is cloudy to clear, the highest temperature is 20 degrees, the lowest temperature is 15 degrees, suitable for wearing long sleeves.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: Recently, the case of female college student Zheng Huiying disappearing at midnight has attracted widespread attention on social media. The police have launched an investigation. In this era of new media where social networking is common, various stranger dating apps keep appearing on our phones.

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.speaker: phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: Among them, 'Only Appointments' has rapidly increased its registered users in just three months and has become a leader among many similar products.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Mr. Ma
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Three years without seeing you, you now have such a cool bodyguard.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: It's called Cong Cong (Animal), it is my eyes.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Mr. Ma
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Cong Cong (Animal), indeed looks quite handsome.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: "Mr. Ma, I have learned braille in the past three years." "I can now type, read, and surf the internet proficiently." "Cong Cong (Animal) can take me anywhere I want to go." "I believe that blindness can no longer be an obstacle to my work and life." "I want to re-apply for admission."

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Mr. Ma
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Lu Xiaoxing, I don't want to discourage you. The reason you had to leave the school was not because of your blindness, but due to your severe violation of rules.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: Mr. Ma
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: "During your internship with the police" "you left your post without permission." "Your impulsive actions" "resulted in serious consequences." "I know your brother's death" "was a huge blow to you." "But that mistake" "is something that cannot be undone." "If you ask me, you should go back."

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.speaker: driver
movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Are you looking to die? Can't you see where you're walking? I almost ran you over!

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: Thank you, Cong Cong. I'm not eating anymore, you eat. I'm not eating anymore, you eat, Cong Cong.

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: broadcast
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: "The missing case of female college student Zheng Huiying," "The police are appealing to the public for clues," "Zheng Huiying, 21 years old," "a junior student at the city's Economic and Trade University," "has been missing since leaving the campus on the evening of the 2nd of this month." "If anyone knows her whereabouts, please contact our station as soon as possible. Now, for a commercial break."

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Mom
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: Uncle Liang plans to sell our old Lanhu Villa house. Do you want to come back and see if there's anything you want to take away? And there's Liang Cong's stuff, do you want to keep any of it?

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: "There are so many, Sister Xiao Xing, come up here quickly!"

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: "But how do I get up there? I'm afraid to go up."

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: "This is what I bought for you with the savings from my New Year's money. You have to practice diligently," "and play beautiful melodies."

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: Hmm, then sister, you must also become a future flying superheroine.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: "Sis", "Step aside", "Stop meddling in my affairs", "You're not my real sister", "Let me go"

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: On what basis you can do this because you want to be a cop, what right do you have to tie me up here.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Mother
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: Xiao Xing, are you just leaving like this?

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Mother
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: I've bought you a vibration guiding detector, it can sense obstacles that are beyond the reach of a normal stick, carry it with you.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Mother
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: The stronger the vibration, the closer it is to you, the weaker the vibration, the further it is from you, Xiao Xing, some things, don't take it to heart, it was an accident.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Mother
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: Xiao Xing, kid, listen to me, this weekend, Liang Cong and their band are holding a concert, in memory of Liang Cong's three-year anniversary, inviting us to go together.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: "How can I go", "Do I have the face to go, if it weren't because of me, Liang Cong would still be the lead singer of that band"

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: "I should have fallen from that bridge with Liang Cong in the first place"

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Mother
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: Xiao Xing, it's dark, how are you going to walk alone

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: "For me", "Is there a difference between day and night"

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: The other end of the phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: "Hello, this is 96106. Can I help you with anything?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: I was the one who just made a reservation for a taxi.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: The person on the phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: May I ask your location?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: I'm at the No. 53 bus stop on Nanhu Middle Road

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: The person on the phone
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Currently there are no available cars. However, we will resend your car request. Please wait a bit longer.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Thank you

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: The man in a suit
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Hey, how can you steal my cab?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Another man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Hey, what are you snatching? What's the matter with you?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: The man in a suit
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Of course I was here first. Are you hailing a cab or robbing one?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Another man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Are you sick or something? Are you blind?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: The man in a suit
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: I was here first

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Two men
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Hey, don't go, wait a moment.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Girl
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: What's the situation here? Are we meeting or not? I've been waiting for twenty minutes. Still have the nerve to say 'It's enough to have your company'. Go play around.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Girl
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Stop the car

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Girl
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Master, Sunshine Apartments

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Hello, did you book the ride?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Come on in

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Sorry, I got your car all wet.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: It's alright, the person who should apologize is me, I'm late.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: It's fine, with this heavy rain, you got here quickly which is really good.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Where are we headed to?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Nanhu Middle Street, Sunshine Residences

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Are you cold? I'll turn on the heater.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Is there a strange smell in the car?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: The scent of the cleaner, I just had it serviced.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Then I'll crack the window

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Rain will get inside.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: Oh, by the way, this coffee is still hot. It'll warm you up when you finish it. Here, take it.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: This seat is genuine leather? Is this a luxury cab?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: "There's no need to check, I can't see,"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: "Give me the coffee, I'll open it for you."

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: Ah, it's okay, I can do it myself.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: No, your eyes are inconvenient, hand it over.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: "Give it to me," "I asked you to give it to me, didn't you hear?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: It's nothing, it was a dog.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: Stray dog, get in the car.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: How could a regular dog smash the windshield?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: Molten Giant, are you messing with me? Is this an ID card? Set it up, set it up.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.speaker: Man with Glasses
movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: You mean the accident happened after the hit-and-run driver hit someone and then fled?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: He escaped.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Yes, there's no time to talk about this right now, you need to investigate quickly!

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: However, according to the on-site traffic police investigation, no clues were found.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Not finding clues is normal, it's raining so heavily today, someone has been hit.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Didn't you say the driver claimed he hit a dog?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: "But I clearly heard a woman's moaning"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: "What time was it approximately then?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Around 9:10

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: How do you know?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Because I got in the car around 9, Officer, you don't need to repeatedly verify this information because I can't see.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Drunkard
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: I am Lava Monster, Lava

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Sorry, please hold on a moment.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: The policemen
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Look, look, look, find the guy, find the guy, find the guy

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Drunkard
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: I'm just messing with you

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Oh, who is this? Isn't it the famous Liu Chun? What are you doing here? Oh my, how did I meet you here? Chun, I didn't expect this, drinking 6 bottles of Erguotou in 7 minutes.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Impressive, the entire East City knows about this legend, amazing, drinking again, let me have a bit, okay? Take them away, sober up outside.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: "Can you just throw away your broken glasses?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: This is fashion!

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Fashion my foot! Come, come, come, give it to me. Carefully go through the report on Zheng Huiying's missing case.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Some people are blind in the eyes but not in the heart, some people are not blind in the eyes but are blind in the heart.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Miss Lu Xiaoxing, right? I heard everything you said just now. Don't worry, you can go back now, it's getting late. If anything comes up, we'll contact you.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: "I'll leave this matter to you then."

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Old Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Miss Lu is not convenient right now, take her to the car.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Okay

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Take care of yourself since your legs aren't good

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hit you. Actually, you could have been let go, but then I found the 'OnlyMeet' app on your phone. Do you think playing like this is thrilling?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Alright, I know I was wrong, I'm sorry, I won't leave you alone at home again. Hey, Cong Cong.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Cong Cong (Animal), what's wrong, Cong Cong (Animal), who is it?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: "Are you an idiot?" Then continues, "Miss Xiao Xing, good day, following the clue you provided yesterday, we've investigated the accident site, and it turns out someone did go missing, a woman."

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Usually, you should be asking me if I saw clearly the car's make, license plate number, and the driver's age, physique, and such questions.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: "I can't describe the car's shape, the driver was over 1.8 meters tall, around 182 or 183 centimeters, as for the license plate number, I think even if you're not blind, it's very hard to see clearly and remember it in such heavy rain."

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: You seem to not trust me very much.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: No, no, no, I just want to understand more.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Officer Lu Li, you're probably about 35 years old, 1.75 meters tall.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: I, when I was 20 years old, people said I looked like 40. They said I looked older. You, you can see it, or rather, you can hear it. Unlike some people, heart blind, yes, heart blind.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: A person's height can be judged by the pitch of their voice, their build can be inferred from the weight of their steps, many things don't need to be seen to be known. For example, this morning, the two of you ate chive dumplings.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Then, let's continue.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Ah, okay, let's continue. You mentioned earlier, that the driver hit a dog.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Around 9 o'clock, I got into a taxi at Shuncheng Road. After starting the meter, we drove west for about 10 minutes. I heard the sound of something rolling under the car, and the sound of the taxi's top light breaking. Even if it were a big dog, it wouldn't make such a large noise.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: So, what you're saying is, he was lying about hitting a dog.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Also, he should be left-handed.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Left-handed

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Because he wore his watch on his right wrist. Usually, watches aren't worn on the dominant hand.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Right, how did the accident happen?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: He said he wanted to help me open the coffee.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Coffee

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: I could open it myself, but he insisted on helping.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Ah, alright, let's stop here for today. Okay, thanks for your effort. Oh, by the way, I wanted to ask, how did you know about my leg?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lu Xiaoxing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Because your steps are uneven. Also, the smell of musk pain relief plaster is strong. Anyone can smell where it's coming from.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Young policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Captain, are you okay?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Ah, it's okay, it's okay, it's okay.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Reward offered, reward offered.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Young policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Here are the photos of all male luxury taxi drivers. A total of 568 individuals.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Young policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: "Shouldn't we investigate the left-handed individuals among them?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Officer Lu
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: This case is, odd, definitely something off about it.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.speaker: Young policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Captain Lu, do you really believe that?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "What did I eat this morning?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "She's not wrong"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Young Policeman
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: It's only because she guessed your age right!

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Homicide squad, Lu Li, what, you're a witness, do you remember what the car looked like?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: What, I told you, it wasn't a taxi.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "Damn", "That's really blind"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: How can you speak like that? Are you really sure?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "Something with wheels", "I've studied this extensively", "I'll say it again", "I am absolutely certain", "Sure, and positive", "It was a 2010 Golf 6", "If I'm lying, I'm your grandson"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Acting like a smart aleck here

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Officer, after getting in the car, I heard the sound of the meter, I cannot see, but I can hear, I have basic judgment skills

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Alright, then please perk up your ears, make a good judgment, am I a man or a woman? Miss, seeing is believing, hearing is not. Have you heard this before?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Yo, same model as mine. Which idiot sold you such a phone? Can you use all those apps?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: You should look in the mirror more often to see what you look like

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Ah, so handsome

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Officer, I am very certain, it was a taxi

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: I am also very certain, it was a Golf 6, my own two eyes saw it crystal clear.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: What about the license plate number?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Uncle Police, the rain was so heavy, the night was so dark, could you have seen it clearly?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "If you are a witness", "why didn't you call the police at that time?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Yeah, why didn't you call the police?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: I did see it, alright, the driver, picked up the person who was hit and put him in the car, I thought he was taking him to the hospital, didn't think any further

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "Put in the car", "Front seat or back seat?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: Back seat

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: You're lying, I was sitting in the back seat at that time, the person who got hit was dragged into the trunk.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "You came here to deceive for money?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: "Damn it"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: What kind of place is this?

movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_1920_2100.text: I didn't see everything clearly, but I did see the hit-and-run, I wanted that reward money, to buy a new pair of rollerblades.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: But I absolutely didn't lie. You can choose to believe it or not.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: If you're trying to scam money, you've got the wrong place. Don't show off here.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: "Can you handle it or not? Haven't seen you for a month. What? You come too tomorrow. Fine. Be at the Lu Jiao Road practice field at nine sharp. If you don't come, I'll kill you."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Officer, just consider what I just said as a stand-up comedy. Can this little liar go now?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Hey, Lin Chong, right? I can arrest you for obstructing police business at any time, you know that? Learn something good at a young age. Go, go, go.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Gao Yanan
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Lu Li, here is the list of taxi drivers you asked for. All left-handed drivers are here.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Gao Yanan
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Yes, yes, yes, we haven't seen each other for many years.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Gao Yanan
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Then you two chat, I'll go out first.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Girl
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: I'm already at the entrance, where are you?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Driver
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Hello, is it you who booked the ride?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Voice message
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Analysis of hit and run criminal mentality, panic mentality, fear of punishment, a mentality of taking chances, a confrontational mentality, self-protective mindset, fear of financial compensation and punishment, analysis of reasons for hit and run and countermeasure research.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2100_2280.text: Hello, who is this, why aren't you speaking, hello?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Taxi driver
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Well, I don't know who the tempestuous one is, I just stopped for a moment and he scratched me a lane. This job doesn't pay much anyway, damaging the car just makes it worse. Do you think it can go without repair

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Police
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: "Why did you remove the dash cam?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Taxi driver
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: What aunt, whose aunt, oh oh, you mean the meter, right?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Police
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: "Our taxi company recently has required switching to this new standard thing"

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Taxi Driver 2
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: I mean, who would bother, huh, to make that little money, is it enough to eat?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Taxi Driver 3
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Nowadays, there are more and more dash cams.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Taxi Driver 4
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Damn it, who would go out in this weather? It's better to stay at home and have some tea.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: "It's not him. His voice was not so shrill."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: "Today we only listened to a tenth" "Tomorrow" "We still have a bunch of nonsensical voices from the old fools" "And the lies are returning" "So don't get hurried" "Tomorrow we will continue to search for a needle in a haystack"

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: We listened to the recordings all day, are you hungry? Here, have one.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: I don't have the appetite

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Oh

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Yo, I forgot you. Here... Ah, I can't give this to you, it's dog meat.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Officer Lu Li

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Just kidding, just kidding.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Taxi, damn luxury taxi, it's nothing but a Golf 6, you're accusing me of lying, which part of it is false?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: So what the blind said is true, huh, damn

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Ah, the little brat is calling.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Hello, it's me, Lin Chong, I'm saying it again, the car that hit the person is a Golf 6, not a taxi, whatever car it is, it is that car, believe it or not.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Ah, what does this little brat mean?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Officer Lu Li

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: Hmm

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: I believe yeah, why wouldn't I believe? I trust, your matter, Yanan has told me all about it.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: "Aren't you going to resume your studies?" "Actually, you should go to that surveillance class" "It would be quite suitable for you."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: Xiao Xing, I don't know what you're thinking right now, but I can't and will not back down. We're in this together, we must only charge forward without looking back, go as far as we can, there's only one road. If you think about taking a side turn in the middle to doze off, that's not happening.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: "Those were my words," "I'm quite the talent," "I can't believe I said such things," "I should go on 'Chinese Dream Show'."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: Officer Lu Li, what was that sound just now?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: "That was the sound of the wind," "my car is all good except for being noisy," "usually cars have separate trunks and back seats," "but mine is a hatchback," "meaning the back seat and the trunk are integrated." "Once you drive a bit fast," "the wind rushes to the back," "making it very noisy."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: But on that taxi, I also heard the sound of a hatchback.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: "Didn't you say it was a luxury taxi?" "Which luxury taxi has a hatchback?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: Nine o'clock sharp, Antlers Road, practice field, do you remember? He had a date with friends there.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: What? You're going to be late? Forget it, forget it, forget it, don't make excuses.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Excuses, this is the last time.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Buddy, you guys can't be late tomorrow, alright? You hear me? Hanging up now,

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Fireflies fly, flowers sleep, pairs of things are only beautiful if they're in pairs. We're not afraid of the darkness, only of heartbreak. No matter how tired or no matter which way we go.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: Motorcycle owner
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Hey, hey, hey, that's my car!

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Damn, what is this all about?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: People
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: It really is, Lin Chong, Lin Chong, Lin Chong, Lin Chong, wake up, quickly, quickly, quickly, call an ambulance quickly!

movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.speaker: The man driving the car
movie101_7010686199291445773_2640_2820.text: Oh, there's been an accident, the ambulance is already here, so many people gathered around.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Is that Lin Chong?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Ah

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Nurse
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Slow down, slow down, just push it in.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Hey wait a minute, Criminal Police, where are you taking this to?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Nurse
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: The nearest Huazhen Hospital

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Okay

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Nurse
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Hurry up and go.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Go

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Get in the car

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: He's really lucky, there's no cerebral hemorrhage, look, the clearer this white line, the higher the bone density, his skull structure is very unique, so he didn't suffer any trauma.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Ah, this kid must be the legendary martial arts prodigy right? Born with a helmet on his head, a natural Iron Head skill.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Observe for a while, if there's no problem he can go home to recuperate.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Alright, thank you for your hard work.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Xiao Xing, here, coffee.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Hey, don't worry, Lin Chong is fine, he'll wake up in a bit, but, if it wasn’t a taxi that hit him, why would he ask you to get into his car?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Is there a strange smell in your car?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: The smell of a cleaning agent.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: It's propofol.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Hmm

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: "That day I got in the car," "I smelled a very strange odor."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Propofol, huh? Why didn't you mention it sooner?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: That day, the driver told me he had just cleaned the car, I thought it was the smell of the cleaning agent and didn’t think too much of it.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Propofol is a strong anesthetic.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Now that I think about it, he was probably going to put the anesthetic in my coffee.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: "That must be it," "now the problem is serious," "it's definitely related to the," "previous serial disappearance cases."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Girl
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: What's going on, are we meeting or not, we're already 20 minutes late, and you still dare to call it 'Just Have You With Me.'

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Right, he must have mistaken me for the girl arranged by the mobile app.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Mobile app, that university student Zheng Huiying, disappeared after, she used 'Just Date' to meet a guy, and completely vanished the moment she stepped out.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Then quickly check the ID.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: Already checked, it's an unregistered 'black card' bought from a street vendor, can't track it, think again, is there anything else suspicious?

movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_2820_3000.text: "Last night"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: I got a call from an unknown number, after answering, they didn't speak, take a look for me.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Hey, Glasses, I need you to check a number for me, find out who the phone belongs to

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: You're awake, are you okay? Does it still hurt? Hey, don't move around.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: What are you doing here, where is this, anyway?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: You were injured yesterday and were brought to the hospital. The doctor said it's nothing serious.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: What's with you, do you even need to care about me?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Hey, don't you know anything? Xiao Xing sister stayed with you all night yesterday, can't even say thank you?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "Sister?" "I don't have a sister like that" "What nonsense" "Who was it that treated me like a liar in the first place?" "Now playing the good guy?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "You were not knocked silly by hitting your head?" "Sharp-tongued as always"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Instead of pretending here, have my mates been caught yet?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Will you ever let it go?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Lu Li, Lin Chong, you're right, I formally apologize to you. It was my presumptuousness that caused you hardship, I'm sorry.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: I went to the roller skating rink, that guy suddenly chased after me, and I ran.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "If you didn't do anything wrong, why did you run?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: He suddenly chased after me, of course, I ran. Oh, right, I saw that guy's eyes.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Did you see the car model and license plate number?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "I didn't have time to look" "I was just about to" "See what I mean?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Hmm

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Anyway, no one believes the truth when I tell it

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: No, no, I mean, it's not that I don't believe you, I just have to think it over.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "Like you" "With your agile limbs" "Can you catch a criminal?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Alright, alright, I'm dumb, okay? "I’m a dumb dog, happy now?" Nothing, nothing, not talking about you, it's okay. Hey" "Let's do this" "Stay here for the next few days" "We will ensure your safety

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Safe, me, and a blind man, relying on this dog?

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: "Will you ever stop, you brat" "Come here, come here" "I need to talk to you" "What are you trying to say?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: I need to pee, if you don’t let me go, I’ll pee right here.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: pee

movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3000_3180.text: Go, go, go, turn right outside the door, ah

movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.text: That guy is just a little kid, childish words, childish words.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.text: I am so ridiculous, a blind person like me trying to be a witness, what can I do in this state.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.speaker: Lu Li
movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.text: Xiao Xing, the owner of the phone number you gave us before is named Yu Lu, a 25-year-old girl. We received a report that she disappeared. This must be related to the recent series of disappearances. If it weren't for your timely report, providing such important clues, how could I have linked it together?

movie101_7010686199291445773_4800_4980.text: 'So many people outside,' 'you don't catch the ones you should,' 'you come here to catch me,' 'to catch me.'
