movie101_7010686199291445773_4800_4980.text: 'Hello, Captain Shan?' 'This is Jingkuang.' 'Found all the missing girls,' 'yes, they're all alive,' 'send the brothers over to help fast,' 'hurry up.'

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: The dark sky hangs low, bright stars follow, the insects fly, the insects fly, whom are you missing?

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Stars in the sky shed tears, roses on ground wither, cold wind blows, cold wind blows, who are you thinking of

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: As long as you're by my side, insects fly, flowers sleep, pairs after pairs are beautiful, not afraid of the dark, only afraid of a broken heart, no matter if we're weary, nor the directions far and wide.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Oh, a message from Captain Lu, he says, the criminal has been apprehended, asking where we are.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Jingkuang
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Hurry up, Shan Dui, Shan Dui, Shan Dui.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Jingkuang
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Shan Dui, I can't seem to get in touch with Captain Lu.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.speaker: Shan Dui
movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: You go look for him again, come with me.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: "People like us," "how could we be afraid?" "Do you know," "I've always thought the reason you got in my car that day" "was fate," "because we share the same misery."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: You love your brother, and I love my sister.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: "But they died by our hands," "My life is ruined," "Even this can't help with the pain inside me," "Could anything be more hopeless," "Might as well," "Let's join them," "I'll help you."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: Xiao Xing sis, call the police, hurry!

movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.speaker: Jingkuang
movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.text: Lu Li, Lu Li, pull yourself together, Lu Li.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.speaker: Jingkuang
movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.text: Over here, Lu Li is here, somebody help.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.text: Lin Chong, Lin Chong, where are you?

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.speaker: Ringtone
movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: "The dark sky hangs low, the bright stars follow, insects fly, insects fly, who are you missing?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.speaker: Police
movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: No good, request mobile phone location tracking.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.speaker: Another police officer
movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: Xiao Hu, request mobile phone location tracking, keep calling Xiao Xing, hurry up.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.speaker: Ringtone
movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: The dark sky hangs low, the bright stars follow.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Come out, do you just like hiding in the dark?

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: "Is it meaningful to live so painfully?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Who is like you? If you want to die, go die yourself!

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Don't come closer, stomp your foot.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Keep chopping, don't stop, give me the key to the lock.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.speaker: Tang Zheng
movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: "Why, why won't you listen to me, I'm doing this for your own good, you know, why don't you listen to me, why, obey me."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Sister, sister, are you alright? I, I, I am Lin Chong.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.speaker: Lin Chong
movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Sis, get up, come on, get up, sis, quickly!

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Sis, sis, save me, sis. Get up quickly. Hurry up and get up. Sis, hurry up and get up. Sis.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Get up, get up quickly, sis, get up quickly.

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: Sister, come save me, Sister, come save me, Sister, hurry and save me.

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: Sister Xiao Xing, you can do it.

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.speaker: Xiao Xing
movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: I am not like you! I am not like you!

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.speaker: Liang Cong
movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: "Just rush forward without turning back." "Fear is not the master."

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: No problem, no problem

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Alright, alright, ah, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Sorry, sorry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "If you take a photo now, when will you finish?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Young Miss
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Uncle, buy a flower

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: The person in the car
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: They're out

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: I'll do it, I'll do it, I'll do it, I'll do it, give the flower to them.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Study well at home

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: You're being insincere, you want to give it to your wife, right? Why give it to me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: You paid for it, give it to your girlfriend.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: My girlfriend, really.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Parking fee attendant
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Leaving, boss, two hours, thirty yuan

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: I'll do it I'll do it I'll do it I'll do it I'll do it

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Excuse me, sir, can I ask something? Is this your car?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Yes

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: That's right, we're from the city's criminal investigation team. Uh, your car is involved in a hit-and-run case, please cooperate and show your driver's license, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "That's impossible, I rarely drive, I’m not used to driving on the left."

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Have you been drinking?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: None

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "Can a Hong Kong license be used here?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Of course, I've gone through the procedures. Can I see your police ID?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Sure, that's right. Here, we've been following this car for days.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: We've been following for days

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Yes, indeed.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: That's not right. Isn't traffic accidents handled by traffic police?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Comrade, you just said you're from the city bureau, which division?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: If you have any doubts, we can verify it at the station. Everything will be clear, right? Before that, I hope you can cooperate, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: I'm not very familiar with your procedures, I'm just making a call, 110.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: What's that supposed to mean? You’re not cooperating? You think being a celebrity lets you off? Cuff him up

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: What are you talking about?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: What do you mean, what do you want to do, don't move, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "How can you police enforce the law like this?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "You're obstructing official duties, stop talking or I'll arrest you too, understand?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Police, how can you

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Take him away

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "Don't move, okay?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Zhang Hua squad, we'll bring the person back and verify soon.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "You're not police, are you?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: This is kidnapping

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "Would you believe me if I said no?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: The situation is as such, pretty much what you guys know. If there's anything different, my version is the correct one.

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: Impressive, acting as police

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: "Why not? Mr. Wu has also played a cop"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "What don't I dare to act? I once played a cop. By the way, which movie was that?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: That's irrelevant. Where did you hide Mr. Wu?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: I don't know.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Is this fun for you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "No, it isn't."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "If it's not fun, then shut up. Huazi, look at your abilities."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "If you're that good, find it out yourself."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Tough, aren't you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: I'm not tough. You're the tough one. Go ahead, hit me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Tough? We caught you, didn't we? With what you've done, do you think you shouldn't get beaten?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Go ahead if you have the guts.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Huazi believes you're not a petty thief. A smart person wouldn't mess with themselves.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "How did you catch me?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Criminal Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Chief Zhang, he's been checking his watch.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Guozheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: We don't have much time left. Mr. Wu should still be alive.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: He's not dead, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Is

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: It's different if he's alive. We've given you the chance, think carefully.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "According to the usual pattern, his accomplices are watching and waiting for his signal."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Another police officer
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Zhang Hua's phone has always been one-way communication. Only outgoing calls. We turned it off now.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Guozheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: They must have agreed on a specific time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Since we’re here, let’s be sincere. When will your men get the signal?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Nine o'clock

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Nine in the morning or nine at night?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: At night

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "What will happen in an hour and a half?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: According to the rules.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Tell us, what are the rules?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Kill

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "You're lawless, you know that?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "I just want to achieve my goal. I do what I want to do. If I think you should die, then you die. If you shouldn't die, then you live."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Who do you think you are?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: You're planning to stick it out like this, aren't you? I'll tell you, we're at this point now.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: I need to think hard if there's even a glimmer of hope.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Your only hope is to atone for your crimes.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Junior Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: All of Huazi's stuff is here.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Junior Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: These were found on him and in his car.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Can I ask for another condition?

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Go ahead.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: I help you rescue Mr. Wu, and you set me free.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "You really don't know how to talk, do you?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Sure I do, that's just what I think. If I live, we all live. If I die, we all die together.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: I've always considered you a reasonable person.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: You should know that when you caught me, I was already dead. I'll never make it. Adding on all my guns, I probably deserve to die several times over.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Junior Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: "These three guns were found in his trunk. These two pistols and the flash-bang are on him. Another was found at his wife's place."

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.speaker: Another police officer
movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Why kidnap? He should just go straight to Diaoyu Island.

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Team Member
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Why didn't he go straight to the Diaoyu Islands for the kidnapping

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Team Member with Hat
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "There are about two hundred bullets of various calibers"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Police Officer in Overcoat
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Check the guns

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Team Member
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "Five bullets in the magazine, one in the barrel, no bullets in the revolver"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Short-haired Policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "Nine bullets in the magazine, one in the barrel"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: White-gloved policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "AK magazine twenty-nine, one bullet in the barrel"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Honestly, you're pretty skilled. Who did you learn from?

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "Do you believe if I say I learned from Hollywood blockbusters?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Why didn't you say the Black Cat Sheriff then?

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Just a joke

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Detective Chief
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Alright, you're just wasting your own time now. It would be better for you to bring out the hostage, you should think it through.

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Hua, it seems like you can't get past Mr. Wu today. Let's focus on him. Did he cause any trouble on the road when you were arresting him?

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Your driving is really rough

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "Are you guys aiming at me?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Mr. Wu, you're really unlucky. We didn't intend to aim for you but you came out as a big star. If I don't aim for you, who should I aim for?

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: "How long did you drive?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.speaker: Zhang Hua

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: Tell me, how much do you want?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: How much money do you have?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: That card has a hundred thousand and some overdraft limit.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: I have another card where I live, with three million in it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: "You better not be joking," "Ask him, how much do I want from you."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: Ah, your price is lower than his, ah.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Your expectations, but you need to consider the actual situation. I'm like this now, do I really need to hide anything from you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "When did you say you became famous? Quite early, right?" "How many years have you said you’ve been watched by me?" "Ah, three million, do you expect me to believe that?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: That three million is the deposit for my next film. All my money is in Hong Kong.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "Can your family in Hong Kong wire the money over here?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "I don't mind, I don't mind, I’m just thinking on your behalf. It's not convenient to transfer money from abroad. Such matters take so long to process. Wouldn’t it be more practical to withdraw the cash?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Where is the high-end apartment that he rented? I've been there once.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Take me there.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Do you know how to shoot?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "I’ve never fired a real gun. The guns we use in films are all fake."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "Let me introduce this to you." "This gun is a replica of a Soviet military pistol from World War II."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: There are only two possibilities for why the two of us have seen your face. First, you never planned on letting us leave alive. Second is that you’re extremely confident. I hope it's the latter. I also hope you get the money quickly so we can safely leave.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Are you sure there’s no issue with the three million?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "Are you sure there’s no issue with letting us go after you get the money?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "If I let you two go, would you call the police?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: I promise

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Are you going to be able to keep peace of mind if the money’s gone?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: I accept it. Money can be re-earned. But you only have one life.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "Where do you live?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: It seems to be this place.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Are you sure

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: It's hard to say. I came to this area in his car during the day after paying the deposit for his new film. It’s not clear to see at night.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: A Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "A King"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Mr. Wu, I’m a big fan of yours and especially love your movies. But I’ve searched for you online and you’re already married.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "What’s this?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: Coke

movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1440_1620.text: "I don't drink it. If I drink it, I’m done for. I have diabetes with four pluses. Can I..."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Can I drink tap water?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: No tap water, only well water.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Then I also want to drink well water.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Go get some well water.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Don't look at my cards! Well water.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: He wants to drink well water, go get some.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Please clean it properly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Drinking well water in such cold weather.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: How are you? Are you okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: "I'm fine, I'm used to it." "How long have you had diabetes?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: "I was just kidding. If I had it, I wouldn't drink water recklessly, would I, Mr. Wu?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: My mom is also a big fan of yours. She particularly enjoys your acting.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Who the heck wouldn't like it? Here, ice-cold well water for you both. Don't get a stomachache.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: We've been circling for quite a while, sorry about that. His home must be around here.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Hey, to the left, to the left, this one looks familiar.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Is it this one?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: "It seems like it's not this one."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Mr. Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: I know many friends in the news media. How about we create some social buzz?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: We can't let the media know right now. Otherwise, the hostage will be in more danger.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Brother Cao, this is Xing Feng. I checked Mr. Wu's driving records; his place is verified to be not far from your current location.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Artificial
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: "Your current account balance in RMB is three million yuan. For further inquiries, press 1. To return to the previous menu, press 2."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: Can you let me win just once?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_1620_1800.text: No way, I'm relying on luck!

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Mm, ah, understood.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: 'Your boss said to add chains and locks, use all of these.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Younger brother
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: They are all locked up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: They are all locked up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Criminal Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: A call just went out ten minutes ago.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: What number?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Criminal Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: It should be the customer service of a bank.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Check the roadside surveillance again.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: The person on the phone
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Can you see the car plate?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: The plate is blocked.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Manager Zhang

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: What's the situation?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Just went to the victim's house but it was a wild goose chase. The main lead now is the suspect's vehicle which is still being screened. The modus operandi is the same - it can be combined with the Kong brothers' case for investigation.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Your old adversary.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: 'I've come across them twice.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Sit down and tell me about it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: The suspect is named Zhang Hua, who was just released from prison a little over a year ago. His accomplices are mainly prison friends he met during his sentence. They pulled off two incidents recently.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Second Brother Kong, right? We are police. Could you help us with the investigation? Can you cooperate with us, brother?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Second Brother Kong
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Okay, come.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Can you cooperate with us, brother?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Alright, let's do as you say. Ah, okay, okay.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Kong Laoda, I understand how you feel. But you can't rush this, you know we have to take it slow.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: 'Can you guarantee my brother will comes back alive?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: 'We have to cooperate on this.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: What kind of cooperation do you mean, you sound uncertain.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Can't you hear? They are here for the money, I can afford that money. You want a million, right? I'll give them two million. That's it, you guys don't have to deal with this anymore.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Zhang Hua asked the victim's brother, Kong Laoda, to put the ransom in a canvas bag. But that night, this Kong Laoda wasn't very cooperative with making the payment.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: This guy drives pretty fast. Has he noticed us and is trying to shake us off?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: 'Did everyone else get out of the car?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Can you tell me where you are?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Drive straight from the big bridge until you see a bicycle on your right, then stop. Just throw the money down from there.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Chao Zi go ahead and slow him down, don't let him be so hasty.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Chao Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Kong Laoda, put it down.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Who let you follow? Are you sick?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Chao Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Don't rush.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: At that time, in order to protect the hostage, we couldn't open fire at the scene, and the roadblocks set up along the way didn't stop him either.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Superior
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: It looks like this kid's escape route was carefully planned.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Hey

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Old Kong, the money has been received, thank you. But, let me tell you something. Your brother is too awesome. When I abducted him, I never intended to let him live. So, you prepare another million for me, and I will tell you where he is buried.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Jia
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Old Yu, Old Yu, someone is looking for you in the office, come over.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: I'll tell you where he is buried.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Yu Guohui
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: This is Hua Zi.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Hello, Mr. Wu. Little Dou, let me tell you, I didn't get your card.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Impossible

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Tell me, where's your card? Huh, where's the card? Huh, where did you put it? It's not in the room, there's no card. Think hard, did you put it under the bed? Or did you leave it with your girlfriend?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: None

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: 'Anyway, I don’t have the card.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: It's not possible.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Think hard, think about it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: No, no, it's right there, it's right there.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Are you sure, are you sure, huh, no more money?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: No more.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: You really are a good actor.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: It's a pity for you too.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: You've been a soldier, huh?

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: I have been. I was a soldier in the south, and then I went to Hong Kong.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: 'So you're telling me you've never fired a gun?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Is this to protect yourself or what

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Protect yourself, should I trust you, or should I not trust you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Is the money in the card right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: I haven't checked yet. Come on, let's record something. Come, say something.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Say what?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Just say that you're doing well, eating and drinking as you should, alright, I'll transfer that chain to you, start recording now.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: I'm here, why did that light flash?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: It flashed once

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Did it not record?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: No, it's recording.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Rewind it, rewind it and check. Not that one, that's fast forward. Not that one, let me see, I'll adjust it for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: What do you mean?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: What do you mean?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: What do you mean?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: "You think smashing it will stop me from recording? I'll use my phone instead."

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: What do you mean, didn't you say you'd let the person go once I paid? Why are you recording, what's the point? Is it meaningful?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Stop shouting

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: "What are you doing? You have more people and more guns, I'm not afraid of you, what's so great about you? If you have the guts, put it down"

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Shut up

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: We're all men, we need to talk about trust, I won't say whether you're right or wrong in this line of work, but you need to have credibility, right? Otherwise, can they obey you? Can they obey you? I've agreed to pay, if you play dirty, I won't respect you, I despise you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: How should I address you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Call me Huazi

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Huazi, the bank is about to open; who will go get the money?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Find a particularly reliable friend to handle this

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: It cannot be my friend

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Rest assured, I, Huazi, know the rules best.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: This Huazi has no rules; he can do anything.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: Kong Laoda, we are the police, freeze, police, freeze, freeze, there's a case that might involve you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Kong Laoda
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: Call the police, quick, call the cops!

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: That day I happened to be working on a case nearby with Cao Gang so we went together, we didn't catch up to them until almost out of the city.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: Cao Gang, how are things on your end?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: I'm on them, almost out of the city.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: After Zhang Hua ran away, this gang disbanded on the spot and individually went into hiding. After conducting some investigations, we finally managed to confirm the locations of several individuals.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Qiang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: It was that guy who told me to lure Kong Laoda out.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Gang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: Yes, it was Dongzi who asked me to call Kong Laoda out to hang out.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Gang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: I really don't know; I only know Dongzi.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: This Dongzi used to be a key player in the gang. After parting with Zhang Hua, we've been looking for him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.speaker: Mister Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: "I've got a problem and need your help late at night"

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: "Where are you"

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Quite far

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: How far is it, in the city, in the suburbs, or where, no, speak up, hello.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Stop questioning

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: The person who kidnapped me will call you, you help me withdraw money and give it to him, when you give him the money, make sure I'm still alive, and don't, call the police.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: And don't, call the police, what do you mean

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Don’t call the police means don’t call the police, could you stop being nervous

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: He's calling, you guys come over immediately, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Hello

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Mr. Wu trusts you that's why he called you, you must not harm him, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: During bank hours, I need to make a call there, without a reservation, I can't withdraw that much.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Policeman 1
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Huazi drove this car which is the most recently stolen one, I pulled up the scene surveillance, from the modus operandi, it seems like it was Bo who did this.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Policeman 2
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: I just sent Shengli to the bank, the scene condition has basically been figured out, we should prepare a plan first.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Just a few hours ago, I was bargaining with the boss, in the end, he was willing to pay me tens of millions to act during the Spring Festival. It never occurred to me that now someone wants to pay me millions to buy back my own life, it's all for money.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: You have money and I don’t, I never thought we would get tied up together

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: For the first time in my life, I'm wrapped in a blanket with another man overnight, huh.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: I've been there, my brother and I always slept together when we were young, whenever there's this, I feel it’s all over, I've landed in trouble.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: It's okay, you have a brother.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: It's okay, it's okay, let's share.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Huazi, it's too cold.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Policeman 3
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: The situation is like this, with you here, we'll depart.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Jia
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Alright, thank you for your hard work.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Policeman 4
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: Mr. Su, if you have any concerns about your personal safety, we can contact the other party for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: My relationship with Mr. Wu is not ordinary, we have been soldiers together. When he comes to me at this time, it means he treats me as a brother.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.speaker: Policeman 4
movie101_6991751088659497479_2520_2700.text: The other party will definitely contact you again, we will wait here with you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Wait

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Make do and bear with it. Maybe we'll be back tomorrow.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: You should get some sleep.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Are you going home for the New Year?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Going home is not an option for us. It's hard for people in our line of work to go home. But now that you mention it, I do miss my mom.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Are there any rules in your line of work?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Yes, money.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: The most important thing in kidnapping is to get the money, not to take someone's life. Back in the day, those old-time bandits, they...

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Back in the day is too far back. I can't understand ancient times.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Then let's talk about the present. There's someone in Hong Kong doing the same job as you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: I know who you're talking about, but to me, he's nothing.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: At least he has rules in this job.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Are you trying to say that you're afraid I'll go back on my word after you've paid me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: I have to believe in you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Actually, Mr. Wu, I really admire you. The people I've kidnapped are usually damn cowardly. Some of them aren't even human by the end of it, but you...

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Maybe it's because I served in the military.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Had a good sleep?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Wei Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: All right.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Get to work.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Hua left Mr. Wu's house and headed northeast out of the city.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Happy New Year, how old were you then?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Thirty-nine, I think it's thirty-nine.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: You don't look old at all!

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Thank you

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Oh dear, fates are different. Some are in the heavens, and some are on the ground.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: You don't need to complain so much, sometimes. It's not other people's problem, it's our own. I'm not just talking about you, I am selfish too, and...

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: What problem do you think I have?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: "You don't have a problem."

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Right.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: You think you don't have a problem.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: No problem at all. I spent nine years in prison. It was like a lifetime, and I finally got out.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Nine years is over, do something proper. Yes.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: What do you mean by proper? Tell me what's proper.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Find a job.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Work

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Right.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2700_2880.text: Work, be an actor.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Ah, I have no financial foundation, nor do I have an elder brother to support me, and without connections, ah, what do you think I can do, ah.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Ah, right, right, right, you are right, so kidnapping it is, kidnapping a bit better, right, ah.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Kidnapping is fine, hahaha, kidnapping is not the purpose.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Then what is the purpose?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Yes, are we leaving?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: The person unlocking
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: None of your business.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Others
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Hey, don't move, don't move.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Dawei
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Don't be nervous, don't be nervous, it's getting light, ah, don't hurt your eyes.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: It's okay, Mr. Wu, just cooperate a bit. Ah.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: "Mr. Su, put this on, this is the largest size bulletproof vest we have."

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Since I'm here, I wouldn't be afraid of dying. Besides, do you think it would fit me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: It does seem a little small.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Bank staff
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Hello, how can I help you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: I am Mr. Wu.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Bank staff
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: May I ask how I can assist you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Ah, I am in an emergency and need money.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: They're moving, they're moving.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Just help me withdraw all of it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Bank staff
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: How much would you like to withdraw?

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Three million

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Manager Lv
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Ah, hello Mr. Wu.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Manager Lv, ah, please do me a favor.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Manager Lv
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Today, we can let you withdraw one million at most.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: One million

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Detective
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: Heading northeast now, they should be close to Shunyi.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.speaker: Manager Lv
movie101_6991751088659497479_2880_3060.text: "We will help you withdraw the rest today."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Bank Staff
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Make a reservation, you can pick it up tomorrow.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Okay

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Alright, let's leave it at that.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Bank Staff
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'Is the person himself coming to pick it up?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: No, it's my friend

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: I need to urinate badly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Hold on, we'll be home soon.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Can I go now? I really can't hold it any longer, you know"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Hold on a bit, hold on a bit, hold on a bit, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "I need to pee, I'm so cold I don't know what to do"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Pull over and let him out, the superstar can't hold it any longer."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'What are you doing?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "What is this?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: A pole

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Turn around, I can't pee with you watching"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "How do you know I'm watching you?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'I can feel it'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Hua, how do we use the money?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'To buy guns'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Guns? Don't you already have some?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "It's not enough"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Okay, I'm good now"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Don't make it difficult for me. If you make any moves, the driver will die with you"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Old Su, wait for me at the bank later"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Okay

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Do you know which bank?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Understood, hello hello hello, is Mr. Wu with you?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: You talk to him

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Old Su

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Hello

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "It's okay now."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'You heard that, right?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "I want to talk to him for a bit"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Why waste words?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "What nonsense! If I'm cooperating with you, I need to know that person is safe"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Are you sitting next to a cop? You seem pretty confident"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: What cop? You better hurry up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: Old Su, ten o'clock, we'll meet at the bank.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "When I was fighting a war, he didn't even know where he was"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: 'What color was the car?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Tractor Driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Silver gray, those guys didn't look like good people"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Mr. Wu, do you really want to know what I'm going to do with those guns?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "Just say if you want to"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3060_3240.text: "When I was in prison, I met a cellmate. That guy used to work as a security guard for a gold vault before he went in. We got along quite well. Later, he gave me some useful tips."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: 'If the cops don't show up in three minutes, we're golden.' 'So kidnapping is just a trifle, too low-level.' 'You two gotta keep a secret for me.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Hua Zi, I've got a small request. I want an apple for peace of mind.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: There are apple trees all around, but you came at the wrong time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: 'If I haven’t sent a message by nine tonight, I might be in trouble.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Is it the tractor that reported the incident?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Chief
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: It's been confirmed. I’ve arranged for people to check around the suburbs.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Alright, I'll have Chao Ge make a run.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Chief
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Right now, we need to set the net and let him walk into it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: The suspect has agreed to meet at ten, the hostage may not be with him. When the suspect shows up, get out and apprehend him immediately. Sniper, be alert; if the suspect reaches for a weapon, injure him immediately. We need him alive.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Sniper
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: 'Received, understood.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Taxi driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: 'Your fare is fifty-two.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Keep the change.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Taxi driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Thanks! Here's your receipt.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: 'I want to see what becomes of this kid.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Hello?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: The person driving the car
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Arrive at the Upper East Mall lobby in fifteen minutes.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Jia
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: "Wu Ge, why did he tell us the plan to rob the gold vault? Do we know too much now?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: I think it’s not reliable. What he’s imagining is impossible.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Jia
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: You, you mean he's blowing smoke?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Hmm

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Damn, damn, hey hey hey hey hey, Mr. Wu, look, look, somebody posted online saying you were arrested by the police last night.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: How so?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Ah, they say your acting career is over, some say you solicited a prostitute, others claim you're involved in gang activities.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3240_3420.text: Honestly, I’d rather be caught by real cops, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I'm here, where are you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Go to the big pine tree in the middle of the lobby, I left something at the base for you, Don't be afraid, it's just an envelope.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "Hua Zi should not be here"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The man pointing at the computer
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: The target isn't at the scene, he's gone to the Fourth Ring Road.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "No, he's not here"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I remembered wrong. It's in the trash bin next to you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "What on earth do you want?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Detachment
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Adjust the surveillance of the south gate

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The policeman with glasses
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: After ten o'clock

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Detachment
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "Zoom in on this image"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Drive in the opposite direction from the suspected vehicle, look for any recently rented houses nearby.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Xing Feng's colleague
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: The car that Hua Zi took has been located. There's no surveillance where he got out, but someone saw him deliberately show the license plate when he changed cars. He should be heading into the city.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: the man wearing a black hat
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: This area only has about ten rental houses, and there is also a small courtyard overlooking the orchard.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: the local police in the car
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: How about you guys? Don't alert these houses first.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I'm exhausted

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Mr. Wu, for your sake, I ran more than two miles

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Didn't you drive?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Hua Zi said, don't touch the car during the day, hey, it's quite clean, no need to wash it, right, hehehe

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The man next to Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Go ahead and eat. Hua Zi asked us to buy it for you. Don't worry, we'll see you off when you leave.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: This is a hundred, there's been no call for so long, is my brother in danger

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Detachment
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: No problem, Mr. Su. They're likely to take the ransom at night.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Hey, have you withdrawn the money?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I have

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: What denominations?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: There are no five hundred yuan notes, only one hundred yuan notes

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I will call you in the evening

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Yellow-clothes policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "He's in the Third Ring Road. He's very close to us"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Green-clad police officer
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Looks like he's casing the place during the day and will take the money at night

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Yellow-clothes policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Let's put out more people to find this car.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Get up. I'm a cop. Look carefully. Sit up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: What's your name?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Stand still

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Kneel down

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: I just arranged for two cars for Dong Zi. I don't know anything else.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "Does Dong Zi have a phone?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Sometimes he does, sometimes he doesn't.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The plainclothes police who arrested Bo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Let's not play games. What are you inquiring about train fares for?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Yellow-clothes policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: "Dong Zi showed his face"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: Detachment
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: What

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.speaker: The man next to the yellow-clad policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: It seems like he's planning to run away.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Call Xing Feng and let's go right away.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Dong Zi

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Stop, police.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Passerby
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Blind Ya

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "Halt!"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Where's Hua Zi?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Dong Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: I don’t know. I really don’t know.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Another policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Be honest.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Dong Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: But let me tell you, Hua Zi always carries a hand grenade with him. He’s always ready to die with you guys. If you guys see him, just shoot.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Stop the nonsense.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Dong Zi wants us to kill Zhang Hua directly, so that there's no one to testify against him. He just confessed that Hua Zi is renting a farmhouse in the suburbs next to an orchard.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Orchard, what kind of orchard?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: He doesn’t know that.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: I need to call more people from other squads for this. We have to have enough manpower. The main force is looking for cars in the city, others should go check out the farmhouse.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: It's been so long and still no news. Make a call and ask.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Hua Zi changes his SIM card every time he makes a call, the police don’t know his number.
