movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Chao Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "You know quite a lot."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "He’s been through so many police performances, how can he not know."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "Have you watched any?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Have watched

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "How was his acting?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Not bad, I think you should take more roles as kidnappers if you get a chance.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Kidnapper, alright, if I get a chance, I’ll really use you as a reference for the role.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Then do you think I have a chance to become a big star?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: You have a chance, you have a chance.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Using the target's last known location as the center, within a radius of three kilometers.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police Officer 1
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: There’s no progress on my end. I haven’t found the target yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police 2
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: I'm looking around, haven't found anything yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police 3
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Near his mother's house, haven't found the target.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police Squad 6
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Squad 6 hasn't found the target.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police Squad 9
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Squad 9 hasn't made progress yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police Squad 3
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Squad 3 is still searching. Haven't found anything.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Where the heck is this grandson hiding?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: This punk is within our circle, everyone look closely, surely we can find him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: "I've checked over a dozen residential areas in this sector. How about I check the roads?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: There are a lot of our people on the road, just look around the residential areas. Listen to me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Okay then.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Have you eaten?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Not yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Got it, I'll be right there.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: This is Xing Feng, I've spotted the suspect's vehicle.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Chief
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Is there anyone in the car?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: No, but we didn't have prior knowledge of this kiln, and we're not clear on which building he lives in.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Chief
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Okay, our people will be there soon.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Do you want it, do you want it?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Hold on, I'm thinking.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Do you want it? Do you want it?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Brother Cang, after winning the money this hand, are you still going to gamble?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Brother Cang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: That's my life.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Which one should I play?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: I don't know this very well, I'm not familiar with it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Go with your gut, go with your gut, go with your gut.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: This one.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: A pair of kings

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: A bomb, huh, three, four, five, six, seven, huh, pairs of tens, huh.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: What's going on, what's going on

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: What kind of cards are those, how would I know about a bomb?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: "You don't know about a bomb? Didn't you once play the God of Gamblers? Is that appropriate?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: "Is it interesting to talk like that? I played a cop, did I arrest you, right?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Brother Cang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Shuffle

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Shuffle

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Hey Chao, where are you? Ah, okay, hurry up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Brother, that shot at Dong Zi today was fucking accurate.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: I thought you forgot, don't forget to treat me to a meal, huh?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Thank you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Alright, let's discuss the situation here.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: "Hua Zi is definitely going down to withdraw money today. There's only one exit from this community. We'll set an ambush in the courtyard and take him down directly when he comes out."

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: This environment is too complicated, too many people, and Hua Zi has a gun. More importantly, he has grenades.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Hey, Li branch

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: You have a better handle on the situation on-site. If there is danger to the public, do not engage inside the community.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: This neighborhood is not suitable for capture.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: "Can you stop putting this here every time?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: What

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Give it to me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Let go.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Such a mood killer.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Will you come back?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Come back

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: "When will you come back? In a while, a day, or half a month?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Don't play with the gun needlessly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Let me tell you, if I die, give birth to the child, and let him be with my mother, okay?

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: If you die, I won't give birth to your child.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: I'm not joking with you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Criminal police
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: The target is out. The target is out.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: He's in the car. He's in the car. Someone upstairs just waved goodbye to him. Seems like a woman.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: His car is moving, I'll follow now, you guys be on alert outside.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: The tricycle driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: I'm sorry, very sorry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Hurry up and go.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: The tricycle driver
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Alright.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Make sure to keep an eye on him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Don't worry, we'll get him today.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: This bastard is intentionally circling around. Xing Feng, stop following.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Alright, I'll head straight. Guo Zi, you take over.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Roger that.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: You don't need to first

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: You don't need to tell me the location first. I want to see my friend Mr. Wu.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: He's in my car. We'll exchange him for the money soon.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Just a couple more blocks, and his tire will be flat.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: I'm waiting at the next intersection.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: No problem.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: He's stalling on the phone, hasn't given me the address for the money yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: You're circling around so much

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: It's making me fucking dizzy, what for, of course, it's for my friend.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Man
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Guo Zi, turn right ahead, I'm following him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: I circled back. I'll wait at the number one car shop first.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: The man in the car
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: We have already passed the point just now. Turn right at the intersection ahead and it's the number one car shop.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: The money is right beside me, you know, I just want to hear my friend's voice.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: He's been knocked out by sleeping pills.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Mr. Su
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: You drugged him? I can wait for him to wake up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: I'm telling you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Man
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Go ahead and give him directions.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Passerby
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Buddy, your tire is flat.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: If you keep talking fucking nonsense, I'll slaughter him right now, believe it or not.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Passerby
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: The tire is blown.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Man
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: It's confirmed to be Zhang Hua, everyone get into positions as planned.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Captain General
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: This job is quite dangerous, tell everyone to be extra careful.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: older sister
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: How did you park the car like this? By parking here, do you still let people pass by?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: The man in the car
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Really fucking cool.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: He's getting out of the car.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: The repairman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Sir, do you need a car repair?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Tire, check the tire.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Guo Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: "Both his hands are in his pockets."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: The repairman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: I'll grab the tool.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Looks like it's punctured. Take a look.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Captain General, it's feasible now, shall we proceed?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Captain General
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Xing Feng, go ahead, proceed.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Brother Cao
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Xiao Feng, he has a gun and a grenade in his pocket. We can't give him a chance this time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Don't worry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Hey, Brother Cao, if anything unexpected happens to me later...

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Brother Cao
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Unexpected my foot, you just think about taking him down convincingly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Hey there, everybody follow the plan, okay? I'll control his hands, the rest of you pin him down, Brother Cao, take care of his grenade.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: A woman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Who is that woman? I'm asking you. Who is she?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: A man
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: My colleague, my colleague.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: A woman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: I insist on toppling it over, what colleague? Then why didn't you answer the phone? What's her name?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: A man
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: I told you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: A woman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: What's the name, I'm asking you who, why should I, don't touch me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: Police, don't move, let go, don't move.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.speaker: Brother Cao
movie101_6991751088659497479_4140_4320.text: This grandson

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Alright, I got it, I'm in position, I have two guns and a grenade on me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: This room, this room, this room.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Which event are you referring to?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: What's the last thing? Let's see if you know or not.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Sure, sure, who is it? Tell me a name, let's see if you know or not.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: The actor, do I need to spell it out?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Find it amusing, do you? Do you recognize this person?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: How do you know Mr. Wu?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: At first, I thought he was Chow Yun-fat.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Just hear me out, okay? If you're asking me now where he is I can't possibly tell you, can I? I really don't want anything to happen to Mr. Wu. Let me make a call and tell my people to withdraw first. Then I'll take you to Mr. Wu, how does that sound?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: They can run wherever they want, I can't really control that.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Manager Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: "You guys think you can run off this planet, what a joke."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Can you loosen the handcuffs a bit for me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: What on earth are you thinking?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: "How am I supposed to speak properly in this state?""Whoever catches me, I'll chat with them, right?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Property management
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Hello, we're from the property management. There's a water leak downstairs from your apartment, could you please open the door for us to check?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: There's no leak in our house. You should check other houses.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: SWAT
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Don't move, kneel down, kneel down, kneel down, embrace your head and kneel down, don't move.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Police 1
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: You better get back here quickly. Alright, Manager Zhang, this woman's name is Chen Chen, we didn't know about her situation before.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Police 2
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: This lady is probably his new girlfriend and they haven't been together for a long time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Police 1
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: She's feeling unwell so Liu Yun and the others sent her to the hospital.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Huazi, what do you think, ready to give it a last shot, is that it?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: I didn't think you'd actually pull it off. When you walked towards me, I thought you were a labourer.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Can you stop talking nonsense and say what you need to say?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: "I didn't expect you'd be a better actor than me."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: I'm telling you Huazi, if you want to talk one-on-one, then stop beating around the bush. Where are the hostages?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Can we start from the beginning?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Captain Li
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Speak

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: The noodle-cooking kidnapper
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Hey, Cang bro, the noodles are ready, come and have a hot bite, it's warm.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Are you sick? Just call out, isn't that enough?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Have a bite first.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: The noodle-cooking kidnapper
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Hua Ge said we should keep it down, yeah?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Hey, why are you so scared of answering the phone?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Are the dumplings good?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: So-so.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Not as good as the ones from home, right?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Not nearly as good as the ones my mom makes.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Have you thought it through? Can you talk now?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Not quite yet.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'How long are your guys going to wait?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: What's the rush? I'm the boss. What I say goes.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Don't even mention that you're the boss.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: What's wrong?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'You've got three million and only gave Dong Zi one hundred thousand. What were you thinking?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Who told you that?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Dong Zi blabbed.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'How I divide it is my own rule.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Your rule is to take care of your lover and wife but not your own brothers? That's not called a rule. That's called being unjust.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'What's unjust? It's my money and I have my own way of splitting it.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'How do you split it?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'However I want to split it, I shall split it, and after splitting, I need to keep some for myself.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Keep some for what?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Save some to buy guns and rent houses.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Rent houses for what?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: For holding hostages.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Take hostages for ransom

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Of course

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Got the ransom and then release the hostage?'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'How could I release them? I'd kill them.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Bury them.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Buried.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: And then plant what, peach trees, plum trees, or apricot trees on top?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Apple

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: What's wrong with any tree?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Captain Li
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Are there any apple trees around the vacant houses in your area?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: 'Have you ever thought about what we should do if Zhang Hua gets caught? I once played a cop in a show, and there was a line, 'Kidnapping carries at least a ten-year sentence.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: You, did you play a Hong Kong cop or a mainland cop?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Mainland's

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Mr. Wu, you're a good person. Let me put it this way, they haven't really watched your plays. I have, and I really think you're an excellent actor.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Thanks. Keep talking.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: My mind's a bit of a mess.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Just talk.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: No more talking, no more

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Keep enduring, no matter how much you endure, the result is the same.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "This Huazi says he wants to see his wife"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Which wife?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "The one in the courtyard today," he says this girl is pregnant and wants to give her a final explanation.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: The policeman sitting opposite Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Wanting to see his wife is definitely a cover; there must be another purpose behind this.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: I think we should follow his request first, regardless of his real intentions.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: The standing policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Does he still think his wife is at home?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "We haven't told him this yet", then looks at Victory and asks: "Victory, did you find anything at home?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Victory
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: A gun

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: You see

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: The police standing opposite
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: The person is better off in the hospital

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Another young policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "Is there enough time?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Victory
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Anyway, the hospital isn't far!

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: The standing policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Then we need to control the site well.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "Anyway, they shouldn't be allowed to meet alone"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: The old policeman sitting beside Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: No problem, let him go. He is creating opportunities for himself and also for us.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "You guys are quite bold, if you hadn't acted quickly, we would've been gone"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: You still reacted too slowly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: How dangerous, if I knew it would be like this, I would've shot myself

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Policeman
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: You want to die? That's boring, I still want to have a good chat with you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Righteous, huh, took quite a fall, didn't you?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: My waist is fine, I can handle this

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Just speak up, actually, thinking positively is not wrong, but, but

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Say it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "You might not have another chance to act in anything anymore"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: What, what are you saying

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: To be honest, whether we get the money or not, you can't leave here alive. This was all decided before Huazi kidnapped you. I have no control over it. I can only say, I'm sorry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Eat noodles

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Don't cry, don't cry, don't cry, don't cry, you must not cry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Listen to your Brother Wu, crying is useless.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Saying sorry is enough, you beat us already

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Don't speak

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Took the money too, ah, help, help me!

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "You're breaking the rules like this, you're breaking the rules"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Alright, alright, that's enough, that's enough, stop shouting, stop shouting, that's enough, shouting won't help, stop.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Did you guys get it wrong? Isn't Huazi, isn't he quite righteous?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: Righteous? He's a mad dog, he's not even righteous to me, how can he be to you? "Accept it," then turns and says: "Lock up".

movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.speaker: Xiaolei
movie101_6991751088659497479_4680_4860.text: "No survivors, this isn't your first time either."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: It's done. When I kidnapped him, I never planned for him to live. Just like this, prepare another million for me and I'll tell you where he buried him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Female Criminal Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Alright, thank you, doctor. You heard what the doctor said, right? Nothing's wrong. You'll have to go see your boyfriend in a bit.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: What's wrong with him?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Female Criminal Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: You cooperate with our work, okay? We won't make it difficult for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: I don't understand why you don't want to see your mom now, but you want to see her.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "What's the point of seeing my mom? What, tell her I'm about to die?" "If I were to die, the person who would suffer the most would be my mom."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Regretting it now?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "I regret it. The first thing I should've done when I got out was to finish her off."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: What do you mean?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "If I did that, then my mom wouldn't be sad if I died." "I would have no ties left." "This isn't the route to my wife's home."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: We took her to the hospital.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Why take her to the hospital?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: She's sick.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Your girlfriend will be down in a bit; just wait here for her.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Let me go up and see her.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Do you get to decide?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Whether I wait for her here or go up doesn't make any difference, does it?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Right, is that her? Look, she's coming now. Let's meet her here then.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Can we have some time alone?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "What are you thinking?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Can you give us some privacy?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "What do you need privacy for, Hua?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "I won't do anything."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: The girl is here, hurry up and meet her.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Wei Zi

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: This might be our last meeting, won't you hug me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "What’s happening?" "Why?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Can't you tell what's happened to me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: I'm asking you why.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: This might be our last meeting, won’t you kiss me?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Separate them.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: What are you doing?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Tell me your last name." "Tell me your last name."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: I’m dead.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Don't listen to him.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Chen Chen
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Don't lie to me.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Go back, it's cold outside."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: I’m dead.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: What are you hiding here?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Guess?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Hua, are you really asking for it? Get in the car and take off your pants to see what’s inside.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: The handcuff key was hidden at the bottom of the egg.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Hua, I’ve done everything I can for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: You guys are incredible.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Got any more tricks?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Can you speak now?

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: "Can I not speak? I regret it now."

movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.speaker: Wei Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_4860_5040.text: Get up, get up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: 'Bro, our last meal together.' 'Let's eat, we should fill up before we go.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: I don't eat meat. I'm a vegetarian.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: You didn't say earlier, so we didn't prepare accordingly.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: 'Open it up a bit, I want to see.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: It's nine o'clock now, whether Huazi comes or not, you both have to leave.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: No, don't cry. Brother will be with you all the way, huh.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: Scared. But because I see you, I really wanted to show you.' 'Your being alive is my hope, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: 'Actually, that sports car belongs to my girlfriend, my real girlfriend.' 'But I was afraid she would be in danger if I asked her to bring the money, so I shouldered it myself. I guess she doesn't even know I'm in trouble now.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: There's really no hope this time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5040_5220.text: No, we can hope that our last journey isn't

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Don't let it be so hard, right? Haven't you seen me in comedies? I'll perform for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Have you seen it, have you seen my concerts, huh?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Last time you had a concert, I couldn't get a ticket.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: I’ve dug the pit for you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Hua Zi said, after everything is done, plant that little apple tree.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Mr. Wu, you really like apples, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: "Applause rises amidst the cheers." "Tears have merged into smiles." "Joy delivered to you at the opening." "Loneliness kept for myself at the closing."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: "How much trial and how many tears," "To be able to stand here." "The pain of failure, the encouragement of success," "Who knows how many years it took." "Clown."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Hua Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: We should turn left ahead, getting on the highway would be faster.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Go straight for two more intersections, then turn left to take the shortcut.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.speaker: Hua Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5220_5400.text: Seems like you really know your way around.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: You told them to wait until nine, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: "But whether a kid will listen to me, I don't know. The first thing I was going to do after I get the money was to kill him."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: "Aren't you afraid Hua won't come back after he gets the money?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: I am not afraid to tell you, even if he comes back, I will kill him first when we split the money.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Cang, you're overthinking this.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Maybe I will kill him first.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: The drama of your infighting should be very exciting. Too bad I won't be able to see it.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Pack up and get ready to go.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: It's not nine yet, Hua said nine.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: "So, what he says is the final word, right?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: He's the boss, who else should we listen to?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: So what I said doesn't count?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Don't fight, don't fight, it's just two minutes, let's not spoil the mood.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: This place looks familiar, right? Tell me, how many people are in the house?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Your call was too timely.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Chief Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: How did you determine this position?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Li Jiehui
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: The tractor driver reported a large area during the day, Dongzi reduced the scope.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Chief Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: The information given by Zhang Hua is quite crucial.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: We investigated the three courtyards that match the criteria of an apple orchard. Currently, the target is locked on the one halfway up the hill. Our current location, the resort, is about 300 meters away from the target.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Chief Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: This courtyard is the only one that fits all criteria. The key is, we don't know what the situation inside is.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Hua just told us there are three people inside, five guns, three long and two short. The two hostages are tied up in the east room.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: He has no more chips, so he shouldn't be going in and out much. I'll go in first this time.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: I should go.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Chief Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Alright, stop arguing. Let's play it by ear.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: I say you listen, whether it's right or wrong doesn't matter. Is it worth it? You're a kidnapper, if caught, you'll be sentenced to ten years. If you kill the two of us, you'll be a murderer. Death penalty, is it worth it? You kill us, in the end you'll either be shot by the police, or by Hua. Is it worth it?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: I have a plan. If you can release the two of us, Hua will get one million. I will give you the remaining two million tomorrow, I promise. This is good for all of us.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5400_5580.text: Turn off all walkie talkies.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Jia
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: The safety of the hostages is paramount. Shoot the suspect as soon as they raise their gun. Everyone needs to stay safe as well.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: We should go through the woods for better cover.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Officer B
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: That is, the suspect said he wants to see the first person to go in.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Just a reminder, my brothers all have their guns loaded. First in, first dead. Headshot.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Alright, I got it. Thanks.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Bro, remember what you said, we must succeed.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Hurry up, hurry up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Fatty, what are you doing?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: "Hurry up, ignore him, and open it quickly."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: "He still has two million."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: "Don't hit him! Stop. Everyone calm down. It's just death."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Brother Cang, what are you doing?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: To avoid trouble later.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: It's not time yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Shut up.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Xiao Lei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Brother Hua said it's not time yet.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Put the gun down.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Let go, let go, let, let

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Hurry up, no more stalling. Together.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.speaker: Cang Zi
movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: Accept it, it's fate.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: "Mr. Wu, why haven't you said a word since we went in"

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: "Have you encountered many such scenes when filming"

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: The shooting is fake, this is real, it really happened, thank you, thank you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: President Cheng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: The flowers are for the Missus, don’t argue when you get home

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: Don't worry, I will treat her well.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Xiao Dou
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: Mr. Wu bro, this is my girlfriend.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.speaker: Xiao Dou's Girlfriend
movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: Thank you, thank you so much, really, I thank you

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: A new day has begun.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Cao Gang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: There won't be any new missions, right?

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Hey, Nuo, you're up so early. I'm sorry, dad's been really busy.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Male Radio Voice
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Hi, this is China's number one music station from China International Broadcasting Station. Hello everyone, I'm Matty.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Broadcasting female voice
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: I'm Ben.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Male Radio Voice
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Next, we have the latest news.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Broadcasting female voice
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Last night, the local police solved a kidnapping case, capturing a total of five suspects and successfully rescuing two hostages.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Male Radio Voice
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: 'Okay, this is very good news. It is reported that one of the hostages is a famous movie star. Our station will provide further reports on the case.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: TV station
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: 'The Beijing No.2 Intermediate People's Court made the final judgment on the 223 kidnapping case.' 'For crimes of kidnapping and intentional homicide,' 'illegal trading of firearms and ammunition,' 'sentencing Zhang Hua and two others to death,' 'and the rest of the accomplices were sentenced to life imprisonment and fixed-term imprisonment.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Police
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Control your emotions, don't get too excited.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Mom, I'm at peace now, no need to worry.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Son, it's my fault for not teaching you well.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Alright, take care of your health while I'm not around.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: In the next life, don't do such things again.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Let's just end it in this life. I'll be filial to you in the next.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Son, oh my son.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: 'Let this be my bow to you.'

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mother Zhang
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: Son

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Xing Feng
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: I told him it wasn't necessary to come, but he insisted on seeing you.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: I really don't know why, but truly I wanted to see you again.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: This is the last chat.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: It should be.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Hua
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: What should we talk about? Educate me, let off some steam.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.speaker: Mr. Wu
movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: 'Before coming, I really had a lot to say to you.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Yuan Xiaowen
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: "I think something big is going to happen."

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: Is there anything I don't know?

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: Forward all information to South Korea's Blue House. And, get to the airport immediately.

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: "There are nine people here right now. I will count to nine. If no one opens the isolation door by then, I will kill you all." "One." "Two."

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Staff Member A
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: "You are in the wrong place. What you want is not here."

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: "Don't play this game with me. Now there are seven left. I will only count to seven." "One. Two."

movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.speaker: Staff B
movie101_6969128872847770149_240_420.text: "Don't kill me! I know where it is."

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: The man next to the parking spot
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Park Yuzhe, if we wait any longer, we won't make it.

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: The man in the suit
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: It's time. Can we start the banquet?

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: Yun Hee-sun
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Husband, it's starting, go in quickly.

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Sorry, Mrs. Cui, the timing is tighter than we imagined.

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: Yun Hee-sun
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: You weren't invited to this banquet, you came uninvited. Do you understand manners?

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: Yun Hee-sun
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Before we got married, I already knew everything you sacrificed for the country. I was going to give this to you tomorrow. Remember to buy it back. Don't worry about us.

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: "Ming Jian, I leave him to you."

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: Professor, the police need you now.

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: Mr. Lee, our drill isn't over yet.

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: "Why are you looking for me? Honestly, Mr. Lee, I don't really like working with government agencies. Everything you do is classified. I know nothing. How can I collaborate with you? Right?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: The National Intelligence Service of Korea suspects their number one wanted man, a man nicknamed 'Equator', along with his assistant courier, successfully stole raw material spheres and handheld devices from both Koreas. UK MI6 intercepted reliable information that the weapon will be handed over in Hong Kong. Korean experts are on their way to Hong Kong. So far, I know what you know.

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: When you're asked to work, you have the right to know. You are a physics professor, not Snowden.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Director Cui, thank you for being willing to help out this time too.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: We're still waiting for one more person.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Kim Hae-sook
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Cui Minho Director, you have worked hard this time, I heard your son is having his first birthday feast today, I've already sent someone to deliver a congratulatory gift to your home.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Kim Hae-sook
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: I've reviewed your records, and to be honest, I need to apologize on behalf of my father to your family, Cui Minho, the nation owes you a lot.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: "I don't know what to say to that."

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Kim Hae-sook
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Park Yuzhe is our agency's best operative; he will ensure your complete safety. By working together, we will ensure a safe return for everyone. I entrust the safety of this country, as well as that of Northeast Asia, to you all.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: We will certainly do our best.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Chief Li, please place your cell phone and personal belongings here.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: "This is Inspector General Wang Jian-zhong, aside from me, he will coordinate the operations of the crisis team entirely."

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.speaker: Wang Jian-zhong
movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Ladies and gentlemen present, these underground buyers are very cunning, but we have identified two locations, and the Criminal Intelligence Division

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Officer Wang
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Before we depart, let's first listen to the Hospital Authority's assessment.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Hospital Authority personnel
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Officer Wang, based on your initial risk assessment, our healthcare system may not withstand the strain, but let's do our best anyway.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: The Customs Chief
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Our customs documents are almost ready.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: The Director of Health Department
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Our fifty swimming pools under the Health Department are also ready.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: The Fire Services Director
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: The Fire Services Department does not have enough bio-chemical protection equipment or staff, in the event of an incident, it will depend on how many people the Police Force can allocate to us, it's the same old story.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: You saw it when you came to me, it's only getting worse.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Hello everyone, I am the consultant of the crisis management team this time, Professor Zhao Zhiren.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: According to the documents, it is very appropriate for everyone to treat this matter with the mentality comparable to the Daya Bay incident. DC8 is a handheld weapon developed unilaterally by the Korean side. Its power is unknown. I personally believe that this weapon is quite dangerous.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: "Since our friends in the Hong Kong Police are so confident in intercepting this transaction," "I'll offer my advice to everyone," "During the interception process," "do not let bullets touch it," "Nobody knows what will happen," "at least, it will affect its stability," "if the interception is successful," "it must be sent away immediately."

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: "Based on the safety of Hong Kong citizens as the guideline," "DC8 absolutely cannot stay in Hong Kong," "if it explodes, there's nothing to discuss," "even if it's just a leak," "with the current training and equipment in Hong Kong," "we are absolutely unable to cope," "if an accident happens," "when it comes to accountability," "I believe it won't be as simple as everyone here," "just saying that we've done our best," "then transferring to another department."

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: The person sitting across from Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: According to international conventions, Cui Minghao, as the director, you cannot possess the activation codes for the device at the same time.

movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.speaker: The person sitting across from Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_960_1140.text: Zhe Yu, you take care of one set, Another set, I've already transmitted to a National Intelligence Service officer stationed in Hong Kong, She is well-versed in Hong Kong affairs, Upon arrival, she will contact you proactively.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: Anti-terrorism Special Duty Squad Inspector, Fan Jiaming

movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: 'Based on intelligence from the UK and the US, and the Hong Kong police's investigation, we believe these buyers will be conducting a transaction in three hours.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.speaker: The man on the phone
movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: Fan Jiaming sir, we just received the latest intelligence. They've changed the transaction location to Jordan, Tak Hing Street.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.speaker: The officer summarizing the situation
movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: Li Jiangjun sir, we will be ready in ten minutes.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Yijun
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: 'I trust your reputation, so I didn't search you.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: You have your bodyguards, and I have mine.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Gangster boss
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: 'I don't trust you.' 'I don't like strangers.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: 'Isn't my reputation enough to reassure you?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Gangster boss
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: I want to see the goods first.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Gangster boss
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: Whoever can open the bag will get a ten percent transaction fee.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_1320_1500.text: When I sell something, there's only one rule: the highest bidder wins. Someone has offered a higher price than you.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: If you disregard the ethics of the martial arts world, we would not have come. Or, seemingly, the intelligence could be wrong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: younger brother
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Protect the boss, go and see what's happening, get the weapons.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: police officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Fall back, fall back, get down, get down, the enemy has assault rifles, they're heavily armed, requesting reinforcements, requesting reinforcements.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Commissioner Fan, please allow Yu Zhe to participate in the operation.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: You are observers, you have no law enforcement power in Hong Kong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Is this matter important? What should we do in case something goes wrong?

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Tan, keep a close watch on them.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Officer Tan
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Yes, Commissioner, you should not go any further.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: police officer
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: We have four people shot and injured, the firepower is so strong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.speaker: Squad Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_1500_1680.text: Get them out, Frankie, cover me.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1680_1860.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_1680_1860.text: Cover me at nine o'clock, let's go.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1860_2040.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_1860_2040.text: Director Cui, the weapon has fallen, the bag is shot, yes, it was hit.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Park Yong-cheol
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'The glasses are already connected to the NIS management officer's office,' 'We can start anytime.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: November 6th, 6:10 AM Hong Kong time, NIS Cui Minho, begin weapon program verification.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: The suspected portable weapon is placed inside a dark brown genuine leather briefcase. We need to separate the briefcase from the weapon, only then can we verify the authenticity of the weapon.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'You haven't been willing to assess its power because you've never seen this weapon.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'If something goes wrong with this weapon, simply put,' 'everything you see will disappear.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'This device's appearance is 90% similar to the DC8 prototype,' 'But it seems the suspected weapon hasn't been officially activated,' 'For safety considerations,' 'I suggest we connect with the suspected device to verify.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Shen Meijing
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: Wait, apart from an official connection, is there any other way to verify the authenticity of the weapon?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'Cui Minho, your NIS and our communications,' 'never mentioned that the verification process would activate the weapon.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: Li Yanming sir, if this is a counterfeit, connecting won't cause harm, conversely, if it's the lost portable weapon, I can use the activation program, to set the weapon to shutdown mode. In any case, it's safer than doing nothing.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: Mr. Cui, I agree with the Korean side verifying the weapon, the police escort convoy for the weapon is ready, once the procedure is finished, leave immediately.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: 'Confirming the portable weapon DC8,' 'We are entering the weapon activation program.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.text: Crisis team ready, initiate weapon escort program.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.text: Mr. Song, is it? You are making this very difficult.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.text: Yes, difficult. Those Korean experts have already confirmed that item. Why not let them take it?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2220_2400.text: This is not a lost and found issue. It's a matter of national security.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: You're asking me to leave my weapons in Hong Kong, how can I cooperate with you?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: "Mr. Li, some things, because of your level, I can't share more with you. Why? I've already said, this is within the realm of national security. We have always had many things that were difficult to discuss with the US, this you already know. I believe that things will change after this incident. The Korean experts have confirmed the device and locked it in safe mode, right? I hope you will take a good look, I do not want any more troubles."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: One of them
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: "This is 300 meters from the intelligence center and 500 meters from the surface" "It's the safest place in Hong Kong to place your country's weapons" "For now, we can only use radio communication"

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Korean Consul
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: What kind of nonsense is this? Why can't we directly transport the weapons out? Isn't this equivalent to detaining us?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Our Security Bureau recently communicated with your National Intelligence Service officer.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Korean Consul
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Don't twist the facts. Our National Intelligence Service never agreed for you to confiscate the weapons.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: A scar-faced person
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Mr. Korean Consul, we are just following the law

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Korean Consul
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Law? What law are you following?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: The Central People's Government is responsible for managing, Hong Kong SAR's foreign affairs, Hong Kong Basic Law, Article 13

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Korean Consul
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: "This is an international event, it should be handled by international law"

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: The person in uniform
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Mr. Korean Consul, please don't get agitated, we are also thinking of the bigger picture.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: The person next to him
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Immediately transporting them out isn't wrong, but based on the Basic Law, we are not wrong either.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Sorry everyone, I will say a few words.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Don't forget you are a Hong Konger

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
