movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: As a physics consultant, technically, we are now detaining an item confirmed safe solely by the South Korean side. Does everyone know how dangerous this is? Knowing it’s a weapon of mass destruction and still going to great lengths to keep it around? This is completely unreasonable unless for some reason. Otherwise, I cannot think of a reason why anyone would make such a foolish choice. It's not my first time working with civil servants, but this is the first time I have witnessed your so-called crisis team members, before and after this gentleman appeared, your attitudes could make a 180-degree change.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: "Professor, everyone, can we pause for a bit and listen to Song An's opinion?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: "When the diplomatic negotiations reach an appropriate stage, the weapon will be escorted out by the Hong Kong police, then handed over between your country's and our Ministry of Foreign Affairs. That's it."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Just like that, whose side are you really on?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Now is not a matter of taking sides.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: It's always a matter of taking sides, it just depends on whether you act in good conscience. Don't forget you are also a Hongkonger.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Nobody has ever contradicted you like this! Still upset, aren’t you?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: "No," "Mr. Li told me," "all crisis team members in Hong Kong," "must remain at the intelligence center" "until this matter is settled." "The first to leave are those irresponsible," "then comes some professor." "What kind of crisis team is this, it’s unreliable," "Totally unreliable."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Should we talk to this professor?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Receptionist
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Sir, how can I help you?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: "Mr. Lee; has an appointment with Martin Koc."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Martin Koc
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Why urgently seek me out, what's the matter?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: Don’t tell me you don't know about what happened in Tsim Sha Tsui last night.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2580_2760.text: A weapon of mass destruction was found, it’s now in the warehouse.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'Tell me what you know, no more, no less.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Tingku
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: The United States has been a market maker for decades, opposing other countries' weapon development, under the guise of maintaining international order, but in reality, it is all about their fundamental interests, If you don't give, someone else will want, where there's a buyer, there's a seller.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: We don't need your analysis of the situation, Do we have any means to contact them?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Tingku
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: All the weapons are with you guys now, why are you still looking for him?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: British and American intelligence are all over us, yet, Hong Kong is unusually quiet.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'If everyone is silent, there must be a problem.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Tingku
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'Do you know how many people around the world are watching the equator?' 'If there's any news, I'll keep you posted.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: Take off your shoes, sorry about that, never mind.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'Why not use them, of course, they should be used?' 'I've never been formally introduced,' 'Song An,' 'The 'Song' of the Song Dynasty, the 'An' of the saddle.' 'This is my assistant Yuan Xiaowen,'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: Thank you, good tea, truly refreshing. I knew the professor was busy before coming, but I didn't expect it to be this much. Nevertheless, I must implore the professor to keep a close watch on DC8. Its security is vitally important to our future actions.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'Li Yanming promised me unrestricted access to the intelligence center,' 'As for how often DC8 needs checking,' 'I don’t need you to tell me.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: Of course, needn't it be said? Although Hong Kong has always been the intelligence hub of the Far East, it has never been attacked, right?

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: 'I don’t want to see anything happen to Hong Kong, the professor feels the same, right?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: I choose to resolve this matter through diplomatic means

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: "First, we need to review why their security system is so fragile, second, we need these buyers to back off when they know it's tough, what do you think? Underground weapons trafficking is just one form of smuggling, but it definitely cannot be considered terrorism. However, we need to prevent it before it happens. If they want to do something bad in Hong Kong, I want to tell them, where is this? Hong Kong, a part of China, opposing Hong Kong means opposing China. Do you understand, professor?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: I think, when you came in just now, you should've seen my door full of slogans. I tell my students, they need to uphold a very important value: that is respect for individuals' freedom of speech. Mr. Song An, please have some tea. We can agree to disagree. I don't think your method is the only way to ensure the safety of Hong Kong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: "It seems that the professor is very suspicious""Is this what you mean""The relationship between the security of a single area""and the entire country's interests""If you can't grasp it well, you would end up in a car crash and casualties""My job is to protect your cars""Which is to protect the safety of the people of Hong Kong""Do you think this is what I mean"

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: Mr. Song An, I fear that your current way of handling things has not yet aligned with the outside world.

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: Is that so? In that case, Mr. Lee really did choose the right person.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "Do you feel any remorse for what you have done?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: If I were to run away, I wouldn't have agreed to meet.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: We had already completed the transaction.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: The weapons you want are now very safe.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: Right, in those damn cops' hands.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: Boss, we all know the risks of this line of work.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "We stole the core material and the implosion device separately" "Ensuring the weapon is operable is my responsibility."

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: DC8 is the smallest weapon in the world, breaking the limits of physics. Without being activated, what you've got is merely junk.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "Why not simply capture a tech person?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "In South Korea, there are fewer than five" "who know how to input the launch codes." "To activate the weapon, this is the only way."

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "Why didn't you discuss this with us beforehand?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: The most cunning strategy is when even those in charge are totally unaware until Mr. Song made things a bit complicated.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: Since debuting at the equator, I've never failed. I don't want any surprises.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Jin Taonian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: Aren't we all working for 'His Highness'? We assist you in obtaining what you desire, the power of a god.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.speaker: Foreign Leader
movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: "Don't let my brother's sacrifice be in vain,"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: "You've lost a lot, have you eaten?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Jin Tao Nian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: Of course not, are you okay recently?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: "So many godsons, only you remember to buy stomach medicine for mom, and you don't take my money?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Jin Tao Nian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: Pig's feet, the iron plate kind.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: I've always been aware of your movements, so I told my brothers not to go to Hong Kong this week unless it's necessary.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.speaker: Jin Tao Nian
movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: I have some stuff left at your place, right?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.speaker: Shen Meijing
movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.text: "If we can find the officer who killed the buyer, will you give me information about Equator?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.speaker: the man flipping the bread
movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.text: Let me give you some advice, don't turn Hong Kong into a battlefield, I don't care what methods you use, you must get the weapons out quickly, is that clear?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaowen
movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.text: All the information you asked me to find about Equator.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Xiaowen
movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.text: "This alias was given to him by the Japanese Imperial Household Agency," "Twelve years ago, there was a theft at the Tokyo Imperial Palace," "Someone successfully stole an ancient jade from the Emperor's three sacred treasures," "This jade is actually a red agate," "After leaving Japan, he began to get involved in the underground weapons market," "The US suspects that over the past decade," "He has orchestrated at least three major deals in Asia," "Each time he managed to escape successfully," "It is very likely that Hong Kong is one of his bases."

movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3480_3660.text: The adept defender keeps his enemies unaware of their attacks, the adept attacker

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: The enemy does not know where to defend.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: assistant
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: You mean...?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: 'Notify the weapons expert in Beijing to be on standby and ready to come to Hong Kong,'

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Woman
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: We obtained some information from the CIA about weapon usage on civilians in the Middle East. This is all the data.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Marty Khoo
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: 'Excuse me,'

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Woman
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Alright.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Marty Khoo
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Officer Li, a group is preparing arms in Macau, and their destination is Hong Kong.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: 'Sorry, I have some matters at my school. I need to call my secretary, Angela. Is that okay?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Hurry up and connect the call.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Mr. Fan, we've reached the basement. Do you copy?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Okay, go ahead.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: OK, we are now conducting the safety inspection procedure.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Fan Jiaming, I'm measuring a concentration of 1250 millisieverts. My assistant is in trouble. Notify the fire department and ambulance immediately. Do you hear me? Do you hear me?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: Tracy, notify the ambulance and fire department.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Tracy
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: is

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: 'Did you notify Director Cui and the others?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: They are all off the grid. It's reported to the main station, and they are looking for them.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: I have prepared a graphite box that can last for up to three hours. I’ve prepared an extra for you. When you find them, send the items immediately.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: 'This thing cannot leave,'

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: This weapon is constantly leaking. Do you not care about the lives of the people in Hong Kong?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3660_3840.text: My job is to ensure the safety of the people in Hong Kong. I've told you that before, have you forgotten?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Mr. Fan, I can't handle anything right now, I can't do anything.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Song An
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: The Beijing weapons expert is about to arrive, if the professor really doesn’t want to help us, I mean if, give us a little more time, we can take over.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Zhao Zhiren
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: I can't accept him, I can't work with him

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Sorry, we're closed for a break, please come back at six.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Are you tallying the restaurant's finances, or arms dealing? Haven't seen each other for what, over a decade?

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Back when you and your spouse first opened this restaurant, I didn't come to congratulate you.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Now you are the department head

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: I just know how to cook, you know that

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: Don't beat around the bush, be straight with me

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: It's not often you come by, have you eaten?, Let me make you something

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: The night before last, we encountered an underground arms deal, I think both the buyers and sellers were very anxious. My informant tells me, the buyers were still unwilling.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_3840_4020.text: "In Macau, an order was placed for a batch of arms", "Ready to go to war with our Hong Kong police", "In Macau, the only person who could get their hands on such a large cache of arms", "I thought about it", "and it could only be you"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: Officer Li, I really don't know what you're talking about.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: To put it simply, "Since I entered this restaurant" "Everything here no longer belongs to you" "Including your life." "What are we working so hard for?" "Isn't it just to make our family comfortable?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Sofia
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: If you dare to touch my granddaughter, I assure you that you won't die a good death.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: "Quietly come with me, I promise your family will be safe and sound."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Yijun
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: "They will escort Sophia back to Hong Kong. Once she's in the car, any mishaps in future underground trades will fall on her."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Yijun
movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: "That's the rule. Whether we believe it or not, others will. If she's willing to go with Li Yanming, she's given up her own life."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4200_4380.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_4200_4380.text: Shen Meijing, since we left the temple, you've been telling us to turn off our phones.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: We've been walking around all day. What's going on inside?

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Shen Meijing
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: 'Our DC8 has already alerted half the underground intelligence world in the UK, US, China, and the Middle East. Because the weapons were seized, he said that at least three groups would carry out terrorist attacks in Hong Kong unless we turn over the police officer who killed the Middle Eastern buyer the night before. He will then tell us where the Equator is.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: That's simple. Explain it clearly to Officer Fan. What's the issue with trading Officer Fan for information?

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: 'You're saying to betray a Hong Kong police officer, to trade Officer Fan for uncertain intel?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: Officer Fan is also a police officer. A cop's duty is to sacrifice themselves for the nation if needed. Were I in his position, I would also consider doing the same at all costs.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: 'This isn't a matter of life for life; it's about trust, integrity. How is what you're suggesting any different from what those criminals would do?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: 'If sacrificing one person can save many lives, don't you think it's worth it? Director, didn't you say we must retrieve the weapons even if it means using force? I've already mobilized many people. Why are you hesitating now?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: I told you to prepare just in case!

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: 'If that informant is reliable, the Equator passed right by us. Can we face the generals with this? How can you live with yourself?'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Shen Meijing
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: Wait a moment. Can I say something? Director Cui Minho, your decision is very immature.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: Please, keep your phones on, and quickly put on your simultaneous translators. Your weapons have been compromised. Everyone return to the intelligence center now.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.speaker: Man with glasses
movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: The Chinese weapon expert will arrive within thirty minutes.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.speaker: Make a call
movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: I'll upload a file to you later, after you see the breaking news, send the file to CTRU.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.speaker: Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: After the Hong Kong police confiscated DC8, I inspected it carefully, the bullet did not damage the inside, after our confirmation, the insulation program was activated, weapons will absolutely not be leaked.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.speaker: Cui Minghao
movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: The professor is helping us covertly.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.speaker: Fan Jiaming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: "Her blood has been sent for analysis, results will be out in eight hours, then we'll know if she is the missing flight attendant"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: How old are you, twenty-four, twenty-six

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: You can spend a lifetime in prison, or, help me find your boss.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: Don't talk about becoming a tainted witness or reducing your sentence. Just give him up, and I'll send you wherever you want to go.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "We are now at the scene in Happy Valley." "A bomb exploded at the racecourse twenty minutes ago." "About twenty people were injured." "The police bomb disposal unit is already on the scene." "As you can see, a large number of horse racing fans..."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Reporter
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: We just saw another explosion at the grandstand behind me.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Synthetic Human
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "This is just the beginning." "In one hour, bring my people and this weapon" "to Causeway Bay alone." "Otherwise, there will be greater casualties."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "If you need it" "As long as your Chief Executive extends an invitation" "Our garrison can be mobilized."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Li Yanming
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: Can't you see how out of control things are now?

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Man
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: I'm telling you, even before you realize how advanced things are, our war with Equator has already begun. If we compromise this time, he will turn Hong Kong into a true underground weapons trafficking center. Is that alright with you?

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Policewoman
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: Actually, I have another way. According to a reliable informant in Hong Kong, he will tell us the whereabouts of Equator, as long as we hand over the cop who killed the Middle Eastern buyer the night before last, that would be Officer Fan.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Policewoman
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "It was this informant who" "Told us the real location of the arms deal the night before last."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Officer Fan
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "I was the one who killed him."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.speaker: Policewoman
movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: "I don't really want the Hong Kong police to hand someone over."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.speaker: Cui Minho
movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.text: This, there's no hope, mission, we must complete, the mission.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.speaker: Park Yuzhe
movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.text: Advisor, advisor, pull yourself together. Advisor, pull yourself together. Pull yourself together.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.speaker: male assistant
movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.text: "Boss Song, I've seen everything, there's no Xiao Yuan."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: It's fine, maybe it was a wrong number.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Sister Dai Chen, I will introduce you to one of our hospital's doctors later.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: What are you doing? Where are we going?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Where are you going? The exit is not this way.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: "I told you not to talk, didn't you hear me?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Why are you being so aggressive? Where are you taking me? Let go of me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: "Why are you calling me? How do you have my number?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Can someone tell me what's going on? You're hurting me. Let go. Jiang Feng, you're scaring me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: "Can't you see she doesn't want to go with you? If you keep this up, I'll call the police."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Jiang Feng, stop, Jiang Feng, let go.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: I'm your husband. Why don't you trust me?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: "How can I trust you when you're acting like this?" "What's going on with that phone call earlier? What are you hiding from me?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Please leave, or I'll really call the police.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Security Guard
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Ladies, is this man bothering you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: This is my wife, it's our own family matter.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Security Guard
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: What's in your pocket? Take your hand out. Take it out.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: Officer Lei, when will Jiang Feng be released?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: What I say matters? Go home and wait for the news.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4680_4860.text: He definitely won't be released tonight.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: Ah, it won't be locked up for long. Better go home and rest early.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: "Sis Daichen, don't worry so much. Look, I'm not hurt. I won't report him, he'll definitely be out in a few days."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: "How about I accompany you to the flower market tomorrow to relax?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: "No need, there's too much happening at home, I'm not in the mood."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: You are out of control. This is very dangerous if it continues.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: 'There's no direct evidence proving she is the killer.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: Once my memory reload is complete, I will definitely find evidence she's the killer.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: 'By that time, I'm worried this memory will be permanently stuck in your head.' 'Is it worth it?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: Is letting the killer walk free worth it? Is living in fear with my wife forever worth it?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: "Jiang Feng, we can't create another monster just to catch one."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: 'Today, my wife looked at me as if I were a monster.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4860_5040.text: So, because I'm going to undergo memory surgery, I don't know what will happen afterward.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Don't know what it'll turn into later,' '"just keep one,' '"a record, a backup for sorrow,' '"this is the place,' '"where you first met Zhang Daichen.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Remember the wind was quite strong that day, it hurt my hand, then, she just stood there continuously watching me with a smile."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Real estate agent
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Are you two planning to pay in full or take a loan?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: Loan

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Real estate agent
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: Oh, then, may I ask about your professions?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: Novelist, he writes novels and I write travelogues, you've heard of 'Rainy Night,' right? He's the author.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Well, after writing for so many years, I've finally won this award. I'm very happy, and I want to thank my wife Zhang Daichen, all she has done for me over the years, without you there wouldn't be a me today, so this award is also yours. Thanks again to everyone, thank you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng's mother
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Chenchen, thank you for taking such good care of Jiang Feng."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Mom, you are too polite," "it's what I should do."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng's mother
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Mom is not pushing you, but this matter of having children, men can wait, women can't wait too long, if you don't have a child soon you'll be considered of advanced maternal age, which can be dangerous in the future, mom is not trying to scare you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Daichen, Louis mentioned their publishing house plans to publish travel literature next year, do you want to give it a try?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "I haven't written for many years, I can't write anymore, well then, I have a good friend named Ada, actually, she also writes in this genre, very eloquent, how about I introduce you to her?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Louis
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Sure, that's possible."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Don't rush, both of you,' '"it might be due to the woman's physique,' '"let's try a different medication."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Do you know, how many pills I eat each day, how many injections I take?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "You don't know, do you?,' '"because every day at this time, it's just me getting up alone to inject and take medicine.'"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "I know, I know."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "What do you know, after all, it's not you who suffers this way."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: "Then, let's not suffer through this anymore, shall we not want this anymore, okay?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5040_5220.text: After all these years, I still can't forget. Sigh, still not asleep?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: "Hey, do you remember the year Ada asked me to go to India with her?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: She wrote a book, look, you see, the best-selling book of the New Era series, best travelogue of the year by the Eastern Post, how impressive!

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: "Hey, why are you ignoring me?" "Am I disturbing your writing?" "But then again," "If you didn't write, how could we live in such a beautiful house?" "Everyone says I'm so lucky."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: You say, if I had written this book...

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: "Would I have written it worse than her?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: Let me ask you, if I hadn't married you back then, what do you think I'd be like now?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: The face isn't this fat, make it slimmer, there’s a mole here next to the face, this

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: I won't accompany you, these are your personal belongings, call anytime if there's any situation.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: Sister Daichen, why did you change your mind?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5220_5400.text: "Officer Shen called me this morning, saying Jiang Feng would be there in the afternoon."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: He'll be back, so, let's see if we can find some pretty flowers to decorate the house.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Sister Zhang Daichen

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: "Mmm"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: You know about the domestic violence case your husband is involved in, right?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: I think I’ve heard something about it

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: I was the one who called the police when Li Huilan was being abused. I really wanted to help her. But I could only respect her own wishes. I didn’t expect... When I saw her again... it was her corpse. So I told myself, if I’m going to save someone, I need to see it through. Even if it's beyond the scope of my work. As long as I can help, I will do it. Sister Zhang Daichen, please don’t blame me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Shanshan, honestly, my husband has been acting so strange recently, even I feel like I don’t know him anymore. But please trust me, he really is a good man.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Li Huilan also told me the same thing back then. Oh, sister Zhang Daichen, my old house is nearby. Will you come with me to get some things?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Sure, sure

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Let's go.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Let's go.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Come on, be careful.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Thank you, this is your family’s old house? It looks like it hasn't been lived in for a long time.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Sister Zhang Daichen, come to the back and see.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Ah, coming.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Staff member
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Mr. Jiang Feng, we can start now.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Let's go.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: long-haired woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: "It’s not scary anymore, right?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Do you dare to leave me?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5400_5580.text: Wait!

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Female Nurse
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Mr. Jiang, what's wrong with you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Sigh

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Jiang Feng what are you doing?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Officer Lei, no, one of the victims, is the killer's mother, what I saw is a memory from many years ago, the killer's childhood memory.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Okay, I'm going to call the master right away.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Hello, little Jiang Feng

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Hello, Dai Chen, where are you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Uh, I'm now at Shanshan Chen's place.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: "What are you doing there?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: She brought me to see their flower room

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Hey

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: The flower room, you quickly leave there

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Hello, hello

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: I'm bringing Jiang Feng to find you, okay, okay, I'm telling Jiang Feng now.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Sister Dai Chen, please believe me, I have my reasons for doing this.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Driver
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Sir, where are you going?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: man
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: You get off, this is my car

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Driver
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Sir, where are you going?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: My address is No.28, Haitang New Village, and I want

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Haitang New Village

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: No. 28, Haitang New Village

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Little Xiao Yun, your aunt will be here to pick you up soon, I've spoken to her, I will pick you up from school these few days, do you understand? By the way, I have a question for you, who was in your house that night?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Uncle

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Uncle
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Where is Han Qiang?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: He's not here

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Uncle
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: I ran out of money, I want to borrow from him

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: I can lend you first

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Uncle
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Good good good

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Xiao Yun, have you ever taken this car?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Oh

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: "Little Xiao Yun, can you tell me, who are you sheltering?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.speaker: Uncle
movie101_6992521335159292452_5580_5760.text: Lei Zi, where did this portrait come from?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: Little boy
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: "But I don't want to see him hit you again."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: mysterious woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: "You must not say such things again."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: Little boy
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: I'm sorry. I don't want to see him hitting you again.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: Dai Chen Jie. Dai Chen Jie, he's awake.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: Be careful, take it slow, take it slow, Xiao Feng.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: "Since I woke up, he has been standing outside all the time."

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: "Just by a whisker" "If he had fired the shot, it would have all been over" "Just by a whisker," "Actually, I don't want to drag you and the child into this" "I know how many medicines you took and injections you had in those years to conceive" "Now, finally" "We have been waiting for this moment".

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: Xiao Feng, Xiao Feng, Xiao Feng, are you alright?

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: Shan Shan, Shan Shan, Shan Shan

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: "According to my plan" "Chen Shan Shan would kill your wife" "you would grab my gun" "shoot Chen Shan Shan dead" "I would try to stop you and" "accidentally kill you" "You see this is the only way"

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: Shen Youqiang, if you want to kill him, kill me first.

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: "If your head is filled with my husband's memories, you will not pull the trigger"

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: "Do you think I really don't dare to shoot?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: "If I had not married you back then" "what do you think I would be like now?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: Actually, I know how much you have sacrificed for me, I did want children, too, I was truly scared of you suffering again.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Of course, having been there for five years, of course, you'll miss the fresh air.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Getting out of jail doesn't mean you're truly free.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Yes, same for both of us.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Keep a close watch on him.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Pretty smart. No need to tamper with the alarm. I guess you hacked into the wireless system directly before committing the crime and remotely turned off all the surveillance cameras.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: That's why you could wear this necklace. I hope we can cooperate.

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: man
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: To hell with you. You know I didn't do this. Do you have any evidence?

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Thank you. We found your fingerprints at the crime scene. Enough to put you behind bars.

movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.text: Loud and clear, communications are secure.

movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.text: Hurry to the lighthouse, what you need is there.

movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.speaker: crowd
movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.text: "Stop animal cruelty, Stop animal cruelty, Stop animal cruelty, Stop animal cruelty, Stop animal cruelty."

movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.text: What’s your take on our new partner?

movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_360_540.text: She should be arriving any moment.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Drinks on me. Good morning, anyone home?

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Good morning

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Hey, a warm welcome. Let me introduce you to the annual beauty thief, Ye Hong.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: 'You know me so well?' 'Calling me by name so familiarly,'

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Let's talk. We have time anyway. Do you have a boyfriend? Or are you married?

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: 'Are you here for work?' 'Or for a blind date?' 'Zhang Dan, I seriously doubt his professionalism.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Come on, you don't even know me.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Chen Xiao Bao, born in 1989 at Nguyen General Hospital in Kaohsiung. Your father was a newspaper seller. Passed away when you were twelve. You dropped out at sixteen. Then you met Zhang Dan. Been in the business since then. Legend has it you're a Virgo virgin. From the way you speak, unmistakable.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: 'Did you really think I wouldn't do my homework before coming?'

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Hey, if you did your homework, you'd know my reputation in the hacker world, alright?

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Only insecure people boast. Talk less, do more. Good boy.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Not bad.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Miss, dinner is served.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: The show starts now.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: crowd
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Stop animal cruelty, stop animal cruelty, stop animal cruelty.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Everyone get ready.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Two-hundred-thousand for the second time, the auction item was sold for 200,000 euros.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Next up is the highlight of this auction. Miss Tingting, please.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: With her unique, Wings of Destiny.

movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.speaker: Tingting
movie101_7026623602615452196_540_720.text: Thank you. I hope that through auctioning my personal collection, I can help establish the largest wildlife park in Europe, so many endangered animals can escape from their plight.

movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.text: "No need to check, he's a French officer specializing in international theft. Zhang Dan was looking for you."

movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.text: "Do you even have a plan B?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.text: Stick to the original plan. A cheetah can only chase one antelope. Lao Mo, come down and make an appearance.

movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.text: Xiao Bao, the fate of The Wing rests on you.

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Security guard
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: "How is it possible when we never left?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Guest
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: "How much longer do we have to wait?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: I am on my way, are you still inside?

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: Open the safe immediately, someone is inside stealing the Wings of Dreams.

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: Listen to me, this riot is just a smokescreen. Open the safe immediately.

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Security Captain
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: You need to share your internal information with us.

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: You're wasting time, open the safe.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Seal all the exits of the hotel, and block off the entire parking lot.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Wings of Command are secured. Let's regroup.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: No rush. Since Pierre has arrived, I want to play a bigger game. It's your turn, Lao Mo.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Lao Mo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Excuse me, be careful, I'm sorry.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Tingting
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: It's okay, it's okay, thank you."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: You're welcome. Hey, may I sit with you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Cannes has a lot of enthusiasts.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Actually, I'm a fan of yours.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Truly, I've seen all your movies.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: Hurry up, stop that car, quickly!

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: "Old man, not too shabby driving skills."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: "I finally know what your B plan is."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: That's good. We can drive slower now.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Lao Mo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: All the hotel surveillance footage has been deleted.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: Without piecing together 'GAIA', how do I find the person who wronged me?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Lao Mo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: Hmm, it seems you already have an answer in your heart. That is a cursed necklace.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Lao Mo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: "Are you sure you want to keep following King Kong?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: Seeing is believing. You're really too cool. Can you give me an autograph?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: Do you want an autograph or money?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: They say you're fair in the underworld. I just happen to be in need of a partner lately. Take me in.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: Didn't Old Gang tell you? This is my last time.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: I'll look for you when I come back.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1260_1440.text: The gift you gave is too fast. Want to give it a try?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Host
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: An accident has just occurred in the Contalon tunnel, involving a car collision that was caused by a vehicle chase. Reports claim that two thieves and an officer who was working alone on a mission were involved. As you can see behind me, fire trucks and ambulances have arrived at the scene, and it is currently unclear about any further details.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Superior
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: "Pierre, do you call this 'observing'? Sit down. Do you know why I'm the one sitting in this chair and not you?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Because you are better at currying favor.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Superior
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Maybe so. I'm no longer your partner; I'm your boss now. From today, you must cooperate and share information with everyone. Do you understand? What are you holding in your hand?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: A Chinese Baoding ball. It helps relieve stress. You should try it. I need to find someone for help.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: superior
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Alright, you can choose anyone here.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: I don't want an officer. I need a specialist, someone who can help me directly find Zhang Dan.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Superior
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Who said you could seek help from outsiders?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: You're the one who told me to cooperate.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Superior
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: I meant cooperate with the officers. If Zhang Dan slips away from you again, I won't be able to protect you. Understood?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: "These cracks are clearly not man-made. This case is not complicated at all. This is a nineteenth-century painting. There's a layer of rabbit-skin glue on its canvas. Rabbit skin is very sensitive to humidity, and now it's evident."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: A certain man
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Will the insurance company cover the compensation?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Unfortunately, the improper maintenance of humidity in the museum is a human error. I'm sorry, but the insurance will not cover the compensation. If you need a more thorough investigation, please contact us again.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: "Ms. Li, I am Officer Pierre Bissette."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: How can I help you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: "You have some special information related to a case I'm investigating. I hope you can assist."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: The only case I'm currently handling is Tingting's necklace. You're not here for that, are you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: Do you know this person?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: You already know the answer to that. Did he steal it?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1440_1620.text: "I believe you already know the answer to that question."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: "Am I a suspect?" "No." "We lost contact after he was arrested." "I didn't even know he got out."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: I understand the feeling of being betrayed.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: Save it. Don't give me that. You don't understand me at all.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: I know Zhang Dan used you to extract internal information and steal 'The Forest Eye'.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: So you want to use me as bait.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: "No one knows him better than you. I need your help."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: To me, Zhang Dan and you are both strangers. Good luck.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: If you change your mind, call me. Thanks.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: "How have you been recently? I've been doing fine."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: I have an additional condition. After everything ends, make sure Zhang Dan is locked up for life.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: "No problem, please tell me," "the whereabouts of the 'Spirit Spring.'"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.speaker: Anbo
movie101_7026623602615452196_1620_1800.text: Are you willing to go abroad?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: foreigner
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Good to see you back, Kong is waiting for you

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Uncle Gang

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: I've been waiting for you for a long time

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: I knew it, I won’t go wrong if I trust you, good, haha.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "What's this"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: It's just a pastime, so that you have something to do after retirement.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "Are you little Taiwan", "Are you still cooperating"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Uncle Gang

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: You've worked hard.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Before you have an accident, I know you wanted to quit the underworld, it's really helpless to ask you for help as soon as you come out, this check should've been given to you a few years ago.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Rest assured, it's very safe.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "It's a bit less, because I took out a little bit of money from it".

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "I made this."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "After you were in jail", "I was a lookout all the time", "I wanted to find out the person who was shipping the 'Eye of the Forest'", "and I found him". "It's this little guy".

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Is that a tongue?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: To

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: "So it was your doing according to the talk on the street"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: There are rules to be a thief, I don't kill, but I can ask someone else to, The money spent was worth it, I consider you as my son.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: Do you know who called the police?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: There are some people you can't guess, don’t guess randomly, want to know

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Maybe you don't really want to know.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: I want to know

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: It's your fiancée, Amber.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: "I have to accept it, can I make a big score before I retire?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Of course, there's a lot of value in combining 'GAIA'. It’s money you can't spend in several lifetimes. "Now we just need the 'Spring of Spirits'." "But this time you really need to think it through." "No more mistakes."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Carving these dolls, I learned something. Because we all start from little dolls. How they look affects the fate of all the dolls. It's really interesting. This is destiny.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Understood, tell me the plan.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Now that you have King Kong's check, wouldn't it be better to retire?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: How to say, greedy, love for money.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Money is useless when you're dead. Besides, do you really believe it was Amber who betrayed you? You were going to retire for her in the first place.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: She's a good person and I'm the bad guy. Can't lie for a lifetime.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Don't look, we're being followed. Split up.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Alright, see you in a bit.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Hand it over. "Forest's Eye", "Wing of Life", Tingting's necklace. Who knows what else you stole.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: So you too think I'm a thief, right?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: "If you're not a thief, why did you go to jail?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: You never gave me a chance to explain. It's been five years, you never came once.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: I don't want to hear your explanation.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Then why are you here?

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: Because I'm working with the police to catch you. This time, if you go in, you will never come out.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: "If they have evidence proving it was me, come and get me."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: 'This is quite clever. Should we inform King Kong to suspend the operation?'

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: We need to change the initial plan. I've decided to use Plan B now.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: Actually, it's not good for women to hold their urine. But I already considered that.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: 'This allows women to pee outdoors. You can stand and pee just like men. How about that? I can accompany you.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: A device that will allow her to pee standing up.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: No matter what method you use, you must infiltrate the castle and find the location of the 'Fountain of Soul'.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: "Is that it?" "This is your method?" "Not talking to him?" "How are we supposed to get the 'Fountain of Soul' like this?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: Hey, let's go. You wouldn’t understand what a woman thinks.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: Sir, is the 'Fountain of Soul' part of your collection?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: "I believe you’ve been targeted by a theft ring."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Can you be more old-fashioned? Don't you have any other lines?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: What's wrong? Is this red wine not good?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: It's not the wine's fault, it's this place.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Drinking wine cares a lot about mood. This place seems to be very good for everything, but lacks two things.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Not only do I understand wine, but I also understand life. Let me introduce myself. I'm Rocherli, this winery is mine.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: I've heard of your reputation. I produce wine review magazines. I'm Rose, a wine reviewer.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: So, my winery won't get any good reviews?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: "I'm gratified to meet you. I have to go first."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Now there's music and you're still missing a friend. Wanna make friends with me?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Then what if I ask you to do an exclusive interview for me? Would you agree?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "How did you know he would call?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: Then how do you know he won't call?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "I'd like to schedule a time with you for an exclusive interview."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: I'm not available. How about the day after tomorrow?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "Great. Let's talk in my office the day after tomorrow okay?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: I'll have my driver pick you up.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: Why did you hang up? Didn't he have more to say?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: I'm going to see how this face mask is doing.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: He really called, he really did call.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "Why are you so intent on catching him?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "He's a thief, I'm a cop." "Catching him is my duty." "That's it."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: I was just curious. Sorry if I made you uncomfortable earlier.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_2700_2880.text: "After Zhang Dan stole the 'Forest's Eye', I chased him through the streets of Paris by car. Just when I was about to catch him, a car hit mine. I was trapped inside, thinking I was done for."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: "You want to know why I want this thief so badly? Because he is the worst one yet. He has patience and integrity. If I can't catch him now, I fear I might never be able to.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Pierre
