movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: We'll follow her when she comes out.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: The video signal is being interfered with.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: Make sure you see everything clearly.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: You don't mind me recording, do you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: Okay, let's start the interview. When were you born?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: 1978, the 31st of this month is my birthday. I'm holding a birthday party and want to invite you.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: Perhaps, let's finish the interview first. How old were you when you first started drinking?

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: I don’t remember, but it was definitely expensive.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_2880_3060.text: So any expensive wine is good?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Not just wine, everything is like that.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: So money must be very important to you.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Of course

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Mr. Luo, I think everyone would want to know what your job really is.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Making money, no matter big or small, take this castle for instance, I rent part of it out for sightseeing tourism in addition to living in it myself.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Then what is the most valuable antique you own?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: "Have you ever heard of the 'Spring of Spirits'?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: I don't know, but since you brought it up, I have an idea, how about I help you take a picture with the 'Spring of Spirits'? This way, our visit content can be more enriched.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Now

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Yes.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Okay, follow me, come this way, this is a secret passage.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Wow, a must-have for the rich, I believe your security system here is different from others, right?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Of course, my security system is connected to the underground guard room, and there's a monitor inside, connected to my phone for me to check anytime.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Monitor
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Good morning, Mr. Law

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: "These are all my collections," "Among these collections, my favorite is this 'Spring of Spirits,'"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Wow, how beautiful, it looks quite valuable.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: "You don't know how many people out there want it," "that's why I have to give it the safest protection." "Buddy (Animal), is my most loyal security guard."

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: "We had a discussion before."

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Buddy (Animal) is quite obedient, just sometimes naughty, don't believe me? Call it.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Buddy

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Buddy (Animal)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Woof, woof

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: I think I'll take a picture first.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: "OK"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Okay, let's do it. Oh, I'm sorry, there's a glare, can we do something about the glass?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: No problem

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Wow, so advanced, okay, let's do it again, let's go for a triumphant vibe.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Hold on, hold on.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3060_3240.text: Ah, yes, alright, ah, it kind of has a 'returning in glory' feel.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Can I take some full-body shots?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Okay

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Higher

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Alright, feels a bit lofty

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Move a bit to the left, a bit more to the left.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: A bit more to the left

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: A bit more to the left, can you still see me?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Different angle, you know

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Tour guide
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: During the Nazi occupation of Czechoslovakia in World War II, they stationed in this castle, they built a secret passage inside, leading to an air-raid shelter. Nowadays, this air-raid shelter has been converted into a wine cellar.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: "She is out"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: That was way off!

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Hello, officer

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: "Looks like prison didn't teach you any lesson"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: I tried, I took an art class, I'm good at stealing paintings, not so good at painting.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Once a thief, always a thief

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Don't be nervous, I came to talk.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: I'm all ears

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Amber

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: That's your own problem. My duty is to arrest you.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: You dragged her into this mess, this is your responsibility

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: Return Tingting's necklace, don't let her get involved again.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Security guard
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: What's going on

movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_3240_3420.text: He still cares about you

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: You said you understand the feeling of being betrayed. Who betrayed you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: "Since when did you become interested in communicating with me?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: When I was young, I admired my father a lot. Everyone loved and respected him. He often went on long trips, always saying it was for work. Every time he came back, he brought me gifts. He said that when I grew up, he would take me traveling.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (Elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: When I was fourteen, one day the police barged into my house and seized everything.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (Elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: The gifts he gave me might have been stolen. It doesn't matter anymore.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: The police took everything, including him. He was locked up in a cell and left nothing behind.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (Elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: He died in prison. Zhang Dan and my dad are the same; they only ruin the lives of others. They don't just steal material things but also people's trust. But you probably don't need to hear all this. Why did you agree to help me?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: "One day, someone offers you an opportunity to resolve an issue you've always wanted to forget but couldn't. Then you should seize the opportunity and do what needs to be done. I just didn't expect it to be so difficult. Although I hate him a lot, I..."

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (elderly)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: You don't need to say it. I understand.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Pierre (Older)
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: Charlie is hosting a birthday ball at his castle. I have to go.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: I am going with you. I want to go.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: Hey, what's up with your fingerprint scanner?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: This scanner, it's hard to strap on, help me strap it on, hurry up.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: Ah, this operation could be dangerous.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: Just in case, I mean, just in case something happens, I won't come to rescue you, and you shouldn't come for me either. It's the ironclad rule set by Zhang Dan.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: These are surveillance cameras, the entire area around the castle within fifty meters is in clear view.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: The entire castle is under surveillance, it's hard to get in.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: "That's why we're not planning to enter from the ground level"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: Then how do we get in?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: It's not impossible to get in. We can enter from a winery next to the old castle.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: Will we suffocate if we crawl in there, the two of us?

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Lao Mo
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: I'll have Lao Mo act as the truck driver, claiming to replace the wine barrels as a pretext to get us in.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: "There's a tunnel exit inside the winery" "Entering from here takes you straight to the guard room underneath the castle" "Xiao Bao"

movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3600_3780.text: Once inside, I'll subdue the ones inside.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.text: Then turn off all the surveillance and complete reporting systems.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.text: Zhang Dan will enter the secret room from the observation tower.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.text: 'What about the responsibility of opening the secret room? You've already paved the way for us.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.text: Thank you. I know you have everything, so I didn't bring you a birthday gift.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3780_3960.text: Your presence is the best gift.

movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.text: 'That scared the hell out of me.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.text: It's a long story,' 'Quick, go inside.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.text: 'Do you see every woman as a gift?'

movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.speaker: Charlie
movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.text: 'Would you like to return home with me?' 'With the Spirit Spring?'

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: Alright, we can part ways now.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: I'm going to the restroom for a bit.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: The spider is on the move.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: man in a suit
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: It seems like there's no problem.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: Middle-aged uncle
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: Your treasures were stolen right under your nose.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: Cut the crap, if you don't leave now, you won't be able to.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: The tycoon's dog bit away our spider.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: There's not much time left, think of a solution quickly.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: Big Black Dog, I'm sorry, you forced my hand.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Bodyguard
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: Mr. Luo, that police officer is in a hurry to see you, saying it's an urgent situation.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: Handsome, your old friend is here again.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: Xiao Bao, we're out of time.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: "Weren't we supposed to follow the rules?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: So don't fall in love with me, go.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4500_4680.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_4500_4680.text: "You think I won't dare to try."

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: Don't mess around, think about it, Amber.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: You brought her just for this, you are smarter than I thought

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: No, I can't understand, you suddenly saved me and made me feel, maybe there's still a chance for us

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: 'Can I be with a thief?' 'A leopard can't change its spots'

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: I need to find the person who wronged me. Without GAIA, he won't show up. If he doesn't die, I won't have peace.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: I'm fine, but you're in trouble now. You're an accomplice.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: You go with them first. I'll follow soon.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: Listen to me, I need to talk to Uncle Gang. I'll come back and explain after I'm done, okay?

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: Zhang Dan, you wouldn't forget your uncle because of this woman, would you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: What you want is in my hand

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Did you bring the money for the goods?

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Amber
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: No, if you give it to him, you won't get another chance.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Ye Hong, what are you doing

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: "Don't betray me when you get in," "She is in my hands"

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Police
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Hands up, lay on the ground, immediately

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Go first, we have to find her.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Fat policeman
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Still refusing to cooperate and confess?

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.speaker: Pierre
movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Where is GAIA? I know it's in the hands of your chief King Kong.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: I know how to find him, without me, you won't be able to find him.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: 'I need to leave here first, rescue Amber, and then deal with King Kong. If we let King Kong escape this time, after he sells 'GAIA', we will never be able to find him again, never.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: The buyer has arrived, keep an eye on her.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: I'll go up. You stay here.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: "Xiao Bao"
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: "Hey, about Ye Hong, so what exactly is our plan now?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: "He saved my life. There are many things we just can't choose."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: The world speaks of balance. Everything has cause and effect. There's cause, then there's effect. There's me, then there's you.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: It's been five years. Haven't I given you enough?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: How can you use the word 'repay' with family? Then, how would you repay her?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: Great, everyone is here. A family reunion.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: Alright, I'll tell you. The matryoshka doll behind you, it's a remote bomb. The sensor is in 'GAIA'. Once our deal is done and 'GAIA' is one kilometer away, it will explode.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: This is the chance I'm giving you to 'repay' her for a lifetime.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: Guard here and don't let them play tricks. I'll call you when the deal is done. Wait for me downstairs, understand?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: White Bearded Old Man
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: "Your action in Jiekekeburg", "has attracted the attention of the police."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: Don't worry, the police can't find this place.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: White Bearded Old Man
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: Buyers from the Middle East are worried about problems and have cancelled the transaction, I was hard to find Mr. Yuliri from Ukraine to take over.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: Changing buyers temporarily, it's against the rules, isn't it?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: White Bearded Old Man
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: He's fine, Mr. Ultriko from Ukraine is very strong, he is willing to pay an extra 20 percent. You can rest assured about this.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Ultriko from Ukraine
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: "Do you know what this machine can do", "cutting the barrel of heavy artillery", "I used to work in a factory and am very good at operating this thing", "it can cut anything"

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: Mr. Ultriko from Ukraine
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: "Did you bring the goods I want", "take them out".

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: I used to be like you, regarded him as a father. Five years ago he betrayed me, it looks like it's your turn now.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: You don't need to tell me so much, all I care about is money.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: Then think about it, why did he keep you, do you think after the transaction, will he share with you, there is your doll inside, you don't believe me, now you kill me.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: Don't be nervous, it's my people handling domestic affairs.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "He killed her without a word."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: You're all incompetent, what's the use of keeping you here?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "What do you consider us to be?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "What do you consider me then?" "I raise a dog" "I throw something and it retrieves it for me" "You leave me for a bitch" "I have my rules for keeping a dog."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "These are your rules, not suitable for me."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Why don't they suit you?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Translate it for him.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: No need for translation.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Doesn't he have a younger brother?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Ignore what he said.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Did his younger brother mysteriously disappeared five years ago?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: You're still talking.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Five years ago, I helped him steal the 'Eye of the Forest'. On the way of escape, there was a boy from Eastern Europe who attacked me and stole the 'Eye of the Forest'. Then he was killed by him.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: So what's the problem?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: The problem is, his younger brother was that Eastern European guy. Did you know that?

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: He not only killed him, but also cut off his tongue.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: The tattoo on his tongue is identical to yours.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "I really didn't know that guy was your brother, ok?""He stole my stuff, killing him is only right""It's the rules of the jungle""You respect the rules, right?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "You are the one who doesn't respect the rules."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: The Eastern European guy was arranged by you, you also killed him.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: You're still talking.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "You shot me."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: Ye Hong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "This is the question I should be asking you, right?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: "Dare you to shoot, shoot then."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: Yurik
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: Remember what I just said? That machine can cut through anything.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: Spiders in position, three, two, one.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: 'Stop!' 'Stop!' 'Come out!' 'You two traitors, come out!' 'I'll kill you!' 'Hand over the "GAIA" to me!'

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: King Kong
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: Stop the car! Stop the car!

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: Zhang Dan
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: The old fox died because of his own greed.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.speaker: Xiao Bao
movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: 'Now the "GAIA" is gone,' 'I want to see how you'll get out of this.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Xia Luo, you're doing well.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: I was just wondering who was driving around here in circles.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Long time no see.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Little Brother-in-law, you little bastard!

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: "Everything I did today was for the one secretly hidden in my heart. Her name is Qiu Ya. She was famous in school, recognized as the school beauty, while I was even more famous as the school joke. But I just don't get it—why do such beautiful girls always end up marrying a pig in the end? I want to have a moment of brilliance on her most important day and then disappear forever, becoming the unattainable idol in her life. Although I'm not the protagonist today, I want to dress the most handsome. Unfortunately, I ended up wearing the same outfit as the Master of Ceremonies."

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Master of Ceremonies
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: This esteemed colleague, did you walk into the wrong room?

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Yuan Hua, can you improvise a poem for Xia Luo's outfit?

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Never mind.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Come on, come on, give us one!

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Alright, I'll try. A lone banquet guest, feathered outfit—all classmates, hence feathered attire.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Xia Luo, I was just joking. Don't take it to heart. It was purely for rhyme.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Classmates, how have you been?

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Old Wang, I heard you were expelled from school for accepting gifts, and yet you still had the face to come here.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Do you remember me? I won the winter marathon that year.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: First

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: That New Year's, my dad brought over a Sony radio for you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Zhang Yang, a teacher can never forget.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Mr. Wang, my dad sent a television, Yuan Hua.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Still as talented as ever.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Teacher, I gave you a calendar.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: The teacher can't remember that. I don't hold grudges. You all have changed so much.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Meng Te
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Mr. Wang, I'm Meng Te. I go by Meng Te Jiao now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Come, sit, sit.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Please, take a seat.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Old Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: "To be honest, the student I remember most from your class is that fool, Xia Luo. What is that idiot doing now?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Come here, fool! Tell the teacher what you're doing now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: The teacher speaks without thinking.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: No problem, no problem.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Classmates

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Congratulations, congratulations, congratulations!

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: A man
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: We're all classmates, how about we send a representative to say a few words, Xia Luo?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Classmates
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, be brave, be brave, be brave, make a confession.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Qiu Ya, when we were in school, I wrote you a poem; but before I could read it to you, I ate it. But that's okay, I wrote you a song, at this moment, I'll sing it for you, I want to mark our relationship with a perfect question mark. Mike, encouragement.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Once is enough, I want to watch the end of the world with you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: A classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Ma Dongmei

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Bridesmaid
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Why did she come dressed like this?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: A classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Yeah

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Xia Luo, didn't you tell me that you were going to sweep your mother's grave?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: What's wrong?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Ma Dongmei, why are you here so late? Xia Luo is drunk.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Qiu Ya, I didn't even know you were getting married. I just came dressed like this, sorry about that. Oh my, congratulations, congratulations, sir.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: This is my husband.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Oh dear, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, sir. Oh my, all the classmates are here, it's been so many years. Oh, Teacher Wang, you’re here too, you're still alive!

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Classmates
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Dongmei, Dongmei, Dongmei is here, have a seat quickly.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: No, I'm not sitting down, I still need to go with Xia Luo to her mother's grave. You know, all these good events happened on the same day. Xia Luo, let's go, let's go home.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: You go home first, I haven't finished my drink.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Your stomach is not good. Stop drinking, let's go home and drink. We have wine at home, let's go.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: I don't want to drink Royal Salute.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: You see, you've had a little to drink, isn't it just making the classmates laugh at you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Who the hell dares to laugh at me, Xia Luo?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: A man
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: No one's laughing at you, isn't that right? No one's laughing at Xia Luo at all, is that right? Go, go, go, go home, go home, go home, go home.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Xia Luo, drinking sometimes can have consequences. Hurry up and go home with Ma Dongmei.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: The last thing I fucking want to hear is you talking. Don't think I don't know, Qiu Ya’s first kiss was fucking taken by you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Let's go home.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Xia Luo, am I treating you too kindly?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: A classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Honey, let's not bother with them men.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Get out of my way. Qiu Ya is having a wedding here, and you're singing and dancing around, dressed like a feather duster. What are you showing off for?

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: I earned the money myself. I can wear whatever I want.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: You earned that money yourself? Do you feel proud, Xia Luo? From graduation to now, have you earned a single penny? For so many years, you've been lying at home all day, your limbs are practically atrophying from disuse.

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: My limbs are about to degenerate, I go out during the day to do cupping therapy for others, I ride a tricycle at night, I just thought I would save some money, If I change to a motorcycle, I could save some energy, But you're great, You took apart everything, You even disassembled my engine, Xia Luo, ah, When we got married, There were no ceremonies, Just on the day we got the certificate, You accompanied me to eat a meal of lamb spine, Now what are you trying to show here, Do you think what I am saying is too exaggerated, come on.

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Hold it in, hold it in for me

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Why? Because I have to return it after wearing it, oh dear.

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: At this moment, the last bit of dignity I had as a man is gone.

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: "I no longer have to bother about what others think of me" "I must thank my wife" "She made me a textbook fool"

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Perhaps, it's fate that my life, will always be a joke. I have never accomplished anything, and the more saddening fact is, I have no idea what I want.

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: You stop right there, where is your mother

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Didn't I ask you to bring your mother here

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: What on earth is going on

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Oh dear, God, hey, hey, Xia Luo.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Xia Luo, you've got amnesia?, "Got amnesia", "Xia Luo, what's that?", "What's your last name?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Xia Luo, let me tell you, don't pretend here, do you hear me, nobody’s got the time to waste on you here, you know that, go on, hurry up and find your mom, get out of here.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: This dream feels so real.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Xia Luo, did I tell you to go back to your seat? How do you manage to disregard the teacher's words as if they’re nothing?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: "No laughing allowed", "Are you even listening when I talk to you?", "What are you wearing, looking all slovenly?", "Where is your school uniform?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Who wears a school uniform to a wedding?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Whose wedding are you attending, your mom is getting married again, right? No laughing allowed.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: "Who are you glaring at", "Who do you think you are, a donkey?", "It's okay if your mom doesn't come", "Handle your own issues", "Read out this love letter of yours", "Loudly, with feeling", "My dear who", "Who's your dear?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Look at what you've done, invisibly, you've hurt how many, read it out, let the classmates listen, how our class’s second biggest fool is ridiculously foolish.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: You have the nerve to laugh, ranking first, are you proud?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: I told you to read, did you hear me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Hey, Nian, you dare to hit a teacher, you scoundrel.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: In my dreams, I could even let you bully me

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Classmates
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Let me tell you, you're done for, you have no future left.

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: "Let go of me", "Talking about future with me?", "You rank us every day", "'Biggest fool', 'Second biggest fool'", "So we have a future?", "Let me tell you", "Even if we turn out to be good-for-nothings", "It’s because you've pushed us to it"

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Ah

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Big dummy Da Chun, what are you planning to do?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: I don’t even know what I want to do

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Xia Luo, how could you hit a teacher?

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: "Who just hit me just now?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.speaker: female student
movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Stop fighting, Yuan Hua has gone to tell the principal

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: Wang, Teacher Wang, do you think my shoes look nice?

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: This student, if you have difficulties or issues, you can tell me. Don't harm female students.

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: I need to wake up from this dream, or else it will turn into a nightmare.

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: "Don't use self-harm to threaten the teacher. You are giving up on yourself."

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: I've had too much to drink, I can't wake up, fine, I'll stay with you a bit longer, Zhang Yang, give me the fire.

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: "I don't smoke; where would I get a lighter?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Director
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: What are you doing? Put out the fire!

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Xia Luo's mother
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: Are you crazy? Did you do all this? Principal, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. What do you want?

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: Mom, I miss you. Don't cry. I don't want to see you crying even in my dreams. I need to wake up, or else my clothes won't refund.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Wife, I dreamt of my mom.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Son, who are you calling your wife?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: 'You scared your Mom to death, can't believe you are still alive, can you?'

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: 'I can't believe you are still alive.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: From the current situation, there shouldn't be any major issues.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: What year is it now, and is the President of the United States still Obama?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Maybe you should consider transferring hospitals.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: If something happens to Xia Luo, I just can't go on living. Honestly, Xia Luo has been fatherless since he was little. Right after Xia Luo was born, Xia Luo's father disappeared.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Auntie, I can especially understand you. Our family is in the same situation. My father is Ma Dong; as soon as I was born, my father was gone, so they call me, Ma Dongmei.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Xia Luo is pretty badass, daring to hit a teacher.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Meng Te
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: I always said Xia Luo had a few screws loose. It's really frightening. I'll be avoiding him from now on.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: You don't need to. You've got a heavy yin aura; it'll counter him.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Meng Te
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: I hate it. I don't want to play with you boys. It drives me crazy.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Sha Chun, put out the cigarette.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: I have some thoughts about this.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "Hey, you shorty smoking next to the toilet, which class are you in? Get to the principal's office now."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: female classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Qiu Ya, cheer up. It's just a kiss.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Hey, listen up. If you have something to say, say it to my face. Stop gossiping behind my back all day.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "But seriously, isn't Xia Luo kind of dumb? He dared to hit the teacher for my sake. I warned him that I can't date right now because I need to focus on practicing the shot put. And what did he do? He jumped out of a window for me. When will Xia Luo finally grow up?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Another female classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "Dongmei, maybe I should tell you in detail what happened after you left."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: A male student
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Sorry, sorry. Hey, Losao, kick the ball back, please.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: I warn you, don't call me by that name irresponsibly.  My relationship with Xia Luo isn't set in stone. Ugh, here, catch this.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Since the founding of the school, or even since the establishment of New China, nothing this egregious has ever happened in the history of education. Therefore, the school has decided to expel him!

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: I said, hey, hey, what are you doing?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Xia Luo's mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: It's all for the sake of the child. Sorry, principal, please understand. Help! The principal is molesting me!

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Isn't this hooligan behavior?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Xia Luo's mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: How am I being a hooligan?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "There's no mother like this, totally devoid of manners!"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Xia Luo's mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "I can't face anyone anymore."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Alright, alright, let's just let Xia Luo write another self-criticism.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Xia Luo's mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Thank you, principal.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: "Hey, hey, hey, no recess exercise today. We need to hold an emergency meeting. Yesterday, there was a shocking incident where a student hit a teacher in the second class of the third grade. The culprit, Xia Luo, committed a grave offense and should be expelled. However, he recognized his mistake in time and repented by jumping from a window."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: Moreover, he helped a frightened classmate with CPR. Considering this, the school will record a major demerit for Xia Luo and ask him to self-critique in front of the entire school. Come on, Xia Luo, come to the front.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Hurry up, don't waste everyone's time.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: All the time, I was wasting my time, but I never thought that heaven gave me a chance to rebirth, so, I want to thank the sky, thank the earth.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: You should thank the school, thank the teachers, thank your class for the not high floor level.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: "I want to apologize to everyone today", Xia Luo turned around and spoke to Teacher Wang: "Teacher Wang" "From now on" "Our grudges will be settled", then he addressed Qiu Ya: "Finally, I want to say sorry to classmate Qiu Ya" "I not only wrote you a love letter" "I kissed you" "But I really thought it was a dream" "I will be responsible for you"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Alright, enough, that's it. Take the classmate with heat stroke to the medical room.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Students turn to page 142, question 3, this will definitely be on the exam, it wasn't on the last two years' exam, this year it is, fifteen points are up to you to study or not.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: "What's the matter, Zhang Yang" "You don't believe me, right"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: No

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Then I'm going to make a bet with you, we'll wager a bread machine.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: "I don't gamble, teacher"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: That's it, classmates, be the witness.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Report

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Go back

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Students, pay attention, let's continue with the bread machine topic, I mean, the bet topic

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Report

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: What's the matter, Xia Luo, do you want to add a pound?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: I want to change seats

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Xia Luo, let me tell you, our matter is not over yet, don't push your luck here.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Ma Dongmei keeps eating sunflower seeds in class, it affects my learning.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Does your studying need to be affected? Is there any room for decline?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: "Look, Teacher Wang," "I also want to study well," "Nobody wants to always lag behind in class, right?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Alright then, where do you want to move to?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: I'm fine with sitting at a desk with Qiu Ya.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Are you going there to study? I'm too shy to break it to you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Then why can Yuan Hua sit with Qiu Ya

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Can you compare with Yuan Hua? Yuan Hua is an excellent student and cadre every year. By the way, speaking of student Yuan Hua, I have to give special praise here. Just yesterday, student Yuan Hua, won the first prize in the district essay contest. The essay topic was "My District Chief Father". Applaud for encouragement.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Teacher Wang, is that a comparison of studies? That's showing off who has the more powerful dad.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: What are you worried about others? If you can't compare, just sit quietly there. Anyway, you'll always sleep wherever you sit.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Then I want to change a sleeping place

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Xia Luo, are you done? Is the school opened by your family? Do you think you are Principal? Sleep wherever you want.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.speaker: Principal
movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Teacher Wang

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Did Teacher Wang agree to it?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: If he doesn't agree, I'll beat him up once more.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Don't worry, I'll come back eventually.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Meng Te
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Dongmei, you can't tear us apart just to pursue your own happiness.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Ma Dongmei, you're the first girl since I started school, who has asked to sit beside me

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Qiu Ya, nothing much, I just seriously wanted to apologize to you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Qiu Ya, I wrote a song for you, I'll sing it for you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Just this once, I'll accompany you to see the desolate wilderness, laugh out loud on sunny days, make a fuss in the carefree air, do you know, the one thing I want

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Xia Luo, keep it down, the rest of us are still trying to study.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Qiu Ya, I have a problem I can't solve, can you take a look for me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: You sang pretty well just now, sing it for me again, will you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Why not sing it for me one more time?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Oh come on, stop it, wife

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Who are you calling wife? Shameless.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: I'm so regretful, I suddenly became a crybaby fool, no trace of the excellent model student and outstanding youth league committee member.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "I didn't expect" "that Sharlo would"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Don't mention him

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "Your hand is bleeding"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: I just touched your hand and you, but he touched your lips, No, No, No

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Laoshi
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Isn't this Yuan Hua fellow student, what's wrong?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "I can't solve this problem" "Can't solve it" "It's too difficult"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Yi
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Big sister, this is a mirror that has been sanctified by Mahayana Buddhism. It can remove all the bad things from your son. When he sees it, a little fear is a normal reaction, you don't have to worry.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Xia Luo's Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Thank you, little Wang, if this works, you will have helped me a great deal. You say my son as soon as he comes back, locks himself in his room, one moment crying, the next laughing, when he sees me, he even gives me a hug. Do you think his mind is broken?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Mom, I'm back

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Wang Yi, you were so beautiful when you were young. If you had stayed that beautiful, there's no way my uncle would have divorced you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Xia Luo's Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "What nonsense are you talking about"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Isn't it true, you're smoking again, how many times have I told you to quit smoking, don't you know how you're going to die?

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: What a piece of junk, it makes me look like a monkey.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: tape recorder
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: I stand at

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "These guys have been famous for years. What about Pu Shu?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: Pu Shu isn't famous yet, Xu Wei isn't famous yet either, I'm going to be famous.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "That laughter reminds me, of my flowers"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Wang Yi
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: The demon-revealing mirror worked

movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.speaker: Sharlo
movie101_6965768652251628068_1860_2040.text: "In every corner of my life" "quietly blooming for me" "I once thought I would forever" "Stay by her side" "Today we have parted" "In the vast sea of people"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.text: "Are you okay?" "These classes" "Don't worry" "Before I let a person be destroyed" "I must first make him swell" "I have arranged for someone to deal with him" "You just endure it" "Fortunately, he dares not blatantly do anything to you in school now."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.text: Qiu Ya are you there, Qiu Ya are you there, hello everyone, I am Xia Luo from class 2 of the third year, I have specifically created a song for you, I will sing it to you during the lunch break.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.text: "I once dreamed of walking around the world with a sword in hand" "to see the world's prosperity" "The young heart is always a bit reckless" "Now you have the world as your home" "The girl who once made you heartbroken" "Now she is quietly nowhere to be found" "Love always makes you eager yet feel troubled" "That once let you deeply hurt"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Ma Dongmei, Ma Dongmei, what are you doing? Put down the fan.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Ma Dongmei, how come you start acting up too, you tell me honestly, didn't the teacher take enough care of you, has the teacher ever taken anything from you, you know you are practically asking for it, don't you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Xia Luo, did you write those lyrics yourself? You're lucky to have a good Chinese teacher. Next week, there's a primary and middle school singing competition. If you don't place, don't come to see me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: The host
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: The first prize of this competition goes to the song 'I Donate Oil for My Country' performed by Li Zhenxing from the experimental primary school.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: "Xia Luo, the song 'Nunchaku' you created is really good""every time I sing, I'll bite my tongue""can you teach me."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Qiu Ya, what happened to your bike?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Xia Luo, did you do this?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: "You actually thought it was me""I saw you swallowing saliva during class""I guessed you must be thirsty""I went to buy you a soda at the convenience store before school was over""but all I could find were cold ones""I remember you can't drink cold ones these days."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: So I had to warm the soda on my chest. Now it's good, the soda isn't cold anymore, but my heart is freezer cold.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: I'm sorry, I must have misunderstood you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: I don't blame you! Who can blame me for not leaving a good impression before?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: It's not like that, I actually admire you very much, being old and ugly can never matter for a man, what matters the most is talent, moreover, you have... such a talent.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: Xia Luo, I just realized, the wheel you were selling just now must have belonged to this bike.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: "Well, I have to buy you a soda, and I didn't bring any money, so I had to dismantle your wheel to sell, But as a compensation, starting from today, I'll pick you up and drop you off at school, I'll be your personal driver, Look! I padded this little cushion for you."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Who the hell did this?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Hey, Qiu Ya, my bike's broken. Get on, I'll give you a ride home.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Thanks, Dongmei.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: No problem. Xia Luo, why do you have so many locks on this crappy bike? Who would even want to steal it?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Ma Dongmei, you annoying ugly!

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: "Xia Luo, how can you say that about Dongmei? I think Ma Dongmei looks better than Qiu Ya."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: "When did you go blind? You must like her, don’t you?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: I don't, I don't, I don't, no, no.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: "I don't believe it," Dachun, "The gender ratio in our country is severely imbalanced. In the future, tens of millions of men will remain bachelors here. Do you think you'll be one of them?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Of course I will be. Isn't that obvious? Xia Luo, what should I do?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Go chase Ma Dongmei. Just follow my earlier advice. Be persistent and relentless. If you don’t seize the opportunity at school, you'll be worse off in society.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: The college entrance exam is coming soon. What about my studies?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: "Is that something you should be worrying about? Dachun, let me tell you, you’re different from others. Don’t waste your time on studying. You definitely shouldn't go to college. Tell your mom, get her to take the money she saved for your college tuition and buy a house instead. Buy a house within the second ring road. Your mom will listen to you. No one argues with a fool."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Alright, it's settled. Hey, hey, Xia Luo, I got it! Xia Luo, Xia Luo, it's my, my first win! Xia Luo, I won!

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: hooligan
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: You're Xia Luo, right? Let's go.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: What do you want?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: hooligan
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Get out!

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Dachun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Fine, I'm leaving!

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: The leader
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: So, you're the fucking Xia Luo, huh? You're fucking cocky, aren't you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: I'm telling you, don't bully me. I'll jump off a building. My brain doesn’t work right!

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: The leader
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Who are you trying to scare? Acting like only your brain works, huh?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: A thug
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Don’t act cocky. You should find out who my big bro Chen Kai is.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Big bro Chen Kai.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: The leader
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Let me tell you, Qiu Ya is my sister-in-law. Stay away from her in the future, got it? Got it? Got it, got it, got it?! Did you fucking hear me? Got it, got it, got it?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Big bro.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: I will buy out this title of 'your brother'

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: What do you mean by giving me money?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Da Chun asked me to save you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Little sis, you are pretty strong.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: What are you doing here? Hurry up and leave.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo, are they bullying you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: This has nothing to do with you. Go.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Lil bro, do you know this little sis?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: "She's my neighbor, bro."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo, how can you hang out with these hooligans?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: The blonde guy
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Say that again.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Don't talk nonsense. This is my big brother. Hurry up and go, go, go.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: "How can you become like this?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: What have I become? Ma Dongmei, don't you understand human language? Stop pretending to know me. I'm telling you, I've always been like this. Get lost.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: "How can you talk to a girl like that, fucker? Don't be afraid, little sis. Are you holding a big toothpick to clean your brother's teeth?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Don't come any closer. Fat ass all greasy. Shameless. Phooey.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Where are you going?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Put me down, let go of me, let go of me, you hooligan, you hooligan.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Gangster No. 1
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Big brother, big brother

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Ah, Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: What are you doing?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Gangster No. 2
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Get lost.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Damnit, kill him.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Stop

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Hoodlum No. 3
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: I told you to get lost earlier, did you get lost? Huh?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Gangster No. 4
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Ah, Teacher Wang, show mercy, Teacher Wang, you've taught me before, Teacher Wang.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: You still remember what I taught you, huh? I only taught you this, what is this, what kind of hair is this?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, wait for me for a moment.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Thank you, Teacher Wang.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Teacher Wang
