movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Are you okay? If you're fine, hurry up and get home.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Teacher Wang, I didn't know you could fight like this. Why didn't you fight back that time?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Nonsense, I'm a teacher.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Actually, I think Teacher Wang is quite cool.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, wait for me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Can you stop following me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo, wait for me. Listen to me, Xia Luo. Xia Luo, wait.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Xia Luo, wait for me Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, tell me, do you like Qiu Ya or not

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Yes, I like Qiu Ya, the whole school knows, and I've made it clear to you, Ma Dongmei, there's no chance between us.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Then why did you still defend me just now

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: You misunderstood, that was because I couldn't stand them, it has nothing to do with you, don't flatter yourself.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Fine, just tell me you hate me now and I will disappear from your life forever.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: I

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Go ahead

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Ma Dongmei

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Go ahead

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: I don't hate you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: I said I don't hate you, hahahaha, stop following me, go home and eat.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: This is karma.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: classmate
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: "I wasn't laughing at you"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Have you seen Xia Luo?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Dongmei, do you know what Dongshi effect means?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Who is Dongshi, why does she have frequent urination?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Pretending to be innocent is exhausting.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: The chrysanthemums are wilted, the chrysanthemums are hurt, your smile is the most beautiful, the girl across from me, the youth radiating from your face, I want to share it with you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Qiu Ya, have you seen Ma Dongmei?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: "What do you want with me?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Da Chun remember, Ma Dongmei's favorite flower is the sunflower, her idol is Leslie Cheung, she hates sloppy men, never tuck your undershirt into your underwear.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Don't insult my idol, get lost.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: You think you could chase after me? A toad lusting after swan's flesh.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: 'Qiuya, haha, why did you run so fast, like an athlete, even lost your shoes.' While picking up the shoes, I remembered a fairy tale.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: 'Cinderella’s glass slipper.' Wow, it's rare, there’s no Ma Dongmei between us today.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: "Ma Dongmei is quite good, isn’t she?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: 'Give me a break, Ma Dongmei is just annoying, with that voice of hers, talking is like setting off fireworks, you're nothing like that, you’re like a nightingale. Oh yes, especially the way she walks, should I imitate her for you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Imitate, for sure, I have to show you how she walks, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, doesn’t it look like riding a pig? Let me show you another, her javelin throw stance, riding a pig throwing a javelin. Yo-ho.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: "Ma Dongmei, actually, you look quite pretty dressed like that."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: If there’s something to say, just speak, why do you have to get physical?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: a burly man
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: You are Xia Luo, aren't you?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: No, are you looking for someone with a birthmark here too?

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Burly Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Someone wants to see you, cut the crap.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: 'Hey, what are you doing, let him go, what are you doing? Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Taxi! Taxi! Please sir, I beg you, follow that car in front.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Driver
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: 'What's this about, just a traffic light gets my blood pumping.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Honestly, big brother, I just took a beating, let’s talk things out properly, shall we? Can we talk it through in a bit?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Let's try not to use our hands.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: "Aren't you Na Jie?" "You don't know how much I love your songs." "You are my only idol." "I always request your songs as soon as I enter a karaoke room."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Na Jie
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: I didn't expect that, young man. You're quite good at chatting. So here's the deal. I called you here today to discuss something with you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: What do you want to discuss with me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Na Jie
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: I've heard your songs. I think you have a lot of talent. So, I want to invite you to a duet. I want to invite you to perform on stage with me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Na Jie
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, what's wrong with you? Alright, alright.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Teacher Wang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Focus! Xia Luo attends rehearsals every day and doesn’t have to take the college entrance exam. But your minds can't drift away. The college entrance exam is your only way out.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Ba Shen
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Bro, his house is on the third floor. Xia Luo comes back at this time every day.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: Ba Shen, you keep a close watch.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: "Hey Winter Mei, what are you doing here?" "My brother is looking for Xia Luo today." "It's none of your business." "Go back."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: What do you want to do to Xia Luo?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.speaker: underling
movie101_6965768652251628068_3120_3300.text: "My boss wants to remove his tonsils."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Chen Kai, brother, are you short of money or something to do? If you're short of money, just tell me the amount, I’ll go back and gather it. If it's something to do, you can take my tonsils, as my tonsils are inflamed anyway.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "Are you sick, Ma Dongmei!"

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: As long as you let Xia Luo go, I'll do whatever you want.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Why don't you come with me to the grove, brother?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "Ma Dongmei, what are you doing, do you want to die?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Brother, brother, brother, are you okay, brother, brother, classmate, this has nothing to do with her, Ma Dongmei, get lost.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: What's the matter, huh? Why don't you go to the grove with me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Go

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Screw you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: subordinate
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Brother, Xia Luo is back.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "Brothers, grab your weapons."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Stop

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Is it true that if I agree to go to the grove with you, you'll let Xia Luo go?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chen Kai
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Absolutely.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "Ma Dongmei, you can't go to the grove with him!"

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "I’ll go with you."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Dongmei

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Sister Na
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Open your heart, shed the shyness of spring, whirl in dance, break the silence of winter.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: "Warmth with deep greetings, soft rain bathing, the thrilling moments of yesterday, yesterday, yesterday. You welcome me with a warm gaze, welcoming the joy, the joy I brought from yesterday."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.speaker: Chorus
movie101_6965768652251628068_3300_3480.text: Come on, come on, let's meet in '98, come on, come on, let's meet in '98.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: Xia Luo, when you see this letter, I am no longer in this city. I'm leaving tonight, going far away to pursue further studies, in sports. There are many things I want to say to you, but I don't know what to write when I pick up the pen.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: Long time no see, your image often appears in my mind, congratulations on your dream coming true, I don't know, if there will be another chance to play with you, the big star, take care.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: "Is this Qiu Ya?" "It's Yuan Hua," "I want to ask which university you applied to," "I want to apply to the same school as you."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: "Don't call me anymore," "I'm afraid Xia Luo might misunderstand."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: A woman
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: "New generation Mandarin music godfather," "Xia Luo, after 'Appointment 98'," "quickly rose to fame," "became the first Chinese male star on the cover of Time magazine," "personally organized," "a sensational large-scale Asian music talent show," "The Voice of China." However," "surprisingly," "yesterday at the recording site of The Voice," "something happened that shocked all the fans," "Let's look back at the scene."

movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.speaker: A woman
movie101_6965768652251628068_3480_3660.text: This is a contestant from Taiwan, who caused a sensation by covering Xia Luo's song 'Star Clearing,' But right after the performance ended,

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: The lyrics are superfluous, like gilding the lily. Still counting stars one, two, three, four in a line, do you think you're a snake gorging on food? I feel irritated just looking at you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: the assaulted singer
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: I really don't know why such a thing happened. I really like Xia Luo. I love every song of his. I create my own stuff, but I don't know why it feels as if I've been living in his shadow all along. I never thought he'd be like this.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Has he gone crazy? How could he do such a reckless thing?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Could Xia Luo be feeling down?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Don't think about such useless things. Hurry up and do PR for his image. Don't let the situation get worse. Get the negative comments down to the minimum.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Bro, is it okay not to pick up the phone?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: I want to take a break for a few days. Let's go, come have a drink with me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Sister-in-law, don't get me wrong, they're all mine.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Hello, Brother Hua, I’ve finished writing your song.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: I wrote it first for you. Listen, 'My hometown, lives in this village. I’m ,' I want you to be more grounded in the mainland. I know your Mandarin is not good, there’s also a Cantonese version. 'My hometown, lives in this village. I’m a native here.' Deal, let’s go for this song. Goodbye.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Xia Luo, you are a genius.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Qiu Ya, if one day I can’t write songs anymore, will you still love me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3660_3840.text: Brother Luo, Brother Luo, there’s a fishing boat behind us. It seems like they're attempting a scam.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: What a twist of fate, can you believe what happened to our Uncle Yuan Hua?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Stop looking. She is your sister-in-law now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Why are you still sneaking a peek?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Yuan Hua, I have always admired you. You were distinguished even in school days.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Could you write an impromptu poem about my current outfit?

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Let me try. 'Strutting cockerel, Soars higher than the phoenix.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Good, good literature! You have not lost your talent from those days. How about this, I'll invest in a magazine for you, I've already thought of a name. 'Men Need to Show off.' You will be the editor.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Let me tell you, I really regret it. I was so naive back then. Xia Luo, the truth is that I'm still haunted by the time Chen Kai insulted Winter Mei.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Maybe I talked too much, I thought you all knew.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: It's okay, Yuan Hua. I just want to get a simple understanding. Continue.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Actually, it's no big deal. Winter Mei agreed to go into the small woods with Chen Kai to protect you. I shouted myself hoarse, but I couldn't change her mind to protect you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Chen Kai's family had some influence, making Winter Mei's family compensate.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: It ended up costing Winter Mei's family a lot of money. I heard her mom even had to sell the house.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: "Do you know about this, Qiu Ya?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Yes, I'm aware of it. You were busy with the rehearsal for the Spring Festival Gala at that time, I didn't want to distract you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: "Do you know about this as well, Zhang Yang?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Bro, whether I know or not, I'm uncertain.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: It's all in the past now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Come on, let's all have a drink.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Yes, it's been so long since we've seen our old classmates. Come on, let me pour you a drink. To drinking, to drinking.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: To hell with drinking!

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Winter Mei ah, where are you now? We're not together anymore, and yet I still owe you such a big favor. Back when we were together, I never let you live a good life. The two of us crammed into a 40-square-meter little house. A 40-square-meter house.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Old Man, is it Winter Mei's family that lives in apartment 322 upstairs?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Old Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Ma Dong what?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Winter Mei

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Old Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: What about Dongmei?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Winter Mei ah

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Old Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Ma what Mei?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Alright, Old Man, you just keep cool.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Old Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Alright then.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Alright then

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: woman
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: "Have you earned a single cent since graduation? All you do is drink every day and laze around at home. You're wasting away."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: What do you know, this is my dream.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: woman
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: What dream?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Who are you looking for?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Is this Winter Mei's place? Sorry, looks like I've got the wrong door.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: If the money is gone, it can be earned again, but when a person is gone, everything is gone.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: You're Xia Luo.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: If you've been together for a long time, don't waste all that little passion on fighting. Go on, make a baby while the iron is hot!

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Let's make one, let's make one. I'll take your auspicious words!

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: I'll close the door for you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Man
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: "Let's have twins."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Who are you looking for?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Come in, superstar, you could've knocked or said something, let me tidy up this mess, our place is small, can't compare to your mansion.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: There are no degrees in homes.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Xia Luo, sit, sit down and talk.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: I, I, I see you on TV all the time. You, buddy, you're so popular right now, you're on every channel, you're on every channel, it's gotten to the point it's totally annoying.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: 'This is the brick I used to film Sister Na, I always keep it, now whenever I see her sing, I want to hit her with it.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: I gave up a long time ago. There was this one competition where I accidentally hit the referee with the javelin and was banned for life.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Good that you've given up, good that you've given up, constant practice would've given you thick arms.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Ah, I'm working as a team doctor in sports school now, and when I'm free, I give massages and cupping therapy to the athletes and all.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Oh, right, you haven't eaten, right? I'm boiling noodles in the pot, anise noodles, it's my unique skill. You must have never tried it. Let me serve you a bowl.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Hurry up and eat the noodles, they're glopping up, finish them and then you can tune your old piano.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: 'I'm sick of eating anise noodles every day, even my sweat smells like anise.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: 'Well, do you see me being sick of it?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: Here it comes, come on, hurry up, enjoy it while it's hot, Xia Luo, I always knew that you talk too much, just like when we were kids. Whenever my mother cooked, you'd certainly knock on the door, try it while it's hot, I do not know if you'll like the taste.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: What's wrong, not to your liking?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Oh my, eat slowly, no one is rushing you. I remember when we were kids, you took me to a Xinjiang village to eat kebabs. You ate in such a hurry that you threw up all over the naan bread.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Do you know to this day when I see that pizza, ugh, it makes me nauseous. Oh dear, did I disgust you with what I said?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Ma Dongmei, I once had a dream where we got married, but our life together wasn’t happy.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: I would drink heavily every day, angering you. Eventually, one day, you couldn't bear it any longer, and you said you wanted a divorce.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Stop joking around, you're a big star; I don't have such luck to marry you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: 'The two of us crammed into this forty square meter apartment, with water outages every Tuesday evening, power outages as soon as we use the microwave, and having to manually fill the toilet after each use.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Every winter when my stomach ailment acts up, you'd warm your hands and place them on my belly to soothe the pain.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Once, I fell into a well and chipped my front tooth, and you stayed by my side throughout.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: You were cracking sunflower seeds, which annoyed me until I realized that you were giving all the seeds to me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: To make me quit smoking, you hid all the lighters behind the heater. But later, the lighters exploded from the heat, and the water from the heater went everywhere.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: You were so scared you cried in my arms; that night, we were both as wet as drowned rats, cleaning up all night long.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4380_4560.text: Ma Dongmei, the first time you cooked for me, it was fennel cumin noodles. You said you loved the fragrance of the fennel.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: You mentioned the taste of fennel, which would allow me to recall your goodness when I get tired of you in the future.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Wife, I am back, The hat store downstairs was on sale, I bought many hats, Look, they are all my favorite colors.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Da Chun, look who's here.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Damn, Xia Luo, am I dreaming, I have to go in again, Ma Dongmei, I left my key in the room, hurry open the door.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Oh

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Xia Luo, good bro, I miss you, here, a hat for you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: "Keep it for yourself," "You and Dongmei," "When did you get married"

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: "I should thank you for this, Xia Luo," "Without you, how could I marry such a good wife as Ma Dongmei."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Then you should treat Ma Dongmei well.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Good

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: "I have to go now, as I have something else to do."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Hey Xia Luo, why are you leaving as soon as you got here

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Right Da Chun, didn't I tell you to buy a house, did you buy it

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Xia Luo said:"When it comes to house matters, I should thank you even more","My mom bought two houses near the second ring","Bought it when it was two thousand and seven","Just half a year later it went up to two thousand and nine","I let my mom sell the house","Made a lot of money","Then I saw that the house prices were going crazy,""I let my mom persuade our relatives to sell their houses","Rent a house","Wait until house prices drop to buy it back.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: "Don't contact relatives anymore in the future," "Try to avoid them if you can."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Xia Luo, come and visit when you have time.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Dongmei, do you still like Xia Luo

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: What are you talking about

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Everyone thinks I'm stupid, but I'm not stupid at all, hey you made fennel soup.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: Dashun

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Dashun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: I, Dashun, am not a stingy person. If the law allows it, I wouldn't even mind us three living together.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4560_4740.text: "Your uncle," "What are you thinking about"

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Zhang Yang, light it up for me.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: I declare my permanent retirement from the music industry.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Three years later, I'll certainly be on fire, isn't it? I'll tell you Winter Mei, I'll give back all the romance I owe you in due time.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: 'When the time comes, I want you to give me a house filled with sunflowers.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Understood. Sunflowers are good, symbolizing their eternal orientation towards the sun. Romantic like sunshine.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Winter Mei
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: No, the main thing is that they're edible.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Driver
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: What are you doing? It’s like trying to stop a car with your arm.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Driver
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Honey, I’m not sure how to tell you this. You know what a Ferrari is, right?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: radio
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: The next song we have for everyone is the latest single crafted especially for 'the King' by Xia Luo, called 'Settlement'.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Xia Luo, what are you doing here? Is this rickety truck yours? Why do you have a truckload of flowers?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4740_4920.text: Fans sent them. Got tired of driving small cars, so I'm playing around with a big truck now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: for fun

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: "A little money and you don't even know how to show off anymore."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Let's go have some fun. You pick the place, I'll pay.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Really?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Really? Can you drive?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: "Watch me."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Get in the car.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: I think I hit someone's car. Let's go quickly or we'll have to compensate.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Da Chun, I let you choose the place. Is this all you aspire to?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Stop talking and go buy tokens.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: I won! Xia Luo, Xia Luo, I won! Xia Luo, do you know? I've practiced this combo for years just to beat you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Can't you even accept losing? Don't be so petty, I'll catch a toy for you later.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: "Da Chun, I'm really jealous of you."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Hmm

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: "Living like a fool."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: What kind of talk is that? What's 'like'? I'm jealous of you too. Having everything you want.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: But my most beloved woman was taken by someone else.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Who, who dares to snatch Xia Luo's woman?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: That was my best buddy.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Damn, Xia Luo, Xia Luo, call him right now. If you're too embarrassed to talk, I'll curse him for you. Call now, I'll curse him for you.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Wait a moment, I need to take a call.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Hello

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Da Chun

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: I gave you everything. Can you give Dongmei back to me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Doctor, is Xia Luo okay?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Doctor, you must know who he is. It shouldn't affect his work, right?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Everyone, calm down first. We found HIV virus in Mr. Xia Luo's blood. Positive.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: That's good. As long as his brain is fine.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Wait a minute, did you just say HIV? Is that bird flu?

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: In layman's terms, it's what we commonly call AIDS.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Meng Te
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Qiu Ya, Qiu Ya, Qiu Ya, calm down, don't overthink. It's not certain yet.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Qiu Ya
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: "Xia Luo, you bastard!" "How could you do this?" "Quick, take me for a checkup."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.speaker: Yuan Hua
movie101_6965768652251628068_4920_5100.text: Check me too.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Da Chun
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Who did this, why does everyone bully me?

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Xia Luo's Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Luo'er, look at the state you're in now.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Xia Luo
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Mom, I'm a disappointing son, I can't take care of you in old age, while I'm young, find another one.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Xia Luo's Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: You don't have to worry about mom, Zhang Yang is a trustworthy person.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Luo'er, I've got it all figured out, from today on, we'll each mind our own, I'll call you 'bro', and you call me 'dad'.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: "What are you looking for bro" "Let dad help you look,"

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, be calm.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Xia Luo's Mom
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: Xia Luo, you cannot treat your Uncle Zhang Yang like this.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.speaker: Zhang Yang
movie101_6965768652251628068_5100_5280.text: The kid can't accept it for a moment.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Nurse
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: No, I don't have the authority.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: Hey, Doctor, could you please tell me how he is doing now?

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Nurse
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: The patient is not cooperating with the treatment. The situation is not very optimistic. It might be a matter of just a couple of days.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: Xia Luo, Xia Luo, I came to see you with Da Chun.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: Da Chun, now it's just me here to see you, Summer.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.speaker: Ma Dongmei
movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: Xia Luo, you know, relationships between people are quite funny. When we were kids, I liked sticking to you, playing house with you. I was the dad, and you were the mom. Later, you got together with Qiu Ya. That's when I realized I had fallen for you. And later, you became a big star, and I didn't dare to like you anymore. Over the years, you wrote so many songs. You know my favorite one was the one you wrote for Qiu Ya back then. I'll sing it to you now, 'Just once, I'll take you to see the wastelands grow old. Laugh heartily in the sunny days. Make a ruckus in the free air. Do you know, my only wish? The world is still small. I'll accompany you to the ends of the earth.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "Each bid is one hundred thousand Euros,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Ladies and Gentlemen, there are only four in the world.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Bodyguard
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Chinese Ambassador

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Chinese Ambassador
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: I'm honored to meet you, I'm sorry I'm late, I apologize.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: White-haired Elder
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Actually, we should apologize to you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "Look at the edge here,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: White-haired Elder
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "Due to the war many years ago," "My ancestors took something that didn't belong to them," "Every time I see the copper statue," "I feel deeply guilty," "It is the heritage of all mankind," "It should not only belong to one or two people," "So I donated it to a museum in China,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Sir, in my humble opinion, if everyone thought like you, the world would be a much better place.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: White-haired Elder
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: I wish you success, in finding the whereabouts of other copper statues.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "Eight million eight hundred thousand, deal."

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "Seven million"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Auctioneer2
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Deal

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: media
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Congratulations, Mr. Morgan, MP Company now owns the world's rarest four stamps.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: You're wrong, not four. Now, there's only one in the world.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Look at the news from all over the world about MP Company, The boss is back, This is the only one of this stamp, Its value can triple overnight.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: This is my father's idea.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: So talented

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: If you want valuable antiques, I can make them for you, next item.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with Red Bow Tie
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Percy called to question our oil painting 'Morning Light,'

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Question? They know nothing, "Buy it back at a slightly higher price, just like before," "Once a counterfeit is bought and sold a few times," "It slowly becomes real, right?" "Next item,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with Polka Dot Tie
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: The fifth zodiac bronze statue was auctioned very well, beyond our expectations.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: In this auction season, all buyers are businessmen and they are very patriotic.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Therefore, these businessmen are willing to pay whatever it takes to buy back their country's cultural relics, aren't they? Their patriotic sentiment can earn us profits.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: So talented.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: These Zodiac bronzes, each sells higher than the last, how can I find them, give me some names.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man in Black Suit
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Let's look for Nine-Headed Bird.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Shouldn't we look for a local instead?

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: How about JC?

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "He hasn't found the oil painting 'Rose' yet,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: "'Rose', forget 'Rose', "Tell JC," "If he can help me find the rest of the bronzes," "I will reward him handsomely,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: As long as the price is right, JC can find anything.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Mr. Morgan's father
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Then tell him it's one million euros per bronze head, if he can find the Dragon's bronze head, I will add a zero.

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.speaker: Man with a hat
movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: So talented.

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: May I use the restroom for a moment?

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Soldier
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Bonnie huh? Please, go ahead. Right this way.

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: President's Son
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Dad, that's awesome! You know it's the Year of the Dragon, we're going to make a fortune!

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: President
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Go on, go chase your girls.

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: President's Son
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: The task of finding JC is yours.

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: President's Son
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: By the way, where is he now?

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Employee
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: What's happening? What's going on? What’s the matter?

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Employee
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: What's that? Someone's coming in. What just happened? Stop him, stop him!

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Soldier
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Stop, or we will shoot! Catch him!

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.speaker: Soldier
movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Someone has invaded, seal all passages!

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: Soldier
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: 'I can't see him. Is he faster than our car?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: The soldiers blocking the way in front
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: "I can only see our car, I can't see anything else."

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: The soldier in the car
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: Where is he, didn't you stop him?

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: The soldiers blocking the way in front
Zong Sheng
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: "JC, It's Zong Sheng. Have you found the 'Rose'?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: Zong Sheng
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: I have a new business for you, are you interested?

movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.speaker: Zong Sheng
movie101_6966492004553490981_480_660.text: 'Zodiac heads from the Old Summer Palace, have you heard of them?

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Research Assistant Girl
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "Professor Guan, this is Martin from National Geographic Channel, this is Professor Guan"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Hello professor

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Hello, hello, your National Geographic is a respectable media, our work needs the support from many friends, especially need, support from credible media like yours.

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "Our feature this time is about the twelve Chinese zodiac statues of Yuanmingyuan, 'You are an expert in this field', 'So we specially came to consult you'"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: 'The pyramids of Egypt', 'The Parthenon in Greece', 'The Angkor Wat in Cambodia', 'Are all like China's Yuanmingyuan', 'With countless precious cultural relics', 'Being plundered, destroyed, resold,'

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: "Students from China, UK, USA, France and Japan"
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Hello, Professor Guan

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: 'Hello to you all'

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "These are students from China, UK, USA, France and Japan. They have been working here for several years, to return the lost precious cultural relics to our country, requires everybody's joint effort. Building a miracle sometimes takes hundreds of years, but to destroy it, just a bomb, a fire,"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "We conducted the most authoritative research, made almost one-to-one replicas, you are the first journalist to see them, no photographs allowed."

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "Sorry, five of them have been auctioned. What about the other few?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "The whereabouts of those few, are varied, one of my students is in Paris, she is an expert in antique appraisal, she has participated in the appraisal of two auctioned bronze heads"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: 'Which two'

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: 'Rabbit head', 'and this rat head'

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Can I have her contact information?

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: I will contact her for you now

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Thank you, can I touch it?

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: 'You can touch it'

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Thank you

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Professor Guan
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "No need to be so serious"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Should be like that, should be.

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Divid
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: "It's here"

movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.speaker: Police
movie101_6966492004553490981_660_840.text: Finished filming the rat head, is it very valuable?
