movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: "Reputation for integrity. We've reviewed these tapes and saw nothing unusual. They have customs documents. This witness said she never saw those bronze heads at the castle."

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Mr. Peel
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Jia Fulian said that because he couldn't get a loan.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: "I was only three years old when I last visited my uncle. Do you think I would remember?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Police
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Miss, we will hold onto your bronze statue for two weeks. If no one claims it, you can take it. If they harass you again, just tell us. You can leave now.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Mr. Peel
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: I swear they stole those bronze heads.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Police
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: You should worry about other things.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: I still have to thank this honest, beautiful French citizen.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: "You're welcome. I just told the truth. My name is Catherine. You seem very interested in those bronze heads. My family has some things you might be interested in. Think about it. You can drive now, Bruno."

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Siché Castle, we've always wanted to get into this castle.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Welcome. Sorry, this place has some routine protection. The bank currently owns all the property here. Valuable items cannot be taken away.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: It's okay, such a beautiful castle.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Our family went bankrupt during the financial crisis.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: "But it's still nice to live here."

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Your ancestors may have been the last people to see these beautiful animals.

movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_1920_2100.text: Yes, I understand what you mean. People always find lost things more precious.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: People always think that what's gone is precious.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Yes, that's right, a chicken head.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: That's the reason I invited you here.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "Is that true?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "It's been here since I was born."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: This could be considered stolen goods, right?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: What did she say?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Uh, she said the stairs are beautiful.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Oh, thank you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "I'm leaving."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "He is my great-great-grandfather," "her grandfather," "he returned from overseas many years ago," "he always wanted to go to sea again to find his first mate," "but he couldn't raise the funds for the voyage," "later his son, my grandmother's father," "organized an expedition team," "to search for that ship called Not-fire," "but he never returned," "he just mysteriously disappeared," "I heard that some bronze heads are in your possession," "or perhaps you know something about my great-grandfather."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Tycoon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: I don't care about any of it, bronze heads, tokens, diamonds, none of these can see the light of day. The only thing I want to get back is that painting. They've stolen my stuff, worth over a billion dollars.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "If you had agreed earlier, to install an infrared security system then."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Tycoon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: That was my mistake.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Subordinate
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: No, I promise you I will.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Tycoon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: If you don't bring back the painting, I will kill you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: This is my childhood rocking horse, it was painted by my great-great-grandfather when he came back from overseas, this was the environment around him when his ship was wrecked, feel free to have a look, I'll go and pour some tea.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Thank you, let's go.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Sorry, we need to discuss some private matters.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: How do we steal the chicken head?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Best to pretend to stay for two days, steal it and then leave.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: No, at least make a fake head to switch with the real one.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: To make a fake, you need data, Professor Guan has the data, find Coco.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "Don't ever mention stealing in front of her," "she won't help us."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Another man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Then what should we do?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Look, it's Lang Shining's 'Autumn Hunting.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Is it valuable?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Old things are certainly valuable.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: My grandfather's chamber pot is also very valuable.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: So the painting really exists.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: I thought it was burned up.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "In the year 1860, my great-great-grandfather sailed on the Not-fire to China," "fought a victorious battle," "this is one of the spoils he brought back."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: You must mean the looting of the Old Summer Palace, it happened during the Second Opium War, remember?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Jia Fu Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: That depends on one's perspective.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Ah, she's right, the corrupt Qing government executed diplomats from Britain and France, which became an excuse for the war.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: "Are those the reasons for two industrial nations to join forces to invade an agricultural nation?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Is that the reason two industrial countries jointly invaded an agricultural country?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: In the eyes of those industrial countries, China is indeed a strong country.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Yeah, back then our Qing government considered itself as the Celestial Empire.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'Are you helping me or her?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'Of course, I'm helping you. And then?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: What

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: And then what?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: On the way back, they encountered a storm. The ship was destroyed.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: The stolen items were too many and too heavy. This is retribution.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'What did she say? Can you speak English?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: I don't speak English.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: She said that it was really unfortunate.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: I didn't say that was unfortunate, I said he deserved it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: He deserved it? That's too heartless. He went to China on a national mission. It was his duty as a soldier. Fortunately, he was saved by a passing Chinese merchant ship.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Heaven really didn't open its eyes back then.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: What are you saying?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: She said thank heaven he came back.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Clearly, that wasn't what she said. But I still appreciate it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: You're welcome.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: What are you doing?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: I'm taking it back to China.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: This is my home, you cannot take things at will.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Just like over a hundred years ago, your ancestors took this painting without asking.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Coco, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, Coco, well, well, that was a long time ago. Just like back then if a woman wore little, someone might throw stones at her. Not at you, at her. Sorry.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'What are you apologizing for? Don't be a doormat. The ones who should apologize are them—'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'What did she say?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Did she say anything?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'I don't need you to translate for me. Have you all forgotten? Over a hundred years ago in our country, they burned, killed, and looted. Just over a century ago, you came to our country to plunder and kill. Even a hundred years later, these are painful memories for the Chinese people.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: That's right. I've studied history, and no matter how you interpret it, those events did happen. Sometimes we can only justify it with unreasonable reasons, like in those days, the strong were always right.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: 'We can't judge past mistakes by today's standards. Even now, the strong rule. You need to be strong enough for others to reason with you.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Alright, I begin to understand her thoughts. Sorry. In the end, these things all belong to the bank now. They are of no value to me. If I could, I would give them to you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Isn't it true that you just wanted to get into this fort? It wasn't easy to get here, we'll stay with you for two days then leave. How about a cup of tea?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Since

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: COCO
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Since you guys are so charged up, you go ahead and drink.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: "She’s gone to the restroom."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: What's up?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: DAVID
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Come here and take a look.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Catherine

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: What

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: "Your great-grandfather’s ship, did it sink or was it stranded?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Who knows

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: You know, we are really interested in how to bring your great-grandfather back. If we stay here for a few days, we can investigate and gather more data; perhaps we can be of help.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Thank you so much, that's great, we have a lot of rooms here, you all can stay as long as you want, let me go get ready.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: "But not him alive."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Catherine
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: No problem

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: COCO, thank you. I’ll call you again, thanks for the help.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Thanks, stay a few more days, to steal the chicken head, huh?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: We can't steal, how can we steal as guests here?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Who says we can't steal? They also took it by force, taking one item from them is called restitution, not theft.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Makes sense.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: At the very least, we need to make a fake one to swap with the real one, but we don't have the data to make a fake one.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Professor Guan has it, I’ll get it from him.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Quick

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Okay

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Here you go, data.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Go to the restroom, thank you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: Zong Sheng
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: Brilliant!

movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.speaker: The person with the binoculars
movie101_6966492004553490981_2460_2640.text: "What are those fools doing here, on a picnic?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: In the distance, a man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: I've got them in my grasp

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Bearded Man
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Look at this, it’s the data sent back by our drone.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: No wonder we couldn't find it on the map, "got it."

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: He created this painting right here.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: It's not us, it's the magic of technology.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Leave a message, no more messages.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Martin, the internet says those three bronze heads have been auctioned off.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: How is it not possible? Let me show you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: There's no signal, it must be fake. We have the real copper heads in our possession, how could that be possible?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: You're saying that the fake ones can sell for so high, then what about the real ones?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: It's seriously not okay, let me tell you this, don't change with the light on in the tent.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Blonde foreign woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: But JC...But JC told us not to move around.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: How long do I have to wait?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Blonde foreign woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: What's wrong? This is my makeup bag.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Still not talking. If it wasn't for the kids, I would have left him long ago. What about you?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: She wouldn’t answer my calls, a birthday can be celebrated three days later, what's there to be mad about?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: woman
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: I'm really fed up with you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: The trees on this island... mustn't let those devious lumber merchants know about them.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Definitely, they won't leave a single tree.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Do you know how hard I tried? And you, you have no room to maneuver, do you?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Who can handle her temper? Let’s just see who walks out first.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: I really don't get why Valentine's Day... who even set it?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: What's the point of caring about who set it at this time, what’s important is you need to be there when she needs you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2640_2820.text: Who's going to provide for the family if I’m with you all day?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: I told them not to run around, Jia Fulian, we're coming, we're coming.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Hold on! Didn't I tell you not to run around? Hang in there.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: I told you not to run around

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Can you speak something I understand, in English?

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Look at the clothes you're wearing

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Don't tell me how to dress, let's talk about your intuition.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Ladies, we haven't hit the bottom yet

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Let go, I can hold on myself.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Miss, we've landed, we're alright, Coco is missing

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: JC is okay, Coco is missing

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Give us a landmark, over here

movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_2820_3000.text: Found Coco, tell the captain to bring down the medical kit.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "Your leg was just dislocated, it's alright now"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: This way, Simon, these trees, they're man-made.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: I see some shells and cannons.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: Looking at the style of that ship, it looks like it's from that era.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: Could it really be a coincidence that this is the Immortal we're looking for?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "This iron chain... why is it here?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: 'The chain extends all the way to that tree.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "It was us who bumped into it. Lucky indeed."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: It's nothing, just a wolf spider.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "What? You can tell it's him just by the bones?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "Not by the ring, but by our family crest found right here."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "There are two, which one, use your intuition, hurry!"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "Positive. I'll pack your great-grandfather into my backpack then."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: 'This is like something out of a dream. How did you find it? Well done!'

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "We found it when we fell down here," "broke my leg doing it."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: Bonnie, I've got the med kit!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "Come around this way, there's an old path. Just follow the markers we left."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "Was there really such a big typhoon?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "On our way here, we saw some graves and skeletons."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: "The preparations outside the cave were likely the officials from the Immortal. The ones inside, by the degree of decay of their clothing, clearly differ from those outside, and they all have blades embedded in them, must have been a fierce fight before they died. These people were likely brought by her great-grandfather, they didn't die of natural disasters or disease, but from killing each other."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Didn't her great-great-grandfather already come back? So why does her son still go looking?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Whatever the reason, it doesn't matter now.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: You're right, this was 150 years ago, right?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: She can understand Chinese?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: I already told her just now.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: They kill each other, so his son came back looking for the unclaimed goods, that his father didn't take away, right?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Right?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: To

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: For

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: We need to go to the bathroom.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Towards

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Towards

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: To

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: "Where are you going?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: The three male team members.
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Bathroom

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: All of you?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: The three male team members.
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: "Right."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: My grandmother will be delighted, how is your foot?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Straight down the mountain.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: The logs are lined up all the way, no wonder so many trees were cut down.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Hey, hey, hey, don't shine it, don't shine it, and also...

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Look here, such a big anchor!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Strange: How come an iron anchor is hanging on the tree?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: A very clever lever principle, as long as the anchor sinks, the chain will rise, using the pulleys on either side to bring the big trees down the mountain. No wonder I couldn't find a single pulley on the ship.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: This is the case of one generation planting trees, another generation enjoying the shade.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: You don't seem excited?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: I'm racking my brains, how to transport this big tree back, if inside the big tree

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: No ifs.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: The four team members
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Money, money, money.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Police
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: JC, the first-aid kit! Your friend also came.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: JC, hello, I'm so happy to see you again, my friend, I would have never imagined!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Pierre

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Jia Fulian

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: How dare you address me without 'Miss'!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Shut up, this isn't your castle, I know you two are in cahoots, I have been tracking you since you went to her castle, give me the painting and what you stole back from Mitte.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: "Do you think I would bring everything to this island?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: This is a nice place, there's nobody else here just us so, I could kill you and nobody would know, get ready.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Pierre

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Are you alright?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Idiot, I told you the gun was not loaded.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre's henchman
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: "It wasn't us; we did nothing."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: It's okay, the gun wasn't loaded.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Henchman A
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Then who fired the shot?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: It's impossible, you guys really are...

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Nobody move, or else I'll blow your brains out.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: pirate

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Like.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: Exactly.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Martin
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: If we join forces, we can take him down.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.speaker: Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3180_3360.text: We've been here for a long time.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Long-haired pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Only now you know about this place

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Welcome to my island, my friends, we are reasonable people, we just want your money.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Don't do anything stupid and no one will get hurt.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Long-haired pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: The ransom is fixed at five hundred thousand, you guys sort it out.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Bald Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Or else, we'll feed you to the sharks

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Bald Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: "If no one ransoms these three women, it's fine, we'll keep them"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Let me tell you something, we are not with them, my boss is willing to give you whatever you want, he is rich, these guys want me to fight you, but I refused.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: What are you doing on my island

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Tell me, what are you doing here

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Black Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Our boss is asking you, what are you here for

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Bald Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: What did you say, this is a metal detector

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Barbecue, use this, what are you using this for

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pirate Captain
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: "You think I'm stupid? This is a metal detector. What are you searching for? Alright, if you don’t want to tell me, I will find out myself. Take those women away."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Little Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Boss, are you okay, don't move.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Forgot to tell you, our guns have no bullets

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: We'll be fine as long as we don't move.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3360_3540.text: Don't let him get the gun

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: BONNIE
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: Captain, quick, this way, quick, come on, twelve o'clock.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: Let's get out of here. My God, that scared me!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: "My great-grandfather! No! My great-grandfather! No! No! My great-grandfather! No!"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: Jia Fulian
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: It's okay, my great-grandfather, thank you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: What do you want to do?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: It's okay! Over here! It's fine! Don't be afraid!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: A man
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: jc, catch the snake head, catch the snake head

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: You take them and go first.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.speaker: Pierre
movie101_6966492004553490981_3540_3720.text: Don't move! This gun has bullets in it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: I don't need you to care.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Mr. Liao
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: How come it's a sheep head

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: My foot, it's killing me, bone

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: How do you know there is gold

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Bonnie
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: "How do you know there will be gold in this tree"

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: I mean my shoe, is there gold in this tree?

movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.speaker: Mr. Liao
movie101_6966492004553490981_3720_3900.text: Found it, found it, bag it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Where's the snake head? The dragon head must be inside.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Sit tight, what are you doing, sigh.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Watch my hand, I am very accurate.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Accurate, my foot! Let me do it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: There's no way here! Go this way!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: You have no escape. Come on, don’t shoot! Move!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Scarves, scarves, quickly! Put them on! Put them on! Simon, put it on!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: The bees are returning to their hive! Smoke bombs! Smoke bombs!

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.speaker: Pirate
movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Stop, you idiots! It's okay, let them go.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: "The big tree is about 1.3 meters in diameter and about 7 meters long. Calculating with the volume of the cylinder formula, it's about 928,000 cubic centimeters. Based on the density of gold and wood, if it could still float, approximately one twenty-second of it could hold gold bars. Dividing by the volume of each bar, this tree could contain about 2,900 bars of gold. Multiplying this by gold's density of 19 grams per cubic centimeter, that's eight tons."

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: Then there's still two tons left

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: Simon
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: "But there's still two small tons left"

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: This is why they kill each other

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: Wife
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: Please leave a message after the beep

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: I know you're by the phone, don't sulk alone, pick up the phone and scold me, I'll hang up now.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.speaker: David
movie101_6966492004553490981_4080_4260.text: Can't you just calmly talk to someone for once?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Teammate A
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Every time we start calm and composed, but it always ends up in a heated argument.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Morning.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Morning, thanks for last night.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: No need, you guys.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: female teammate
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Morning, you all need your medicine.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Is there something you want to tell me?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: What is it?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Jia Guan Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Good morning everyone, please wait, JC, to thank you for what you've done for me, I wrote a poem last night, Coco, can you help me translate it?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: Can

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Jia Guan Lian
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: The brave warrior saved the oppressed.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Coco
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: In reality, a group of scoundrels full of lies.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.text: What

movie101_6966492004553490981_4260_4440.speaker: Jia Guan Lian

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: Don't do this, have you tried to report it to the police?

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: I've done all that, I really had no choice but to come to you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: I will help where I can, but those people

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: I'm sorry to bother you.

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: CoCo
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: "Professor Guan was also taken away by the police because of the information about the copper head he gave me"

movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_4800_4980.text: "Why are you crying"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.speaker: change
movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.text: He's over there, get him. You're not going anywhere.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.text: Nine-headed bird, go deal with him.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.text: That's not fair! Ganging up on one person is despicable. A one-on-one fight is the true measure of fairness.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: It's about to explode, it's about to blow - run for it, run!

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: Wu Qing, are you guys okay?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: "Shut up", "You fool I'm going to kill you", "How did I teach you", "We don't kidnap, we only do Hawk brand"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: "I really wish we could meet under different circumstances"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: I really wish you wouldn't cheat

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: "It seems you've already made it impossible for me to cheat", "I'll keep this as compensation for my loss", "You accompany these", "young people safely home", "We'll continue to collaborate later", "Deal?", "Take them out", "Oh, about that dragon head, I'm really sorry", "It disappeared so there's no extra zero for you"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: Dad, you're just letting them go like this?

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: Interpol has already homed in on this location, he saved us the trouble of dismantling this place, you see if there's anything worth preserving, then get out of here fast, blame it all on Frankie.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: I have a job for you

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.speaker: Lawrence
movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: "Those protests about reclaiming lost cultural artifacts are hurting the antiques market, I want to teach them a lesson, let's start with the dragon head."

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Boss
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Let's start with the dragon head.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Michael
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: What to do

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Boss
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Let Long Feiya do it

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Female Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Nine-headed Bird

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: What a pity

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Host
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: "Due to a series of protests" "the auction house is under great pressure" "nations around the world are calling for the return of cultural relics" "MP announced that if Dragon Province's first auction is once again affected by protesters" "they will take further action"

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: It's time to start our non-public auction, the precious dragon bronze head.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Operator
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Thank you very much, oh, good news, good news, The Global Chinese Business Association has donated fifty million yuan.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Woman Sitting There
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: But it's useless, the Chinese government simply won't accept it! They won't accept any bronze heads bid from auctions.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Man wearing a jacket
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Hey, just tell them we bought it back, we'll keep it for them first, okay?

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: The woman wrapped in a scarf
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: No way, there's only one head left, who buys it is a sinner.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: The second and final time to launch the auction, no reserve price, is there a first bid?

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Journalist
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Media around the world are waiting for a response. MP Company threatens that if no one makes a bid before noon today, they will throw the dragon head into the volcano.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Journalists
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Everyone sees the volcano behind me, the dragon head of the Chinese zodiac will disappear here forever.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we're nearing the auction deadline at noon, I'm still waiting for the first bid.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Chinese Journalist
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: If the dragon head remains unsold, MP Company will throw the dragon head into the active volcano in front of us.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Auctioneer
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Up until now, I still haven't received the first bid, first notice, second notice, last chance, the item remains unsold.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Foreigner
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Boss, the dragon head is unsold.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Boss
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: "Throw it away"

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Nine-headed Bird
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Alright, brothers, let's move out.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Journalist
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: It's really happening, they've started the operation, we see three parachutists jumping out of the cabin, it can be clearly seen that one of them is holding the dragon head.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Man wearing a jacket
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Lost it, lost it, lost it.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Foreign female news anchor
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: MP Company calls this action 'Flying Dragon in the Sky'.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Journalist
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: "How did the fourth parachutist appear"

movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.speaker: Chinese Journalist
movie101_6966492004553490981_6060_6240.text: Look over there, quick, look over there

movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.speaker: JC
movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.text: Wake up, wake up, go save her.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.speaker: Reporter
movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.text: The dragon head is out of hand and is falling towards the volcano crater.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.speaker: Reporter 2
movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.text: 'They have reached the minimum altitude for opening parachutes,' 'but none have opened theirs yet,' 'the situation is very critical.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'Nine out of ten times it won't work. Stop shouting nonsense, damn it, just take the money.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Having hair, who would want to be bald? I almost forgot.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: "Tuition fee."

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Lei Luo bro, you're late.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Busy, you know.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Hey, Yan Tong is so stingy, you know.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'This generous gift can't be considered stingy, right?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Wow, big spender. He'll be so happy he'll drool, let's go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: The greeter says
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'Upstairs, please.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: It's just a birthday, but they've made it look like the Queen's birthday.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Wow, indeed.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Yan Tong's Wife

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Yan Tong's Wife

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Lei Luo bro is here to celebrate Yan Tong sir's birthday.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong's wife
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Ah, Lei Luo, now that you’ve been promoted to detective, you're so busy.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: It's alright.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'It's for Yan Tong sir.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong's wife
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Take it over yourself, I won't serve you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Bystander
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: No need to be formal.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Wow, no wonder they don't look at you directly. Turns out there's so much their mom could open a gold shop.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: This isn't about money.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Then put it there.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'Of course, I want it to be obvious. If you're not convinced, bite me.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Move aside

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'Sit down,' Officer Officer Hunter wants to play with you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: This is yours.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: That damn Officer Officer Hunter is drunk again.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Let's start playing.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: He's interesting. He always behaves like this when he’s drunk.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Bystander
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Gamble, gamble, gamble.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Damn it

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Chinese Officer
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Wow, lucky you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Shut up.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Chinese Officer
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Pay up, come on!

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Man in White Suit
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: That's right, be careful or you’ll lose it all.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: It's yours, you have it too, you have it too.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Officer Hunter's point is, anyone wanting a promotion or wealth, just take it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Officer Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Who's the boss now, huh?

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Man in black jacket
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: What, do Brits not have to repay gambling losses?

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Lei Luo bro, Lei Luo bro, don't!

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'What are you doing, you're drunk.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Stop!

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Take the officer to wash his face.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'You just got promoted to detective and you're showing off?' 'Daring to hit an officer?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: None

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'So you're acting tough even in Yau Ma Tei? Do you want to manage Wan Chai? Are you daring enough to hit me too?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Yan Tong sir, sorry, Lei Luo bro had too much to drink.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Man in red suit
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'If you're drunk, then leave! Still waiting to eat?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Let's go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: 'We're leaving, happy birthday.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Don't be angry, let's go dance, ah, I'll go with you!

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: What? Let go, let go, I'm fine, I'm fine.' 'If it weren't for you, I would’ve shot him.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: Patience, revenge can wait ten years. A little impatience spoils great plans. Think of it as constipation, bear with it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: I can tolerate

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Luo Ge
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: I can't tolerate his wife!

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Man in Short Sleeves
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Oh, that's true. "I saw you almost pull out your gun to shoot her."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Luo Ge
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: A single moment of impatience may ruin a great project.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Xiao Di
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Luo Ge

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Luo Ge
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: What's up?

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Follower
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Tonight, Gong Zai Keung and Big Gray Bear are staging a big scene downstairs.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Luo Ge
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Gong Zai Keung is bringing people over from Kowloon City?

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Another Xiao Di
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Both sides have gathered hundreds of people.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Man in Short Sleeves
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "He treats you like that and you still help him? You're truly magnanimous."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Luo Ge
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "Ruining Yan Tong means ruining the police." "Can we maintain our reputation? Right?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: I have a small task for you. There's a group of Chinese causing trouble downstairs. Go handle them for me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: It's a minor issue. Rest assured, I'll handle it quickly.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Xiao Di
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Boss, it's Yan Tong's birthday today. Doesn't this big scene scare you?

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Big Gray Bear
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Hmph, I want him to know that when I Big Gray Bear get angry, no one can handle it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Big Gray Bear
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Gong Zai Keung, you scoundrel, isn't your Kowloon business enough? Why did you come to steal my Hong Kong business? Yan Tong doesn't care. I will.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Big Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Wrong side.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "You've been secretly stealing my business in Kwun Tong and Tsz Wan Shan. You play tricks?" "I'll play big with you. I've already ordered the coffin, Big Gray Bear."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Man in Short Sleeves
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "We're not here to fight. Why so much pointless talk?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: In the underworld, the biggest fist gets the biggest share.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: A Qi
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Brother Hao, aren't we just here to make up the numbers?

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "This time it's serious."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: The rules will be set by me from now on.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Followers
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Good

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Get the weapons.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Big Gray Bear
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "Screw you, you set the rules?" "Set what rules? You don't even need to order a coffin." "I'll cut you into pieces and feed you to the dogs."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Man in Short Sleeves
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: "If you want to fight, let me finish my coffee first."

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Big Gray Bear
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Chop him up for me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Xiao Di
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Brothers, attack! Come on!

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Chop him up for me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: <Luo Ge0>, your two good brothers are staging a big scene downstairs. Aren't you getting involved?

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Yan Tong, stop messing around. You know I faint at the sight of blood.

movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.speaker: Fat Boy Chau
movie101_6973286990817002015_420_600.text: Eh, it's too bloody, not as fun as gambling.

movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.speaker: Big Gray Bear
movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.text: Go on, go, chop, chop him, chop, chop him.

movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.text: This is bad, really bad, Da Wei

movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.speaker: Pig Oil Boy
movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.text: That curly-haired one can really fight.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Hmm, I suppose so.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome, welcome.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Now, I am honored to introduce my daughter's good friend. He is an outstanding member of the community. And this young man has a great future ahead.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: What did he say?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: That man
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: He said his daughter is twenty-four years old this year, likes successful people. Seems like he is talking about me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Nonsense. He is introducing his future son-in-law.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Who? You?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: May we welcome, Inspector Lei Luo

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Next month, the two are getting engaged. Make sure to respond to the invitation, and come early.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Boss, Lei Luo seems to be getting close with Sir Chow's daughter. Would Sir Chow help him become chief inspector? Does he deserve such a title?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: The London headquarters has decided not to increase the position of the chief Chinese inspector for now

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: I've spent so much money in the past.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Don't worry, if this goes through, you'll be the first choice. Listen, I have something to discuss with you. The Wan Chai Inspector has passed away. No matter what happens, Lei Luo really needs this position.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: This kid, he can live off of a woman. He wants to sit in this oil-rich district? In his dreams.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: There is only one way to keep him out of this position, and that is, you take his place.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Tsim Sha Tsui and Wan Chai have approximately the same oil and water levels. Although I live in Kowloon, for the sake of resisting this brat, I'm willing to move. Thank you, boss. What about my previous position as Chief Inspector of Yau Tsim District?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: He will replace you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Him, boss.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Didn't you just agree?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: He just agreed to take over the position in Wan Chai.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: he

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Yes, good news, isn't it?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Yan Tong sir, really? But you live in Kowloon. Going to work in Hong Kong every day, you have to take the ferry.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Aren't you afraid of getting seasick?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: You gigolo, don't get too happy too soon.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: "Mind your words."

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: "Sorry, boss."

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Man
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Lei Luo, shall we get started?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Alright, excuse me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Buddy, I'm looking for Brother Chao, Brother Chao.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: What, ready to fight? What's with that?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "Chao Bro... Let's talk this over." Can you let my brother go first, please?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "See, I bet with them!" "I told them the first thing you'd say when you came in would be this." "I was right, wasn't I?" Chao Bro said to the others, "You each owe me a hundred bucks!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "Your brother, the first day he helped me with something, he rifled through my drawer and stole my money. Then he took my money to gamble at my casino. If he hadn't lost everything and gotten caught, what kind of life would I be living?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "Think smashing a couple of bottles is impressive?" Chao Bro said. "My boys smash heads all the time." "Do you want them to put on a show for you?" "Break a couple of bottles and I'll let him go? Who do you think you are?" Chao Bro's tone shifted, "I'll tell you what, I need some people right now."

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "I know you're good at fighting." Chao Bro responded. "I want to see if it's true."

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "Stop, stop, stop! We play by the rules here! One-on-one means one-on-one!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: The boys
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: Hit him, hit him, hit him

movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.speaker: Fei Zai
movie101_6973286990817002015_1680_1860.text: "Stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, no more fighting, listen to me, enough!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: Fat Boy Chao, am I not qualified enough?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: From now on, you will eat with me. I guarantee you, if you want women, you have women, if you want money, you have money.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: I took ten thousand from you today, I will help you earn back a hundred thousand in the future.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: You're damn greedy, just like me, I like it. But remember, don't learn from your brother, otherwise, I'll break your legs, let's go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: "Take nine thousand and repay that big rotten debt"

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: Do you know how to fight?

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: I give you a bottle of cola

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: "Following Fat Boy Chao, I just make a living in Kowloon Walled City. Due to the chaos of the British colonial administration, the city has become a no-man's land. And the colonial police have no desire to take care of it. Drugs, gambling, red-light districts, dog meat stalls, everything can be found here. Hong Kong law cannot control it. Even the police dare not come in. They are afraid that once they come in, they can't get out."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: "What are you doing? Want to die? Do you remember when you stole money to gamble last time?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: And you're still gambling? Do you want to stick around here forever?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Ah, what about your grandmother in the countryside? Didn't you say you were going to build her a big house? Remember that. Is that clear?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Go over there. Xiao Wei sits on the side, squinting at the person in front of him, "Si Yan Zai, I've never seen you before, what are you doing here?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: "Don't sell to him. What are you doing? Si Yan Zai" A Hao grabs the man with glasses by the throat: "Are you trying to become like him?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: He's all skin and bones from doing drugs, do you want to be like him?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Try it once, and you're hooked for life. "I'm telling you, don't let me find out you've been back to buy." "And don't let me find out you've bought elsewhere." "Or I'll break your legs."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Take your money and go, go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Brother Hao, why refuse money when it's offered?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: Got it, we need to have bottom lines.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: "Do you need to be so loud?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Who wants to eat mooncakes?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Two children
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: I want, I want too.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Can you cut them?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Girl
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "Sure."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Be careful, well done.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A woman carrying a fruit platter
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Wow, you're so smart.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Alright, well done.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Bro Yan Zheng, hey.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Hello, hello.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Happy Mid-Autumn Festival. Sit, sit, sit.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "So happy to see you!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "Come, sit."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival. I specifically brought mooncakes to honor you. And also, fine wine.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "I can't accept these things. I'm a public official."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: It's Mid-Autumn Festival, bro Yan Zheng. Just take the mooncakes, take them.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Alright, then. I'll only accept this box of mooncakes. The rest, you take back. Thanks for the gesture.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Bro Yan Zheng, you helped me last time. I've kept it in my heart all along. Actually, I've been wanting to find a chance to repay you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "No need to be so polite."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: This is for the children, for the children.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: No, no, no. I can't take your money.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: It's fine, it's fine, don't worry, don't worry.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
