movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "What do you mean? I don't want it."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: It's a small thing, don't be so formal, don't be so formal.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: I already said I don't want your money.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: A Hao, you're filthy rich, right? Tell me, have you been selling drugs with Fat Boy Chao recently? Speak!

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Just trying to make a living.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: It doesn't matter if you don't admit it. My colleagues have already told me everything. Let me tell you, I've been a cop for twenty years. I haven't taken a single bribe. So I won't take your dirty money. Take these gifts and leave immediately!

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: Bro Yan Zheng.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: If you won't leave, I'll leave.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: In this world, some people are greedy for money, while others aren't. Yan Zheng is one of the ungreedy ones. Let him go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: I'm greedy for money. Having money is great.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: By the way, bro Lei Luo, last time you got Brother Zai to lend me some money. How about I return it now?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "That's it? You're still short on principal and interest. Keep it as a deposit for now. When I need you, you come."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "I'll definitely come."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "You said it."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: I said it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: "Thank you, bro Lei Luo."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: I said it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Audience
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Wow, awesome, Fat Boy Chao is awesome.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Fat Boy Chao is really great

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Finish this drink

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Sorry about the last time, Fat Boy Chao

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Good man, honestly, your help means a lot to me, I really appreciate you, brother.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: It's good to be your brother, it's good to be your brother

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Come on, let's drink again.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Drive faster, we're late.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: The three brothers
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Pick up the sister-in-law, hurry up, hurry, hurry up!

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Son
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Mom, I'm so hungry, are we there yet?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Wife and Son (Ah Mei)
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: We're almost there, your dad is waiting for us at the dock.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Brother, brother, seems like it's Water Cop ahead.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Water Cop
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: "Attention, fishing boat ahead, we're Hong Kong Maritime Police, switch off your engine immediately, prepare for inspections"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: The people on the boat
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: There are cops, hurry to the stern, get in the water, quick, get in the water.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Water Cop
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: "What are you doing here?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Fishing Boat Owner
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: What did he say?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: No clue

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Water Cop
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: Now I've got you by the throat.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Man
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: "Quiet down!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Fishing Boat Owner
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: This was given to me by my wife.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: A Hao, you're really screwed now. "Look, there's lipstick mark."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: "Are you making fun of me, brat?" "Don't think I don't know what you were up to in the bathroom with that woman."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Ah Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: "Sister-in-law, how could this happen! How could there be a death! I want to take them home."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: Ah, ah, why, why is this happening, ah, why, why, why, why.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang's behavior is getting more extreme. There was a big fight a while ago, and now they are fighting guerrilla wars. Recently, more than twenty people were killed, and fifty many were injured. The superiors are not happy.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: So what do the superiors mean?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: A good cocaine business, made into a pot of porridge, how to eat?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: You want to overturn him, clean up, and start again.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: "If you really uproot it, wouldn't Fei Zai Chao become dominant?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: "If Fei Zai Chao listens to me obediently, leave him a share, find two people, take the positions of Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: "You really are a good brother. When Big Gray Bear went to gamble in Temple Street, you took the opportunity to show up."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Hua Zi Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: What do you want to do?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: “It’s easier to kill Big Gray Bear who is courageous but reckless, but Gong Zi Qiang is the nephew of Ding Ye, the old city fortress. If you touch him, I'm afraid Kowloon District will be chaotic.”

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: I'll go to the city, and have a talk with Ding Ye.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "No, no, no, it's too dangerous." "If you go in like this" "What if they turn hostile?" "Let's ask A Hao for help."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Amon just lost his wife. Let's not bother him.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: That's true. After his wife died, he lost it. He's become a wreck, spacing out all day. We can't rely on him this time.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: You short-lived fool, do you think we're talking nonsense?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: No

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Still, you have no memory, do you?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Yes, yes.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: What did I tell you last time?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Don't buy, don't buy.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "Don't buy, right?" "I told you not to come in." "Or I'll break your legs."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Bro, look

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: How can you be so useless?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Why are the three of them together?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Please, Big Brother Wei.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Get up. Do you need a hit?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "Yes, yes, yes."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Go listen to what Baldy is saying.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man in the white shirt
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Good

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Go

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Yan Tong,
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "Rest assured, we got this. As long as that SOB dares to come in alone, I'll take him out. Don't worry."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Gong Zai Qiang
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Master Ding trusts me the most. After today, you won't see Lei Luo again.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: All set.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "Do we really have to use this?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Alright, alright, be tough.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: You're acting like this is a war zone.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Better safe than sorry, nothing will happen. And even if something does, you won't get seriously hurt. Hurry up, thanks.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: What?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: A gun.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: I know, I know this is a gun. But what is this?

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: This is a signal flare. If anything goes wrong, shoot it immediately. I'll rush in as soon as I see it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: "Alright, whatever you say."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: I'll wait for you here. If anything happens, send the signal. I'll rush in immediately.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Man with a bare torso
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Everyone, pay attention.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: All of Gong Zai Qiang's people have returned to the city, they're armed, and many from Brother Chao's side went in as well.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Dingye
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Detective Lei, we meet again. The good tea you brought me is highly praised by everyone.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: "If Uncle likes it, I'll send it every day."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Uncle, that cop is always looking for bribes. You have to be careful.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Dingye
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: "Our city and the outsiders have always minded their own business. No one dares to change this rule. You and Grizzly Bear have caused chaos outside. Now, Lei Luo has come in person to make me hand you over. Tell me, what should I do?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Man in yellow leather jacket
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Brother Hao, all entrances and exits to Dingye's clubhouse are sealed; no one can get in.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Dingye
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Uncles, I need to appoint a new person to handle affairs in the walled city.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Dingye
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: "Didn't do it? Do you think I don't know anything? You broke the rules, and you should have expected today's outcome."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.speaker: Dingye
movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Detective Lei, I will give you an explanation regarding the change of personnel.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: subordinates
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Don't run, stand still, stand still, don't run.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: The armed man
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Lei Luo killed Dingye, didn't he

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: old man
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Yes, Lei Luo killed Dingye! "Yes, yes, I saw it with my own eyes."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: Junior leader
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Listen up, no one is allowed to let Lei Luo escape, stay sharp.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: subordinates
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Lei Luo killed Dingye, don't run!

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: subordinates
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: "He's here, don't run! Lei Luo killed Dingye," "He's here, don't run! Catch him!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: A Hao, ah, the signal flare's gone; I can't call for help, I can't reach the outside.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: Don't worry about it, save me some face, save me some face, move aside, move aside.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: "Don't come any closer, if anyone dares, I'll kill them, come on!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: "We came out to be loyal, Lei Luo saved me in front of those British bastards, shouldn't I repay it? A favor owed is remembered for a thousand years. Haven't your parents ever taught you guys? Tell me, tell me, today, leave a way out for Luo Ge, I, A Hao, will surely repay you all."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.speaker: Gong Zai Keung
movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: Repay your mom, not a single one left

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: Not afraid of death? Come on, come on, come on, you come too, you bastard, come on!

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: "Your time has come, you traitor, I trusted you so much, and you betrayed me, you're going against me? Want to play the hero, is it? Want to play the hero, is it? I'll help you achieve that. Want to play the hero, is it? Want to play the hero."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: Gong Zai Keung, Lei Luo bro, Lei Luo bro, Lei Luo bro, how are you? I'll take you to the hospital, come on.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.speaker: The rest of the people
movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: Call a car to the hospital, call an ambulance.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: Wow, damn it, how did you end up like this?

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: The patient's leg bone is fractured in half, and the knee has shifted out of place. It looks like we'll have to amputate. Even if we can save his leg, he'll walk with an uneven gait and become a hunchback.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: "I won't let it go just like that"

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Piggy, when did you see me break his leg?

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: These few packages were found in the car, your car.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Are you playing me? I won't admit it even if you beat me to death.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: I dare not kill you, I still need to invite you for a Judicial milk tea.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Don't make such a joke, it could kill someone.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Spend the night here tonight, until you fall down with a stomachache.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: "Still not talking? Then we'll leave first."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: I admit, I admit, I admit, I admit, I admit

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: I've said, whatever I have, you have half of it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: "In 1965, Brother Luo really gave me half of the world" "He industrialized corruption in the police, the powder business, gambling business, and prostitution business" "Unified money collection, unified money distribution, no need for quarrels" "Those were the smooth years for both the underworld and legitimate businesses" "We made a lot of money, bought lots of property" "Some people say that Brother Luo has five billion in assets"

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: This world is divided into black and white. I am the biggest in white, you are the biggest in black. Brother, let me say it again to you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: All you see now in Hong Kong is governed by the British. Even I can be killed by you. But you can't kill British police. If you can endure, this world belongs to us two brothers.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Boss
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: Guys, we don't have a royal family in Texas. The race club has specifically organized a Queen's Cup. If we are confident, I have the chance to shake her hand. We must win this race.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: "When the time comes, Boss will be the most majestic"

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: A Hao, dressed so handsomely, are you coming to pull the lead horse?

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: No, I have a friend who has a horse, and it's going to run a race today, just to learn. What was the horse called again? Dragon Pond rat, how is it?

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: "The horse is as lame as you. Can it outrun the rat? This race, it's my Boss's 'Thunder' that has to win. Definitely win."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: Very well, thank you, thank you, hey, we need to supplement the bet, go quickly.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Broadcast
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: The last horse to enter the pen is number four, all horses are in position. Today, let's wait and see who will emerge victorious. Get ready, after the gates open, the first to rush out is 'Thunder'. Ah, this horse is really great, it's a favorite and is already leading after a few steps. Look, the second one is the 'Supreme Divine Steed'. Wow, and there's 'Major Success', closely followed by 'Get rich soon'. The one which is last but one is 'Must be red'. Oh no, 'Dragon Pond rat' falls to the last place. They're entering the straight road now, 'Thunder' seems to be winning, it’s been leading all the way and has pulled ahead by several lengths. Oh no, trouble! 'Dragon Pond rat' has suddenly moved to the outer line and has surged forward, as if it was motor-powered, leaving all the other horses behind. 'Dragon Pond rat' is a big upset this time. That's it, now crossing the line, 'Dragon Pond rat' is in first place and 'Thunder' is second.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Boss
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: My goodness, what the hell are you doing? How do you guys work? Both of you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: Listen, listen, something has happened, something has happened.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.speaker: foreign man
movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: Do you know how much I earn in a month? I lost everything. What do you want me to do?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Shut up

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Hey, Lei Luo, Lei Luo, your inside information doesn't seem reliable. Fortunately, I supplemented my own horse.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: 'You lame, I'll deal with you, destroying my good deeds.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: I know you bribed eleven jockeys. I bought one, your own jockey. Who said it was impossible to win.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Lei Luo, I remember what you said when you raised my five fingers back then. You didn't lie to me. Now I will laugh even in my sleep.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Keep a low profile.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Right, right, right.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: One should be content.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: I want to applaud you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Alas, but be careful with A Hao. These years, he is somewhat unruly. He has spent a lot of money on both the underworld and the upper world to win over people. He has fingers in many police stations, including ours. Whatever happens, he will know within fifteen minutes. He must have a plan doing this. Be careful not to raise a wolf dog to gnaw your heart.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: The drug business is not worth us taking such a big risk. Two suppliers are not enough. We need to double it. Four suppliers, so we don't have to take risks.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: I don't think it will necessarily work.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: I don't care, I have to make it work.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Awei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: A Hao, Lei Luo asked Piggy to pick up Fat Boy Chao from prison.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Being brothers is about trust. He patted Awei, 'Don't think about Lei Luo like this in the future.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Awei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Good

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Congratulations, congratulations, Lei Luo.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Thank you

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Lei Luo, congratulations on your promotion to Chief Inspector.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: It's all your help, A Hao.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Congratulations, Chief Inspector, a small token of my admiration.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Ahao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Rong Brother

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Brother Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Brother Hao

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Wife of Rong Brother

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Wife of Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: I thought it was a big party. I spent the whole afternoon doing my hair.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: 'You need to do your hair every day, be quiet.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Wife of Rong Brother, you go first.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Wife of Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Are you kidding me?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Rong Brother
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Don't you understand what Lei Luo is saying? Get lost. Go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Come on, Rong Brother, have a seat.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Brother Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Alright

movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4020_4200.text: Come, Ahao.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: This is Rose, who is popular in Taiwan and Thailand, take care of her for me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Hua Zi Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Miss Rose, hello

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Come, there's something I need to tell you. Today's my big day, do me a favor.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Absolutely.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: "Today is his first day out," "Let's put the past behind us," "After tonight, I won't interfere. OK?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Lei Luo, if you say so.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Fat Boy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Yes, big brother A Hao, one shouldn't be stingy, be generous. You look fancy, even this crutch looks luxurious, I think I can't walk as fast as you now.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: "Keep your mouth shut", Fat Boy Chao covers his face, not daring to lift his head. "Everyone is here, let's play four rounds."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Alright

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: I feel that recently, Hongkong's economy is booming, the demand for gambling dens, drug dens, and brothels is growing rapidly.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: I think it's time to reorganize, let's see how many gambling dens, drug dens, or brothels there are on the streets, the regular ones are much easier to manage.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Speaking of the drug business, the Brits want to divide Hong Kong Island into two, and Kowloon and the New Territories into two.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: How will they divide it?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: The part in Kowloon is still yours, no change, in Hong Kong, from Causeway Bay to Chai Wan, is Hua Zi Rong's, the rest of the Western District is Rose's, is that OK?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Hua Zi Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Why should she be in charge? Why should half of my territory be divided with her, "Give A Hao's to her,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Give the New Territories to her?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: A Hao, I've put up with this for two years, it's time to settle scores, right?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Hua Zi Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: "You can't even understand the cards, why are you meddling so much,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: "How the hell do you know what I'm eating,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Hua Zi Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: I know, you have nothing to eat.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: "I eat,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: I quit, you play.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: You are upset, not your usual calm self.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Rose
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: I hope you guys can remember, "Who Lei Luo feeds, he gets to eat," "If Lei Luo doesn't feed, no one eats."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Rose
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: Sorry, I won.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: What a coincidence

movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4200_4380.text: The division of the territory into four parts is the Brits' idea.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Lai Lok
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Ah Ho, I hope you understand, it's still the Brits who call the shots in Hong Kong now.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: It's the same as always, however you say it goes, Brother Lok.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Lai Lok
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Good

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Cheers, cheers!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Cheers

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'You're crazy!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Screw you!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: What are you going insane for?!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'What about my leg, how do you count that?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Brother Lok, he's lost his mind.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'If it weren't for Brother Lok giving face, I'd take you down tonight—screw you! screw you! screw you! screw you!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: I have to go to school to see my son's performance early tomorrow morning, sorry, I'll be taking my leave first.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Lai Lok
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Alright.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Brother Lok save me, Brother Lok.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Sit down first, I'll take you to the doctor.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Alright alright, thank you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Lai Lok
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Pick up the ear, pick up the ear!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Fatty Choi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Alright alright alright

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'It's the abalone porridge made by your sister-in-law, can you eat it?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'For sure, it's definitely better than the one my brother makes.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Qi
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Little brat

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Sister-in-law
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'I used more than a dozen abalones to make this.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: "Has Ah Ping been downstairs all this while?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Sister-in-law
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'He is reading in his room.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: I'll go call him—Xiao Wei, did you get the thing I asked you to buy for me?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: to

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Sister-in-law, why did Brother Ho ask me to buy a gold pen?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Sister-in-law
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Isn't Ah Ping's lunar birthday coming up soon?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'You little brat, you little brat, trying to kill yourself?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: What happened?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Do you know what he's done? He's on heroin. Look at him, look at his ghostly face. I don't touch the stuff myself, and I won't let my family touch it either—but now he's using.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'What right do you have to control me? The biggest drug kingpin in Hong Kong, selling the most heroin—that's you. You've hooked thousands & thousands on pain. You talk to me about this, aren't you being hypocritical?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'What are you saying, huh? You little brat, what? I deal heroin, if I don't do business and make money, what should I do, eat shit? People ruin themselves, I can't control that, but you can't be doing this!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'If you sell, I'll use; if I don't sell, I won't use!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Sister-in-law
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Listen to big sister-in-law.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'You're not my sister-in-law. My real sister-in-law is dead.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: 'What are you saying, huh? You little brat, what?'

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Everyone
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: Don't do it, don't, Ah Ping, quick, leave, leave!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.speaker: Ah Ho
movie101_6973286990817002015_4380_4560.text: You little brat, give him to me and lock him upstairs until he kicks the habit before you let him out!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Spread the word, if anyone dares to sell cocaine to my younger brother again, they will lose their hands and feet. Also, if I find out you're the one supplying him, we can no longer consider ourselves brothers.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Understood, understood.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Qiong Jie
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Calm down, calm down.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Brother Luo, bad news.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: What happened?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: We've got trouble. General Songchai from Golden Triangle just died from a stroke. The one taking over is named Naimi.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Piggy

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Hao Ge, Brother Luo has been waiting for you for a long time.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: "Now Naimi is controlling all of Asia's heroin supply." "Luo Ge wants to negotiate with him as soon as possible." "In less than three weeks, all of Hong Kong will run out."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: "I want you to take a trip to Thailand," he gestured to one side. "Rose will go with you."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Rose
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: I have someone who can get a message to General Naimi.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: "You trust me that much, Luo Ge?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: "Do I have a better choice, trust Fei Zai Chao?" "The split of the territories was the Brit's idea." "They're afraid you'll become too powerful." "They can't control you."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Once the negotiation is done, I'll dominate the business. You're not afraid?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: I am afraid, but what I fear more is that Ah Chao and Ah Rong will get there first.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Hello, Hao Ge

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Such a small matter, it's a shame you had to make the trip yourself. Come in and have a seat, come in and have a seat, please.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: What are you looking at?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Understood

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Wow, the Thai guys are doing quite well.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Everything is credited to A Hao, if not for Hao Ge, where would I be today?

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: "Take a seat, brothers."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Hao Ge, things have been a mess in the Golden Triangle since General Songchai died. That General Naimi is a difficult man to deal with, he's driven away all the fixers, I can't get near him now, give me some time. Both Ah Rong and Ah Chao came to visit me early in the morning. I told them to go die.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: Chai Jia
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "Zao’er, Tianhua, Rong, and Achao all came looking for trouble with me, I told them to drop dead. I only work for your A Hao family, let's not talk about this for now, let's relax tonight and take a bath first."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "Do you know what’s most important in doing business?" The most important thing is to be credible!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "How much money did Hua Zi Rong give you? You scumbag! Go to hell!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "You had it all figured out how to deal with me, didn’t you? Having so many people here to welcome me!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "I'm the fifth generation A Hao! If you dare, then make your move!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "It's okay, it's okay, your brother is here, it's all right."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: Da Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: "It's okay, it's okay, I'm here, it's all right."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: Brother Hao, take me home, take me home.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: You're blessed by the Bodhisattva, you'll be fine!

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: David
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: "I'm going to kill you, I'm going to kill you, I'm going to kill you, go to hell, go to hell, give me back my brother."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Ahao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: Life and death are fated, riches and honor are from destiny.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Huazai Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: That damned cripple, once he gets to the Golden Triangle, let's see how he dies.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Huazai Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: I really have to thank Lei Luo, for sending you to share my Hong Kong business. If not, I would have no chance to get close to you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Huazai Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: "With you around, do I still need her?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Huazai Rong
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: As long as you serve my little brother well, I, as the big brother, wouldn't even mind giving my life for you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Soldier
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: Stop here, General, they have arrived.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.speaker: Ahao
movie101_6973286990817002015_4920_5100.text: Hello, General Naimi. I am Wu Shihao. It’s a pleasure to meet you today. I've...

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: "I brought some medicine for your army today, and also some top-quality Cuban cigars for you!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: Come on, please take a seat.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: A Hao, I heard you've come from afar. If you need my goods, name your price.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: "General, you're straightforward and to the point. General Somsak used to charge me 3,500 per kilogram. I'll add 400 for you, 3,900. That's it."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: 3,900? Someone here has already offered 6,000 per kilogram.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: 6,000? This market can't take it! Impossible!

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: A Hao, it's no use talking now. They have already come to the door with a deposit.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: "Hua Zi Rong, you're the one who offered 6,000? You really deserve to die! Do you have so much money to give away? This treacherous dog, selling me out today, will sell you out tomorrow. You shouldn't do business with these people. I, A Hao, am trustworthy. I guarantee that if you cooperate with me, you will be satisfied, General."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: "So you're playing behind my back, huh? You think you're in Hong Kong? This is Thailand! You can go to hell if you want to bargain with me!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.speaker: General Naimi's son
movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: "Daddy, lots of brothers took me and mommy to ride the carousel. When are you coming to play?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Please, sell me some.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Get away.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Check out what that kid is up to, bring him over for some fun.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao's subordinate
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Okay

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Your big brother has given the word, "Anyone who gives you something will have their hands and feet broken." How can I give it to you?

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: I'm about to die.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Better you die than I.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: I beg you, I really beg you

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao's subordinate
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: What's wrong?

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Lackey
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Looking for goods, let go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao's subordinate
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: "Come with me."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Thank you, thank you, big brother.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao's subordinate
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Come on, Brother Chao, he's here.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Brother Chao

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: What do you want, tell Brother Chao.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: I, I want to pick up the goods.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: You want to chase the dragon, huh? Okay, no problem. Wow, look at you, you're so addicted. Slobber and snot, all dripping down. He looks better now than a new lackey playing comedy.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: He's the little brother of the crippled Hao, give him some fun.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Okay, little brother, Brother Chao here, I'm all about loyalty. Just wanting some goods, no big deal. We're so familiar, no need to talk about money. Drink with me, and I'll give it to you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: A Ping
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Thank you

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: I'll add some ice cubes, a cold drink for you, little brother. How good I am to you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Freshly squeezed orange juice, huh?

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Look at this foreigner pouring out, it's a big cup, little brother, be good, drink it up, drink it, the goods here, all yours. Electricity’s thrilling, it's like ascending to heaven.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Bystanders
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Drink pee, drink pee, drink pee.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Come on, drink it while it’s hot, come on.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Bystanders
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: Drink pee, drink pee, drink pee.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_5280_5460.text: You this

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Qing Jie
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: The doctor said, his brain has been severely hit. He might become a vegetative. Even if he wakes up, his intelligence will be affected.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: I told this damned kid not to touch that thing, told him not touch.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: A Hao, A Hao, I will deal with Fat Boy Chao.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "What Fat Boy Chao, it's the damn Hunter." "No matter what he does to me, I can let it slide." "But he messes with my brother, I'll make sure his whole family dies."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "You can't kill a cop," "Even in Britain," "If you fight with the British, we can't win."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "Why can't we fight them?" "Right now, all the goods in Hong Kong are in my hands," "All the police in Hong Kong are fed by me," "As long as I give the word," "Even burning down the police headquarters is possible."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "Cool down, cool down, just cool down."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "Do you know why things have turned out this way? Do you realize we're not invincible? Do you know why, despite all we've done, the Englishmen haven't laid a hand on us? It's because everything we do is within some kind of order."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "Do you know what our bottom line is?" "You crossed the line, you know that?" "You want to kill the police," "The British government won't let us go," "Then everyone will suffer," "What about our brothers, our wives and children?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: "Do you know what you are saying, Lei Luo?" "Do you know? Lei Luo?" "What do you mean by all this?" "Reversing roles?" "The Englishmen are not to be killed?" "When did you become the Queen's heir?" "Come here," "That's my brother in there," "What would you do if it was your son?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: Qing Jie
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: A Hao, A Ping is spitting out blood!

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: Call the doctor, call the doctor! Call the doctor quickly!

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: What you feared the most is finally happening.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Close the door first.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: News Broadcast
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Here is a special news report. Governor Sir Murray MacLehose has announced the establishment of the Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC) to specifically combat bribery and corruption in both public and private sectors. Sir Jack Cater has been appointed as Commissioner of the ICAC. A large number of personnel have been recruited to join the ICAC, and a statement was made that no personnel will be seconded from the civil service. This concludes the special news report.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "The ICAC," "is probably just a paper tiger." "Even the headquarters had an anti-corruption department before."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: The Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: So what? We just give them a bigger share.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Dad, I don't think so. I feel like they are serious this time.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "I don't believe they can deal with all the corrupt cops in Hong Kong. Who would manage the city's security then? Leave it to the gangs?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Ge Bo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Of course. I will fly to Spain tomorrow. Let's see if they can catch me and bring me back.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Those British, nine out of ten are corrupt.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: The Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "Are you the exclusive rent collector for Inspector Lei Luo?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: What rent collector? I am the landlord.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: ICAC
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "Every month, you collect the amount and distribute it to each police officer in the department, right?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Pay attention, I have no idea what you're talking about.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: The Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Inspector Yan Tong, you have sixteen accounts in Hong Kong. Altogether they hold ninety-eight million in deposits. Under your name are twenty-two buildings and seven luxury cars, including a Rolls-Royce and two restaurants. Your monthly salary is only three thousand two hundred dollars. How do you explain this?

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Yan Tong
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: I love gambling. And I'm lucky. I always win. I'm nicknamed the God of Gamblers.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Daughter
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "This morning, some people came saying they were from the ICAC, asking to take dad for an investigation. Dad got so agitated, that he had a heart attack."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Dad

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: The ICAC is not a paper tiger. They even dare to come after me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Alo, go.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.speaker: Sir Chow
movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: "Take Snow and the kids with you. Any later, and you won't be able to escape."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: Yes, I just wanted to tell you that I've submitted my resignation letter. I'm leaving for Canada tomorrow.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: Let's go together, not just for yourself, but for Ah Qing and the two kids too.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: You came in the middle of the night just to tell me this?

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: "No need" "You haven't been happy with what I've been doing these past two months, right?" "You blew up his car, I had people stop him" "You ambushed at the police station" "I had someone whisk him away" "Do you know why?" "If an English cop died, both you and I would be in trouble. Do you understand?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: "I've received word, the ICAC will move against me in two weeks" "Yan Tong will take my place" Without me, no one can help you. But you should know, I'm doing this for your own good."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: You're doing this for my good, I’m the tumor, that’s what you gave me.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: That's not how you count brotherhood, I've already handled quite a lot...

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: "You can’t forget, it was you who told me to go to Thailand" "Because of that, my brother Little Wei got killed" "Now my own blood brother lies in the hospital" "turned into a vegetable"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: I didn't expect it to turn out like this. I'm not a god, I can't control everything.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: "That's where you’re right, you can't control everything" "Life, we can’t control. Death, we can’t control" "Between life and death, I can control what I’m able to, I can choose my own path" "I call the shots"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: So, in the end, it boils down to you saving my life and me ruining yours, right? As long as I'm alive, shoot me, it’s fine to kill me with a single shot, come on.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: Alright, if you were good to me, you wouldn't have planted a needle by my side.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Rose, put down the gun. Tell Lei Luo what your name is.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: "Her name is Ah Hua; I raised her." "I sent her to Thailand and Taiwan for training." "By your side." "Someone so capable." "You, Lei Luo, wouldn't waste such talent, would you?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: "Alright." "Turning an abused little girl from the old buildings of Kowloon City into a rose, impressive." "But don’t think I don’t know." "Do you know what it means to turn a blind eye?" "Placing a needle by my side." "Do you even consider my feelings?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: "Do you even consider my feelings?" "If Rose wasn't by your side, I would have already been dealt with."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Qing Jie
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: The two kids won't sleep; they insist you go up and accompany them.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Alright, I've said what I needed to say. Let's end this here.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Ah Hua, help me see Lei Luo out.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: No need. I want to try the feeling of not having a needle by my side. Watch them closely.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Hey, weren't we meeting at the airport?

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Something big happened. A Hao is going after Hunter tonight.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: "I only trust Ah Zheng. Help me find Ah Zheng right away. This is evidence of Hunter's corruption. Have Ah Zheng give it to the ICAC."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: "Alright, got it." "Lei Luo, is that all?" "Do you have any other instructions?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: "I didn't even know such things were legal here, stop, we don't have to do it anymore, they all got caught. We don't have to do it anymore."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Peter, you decide where we go now.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Peter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: I want to go to Fifty.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Shev, drive carefully, or I'll arrest you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Don't worry, what are these two cars up to, what, what happened, drive, drive faster, go, I will kill you, let us down, I will kill you, I will twist your head off, let us down immediately, A Hao, where are the guns? In the trunk, the trunk, A Hao, let us down.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: "You bloody foreigners, corrupt in Hong Kong, seize anything you want. Hong Kong is yours? It's ours!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Peter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Hurry up and leave, you're done for, you think you can get away, open the door, open the door, put us down immediately, or else

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Shev, open the door, get up, get up, get out of here quickly.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6180_6360.text: Time to pay your debts, Hunter.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: Wait, call in the riot police, I want to block this place.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: "You're my last brother. Get as far away as possible.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: Why haven't you left? I told you to go. Don't you even listen to me? Do you believe I will shoot you? Fuck you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: "Weren't you trying to kill me?" Why are you running so fast?" "Don't run."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: Ah, you ran too fast, damn it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Fat Boy Chao
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: Open the door, open the door, open the door.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Yan Zheng
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: We received an order to catch a criminal named Wu Shihao in the city.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Police
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: "We are on a mission inside, no one is allowed in."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: Who said that, I asked you, who said that?

movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6540_6720.text: "He will be tomorrow. Before 12 noon, I am still Detective Chief Zhanghua. Even if Hunter comes, I won't give him face. Make way, make way."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.speaker: Piggy
movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.text: Damn, I've been hit, Lei Luo brother, leave a spot for me, I want to be with you in the next life, Lei Luo brother.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.text: You should go back to where you came from, Bo Hao, I'll kill you.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: A Hao, I'll take you out.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: "Damn you! Damn you! You can't kill me, I'm a British police officer, you should look up to me, you fisherman,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.speaker: Hunter
movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: "My country, we built this place," "We educated you," "Without me, you are still a damn fisherman!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_7080_7260.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_7080_7260.text: A Hao, don't push me. Those around us, all our brothers and sisters, died for us, none left. Shooting him won't bring them back. Give yourself a chance. Give your son a chance. Give Ah Jing a chance.

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: TV
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Convicted of drug trafficking, Lan was sentenced to thirty years. Drug lord Wu Shihao, also known as Hao, was granted early release due to terminal liver cancer.

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Is it A Hao, Lei Luo?

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Brother Luo, how have you been?

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Good. By the way, have you ever thought about coming out to take a walk? The environment here is nice.

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: "If I had to leave, I would have left long ago. I still like Hong Kong. If you asked me to choose again, which path would I take?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Heroes are shaped by the times. How can an era lack one or two heroes, right?

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Right, right. Smoke less, take care of your health.

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: Lei Luo
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Life and death are predestined, wealth and honor are in Heaven's hands.

movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.speaker: A Hao
movie101_6973286990817002015_7260_7440.text: Life and death are predestined, wealth and honor are in Heaven's hands.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: What I want to say is that while 'ability' is certainly important, being a good person is the key. But what is the key to being a good person? Acting skills.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Long Ge

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Long Ge
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Hmm

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Your birthday is in just over six months.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Long Ge
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Thank you

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Long Ge
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: I fully agree with Secretary-General Shen Mo's opinion. Life is like a play, and the key is acting skills. Ah, come, let's raise our glasses together. Eat and drink well.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Okay, hey, have you seen my watch?

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Come on, second sister-in-law, a toast to you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Legend of the Police World
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Now, let's have our veteran captain, the Legend of the Police World, give some guidance to the young officers present.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: The people present
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Okay.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Legend of the Police World
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: "In my half-life, I've solved countless cases and caught countless thieves, but I still have two major regrets. First, I have not caught the thief king Bi Jinlong. That guy—I can recognize him even if he turned to ashes. There's still another regret..."

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: PK
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Who is it?

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: PK
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Ah, Secretary-General Shen Mo

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: The organization entrusted you with the important task of managing the bonus, but you two are up to these antics. How am I supposed to explain this to the higher-ups?

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Passerby
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Come on, let's drink together.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Legend of the Police World
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Snot

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: PK
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Brother Shen Mo, give me a break.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: It's clear that you two truly love each other. Don't let this happen again.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: PK
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: "Thank you, Brother Shen Mo."

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Let's pretend I was never here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: "Society is a stage. Life is a play. Everyone has their role. And my roles exceed just one. But all my roles are to assist the police in punishing evil."

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Don't run!

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: PK
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: This, this, this is mine.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Yours, huh? Caught you red-handed. Take him away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: No one knows who I am because the best performance leaves no trace.

movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_180_360.text: Like many others, I hope to make my long life more meaningful. But what is meaningful, I don't know. I just know that each of my roles needs to be accepted by others.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: The test results are out, have his family been contacted yet?

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Can't contact them. Just tell me the diagnosis directly. I can handle any result.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: This patient suffers from glioblastoma.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: It's the most malignant brain cancer. An optimistic estimate, he can survive for three to six months. During this time, he might experience epilepsy, speech loss, paralysis and intellectual decline.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: He might also show symptoms of dementia.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: But tell his family not to lose heart. Encourage the patient to actively cooperate with our treatment. There's still a one percent chance he can survive.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: There's a time when the curtain falls for every show. Every character has its day of farewell performance.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Some shows are long and tasteless, some are short and brilliant.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: "For better stage management, I must deftly control my body."

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: But in fact, my body has become increasingly foreign to me, time is pressing, the show, must go on.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: I tell you, this oil can only be twenty per barrel, usual rule.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: No, thirty.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Twenty

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: That's too little.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Twenty is not little, twenty-five.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Twenty

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: It's so cheap, gutter oil, isn't it?

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: "Screw you, go do your work."

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Where was I?

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Deal

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: The oil seller
movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Stop nagging, unload the truck.

movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.speaker: Shen Mo
