movie101_7052960987330118151_360_540.text: Sister-in-law, you know how sick our dog has become.

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "That'll surely kill someone"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: Serve the dish, Jinx, come on.

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Here is your order, take your time"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Sister-in-law, I need to talk to you"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "What's the matter? Don't dawdle."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "You know that Drunken Immortal wine of ours?""It's nine yuan a bottle""That'd surely kill someone"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Shut your jinx mouth"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: No, what's happening?

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Don't worry, I'll take him to the hospital."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Something really happened!"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "What's happening? Little Shen, how is he?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Boss, I'm at the emergency room door, he's definitely not going to make it, you and Sister-in-law have been good to me, you should run, I'll take the blame."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "What are you talking about? How can I let you face this alone? Aren't we brothers? Our people are loyal. How can I just leave? That's not my character."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Brother, don't waste time with all that character stuff, this time let me repay you and sister-in-law, I'm uneducated, if it weren't for you taking me in, I wouldn't even have food by now, I have no attachments, just an old mother at home, when I go in, please take care of her for me."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "I'll give you my home address now"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "I can't hear you"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Hey, Brother Zhu, hey, Boss"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Why are you getting angry at it? Are you withdrawing money?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Withdrawing what money? There's no money left in the account"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: "Sister-in-law"
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: Call the police!

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Why are you calling the police? Is your brain fried? The police are after us both now."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Guest
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "How should we spend Old Zhu's money?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Save it for him first"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Guest
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "I did eat that dog meat\"\"Didn't even use a double\"\"I risked my life acting\"\"Can you at least give me some nutrition money?\"\"I can't earn money with you\"\"Can't date girls\"\"You might withstand this, but I can't"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Once this job is done, you can leave"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Guest
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "What do you mean? I've been with you for half a year, now you want to cut ties?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "Just remember the promises you made to me initially."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Guest
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "I've already turned over a new leaf, and you think I'd settle for such a small amount of money? Look, how about this, I get you a couple, guarantee you'll use them."

movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.speaker: Young Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_540_720.text: "I've been kidnapped, hurry bring twenty thousand to ransom me, or they'll kill me"

movie101_7052960987330118151_720_900.text: You guys tell me, how many times have I said this, what's in your heads, what do we rely on, what do we survive on, it’s our hard work, there's a saying, details determine success or failure.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1080_1260.text: Eyelashes curl, eyes blinking wink, Why do the words turn away when they reach our lips? Your smile, like the crescent moon, sets a romantic mood, just needing your company. Eyelashes curl, eyes blinking wink.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1080_1260.text: A special thanks to MC Ninth Round for the gift of a little car. Actually, I don't really need a little car. I only need nine hundred and eight to bring it home. Kisses during the day, and at night...

movie101_7052960987330118151_1260_1440.text: Got any booze, if not, I'm trashing your shop, cheers!

movie101_7052960987330118151_1260_1440.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_1260_1440.text: Cheers. There's a kind of person, who doesn't know what they have to do tomorrow, just like me, I really have no idea, where I should go tomorrow, because I, don’t know who, will be waiting for me somewhere, a woman's happiness, she can't wait for it, the more you wait, ah, the more your heart hurts, the more you wait, oh my, the more desperate you become, The night is so beautiful tonight, it’s a pity there's no moon, I feel like it's been a long time since I saw the moon.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1260_1440.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1260_1440.text: "Your son, failing to get his salary, stabbed the boss seventeen times", "causing serious injuries", "suspected of intentional harm", "He’s now under our control", "Do you want to settle this privately or go public", "Going public means ten years.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Settle privately for a hundred thousand, I am the private attorney of the victim, I suggest a public settlement, but the boss wants to keep this scandal under wraps.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Grandma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: The call won't go through, something's really happened.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Grandpa
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: "Don't go public, settle it privately, privately"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: "Is this what you meant?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Oh my, I told you I didn't misjudge you. Come, come, come, sit, sit, sit. What are you standing there for? Quickly, quickly, quickly, quickly, quickly.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Call those three idiots in here for me

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: The female employee wearing glasses
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Um

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Hey, I've paid the internet bill, why did it suddenly disconnect?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Want me to take a look? I studied computer science before.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Oh my, you're amazing, come, come, come, come on, I really like you, a versatile talent, come, come, come, come on.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: The three employees
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Hello, Jia Zong.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: What a bunch of idiots! Learn proper Mandarin like young Shen Mo, alright? Don't be so unambitious all the time. Look at young Shen Mo, he's been here only a few days and his performance is so good. Young Shen Mo is talented, whereas you are all just fools. I've watched you three grow up, not a single one of you is promising.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Purple-clothed underling
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Third Uncle

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Shut up, don't think that just because you're related to me you don't need to work hard. We are a modern enterprise, we don't talk about kinship, we don't form cliques, we don't keep freeloaders.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: "Are you having any trouble?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: No, there's just a lot of junk. I'll help you clean it up.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: good industry

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: "Stand properly, all of you," I keep emphasizing, "What do we rely on to earn a living? Brains, brains, brains! Don't spend all day shaking your phones, opening red envelopes, chatting online, and chasing stars and shopping, I'm talking about you! Can't you enrich your minds a bit? Be smart like young Shen Mo."

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: It's done, Jia Zong

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Young Shen Mo's work is excellent

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: I live on the Loess Plateau, a strong wind blows over the hill, blows over, blows over, no matter if it's a northwest wind or a southeast wind, it's all my song, my song, yeah!

movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1440_1620.text: Thank you, thank you very much

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Thank you all for the support and help from my fans.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Next, I have an announcement to share. One of my fans has unfortunately been diagnosed with brain cancer. He is in urgent need of medical funds right now.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: As for myself, I have already donated three thousand yuan, here's the remittance slip. I hope everyone can extend a helping hand to assist him, because my own ability is limited. I want to thank everyone here in advance.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: "You're the scammer" "Your whole family are scammers" "Today, I'm going to exhaust you, you damn fool" "Grandson, I've transferred another ten thousand yuan to you, check your account".

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Who are you talking to?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: There was a scammer today, pretending to be my fan, sent me a text saying they were diagnosed with brain cancer and asking for donations. I told them I transferred the money, made the bastard run to the ATM over ten times. With that kind of intelligence, and they still try to scam people.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Even if you don't donate, you shouldn't fool others, what if it's true?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: The address is fake, the information is fake, the ID is fake, everything is fake, only the money is truly gone, transferred tens of thousands in a blink, why aren't you so generous with me? This ‘good person’, and ‘intuition’ of yours, this is your intuition, I'm embarrassed for you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: "Do you like her or what?" "She's not even that good-looking" "That girl's acting skills are better than yours, just concede", then stood up and sat down on another sofa seat. Du Yu seeing that Shen Mo still did not speak, decided to change the subject: "Should we transfer the money from Lightyear Company's account?".

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Alright, understood. Let's not touch it yet. Fatten it up before we do.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Check her IP address.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Another one, no, can we really handle each one? Biting off more than we can chew. Didn't you use to prefer stability? Why are you so aggressive now?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: We used to do offline marketing, it's the age of e-commerce now, we should do B2C, engage in PR.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Boss Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Don't understand, can you put it more simply?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: It means to do publicity.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Boss Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: We also do publicity.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: We stick on American trademarks, and what we copy is the whole set of authorization procedures, we lack nothing.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Boss Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: "Yeah, we lack nothing" "except for effectiveness" "You tell me, I'm listening to your plan".

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Find a celebrity for endorsement

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Wait, wait!

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Hello, Boss Shen.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: Ma Xiaoli teacher, where are you now? I'm waiting for you at the gate of the community.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: No need, no need, I, I know my way there, you're too polite.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1620_1800.text: How about

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: If it wasn't for the company cars being scheduled for maintenance today, I would have definitely arranged a ride for you, I think I see you, a Porsche, right?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Porsche

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Looks like you over there, Xiaoli Ma Teacher,

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: I see you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: I almost didn't recognize you, dressed all fancy, what's the big idea, don't think just because you've got a little success that you can start showing off, we don't need to meet clients, special job types, keep it low-key, low-key, got it?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Today, this suit for the blind date, it's borrowed.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Blind date, such a big deal, that

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: No, no.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Girl
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: You'd have to be blind to fall for him, even if he wore dragon robes, he'd still be a country bumpkin.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Right, right, right.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: How can you speak like that, remember unity, chest out, chin up, be confident, alright then,

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Today, when Xiaoli Ma Teacher arrives, try to act natural, relax.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Especially Big Head, acting like he's not fully awake everyday, as soon as he sees a girl he's all over her, those eyes just gluing onto them.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Xiaoli Ma Teacher

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: You're, Shen Mo General Manager,

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: General Manager Shen, no, no, it's not, General Manager Shen, has been waiting for you to order.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: No need, I rarely eat much in the evenings now, you order.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: "This one," "and this one," "all of this row,"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, just wait a moment.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Hey, hey, hey, Old Sun, what's going on?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Old Sun
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: My wife is giving birth, I'm rushing to the hospital.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: What about the cook?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Old Sun
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: "It's a day of great joy, the cook's off for the day,"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: No, no, no, no, no, don't be like that, what about me? My guests are waiting for their food.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Old Sun
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: You've got ingredients, you've got pots, just handle it yourself.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Hey, hey

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Xiaoli Ma Teacher, it really is you. Just now at the door, I thought I had recognized the wrong person. My name is Shen Mo.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: "I also thought I had recognized the wrong person,"

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Please, take a seat, we have serious matters to discuss, you all hurry back to the production line.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Company underling
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Yes, Shen Mo General Manager.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1800_1980.text: Glad you could make it back, look at Xiaoli Ma Teacher, she doesn't

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: If she doesn't drink, I'll just drink casually.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: First, let me introduce our company's brand to Mr. Ma. We are an international brand registered and authorized by the American W00 pharmaceutical group. I believe someone of your status, Mr. Ma, must have heard of us. We have just entered the Chinese market and are looking for a famous and influential celebrity in China to endorse us. We've discussed this and think that you are the best choice, Mr. Ma. Actually, we were planning to hold this meeting at the ultra-five-star hotel next to our company. But considering that you, Mr. Ma, are from the Northeast and we know that you always keep things low-key, we specifically arranged this meeting here in this unique Northeastern restaurant. Please sit down. I'll go out to handle some business and will be right back.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Jia Zong, you guys just happen to pass by here?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: You think I didn't know? It's your birthday today. A Lian is really thoughtful and always remembers. Celebrating employees' birthdays is an essential part of our corporate culture. I must be here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Thank you Jia Zong, but I might not be able to take care of you guys today.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Oh well, you just go ahead with your date. We are here to boost your score. You just come over for a drink later, okay?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: A Lian
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Just have a good, serious date!

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Isn't that the girl from just now? She still won't admit it.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: A Lian
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Pretending to be ignorant.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Mr. Ma, you do have a lot of fans.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Yes, I didn't expect that either.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: The restaurant is short-staffed today, so I'm stepping in as a waiter. I'm very honored to serve Mr. Ma personally.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Left and right cuts, red beans, big red beans, yam.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: You've worked hard.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Another table, huh? I can't handle it.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: They saw my fake ID and thought it was my birthday today.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: I can't do it. The one-table-after-another thing has exhausted this poor kid. I can't play along. You do it. I want to see how you do it.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: I'll transfer $100,000 to your account.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Stop playing tricks on me! Repeat what you said, I'm going to record it.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Today is an important day for Little Shen. Everyone mustn't cause any trouble. Only when an employee's happiness is settled can the company generate greater profits. Got it?

movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.speaker: A Lian
movie101_7052960987330118151_1980_2160.text: Uncle, what about me

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Come come come, I'm sorry, Mr. Jia, today is special, I didn't take good care of you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: "I said I wouldn't bother you" "We are self-service now" "Come on" "I wish you success and happy birthday"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: President Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Shen Zong, what are you busy with? There's a big thing here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Those guys owe me some money. It's not hard to understand that debtors are bosses these days, isn't it? But Professor Xiaoli Ma, I believe our upcoming cooperation is definitely going to be a win-win situation.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: A Lian
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: What are you playing at, all you men are liars.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Mr. Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Aren't you being too harsh? It's not easy to find a wife these days. Can you let little Shen Mo play along? Let's mind our own business.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: A Lian
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Waiter, hurry up and serve the food, why are you so slow?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: It's fine. Once I pay back the money, I don’t have to save their face anymore.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: President Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: This debtor really did become the boss, I'll go and ask them.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: Professor Xiaoli Ma, it's important here. Excuse me.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Our next step in advertising is to not only broadcast on video sites, but also on major mainstream media across the country.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Please allow me to introduce myself.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: This is the leader, this is the leader

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: "I hope for your success in holding hands today."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: President Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Thank you, thank you, I have no problem on my end, come.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: This is our introducer.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Thank you for your hard work.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: I think this is not a trivial matter after all, we need to understand further.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: That's right, that's right. I guarantee with my personality, Shen Mo is a very reliable person.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: This girl is a police officer.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Young people's affairs, I won't interfere.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Very well, very well.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Shen Mo, please come with me.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Go ahead and eat.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Why are you dating a police officer? Are you seeking death?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: "I just found out."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Actually, money is not the issue. I need to live up to consumers' trust in me. So, I want to try your product myself first, and then I'll make my decision.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: President Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Great, I have a weight-loss pill right now, I have it ready, feel free to take it, I assure you it won't be fatal, thank you so much, Xiaoli Ma.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: I certainly won't do anything to betray the company.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: What's your introducer doing?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: This wine is really strong, it's okay, the elders in their village care about the younger generation like this.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Where did you park your car?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: I came by a tuk-tuk.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Shall I send a company car to take you back?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Great, thank you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Look at my brain, company car.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: "It's sent for maintenance and hasn't come back, right?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: is

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: The restaurant owner hasn't returned yet either, right? That table doesn't look like they owe you money.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: I knew it. But, Xiaoli Ma, I'll confess. "I'm just a waiter in the restaurant." "I owe a huge amount of money." "I finally found such a decent job in a pharmaceutical company." "I want to perform well."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Aren't you tired?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Hey, where are you going?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Tired, really tired.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: Help me get straightened up.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Actually, I have brain cancer. I've been working so many part-time jobs just to gather enough money for medical expenses. I haven't told anyone about this. I'm afraid they'll worry about me.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: I think lately, a lot of people have been getting this illness. It's almost become an epidemic. Once you get it, there's no curing it. You won't live much longer. So, you should just enjoy life, eat and drink what you like. Take it easy and have a little fun, see if there's any wish you haven't fulfilled yet. Or, if there's still money left unspent, I could help you with that.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: "Sis, how about I give you a foot massage? I also work part-time at a massage parlor,"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Taxi, give me that medicine. How are you going to explain it if you take it back?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: "Sis, what if it actually works? Give it a try."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Do you think I'd believe what you say? Drive.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: I've brought some soup. You must be anxious, sorry for keeping you waiting. I just couldn't get away earlier.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: "This soup is meant to be drunk before bed. It’s nutritious, beautifying, and can even help with sleep. You have to drink it while it’s hot. It can't be reheated. Once reheated, it loses its nutrients. Don't you take it, let me carry it in for you."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: What are you doing? Take a good look at yourself holding your soup, you poor jerk. Get lost.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: "Then I'll just leave the soup here and go."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Take your soup and get lost with it.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: Fatso
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Honey, you look so happy today.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: General Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Come on, buddy. You look so familiar to me.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.speaker: General Yao
movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Do we live in the same building? Here's a toast to you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "Girl, don't touch everything," "Have some quality."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "In our village, those who owe money has the worst quality."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Are you back?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Is it all done?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "How did the talk go?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Don't ask. Nobody ask anything. You, go away immediately.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Ah, I'll go, I'll go. It's all my fault, my fault, my bad. I'll go away, I'll go away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Hey, you can't blame the matchmaker if the matchmaking didn't work, besides, they are the elders.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: What matchmaking are you talking about?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "The person who just left was not like this, how come he comes back like another person?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: How come he's drunk again? Sorry, he's just like this when he drinks too much. Come on, let's go home. Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: I feel miserable.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Feeling miserable

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Ah, I'm so miserable, so miserable, so miserable, so miserable.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "Living is so tiring."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "You guys, don't drink with him in the future." "He's too divisive."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "You've had your fun and games, birthday celebrations, and matchmaking sessions. I'm as exhausted as an old man. Just because of your trivial matter today, my lifetime's happiness has been ruined by you. Do you know what the girl called me? Huh? A poor loser. If it weren't for following you, I would just snap my fingers and tens of thousands would roll in."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "What's the matter, can't stand it anymore? Nobody is forcing you."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Clean up inside later.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "What do you think," "if a guy saw you having a nosebleed," "what would it be?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: One of the sisters
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "He must be sick."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: "Isn't it a sign of liking?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.speaker: One of the sisters
movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Sis, you're overthinking.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Eh, what are you guys going to do about the contract? I signed it anyway.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: The platform is high, resources are plenty, we must sign, I don't want to be stuck in this lousy place anymore.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister Li

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Ah

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "What's your take?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "Will our boss agree?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Does he have a say? He doesn't even sign a contract with us. It's just a makeshift outfit.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Exactly, look at this company now, it's so legitimate.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "This doesn't seem right."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Just give a heads-up later.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister Li, are you done yet? I'm brushing my gums off here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Yes, sister, the pills are pretty strong today. "You've been glued to the toilet."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Talent Agency Manager
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Following your instructions, I have arranged everything for these three girls. Honestly, these three girls have indeed performed well. Your discernment is commendable.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Talent Agency Manager
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Brother Shen Mo, rest assured, we've long stopped those old illegal programs. Following your guidance, we've successfully transformed and found a new profitable model. Here's my business card.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Quite a few titles.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Talent Agency Manager
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Don't laugh, the more identities I have, the less of myself remains.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "How much are these cucumbers?" "Do you have better ones?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Don't touch, I've bought all the cucumbers.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "Sister, what a coincidence, what are you doing here?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: I forgot you live here too.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Fate

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: I think, this outfit suits you better.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister, our restaurant buys in bulk, don't mind. If you like cucumbers, I'll save you a couple.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Alright, thank you, but I'm avoiding cucumbers today.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister, I've got two extra cucumbers. Do you want them?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Hmph, no need. Keep it for yourself.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister, you've lost weight, were you using those pills?

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "With your unreliable character and an untrustworthy company, do you think I would dare try it?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "You don't have to try them," "Although the pills are effective," "There can be some side effects initially," "Like diarrhea or so," "But it goes away with use," "And the results get better with continuous use."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "Do you think I would still believe you?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Sister, hurry up, I can't hold it anymore, sis, sis.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Hang in there.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: They're here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Customer
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Boss, a bowl of noodles, please.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: "We don't have any," "The place is closed."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Hey, sis, we meet again.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: What bad luck, shouldn't have gone out today. Is there another way home?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Little Shen Mo, didn't you see Xiaoli Ma carrying so many things? We're all neighbors, lend a hand and help carry it over.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Come on, Xiaoli Ma, let me help you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: No need.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: I'll give you a chance, take mine.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Keep the balance

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Thank you

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Thank you, thank you. Just put it here, right here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Everything is nice in this community, except for the many rooms, the toilets that don't work well, electrical circuits and pipes that are aging, a lot needs to be replaced.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Hey, how do you know that?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: I often come here to deliver food, I'm familiar with the property management. A lot of the rooms, things don't work well, I've fixed them myself. Is there anything broken at your place? Might as well fix it now that I'm here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Our Li Jie has fixed everything. These little things are no problem for her.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Don't chat with unreliable folks. Hurry upstairs and get things organized.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Bye-bye

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: We're neighbors, just shout if you need help.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Um, are you afraid of cockroaches?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Is it there?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Where was it before?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Mary
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: There, there, there, lift the carpet, that side, over there.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Nope.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Sis, you perform so well, just relying on this book?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Enough of that. Fifty-five yuan, money wasted. Sis’s success today, let me tell you, is because of my talent and hard work. Besides, you're so young, why don't you do something more serious instead of fooling around all day?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: 'Sorry, I forgot, you have a problem in your head.'

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: I'm learning acting, too.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Aren't you just left with the last three months? Why waste that time?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: 'Actually, when I was very young, my parents passed away. I grew up with my aunt. My aunt has a strong personality, married three times, and as far as I remember, it’s just continuous transfers, moving, fighting, and running away. I often wonder why I can't be like other kids.'

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: 'Why do we only live once? There are so many things that there's not enough time to do, so many emotions that we never get the chance to feel.'

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: I think, maybe acting can make up for these regrets, to experience different lives. If that's the case, three months will be enough.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "I think, you should not be too pessimistic, you must believe, in this world, miracles can happen"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Hey sis, why don't you teach me how to perform?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Enough, you perform pretty well."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Hey, Xiaoli Ma, is Shen Mo the one who had a nosebleed for you last time, isn't he? He's a nice guy, isn't he?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Qi Qi
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "What's good about a poor loser, don't push our sister into a fire pit, am I right, sis?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Poor is poor, but at least he's genuine"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Sis Xiaoli, don't lock the door, okay? My phone is in there."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Miss Xiaoli Ma, right\"\"We are from the Angel Foundation\"\"The money you donated to our foundation\"\"The transfer had a problem\"\"The bank needs to further check your personal information"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Why does your voice sound familiar?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Miss, please do not digress. The situation of the person being rescued is very critical. Please provide your personal information as soon as possible, thank you."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Okay, okay, okay. Are you ready to record now?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Have you noticed that since Little Shen was dumped, he has focused more on work?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: People
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "What's the use of that, no matter what, isn't he still a scammer?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Thank you for your cooperation with our work, on behalf of the foundation, I thank you for your charitable heart, thank you."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Mr. Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: You cannot put personal feelings above the work of the organization, understand?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: woman
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Are you busy, do you have time?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Not busy at all, there's plenty of time.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Don't forget what you're here for

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Sis, why are you free to have dinner here today?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Boss, five more beers please"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Here it is, here it is. All the money in Xiaoli Ma's card, who knows which scammer transferred it away. So I'm treating you all to a meal today. Let's be happy, to ease the tension. Okay, okay, you can go back, go back to the kitchen to cook.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Keep drinking!

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Come on! Come on! I'll sit.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Xiaoli Ma, ah, when the boss is not here, I'm in charge, cheers! Cheers!

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Cheers!

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "What are you stupefied for, go and place the order, don't forget what you're here for, come on!"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: "Teacher Ma, please take your time eating."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Ignorant

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: "Why are you lying on the tree if you're not cooking? Do you want to work or not? Go cook."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Mr. Ma, you are really quite happy.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: "What else can I do if I'm not happy," "Should I just die?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Short-haired Girl
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Sis, what if you really get into the drama academy? Then the tuition will be gone.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: If it's gone, it's gone, I'll earn it again.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Just these few dishes, you're taking forever, if you don't want to do it, don't, no one's forcing you, come on, add two more fancy dishes.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: I've investigated, your intuition was right, Ma Xiaoli is a good girl.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Here it comes, huh.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: What is this, what a mess.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Look how embarrassed you've made him, oh my, just let these dishes go, I'll take over.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Okay

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Dear guests, please wait a moment.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Short-haired Girl
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Sister Li is so pitiful.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Long-haired Girl
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: These scammers are so hateful, don't let me catch them, I'll cut off their little brothers, and they'll give birth with no assholes.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: I'm talking to you, do you still want to eat here? Go lend a hand.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Sis, I'll help you wash the vegetables.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: "I wasn't crying," "The onions are just too strong." "I'm not sad at all," "Look at those with terminal illnesses," "Aren't they living happily?" "What's this compared to that?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Sis, didn't you say you believe in miracles? Maybe in a few days, the money will come back.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Are you trying to comfort me?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: "Do you believe in miracles then, insincere?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoli Ma
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Dear guests, I've rescued them.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Everyone
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Good, good, good.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: I don't want anything, I just want freedom, I beg you, please let me go, I don't know anything about your affairs.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.speaker: The man watching the surveillance
movie101_7052960987330118151_3420_3600.text: Baby

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Boss
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "You can't want nothing", "I give you freedom", "because you brought me happiness", "gave me all the beautiful memories", "how can I bear to let you go"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Du Yu, aren't you afraid of danger being with me?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: I'm not scared, I like the thrill.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: So you're with me, just for the thrill?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Of course not, I want to be thrilled with you for a lifetime.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Then, let's leave this place.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "Sure"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: But, but how will we live?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "I have money"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: I'll just sleep holding you, I promise I won't touch you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Stop it, I hate it when you do that.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "Turn off the lights, turn off the lights, let me show you a trick."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Come over, take off your clothes.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Hey, hey, hey, what are you doing?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: He Dachang
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Turn off the lights

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: He Dachang
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Yuanpeng Jun

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Yuanpeng Jun
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Please rest assured, I will make the two of them disappear in an artistic way.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Yuanpeng Jun
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Ichiro Kitano

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Yuanpeng Jun
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Boss, why didn't you answer my call? I forgot to ask earlier, what about travel expenses?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "I need money."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: No money

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: What about the money from the Lightyear Company?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: It's not the right time, that's not our money either, don't forget our original pledge, we're not doing this for the money.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Then what for?, "Your so-called justice?", "You were a criminal", "and now you're committing a crime", "you've known from the start", "that Ma Xiaoli is a good girl", "and yet you still deceived her."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: It's precisely because of good people like her, such foolishly good people, that it emboldens those people, to become more outrageous, without any scruples.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.speaker: Du Yu
movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: "Nonsense", "the way you treat Ma Xiaoli", "is like how I used to bully girl classmates when I was a kid", "you have no idea", "how to express your feelings", "you're just cold-blooded", "stop acting", "after playing so many roles", "do you even know", "which one is the real you?", "You're just a freak"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: It's okay if you quit, but don't relapse, otherwise I won't let you go.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Man
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: The accident was caused by evasion, a tractor driving against traffic, but there was no collision, so we can't hold them accountable, and we can't confirm the tire incident, I have put a lot of thought into this for your brother.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Maybe Du Yu is right, I am also guilty, this is my punishment, it's soon over, for this perfect, finale performance, I have to hang in there, but I wonder, should I also have some parting words.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Shen Mo, what are you doing here this late at night?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Sis, it's too dark here at night, I've been looking for a long time, and I don't even know which apartment is yours.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Cut it out, you're really funny.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Sis, I need your help with something, as long as you sign the endorsement contract, you will get 100,000 yuan right away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: No problem, I won't charge a cent, I'll do the endorsement for you for free, But Shen Mo, we should have conscience, and take the right path, do you want to learn acting? I'll give you this opportunity

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Do you want insomnia, do you want diarrhea, do you want infertility, do you want to be thin and pale like me?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Lishen diet pills, you will see the effect immediately

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: "What I'm losing is not weight, it's health,"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Ah, how far is it from being a goddess to a ghost?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Eat this, it's just a step away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Ma Xiaoli
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Bro, look at me, I took AiLiSheng weight loss pills, do I look slim?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Slim, enough, really.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: "What are you laughing at?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: This guy didn't sober up from drinking last time, what's going on?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Hello

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: "Are you Yao Dezhi, the legal representative of Trustworthy Pharmaceutical Company? Listen up! This is the City Industry and Commerce Bureau. Someone reported that your company is involved in producing and selling fake products. Please bring your company's relevant documents to our bureau tomorrow morning for inspection. No time? We can handle it over the phone. Then give us your company's documents, product details, registration accounts, and other relevant information."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Rest assured, we strictly abide by the law and are not afraid of inspections. Please hold on.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: It's the Bureau of Industry and Commerce. Answer whatever they ask you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Little Brother
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Oh

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Little Brother
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Hello

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: It seems I can't stay in this place anymore.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Little Brother
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Yes, yes, yes, oh right, right, right.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Hey, Lao Chen

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Old Chen
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Old Yao, old Yao, listen to me! I got scammed over the phone. My silly wife transferred money to someone else's 'safety account'.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yao Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Are you that naive? Such a small trick can fool you? Why not me? I don't care about that. Give me the money right away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Little Brother
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Ah, yes, the account number is 6220801702.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Jia Zong
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: My dear Xiao Shen, you're my idol. You earned two deals in one morning, you're the lucky star of our company. Here, this is yours. Hahaha, what are you all standing around for? Applaud, cheer!

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yuan Pengjun
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: I am the first.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Yes, yes, yes, I am the first. Are you Japanese?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Yuan Pengjun
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Miss, I am a Japanese overseas Chinese, new here. Could you please tell me where this address is?

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Ah, I know, I know, it's just, it's just over there, oh my, let me take you.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.speaker: Yuan Pengjun
movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: The elevator is about to go.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.speaker: Xiao Wei
movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: What should we do, He Dachang will definitely not let us go, but we have no money, where can we go?

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.speaker: Doctor
movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: There's no money in your card.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: Hi, I thought you might not have eaten yet, this is my favorite cake, I

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: Lan Lan
movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: I think I might have lost something here.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: President Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: The greater the capacity for alcohol, the greater the ability for business. Everyone needs to fill up their glasses.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: Shen Mo
movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: President Jia, allow me to toast to you alone.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: President Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: No, no, no.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: President Jia
movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: Alina, give him the child’s drink. If you drink again and split, I can't bear it. Alright, our brotherhood is not found in liquor, cheers.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.speaker: Lan Lan

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Staff Member
