movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Come with me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: "Are you crazy?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Staff Member
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Call security.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Put the memory back, retrieve her memory for me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Security Guard A
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: "Calm down."

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Retrieve it for me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Security Guard B
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Don't be hasty.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Get out of my way, restore her memories, right now.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Security Guard C
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: What are you doing? Put the gun down.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Retrieve the memory again.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Retrieve it again.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: I've already given you a chance.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: Please.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: It's too late. This was already the second procedure.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: All the memories have been deleted.

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: "I have already signed the divorce agreement" "I didn’t change anything" "You can sign it" "You can check the property division again if you are not assured" "I also plan to sell this house" "We can split it half and half" "I’ve already entrusted an agent to handle it."

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: Why, wasn't it you who wanted to leave?

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: "Can you wait a bit longer?" "I have something to say to you"

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: I just want to talk to my husband

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: "You don’t look like my husband now," "I’m asking you," "Do you remember where you proposed to me?" "And where we spent our honeymoon?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: I proposed to you on the rooftop, we were very poor at that time, had no money for a honeymoon, I remember all these, the surgery only erased, details and emotions.

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: Anyway, I won’t sign until you retrieve those memories.

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: Mr. Jiang Feng, we will now begin memory restoration.

movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.speaker: Please provide the Chinese text to be translated.
Please provide the Chinese text to be translated.
movie101_6992521335159292452_540_720.text: "Mr. Jiang Feng" "I will prescribe some sleeping pills for you" "To help you enter deep sleep" "Under normal circumstances" "Just two or three good slumbers" "Will reactivate the retrieved memories" "Which means memory reloading" "But I need to remind you" "Memories written into the brain through reloading" "Once more than seventy-two hours pass" "They will be permanently saved"

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: In other words, if I want to have my memory erased again, I would need to undergo another surgery within seventy-two hours.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Boss
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: To be precise, it's within 72 hours starting from the first memory reload. And it's not about taking it out, it's about permanent deletion, currently, there is no technology capable of extracting memories twice. During this time, Mr. Jiang Feng, you may also want to think it over. If you really decide to undergo the surgery, please let us know in advance.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: Can't we wait until all the memories are restored before we decide?

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: I was just about to order takeout.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: I brought you food, medicine, books, and clothes for you to change into.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: I saw her, she's doing well so don't worry.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: I just wanted to report that I'm safe.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: 'If you keep doing this,' 'does it make any sense to hide?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: Thank you for taking care of me all this time, but there are some things, I must go back and clarify things with him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: No need, I can handle it by myself.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Your hospital really must have messed up my memory

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Mr. Jiang, we do have a confidentiality agreement signed, we won't look into your memory content, that is to say, we are only responsible for the security of the memory chip, not the content itself.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "But the memory should be continuous, right?" "It can't just pop out of nowhere like this, can it?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Didn't I tell you it would take three days to fully recover? Maybe in a couple of days, you'll remember everything from start to finish.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "How about I go over it again with Mr. Jiang"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: If it's our problem, we will definitely take responsibility. But as of now, all your suspicions have no proof. They're all just your conjectures.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: I've already checked the data, this surgery has not been approved in many countries, that means it definitely has flaws in certain areas.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Mr. Jiang, do you know how modern plastic surgery started?

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Let me tell you, after World War I, many soldiers suffered facial injuries. At that time, the development of plastic surgery not only helped them reconstruct their faces but also rebuilt their self-confidence, allowing them to return to normal life better. Now, cosmetic surgery has evolved from negative rescue to positive improvement, everyone has the opportunity to become a better version of themselves.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Why are you telling me all this

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Let me finish, such a surgery that helps people seek beauty was once pointed out as potentially allowing criminals to change their appearance and escape legal sanctions, do you think that's reasonable?

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "Our memory surgery is the same as plastic surgery" "One is to remedy physical imperfections" "the other is to heal emotional wounds" "Our surgery's intentions are clearly good" "It depends on how the person using it chooses to think"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "What do you mean?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: What I mean is, how would I know whether you stored your emotional memories or your memories of committing a murder

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: What did you say?

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Please.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: You leave

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Please leave.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Assistant
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Someone, quick, call the police!

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "I fell from the bike on my own"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Xiao Yun
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "It was clearly dad who hit you"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: I told you not to talk nonsense

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: "You better lie down, this will make things worse for you"

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: You handled Li Hui Lan's medical file, please confirm it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: No need to look, June 9th last year, two broken ribs.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Fractured ulna on the left arm, and multiple soft tissue contusions, right?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Yes, come, sign here, you remember it quite well, huh?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Shanshan, sorry for making you take another trip.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: It's fine.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Officer Shen, then I'll be going, I've also made an appointment to see a house with an agent.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Okay, I'm finished here too.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Oh right, Officer Shen, could you get me an observer's pass? I want to see her husband being sentenced with my own eyes.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I'll figure out a way.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Thank you

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Oh, hey, take her, uh, go quickly, hey hurry hurry, take her.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Shanshan, are you buying a house?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Go see with the agent.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I do have a few places I can recommend to you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Really? Alright then.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: What's wrong? Discover something?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Officer, has the murderer been found?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: What's it to you? Sit back down.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: But officer, I have a clue.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: What kind of clue do you have? Let's hear it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Did this woman, did she run away from home before she died?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Then I won't see you out.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Ah, you're busy, you're busy.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Mm.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: She must have been hiding out with the murderer.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: You saw it?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Hmm, ah no.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Do you realize what you are saying?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: That's the thing, officer, um, a while back, I had a memory surgery at the Memory Master Medical Center, but after I got my memories back, I vividly saw this woman being killed.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: The famous writer, so you mean you know who the murderer is?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: "I don't know," "do you understand what I'm saying?" "In my memory," "the murderer was me."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: There was a greenhouse, didn't see the place clearly, ah, she had an injury on her face, but she seemed not afraid of the murderer at all, it's like they knew each other quite well.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Can you think of any details about the murderer?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I just got my memories back; I might need some more time.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: "You say you don't know anything; how are we supposed to investigate?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: How can I not know? I saw the murderer drowning Li Hui Lan in the bathtub.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: You saw it?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I saw it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Are you sure?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I saw it with my own eyes.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: Saw it with my own eyes.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1080_1260.text: I

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: "What I saw in my memory"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Great writer, don't kid around with us police officers, are you making up stories from the news?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: I'm telling the truth

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: The policeman nearby
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Take a break, wait for your family to bail you out.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: "Why don't you guys believe me""That flower room is big and noticeable"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Okay, okay, okay.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: And there are many wooden carvings inside. One of the carvings isn't even finished yet.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: "Can you look into Li Huilan's friends"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Jiang Fenggreat writer, you really know how to craft a story.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Hello, is this the police station? I'm at Haitang New Village, No. 20

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Mom, what are you doing

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman's mom
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: No calling the police, it's too embarrassing if this gets out.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Honey, open the door.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Leave, my sister doesn't want to see you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Wife, I'm wrong, let's go home, wife, I'm holding a knife in my hand right now, if you don't come out, I'll chop off my fingers, wife.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Sis, you can't go out, sis.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Mom, I know I didn't do well in the past, I will definitely change in the future.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Let's go home.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Why are you still staying here

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Younger Sister
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Don't mess around

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Let's go

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Can you slow down please

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: I beg you, I was wrong, I am sorry, can you let him get off first, if not, please let him get off.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Car, car

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: "Will you listen to me from now on?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: 'You treat me like garbage, wanting me to die, to die! Today, right in front of your family, in front of him, I knelt on the ground and you didn't even look at me. Are you satisfied now?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Are you satisfied now? Tell me, will you dare to leave me again? Will you dare to leave me again? Answer!

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Hey, whose files are you looking for?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jia
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Li Huilan

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: 'Shifu, do you really believe what Jiang Feng said? Li Huilan wasn't drowned at all. Don’t forget, he hit the hospital director; maybe the surgery did mess with his brain.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Is Jiang Feng a well-known writer?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: calculate

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Really? Then why would a famous writer come to the police station and lie?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Publicity, definitely for publicity. Nowadays, celebrities do this all the time. If they can't make entertainment news, they make social news. He must be coming out with a new book.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: When is the new book coming out?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I don’t know.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: The elderly man with gray hair
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I'm looking for your Captain Shen Hanqiang.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I haven’t…

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Bing
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Uncle, I'm sorry, could you please wait outside for a moment, just a moment.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Young Officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Captain Shen

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: The elderly man with gray hair
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I have an urgent matter.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Young Officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Mr. Jiang Feng says he wants to see you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I understand, give him some.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Understood.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: According to your story, the killer not only murdered Li Huilan but also an unknown woman. Is this a serial killer?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: is

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: But you just said Li Huilan was drowned. Now you're saying the killer murdered two people? Did the ending of the novel change?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: But what I’m saying is true.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: What's the phone number?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Ah

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Didn’t you say you saw Li Huilan calling home? What’s the number? You can’t remember a single digit?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Let me think, 9, 9.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: 'Is that the last digit?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: 'How could I remember that clearly?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: 'When did you have your memory surgery?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: On Friday, the day of the shooting incident.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Alright then, I'll go back and think things through carefully, I'll contact you once I have a clear understanding.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Officer Lei, detain him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Ah

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Ah

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Hey, I'm here to provide you with clues. Do you believe me or not?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: Of course not.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: I believe you, so

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: I suspect that you're involved in this case, cooperate a bit.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Master, Jiang Feng is talking nonsense, why are we keeping him?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Look at Li Hui Lan's home phone number and read it out loud.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: 0909914, 914, Master, this is just a coincidence.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: There's a new guy, bro, what did you do?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Is this your first time in here?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Your first time, huh? Then I need to enlighten you. What if they bully you next time you come in? Right? Do you know what this is for? It's specifically for those drug addicts. Once they are in here, they use all means to hurt themselves. There are many ways. There's stabbing with bars, there's pulling out rings and swallowing, Once in the south city, I encountered a woman. It was amazing. She hid needles in her hair and swallowed them. The police were all scared.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: This shitty place, all kinds of people are here, there are robbers, prostitutes, men who visit prostitutes, fighters, arsonists, and thieves. Bro, you still haven't told me why you're in here.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Fighting

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Fighting, you got beaten, didn't you? You're not that kind of person, I'm very accurate in reading people. You don't have that thing in your eyes.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: What kind of thing?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: "Have you ever seen a murderer's eyes?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Prisoner
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Ignoring me now? I didn't even want to chat with you, I've been talking all by myself.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Stop, zoom in on this, this is Jiang Feng, who's this guy, zoom in

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: "He seems to be picking something up"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: He seems to be picking something up, I'll go to the Memory Master, call me if anything.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Print it out

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: What are you here for?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: I received a call and came to check because I was worried

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: I'm fine, you can leave

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "You keep saying you're fine, but look at you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: I told you I'm fine! Stop worrying about me and just leave!

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "I can't let you live like this anymore. I'm taking you away."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "Where are you going? You need to leave now, my husband will be back any minute."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: None of your business, just go, you better leave now.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: "出现重大事故" Jiang Feng立即回应："别怕"，令人十分感动，任何人看了都会感动。紧接着他站起来准备阻止李慧兰急中生智， 可她却抓住他的胳膊拽住，紧张地喊道："别动"。看看屋子外边，江丰像是明白了什么，再次坐回沙发上，看着扶着墙壁走进来的人。他抬头看着对方，冷然出声道："你是谁"。 李惠兰紧张得不知所措，一时间语塞，只好硬着头皮道："快走"，她害怕的样子让人心疼，甚至有人想流泪，但是她并没有选择忍着泪，放弃抵抗，而是选择了面对。然后 她喊在剩余的光亮中看到了李慧兰丈夫的样子，他昏沉沉地摸着头坐了下来，带着醉意，他挥了挥手李慧兰才终于松了一口气，再向屋子里看，李惠兰的丈夫没有再看江丰，而是转头开始四处瞄视，似乎想要找出他在屋子里有没有留下什么痕迹。
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: Open up, open the door, open the door, open the door! You shameless thing, open up!

Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: 'Is he still alive?' 'I didn't mean to.' 'I didn't mean to.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "He's not dead. Leave him. Come with me."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "I can't leave. What about my daughter if I leave?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: "You can't call the police. Last time I ran away from home."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "He was questioned by the leaders," "If I disappear again this time," "he would lose his position," "I'll be fine," "It's been over a dozen years," "Nothing is going to happen to me."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "It's been over a dozen years," "He hasn't changed one bit," "What are you still hoping for?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "Don't be like this," "I'm not used to it."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "He's scum," "He's not going to cherish you,"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "Stop saying things like that," "Don't you find it strange to say such things?" "You scared me," "Sorry, please leave,"

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: Leave him, come with me, leave him, alright?

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: "Stop dreaming, I will never love you, you make me sick,"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Prisoner A
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "You scared me. You're crying. Having a nightmare? What did you dream of? Tell me about it."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Stay away from him. Move a bit.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Prisoner A
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Ah, care about him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Lean against the wall

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Hey Officer Lei, I saw some things again. I saw the killer push Li Hui Lan down the stairs. What's strange is that after Li Hui Lan was pushed down, it seemed like she couldn't see clearly.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Got it, I will report it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "Do you still not believe what I'm saying?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "Excuse me. Is this you?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: What were you picking up off the ground?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Oh, that day, I dropped my memory chip tag on the ground.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Remember this person, OK?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: What about this person?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "I watched the surveillance video." "I noticed you two were picking up something at the same time."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Prisoner A
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Officer, officer, I'm hungry. Do you have afternoon tea?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Do you want to stay for a late-night snack?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Hey, hey, hey, Officer Lei, you need to send someone to protect my wife right away.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Why

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "If the killer also took the wrong memory, my wife is in danger right now."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Ah

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Think about it carefully, the previous two victims were both people the suspect liked.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: That

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Let's talk about this later.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Hey, Officer Lei, Officer Lei

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Master, why haven't you come back yet?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: I'm still at the Memory Master. Any progress on your side?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Jiang Feng just remembered something. It seems to be related to the case. He said Li Hui Lan couldn't see clearly. I remember that the autopsy report mentioned. Li Hui Lan is severely myopic.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: This detail is very important. Get moving now. We'll meet at Li Hui Lan's house.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Oh, okay.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Prisoner A
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "Buddy, you're asking him to protect your wife. You might as well ask him to open the door and let us both go."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: Master, the objects that can solve the case have been taken away by the forensics team. Why are we still here?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: "You tell me what can solve the case?" "Every seemingly unnecessary object at the scene" "had a specific role at the time of the incident."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: Everything had its specific role, how many times have I told you, do not casually decide what can break the case and what cannot.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: What do you know, what are we here for?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: Let's go upstairs and have a look

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: "Master," "look what I found," "Master," "Master, look at this"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: "How many times do you need to ask?" "I have a life too"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: Mrs. Zhang, sorry for the inconvenience, we went back to check the statements and found some issues, could we trouble you again?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: According to your statement, the time you knocked on Li Xiaoyun's door was at nine o’clock and one minute. At that time, Li Xiaoyun said there was nothing wrong at home, but according to the police station records, Li Xiaoyun's time of report was nine o’clock and three, only two minutes apart.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: I definitely did not remember wrong, the time I arrived at his house was precisely nine o’clock and one minute.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: How could you remember so precisely?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: It's simple, every evening I am watching the drama series 'The Silent Bird', that day I heard noises of arguments from her house, I didn't leave right away as I was watching TV, after all, their house is often like this, this TV drama, airs the preview of the next episode every night starting at fifty-nine minutes past eight, it switches to commercials at nine o'clock, I left immediately after watching the summer preview, look, just a few steps to her house, at most a minute, right?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.speaker: Shen Hanqiang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: "Do you know where Li Huilan might have gone after leaving home?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: I'm not sure about that, but during that time, her daughter would go to school and come back as if everything was normal, like nothing had happened.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "So, does Li Xiaoyun know where her mother is?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "I'm even less sure about that," "but during the time her mother ran away," "I saw Li Xiaoyun being driven home twice," "The odd thing was," "each time the car was parked a long way off," "and Li Xiaoyun would get out and walk back home by herself."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Oh, and, I once overheard a fight between her and her father, Li Hang asked Li Xiaoyun, "Where is your mother?" and guess what Li Xiaoyun said?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "What did she say?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Mrs. Zhang
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: The girl said, "Why do you care where she went, even if she's dead, it's better than being with you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Hey, I want to ask you something.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "Don't ask me, I don't know anything."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: You said before, why did that woman swallow the needle into her stomach?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "What do you think?" "For medical parole, of course," "If you hurt yourself here," "the cops are scared someone will die," "so they'll for sure send you to the hospital."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: What about the stuff you hid?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Me hide something?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "I can give you money," "I want out."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Master

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Hmm

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Snap out of it

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: What's the time?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Master, have you thought about getting a new car?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: "It's wrapped in tape," "it won't kill if swallowed," "you can spit it out or pass it later."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: As long as the cops think you’re not faking, they'll definitely send you to the hospital.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.speaker: Inmate
movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Hey, buddy, you haven't told me how much you'll give me yet.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'How much would it take for you to swallow this?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Person
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'I'll swallow it.' 'Are you crazy?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Person
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Police Officer

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: What are you doing?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'He swallowed a blade.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Prison guard
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Move away, I'll handle it. Damn it, he swallowed the blade! Spit it out, spit it out!

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Police Officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Hey, what are you doing? Open the door, hurry up and open the door, open the door.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Daichen

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Jiang Feng, why are you out first? I was just arranging your bail.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Police Officer 2
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Sorry, you can't leave.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Listen to me first. In the next few days, be cautious of strangers around you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: What strangers? What do you mean?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Let go of me! Let go of me!

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'Let him go! I just arranged his bail.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: You have the wrong person.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Police Officer 3
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Don't move.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Xiaofeng

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'I am formally detaining you for assaulting an officer.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: I just arranged his bail.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Police Officer 3
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Let's go, behave yourself.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Who are you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: He's my husband, officer. My husband is normally a very gentle person. I don't know what's gotten into him these past few days, but please trust me, he's really not a bad person.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: You need to take care of that wound. Kim, take this lady to Dr. Chen.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: It's just a scratch, it's fine.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: We need to follow procedure. As his family member, please cooperate.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: 'If you can hold on for ten more minutes, your wife's bail process will be completed.' I trust you. 'I've been to the Memory Master place. They were very uncooperative. They insisted I produce a search warrant. Given the current situation, even applying for a search warrant will take at least ten days to two weeks. So, for now, I can't confirm who exchanged memories with you.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: How is my wife?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Find out his identity

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Then let's hurry up and find him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "Your wife has been explaining to me," "saying our Jiang Feng used to be a very gentle person.""What you did tonight" "is this your true nature?""Huh?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Now, your memory is our only basis for solving the case. You need to cooperate with me as much as possible. Give me more clues. I can find the killer. This way, you and your wife can truly be safe.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Alright, I'll do whatever you say.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Does it hurt?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Mm, it's okay.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Thank you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "You're welcome. I'm just doing Officer Shen a favor. My name is Chen Shanna. You can call me Shanshan."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "My name is Zhang Dai."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Zhang Daichen, right? It's written on the medical record.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: This text does not provide any content for translation from Chinese to English.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: This wound of yours is quite deep. Officer Shen told me all about it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "My husband didn't mean it."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: He didn't mean it, but you also need to be careful.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Jiang Feng, hey

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "Now, don't worry about anything." "Relax." "Focus on recalling the details." "Hey, hey, try to see if you can stay conscious in your dreams."

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: "How can I stay conscious in a dream?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Here's how you do it. Before you sleep, keep giving yourself psychological suggestions, "I'm dreaming," "I'm dreaming," it's that simple. Relax now, make yourself comfortable, and sleep.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Li Huilan's husband
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Who has been here?

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Li Huilan's husband
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Who has been here, saying

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Li Huilan
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: Really, no one has been here.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.speaker: Li Xiaoyun
movie101_6992521335159292452_2880_3060.text: I'm sorry. I really didn't know who else to find. I could only call you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3060_3240.speaker: Li Xiaoyun
movie101_6992521335159292452_3060_3240.text: "Just go. You staying here will just cause trouble."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3060_3240.speaker: Li Xiaoyun
movie101_6992521335159292452_3060_3240.text: "I'll call the police after you leave."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: Officer Shen, Officer Shen, Officer Shen

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: Jiang Feng, Jiang Feng, Jiang Feng

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: "I figured it out. You said some things are blurred. Some places can't enter. That's because you took someone else's memory. What he didn't notice, you naturally can't see clearly, where he can't go, you naturally can't go in."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: "Then, who do you say usually has the habit of wearing white gloves?”

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: What does the goldfish floating in the air represent?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: "This is just a surreal thing, is it your dream getting confused with memory?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3240_3420.text: "No." " People from the medical center have told me." " This is a memory overload,"" not a dream."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: What is the relationship with the murderer?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "They know each other, but he didn't see the entire process of the murder. He thinks the murderer came to help his mom. There's one more thing I couldn't figure out—in my memory, I was so ruthless to Li Huilan, but at the moment I saw her take her last breath, I had a very strange feeling."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: What feeling?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Happiness for her.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Oh right, there's one more thing, the last call from Li Huilan's house was made to the murderer.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Doctor Chen

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: I brought you some medicine. This medicine I have is very effective in removing scars. I'll give it to you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "How could I trouble you so?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: It's no trouble.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "Oh, sorry, please come in and sit."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "In such hot weather, you specially came to deliver medicine. It's really too kind of you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "Actually, I was passing by." "I also wanted to ask you something." "I have a ticket to a concert." "I really couldn't find anyone to go with me. I wonder if you'd be interested."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "I'd love to go. But—"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: How about this, I'll give you my business card. It has my phone number. If you change your mind, or if your wound has any issues, give me a call anytime.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: "Okay, thank you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Then I won't disturb you further. I need to get back to the hospital.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Master

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Keep it down

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Hello Xiaoyun, is it convenient for Uncle to ask you a few questions?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: The police uncle is asking you a question.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Don't be nervous, we just want to confirm a few details with you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Xiaoyun Ji, do you know where your mom went during the time she went missing? Little girl, don't lie. How could your mom leave home without telling you? And I also heard that some time ago, someone gave you a ride home. Who was that person?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Xiaoyun Ji
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: I just hitched a ride with a classmate.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: A classmate? Which classmate? What's the name? Take me to find him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Li Xiaoyun
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Uncle, are you questioning me now as a police officer? Did you come to find me with the knowledge of the station? You should be very clear that I'm a minor.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: What kind of attitude is this?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Why scare her?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: I think she definitely has a problem.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: What do you think about her relationship with her mother?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: "I think it's not bad."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Then what do you think, why would she cover for the murderer of her mother?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: I know, Li Xiaoyun must be fed up with her parents' quarrels, so she simply killed her mother and framed her father.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Lawyer Li, yeah, I also find it strange, Jiang Feng, yeah, definitely something is wrong, really? That's great, then I am relieved.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Master, I can't figure it out, what do you think? Is it more likely that Li Xiaoyun is protecting the murderer, or that Jiang Feng has lost his mind?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Here they come.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Li Hang, we'd like to understand more about what happened on the night of the incident. Please cooperate.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: I'm talking to you. Lift your head up.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Li Hang, can you recount what happened on the night of the incident?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Li Hang
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: I drank, I hit her, then she died.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Can you be more specific?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Li Hang
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: I've already explained everything I have to say.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Say it again

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Li Hang
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: 'I've already confessed.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: So you're sure that you personally bludgeoned Li Huilan to death?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Li Hang
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Or what?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Do you know about your daughter's recent social activities?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: During the time the incident occurred, did you see anyone drive your daughter home?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Answer

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: The files of female domestic violence victims over the years are all here.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "I don't think she would have called the police, ""This is another Li Huiran, they don't think it's a crime for their husbands to abuse them."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: Also, the two victims' personalities are very similar, but the killer's attitudes towards them are very different.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "One is drugged behind their back, one is killed face-to-face with a weapon. According to criminal logic, it doesn't seem like the work of one person."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "Is it possible that you received the memories of more than one person?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: Is it possible he has multiple personalities.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: She said there was no one else at home on the night of the crime.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: Impossible, ""She's lying.""Why don't you get her here, and I'll confront her face to face?

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "You say bring her here like it's that easy!" "She's a minor," if you want to overturn this testimony, "I'll need her guardian," "her school's legal representative," and "I also have to notify the relevant youth protection agency."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "What is this?" "Didn't you say the last phone call from Li Huiran's house was not traced?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "You found out, why did you lie to me!"

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "Whose phone is this," "you could've found out with just one call."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: "Do I have to report to you?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'My wife is out there in danger at any moment,' Officer Shen released his hold

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'Please take Mr. Jiang Feng back,' then he took his hand off Jiang Feng's

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Policeman
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'Mr. Jiang Feng, leave,' and Jiang Feng, with an angry face, was forcibly taken away by the prison guard who came in.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Officer Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'Sis Daichen, you're here,' The two walked upstairs arm in arm

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: A police officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: Officer Lei, "No blade was found in Gu Haibo's stomach"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'Could you do me a favor? You're so close to Officer Shen, could you ask him when my husband can come out?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: 'Actually, it's been a long time since I've been to a concert. After getting married, even the number of new friends I make has dwindled. Did you know I used to be a writer, but then I stopped writing'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Officer Chen Shanshan
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: It would be great if you continued writing

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: "I will. Anyway, it's never too late to write a book."

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Doctor
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Don't move. The more you move, the bigger the wound gets. I'll give you a sedative injection first.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: You now have two choices. Either I kill him and you shoot me, or you put the gun down and no one gets hurt.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Police officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Alright, alright. Don't be impulsive. I'll put the gun down.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Give him a sedative injection. Do it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Police officer
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Alright, can you put the scissors down now?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Zhang Daichen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Xiaofeng, what's wrong with your voice? Hello? Did you get out?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Don't ask these things now. Where are you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Stay there, don't move. Wait for me.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: 'What's the situation now, huh? Why aren't you out there looking for Jiang Feng? What are you doing here?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Master, I found a lead.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: What lead?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Let me ask you, what do you think is the relationship between the killer and the mysterious victim?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Lovers

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: "Wrong, not quite. Let me rephrase it. What do you think is the relationship between the killer and the mysterious victim's husband?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Rivals in love

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: "Wrong again," said Officer Lei. "Alright, let me ask you this. If one day you got married, and came home after work to find someone having an affair with your wife, what would you do?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: 'I'd castrate him.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: 'What if there's nothing to castrate?'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: So, I think there's another possibility in the relationship between the killer and the victim.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Officer Lei
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Master, isn't it possible that the killer could be a woman?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: I brought you food, medicine, books, and some clean clothes.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Thank you

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Long-haired woman
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Hey, bring me two painkillers.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Man
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Who's here?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Leave him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Do you want me to leave my husband?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Don't you understand? He's just a scumbag.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Li Hui Lan
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Stop dreaming. I will never love you. You make me sick.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Sister Dai Chen, how about I wait at the entrance with you?

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.speaker: Dai Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Alright.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Jiang Feng, you must stay calm. No matter what you see, don't act rashly.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: I asked you, where's my wife?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Jiang Feng, you were right. Shanshan Chen is the murderer, but I didn't expect her to go after a pregnant woman.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Don't you know your wife is pregnant?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Can you wait for me a bit longer? I have something to tell you.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Jiang Feng, Jiang Feng, don't act rashly.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Shanshan Chen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: As long as you don't get your memories back, I won't sign anything.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Jiang Feng, listen to me. Your wife's death, I will make Shanshan Chen pay for it. Don't act rashly.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Jiang Feng
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Pay? What pay? Ten years in prison? Twenty years or a life sentence?

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: Jiang Feng, I know you both have gone through a lot to have a child.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: "She's already dead. What good will this do?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: I went to see the memory master.

movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.speaker: Officer Shen
movie101_6992521335159292452_5760_5940.text: "We can't let Li Hui Lan's incident happen again. You stay with Dai Chen for a while and hide."
